original: (PB 1.1.1) oṃ mahan me voco bhargo me voco yaśo me vocaḥ stomaṃ me voco bhuktiṃ me vocaḥ sarvaṃ me vocas tan māvatu tan māviśatu tena bhukṣiṣīya
analyzed: om mahat me vocaḥ bhargaḥ me vocaḥ yaśaḥ me vocaḥ stomam me vocaḥ bhuktim me vocaḥ sarvam me vocaḥ tat mā avatu tat mā āviśatu tena bhukṣiṣīya

original: (PB 1.1.2) devo devam etu somaḥ somam etv ṛtasya pathā
analyzed: devaḥ devam etu somaḥ somam etu ṛtasya pathā

original: (PB 1.1.3) vihāya dauṣkṛtyam
analyzed: vihāya dauṣkṛtyam

original: (PB 1.1.4) badvā nāmasi sṛtiḥ somasaraṇī somaṃ gameyam
analyzed: badvā nāma asi sṛtiḥ soma saraṇī somam gameyam

original: (PB 1.1.5) pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūḥ
analyzed: pitaraḥ bhūḥ pitaraḥ bhūḥ pitaraḥ bhūḥ

original: (PB 1.1.6) nṛmaṇa ūrdhvabharasaṃ tvordhvabharā dṛśeyam
analyzed: nṛmaṇaḥ ūrdhva bharasam tvā ūrdhva bharā dṛśeyam

original: (PB 1.1.7) mṛdā śithirā devānāṃ tīrthaṃ vedir asi mā mā hiṃsīḥ
analyzed: mṛdā śithirā devānām tīrtham vediḥ asi mā mā hiṃsīḥ

original: (PB 1.1.8) viṣṇoḥ śiro 'si yaśodhā yaśo mayi dhehi
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ śiraḥ asi yaśaḥ dhāḥ yaśaḥ mayi dhehi

original: (PB 1.1.9) iṣa ūrja āyuṣe varcase ca
analyzed: iṣe ūrje āyuṣe varcase ca

original: (PB 1.2.1) yunajmi te pṛthivīm agninā saha yunajmi vācaṃ saha sūryeṇa yukto vāto 'ntarikṣeṇa te saha yuktās tisro vimṛjaḥ sūryasya
analyzed: yunajmi te pṛthivīm agninā saha yunajmi vācam saha sūryeṇa yuktaḥ vātaḥ antarikṣeṇa tvad saha yuktāḥ tisraḥ vimṛjaḥ sūryasya

original: (PB 1.2.2) ṛtasya sadane sīdāmi
analyzed: ṛtasya sadane sīdāmi

original: (PB 1.2.3) ṛtapātram asi
analyzed: ṛta pātram asi

original: (PB 1.2.4) vānaspatyo 'si bārhaspatyo 'si prājāpatyo 'si prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase brahmavarcasāya
analyzed: vānaspatyaḥ asi bārhaspatyaḥ asi prājāpatyaḥ asi prajāpateḥ mūrdhā asi atyāyu pātram asi idam aham mām prāñcam prohāmi tejase brahmavarcasāya

original: (PB 1.2.5) maruto napāto 'pāṅkṣayāḥ parvatānāṅkakubhaḥ śyenā ajirā endraṃ vagnunā vahata ghoṣeṇāmīvāṃ cātayadhvaṃ yuktāstha vahata
analyzed: marutaḥ napātaḥ apāṅkṣayāḥ parvatānām kakubhaḥ śyenāḥ ajirāḥ ā indram vagnunā vahata ghoṣeṇa amīvām cātayadhvam yuktāḥ astha vahata

original: (PB 1.2.6) idam aham amuṃ yajamānaṃ paśuṣv adhy ūhāmi paśuṣu ca māṃ brahmavarcase ca
analyzed: idam aham amum yajamānam paśuṣu adhi ūhāmi paśuṣu ca mām brahmavarcase ca

original: (PB 1.2.7) vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā saṃ mṛjantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā saṃ mṛjantv ādityās tvā jāgatena chandasā saṃ mṛjantu
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā sam mṛjantu rudrāḥ tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā sam mṛjantu ādityāḥ tvā jāgatena chandasā sam mṛjantu

original: (PB 1.2.8) pavitraṃ te vitataṃ brahmaṇaspate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvato 'taptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantaḥ saṃ tad āśataḥ
analyzed: pavitram te vitan brahmaṇaspate prabhuḥ gātrāṇi pari eṣi viśvatas a tapta tanūḥ na tat āmaḥ aśnute śṛtāsaḥ id vahantaḥ sam tat āśataḥ

original: (PB 1.2.9) praśukraitu devīmanīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājy āyuṣe me pacasva varcase
analyzed: praśukrā etu devī manīṣā asmat rathaḥ su taṣṭaḥ na vājī āyuṣe me pacasva varcase

original: me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāya
analyzed: me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyāḥ divaḥ janitrāt śṛṇvantu āpaḥ adhas kṣarantīḥ soma iha udgāya

original: mām āyuṣe mama brahmavarcasāya yajamānasyarddhyā amuṣya rājyāya
analyzed: mām āyuṣe mama brahmavarcasāya yajamānasya ṛddhyai amuṣya rājyāya

original: (PB 1.3.1) vekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāhā
analyzed: vekurā nāmā asi juṣṭā devebhyaḥ namaḥ vāce namaḥ vācaḥ pataye devi vāc yat te vācaḥ madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāhā

original: (PB 1.3.2) sūryo mā divyābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāhā
analyzed: sūryaḥ mā divyābhyaḥ nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyuḥ antarikṣābhyaḥ agniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāhā

original: (PB 1.3.3) yo 'dya saumyo vadho 'ghāyūnām udīrate viṣūkuhasya dhanvanāpa tān varuṇo 'pa dhamatu
analyzed: yaḥ adya saumyaḥ vadhaḥ aghāyūnām udīrate viṣūkuhasya dhanvanā apa tān varuṇaḥ apa dhamatu

original: (PB 1.3.4) yo ma ātmā yā me prajā ye me paśavas tair ahaṃ mano vācaṃ pra sīdāmi
analyzed: yaḥ mama ātmā yā me prajā ye me paśavaḥ taiḥ aham manaḥ vācam pra sīdāmi

original: (PB 1.3.5) agnes tejasendrasyendriyeṇa sūryasya varcasā bṛhaspatis tvā yunaktu devebhyaḥ
analyzed: agneḥ tejasā indrasya indriyeṇa sūryasya varcasā bṛhaspatiḥ tvā yunaktu devebhyaḥ

original: prāṇāyāgnir yunaktu tapasā somaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
analyzed: prāṇāya agniḥ yunaktu tapasā somam yajñāya voḍhave dadhātu indraḥ indriyam satyāḥ kāmāḥ yajamānasya santu

original: (PB 1.3.6) annaṃ kariṣyāmy annaṃ praviṣyāmy annaṃ janayiṣyāmi
analyzed: annam kariṣyāmi annam praviṣyāmi annam janayiṣyāmi

original: (PB 1.3.7) annam akaram annam abhūd annam ajījanam
analyzed: annam akaram annam abhūt annam ajījanam

original: (PB 1.3.8) śyeno 'si gāyatracchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
analyzed: śyenaḥ asi gāyatra chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe svasti mā sam pāraya ā mā stotrasya stotram gamyāt indravantaḥ vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: (PB 1.3.9) saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tapobhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena saṃ vijñānena
analyzed: sam varcasā payasā sam tapobhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena sam vijñānena

original: manasaś ca satyair yathā vo 'haṃ cārutamaṃ vadānīndro vo dṛśe bhūyāsaṃ sūryaś cakṣuṣe
analyzed: manasaḥ ca satyaiḥ yathā vaḥ aham cārutamam vadāni indraḥ vaḥ dṛśe bhūyāsam sūryaḥ cakṣuṣe

original: vātaḥ prāṇāya somo gandhāya brahma kṣatrāya
analyzed: vātaḥ prāṇāya somaḥ gandhāya brahma kṣatrāya

original: (PB 1.3.10) namo gandharvāya viṣvag vādine varcodhā asi varco mayi dhehi
analyzed: namaḥ gandharvāya viṣvañc vādine varcaḥ dhāḥ asi varcaḥ mayi dhehi

original: (PB 1.4.1) adhvanām adhvapate svasti me 'dyāsmin devayāne pathi bhūyāt
analyzed: adhvanām adhva pate svasti me adya asmin deva yāne pathi bhūyāt

original: (PB 1.4.2) samrāḍ asi kṛśānuḥ
analyzed: samrāj asi kṛśānuḥ

original: (PB 1.4.3) tutho 'si janadhāyo nabho 'si pratakvāsaṃmṛṣṭo 'si havyasūdanaḥ
analyzed: tuthaḥ asi jana dhāyaḥ nabhaḥ asi pratakvā asaṃmṛṣṭaḥ asi havya sūdanaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.4) vibur asi pravāhaṇaḥ
analyzed: vibuḥ asi pravāhaṇaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.5) vahnir asi havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: vahniḥ asi havya vāhanaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.6) śvātro 'si pracetāḥ
analyzed: śvātraḥ asi pracetāḥ

original: (PB 1.4.7) tutho 'si viśvavedā uśig asi kavir aṅghārir asi bambhārir avasyur asi duvasvān
analyzed: tuthaḥ asi viśva vedāḥ uśij asi kaviḥ aṅghāriḥ asi bambhāriḥ avasyuḥ asi duvasvān

original: (PB 1.4.8) śundhyur asi mārjālīyaḥ
analyzed: śundhyuḥ asi mārjālīyaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.9) ṛtadhāmāsi svarjyotiḥ
analyzed: ṛta dhāmā asi svar jyotiḥ

original: (PB 1.4.10) samudro 'si viśvavyacāḥ
analyzed: samudraḥ asi viśva vyacāḥ

original: (PB 1.4.11) ahir asi budhnyaḥ
analyzed: ahiḥ asi budhnyaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.12) ajo 'sy ekapāt
analyzed: ajaḥ asi eka pād

original: (PB 1.4.13) sagarā asi budhnyaḥ
analyzed: sagarāḥ asi budhnyaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.14) kavyo 'si kavyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: kavyaḥ asi kavya vāhanaḥ

original: (PB 1.4.15) pāta māgnayo raudreṇānīkena piṣṭata mā namo vo 'stu mā mā hiṃsiṣṭa
analyzed: pāta mā agnayo raudreṇa anīkena piṣṭata mā namaḥ vaḥ astu mā mā hiṃsiṣṭa

original: (PB 1.5.1) ṛtasya dvārau stho mā mā saṃ tāptam
analyzed: ṛtasya dvārau sthaḥ mā mā sam tāptam

original: (PB 1.5.2) namaḥ sakhibhyaḥ pūrvasadbhyo namo parasadbhyaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ sakhibhyaḥ pūrva sadbhyaḥ namaḥ para sadbhyaḥ

original: (PB 1.5.3) śyeno nṛcakṣā agneṣ ṭvā cakṣuṣāva paśyāmi
analyzed: śyenaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ agneḥ tvā cakṣuṣā ava paśyāmi

original: (PB 1.5.4) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato gāyatracchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: indo indra pītasya te indriyāvataḥ gāyatra chandasaḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.5.5) ūrdhvaḥ sapta ṛṣīn upa tiṣṭhasvendrapīto vācas pate saptartvijo 'bhyuc chrayasva juṣasva lokam mārvāg ava gāḥ
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ sapta ṛṣīn upa tiṣṭhasva indra pītaḥ vācaḥ pate sapta ṛtvijaḥ abhi ud śrayasva juṣasva lokam mā arvāk ava gāḥ

original: (PB 1.5.6) soma rārandhi no hṛdi pitā no 'si mama tan mā mā hiṃsīḥ
analyzed: soma rārandhi naḥ hṛdi pitā naḥ asi mama tat mā mā hiṃsīḥ

original: (PB 1.5.7) soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ vardhayāmo vācovidaḥ sumṛḍīko na ā viśa
analyzed: soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam vardhayāmaḥ vācaḥ vidaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ naḥ ā viśa

original: (PB 1.5.8) ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam

original: bhavā vājasya saṃgathe
analyzed: bhava vājasya saṃgathe

original: (PB 1.5.9) avamais ta ūrdhvais te kāvyais te pitṛbhir bhakṣitasya madhumato nārāśaṃsasya sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: avamaiḥ te ūrdhvaiḥ te kāvyaiḥ te pitṛbhiḥ bhakṣitasya madhumataḥ nārāśaṃsasya sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.5.10) dīkṣāyai varṇena tapaso rūpeṇa manaso mahimnā vāco vibhūtyā prajāpatis tvā yunaktu prajābhyo 'pānāya
analyzed: dīkṣāyai varṇa tapasaḥ rūpeṇa manasaḥ mahimnā vācaḥ vibhūtyā prajāpatiḥ tvā yunaktu prajābhyaḥ apānāya

original: (PB 1.5.11) vāyur yunaktu manasā stomaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
analyzed: vāyuḥ yunaktu manasā stomam yajñāya voḍhave dadhātu indraḥ indriyam satyāḥ kāmāḥ yajamānasya santu

original: (PB 1.5.12) vṛṣako 'si triṣṭupchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
analyzed: vṛṣakaḥ asi triṣṭubh chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe svasti mā sam pāraya ā mā stotrasya stotram gamyāt indravantaḥ vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: (PB 1.5.13) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato triṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: indo indra pītasya te indriyāvataḥ triṣṭubh chandasaḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.5.14) sūryo yunaktu vācā stomaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
analyzed: sūryaḥ yunaktu vācā stomam yajñāya voḍhave dadhātu indraḥ indriyam satyāḥ kāmāḥ yajamānasya santu

original: (PB 1.5.15) svaro 'si gayo 'si jagacchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām
analyzed: svaraḥ asi gayaḥ asi jagat chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe svasti mā sam pāraya ā mā stotrasya stotram gamyāt indravantaḥ vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām

original: (PB 1.5.16) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato triṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: indo indra pītasya te indriyāvataḥ triṣṭubh chandasaḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.5.17) āyur me prāṇo mano 'si me prāṇa āyupatnyām ṛci yan me mano yamaṃ gataṃ yad vā me aparāgataṃ rājñā somena tad vayaṃ punar asmāsu
analyzed: āyuḥ me prāṇaḥ manaḥ asi mama prāṇaḥ āyu patnyām ṛc yat me manaḥ yamam gatam yat vā me a parāgatam rājñā somena tat vayam punar asmāsu

original: (PB 1.5.18) yan me yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ mano jagāma dūragās tan ma āvartayā punar jīvātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye
analyzed: yat mad yamam vaivasvata manaḥ jagāma dūra gāḥ tat me āvartaya punar jīvātave na martave atha u ariṣṭatātaye

original: (PB 1.5.19) yenāhy ājim ajayad vicakṣya yena śyenaṃ śakunaṃ suparṇaṃ yad āhuś cakṣur aditāv anantaṃ somo nṛcakṣā mayi tad dadhātu
analyzed: yena ahi ājim ajayat vicakṣya yena śyenam śakunam suparṇam yat āhuḥ cakṣuḥ aditau anantam somaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ mayi tat dadhātu

original: (PB 1.6.1) aindraṃ saho 'sarji tasya ta indav indrapītasyendriyāvato 'nuṣṭupchandaso harivataḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: aindram sahaḥ asarji tasya te indo indra pītasya indriyāvataḥ anuṣṭubh chandasaḥ harivataḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.6.2) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato 'nuṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: indo indra pītasya te indriyāvataḥ anuṣṭubh chandasaḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.6.3) stutasya stutam asy ūrjasvat payasvad ā mā stotrasya strotraṃ. gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
analyzed: stutasya stutam asi ūrjasvat payasvat ā mā stotrasya strotram gamyāt indravantaḥ vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: (PB 1.6.4) iṣṭayajuṣas te deva soma stutastomasya śastokthasya tirohnyasya yo 'śvasanir gosanir bhakṣas tasyopahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: iṣṭa yajuṣaḥ te deva soma stuta stomasya śasta ukthasya tirohnyasya yaḥ aśva saniḥ go saniḥ bhakṣaḥ tasya upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.6.5) ṛtasya tvā deva stomapade viṣṇor dhāmāni vi muñcāmy etat tvaṃ deva stomān avakaram agann aśīmahi vayaṃ pratiṣṭhām
analyzed: ṛtasya tvā deva stoma pade viṣṇoḥ dhāmāni vi muñcāmi etat tvam deva stomān avakaram agan aśīmahi vayam pratiṣṭhām

original: (PB 1.6.6) somehānu mehi soma saha sadasa indriyeṇa
analyzed: soma iha anu mā ihi soma saha sadasaḥ indriyeṇa

original: (PB 1.6.7) subhūr asi śreṣṭho raśmir devānāṃ saṃsad devānāṃ yātur yayā tanvā brahma jinvasi tayā mā jinva tayā mā janaya prakāśaṃ mā kuru
analyzed: subhūḥ asi śreṣṭhaḥ raśmiḥ devānām saṃsad devānām yātuḥ yayā tanvā brahma jinvasi tayā mā jinva tayā mā janaya prakāśam mā kuru

original: (PB 1.6.8) apāṃ puṣpam asy oṣadhīnāṃ rasa indrasya priyatamaṃ haviḥ svāhā
analyzed: apām puṣpam asi oṣadhīnām rasaḥ indrasya priyatamam haviḥ svāhā

original: (PB 1.6.9) hāriyojanasya te deva someṣṭayajuṣaḥ stutastomasya śastokthasya yo 'śvasanir gosanir bhakṣas tasyopahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: hāriyojanasya te deva soma iṣṭa yajuṣaḥ stuta stomasya śasta ukthasya yaḥ aśva saniḥ go saniḥ bhakṣaḥ tasya upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 1.6.10) devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi pitṛkṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi manuṣyakṛtasyainaso
analyzed: deva kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi pitṛ kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi manuṣya kṛtasya enasaḥ

original: 'vayajanam asy asmatkṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi yad divā ca naktaṃ cainaś cakṛma

original: (PB 3.9.4) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhait ya etayā stute
analyzed: eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhait yaḥ etayā stute

original: (PB 3.10.1) caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo
analyzed: caturdaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ saḥ ekayā pañcadaśabhyaḥ

original: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekādaśabhiḥ
analyzed: hiṅ karoti saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekādaśabhiḥ pañcadaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti saḥ ekādaśabhiḥ

original: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhir nirmadhyā
analyzed: saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ nirmadhyā

original: (PB 3.10.2) astīva vā ayaṃ loko 'stīvāsau chidram ivedam antarikṣaṃ yad eṣā nirmadhyā bhavatīmān eva lokān anu prajāyate pra prajayā pra paśubhir  #
analyzed: asti iva vai ayam lokaḥ asti iva asau chidram iva idam antarikṣam yat eṣā nirmadhyā bhavati imān eva lokān anu prajāyate pra prajayā pra paśubhiḥ  /

original: jāyate ya etayā stute
analyzed: jāyate yaḥ etayā stute

original: (PB 3.11.1) pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo
analyzed: pañcadaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekādaśabhiḥ saḥ ekayā pañcadaśabhyaḥ

original: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ
analyzed: hiṅ karoti saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekādaśabhiḥ caturdaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ

original: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ

original: (PB 3.11.2) ājyānāṃ prathamā pṛṣṭhānāṃ dvitīyokthānāṃ tṛtīyā
analyzed: ājyānām prathamā pṛṣṭhānām dvitīyā ukthānām tṛtīyā

original: (PB 3.11.3) yājyānāṃ sā hotur yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yokthānāṃ sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino
analyzed: yā ājyānām sā hotuḥ yā pṛṣṭhānām sā maitrāvaruṇasya yā ukthānām sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ

original: yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sahotur yokthānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yājyānāṃ
analyzed: yā eva hotuḥ sā acchāvākasya yā pṛṣṭhānām sa hotuḥ yā ukthānām sā maitrāvaruṇasya yājyānām

original: sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yokthānāṃ sā hotur yājyānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya
analyzed: sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ yā eva hotuḥ sā acchāvākasya yā ukthānām sā hotuḥ yājyānām sā maitrāvaruṇasya

original: yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya sarvā ājyeṣu sarvāḥ pṛṣtheṣu sarvā uktheṣu
analyzed: yā pṛṣṭhānām brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ yā eva hotuḥ sā acchāvākasya sarvāḥ ājyeṣu sarvāḥ pṛṣtheṣu sarvāḥ uktheṣu

original: (PB 3.11.4) paśavo vai samīṣantī yad eṣā sarvāṇi savanāny anusaṃcaraty anusavanam evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayati paśuman bhavati ya etayā stute
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai samīṣantī yat eṣā sarvāṇi savanāni anusaṃcarati anusavanam eva enam paśubhiḥ samardhayati paśumān bhavati yaḥ etayā stute

original: (PB 3.12.1) ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvadaśabhiḥ sa ekayā ṣoḍaśabhyo
analyzed: ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvadaśabhiḥ saḥ ekayā ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ

original: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvādaśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa dvādaśabhiḥ
analyzed: hiṅ karoti saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvādaśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa dvādaśabhiḥ

original: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ

original: (PB 3.12.2) anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ paśavaś chandogā yat ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ-ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti ṣoḍaśakalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti
analyzed: antaḥ vai aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ paśavaḥ chandogāḥ yat ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti

original: (PB 3.12.3) dvādaśabhir vihitaikā paricarā dvādaśamāsās saṃvvatsaro yajamānaḥ paricarā
analyzed: dvādaśabhiḥ vihitā ekā paricarā dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ yajamānaḥ paricarā

original: yad dvādaśabhir vidadhāty ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tad antatas saṃvvatsare
analyzed: yat dvādaśabhiḥ vidadhāti ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tat antatas saṃvvatsare

original: paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitāṣṭācatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
analyzed: paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā aṣṭācatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ etayā stute

original: (PB 3.13.1) ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo
analyzed: ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ

original: hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ
analyzed: hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ

original: sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir nedīyaḥsaṃkramā
analyzed: sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ nedīyaḥ saṃkramā

original: (PB 3.13.2) anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśo yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ sṛptvā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmaty evam etan nedīyaḥsaṃkramayā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmati
analyzed: antaḥ vai aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ yathā mahā vṛkṣasya agram sṛptvā nedīyaḥ saṃkramāt saṃkrāmati evam etat nedīyaḥ saṃkramayā nedīyaḥ saṃkramāt saṃkrāmati

original: (PB 3.13.3) daśabhir vihitā tisraḥ paricarā daśākṣarā virāḍ etāvān puruṣo yad ātmā
analyzed: daśabhiḥ vihitā tisraḥ paricarā daśa akṣarā virāj etāvān puruṣaḥ yat ātmā

original: prajā jāyā yad daśabhir vidadhātt tisraḥ paricarā bhavanti yajamānam eva tad virājy
analyzed: prajāḥ jāyāḥ yat daśabhiḥ vidadhāt tisraḥ paricarāḥ bhavanti yajamānam eva tat virāji

original: annādye 'ntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayaty annādo bhavati ya etayā stute
analyzed: annādye antatas pratiṣṭhāpayati anna ādaḥ bhavati yaḥ etayā stute

original: (PB 4.1.1) gāvo vā etat sattram āsata tāsāṃ daśasu māssu śṛṅgaṇy ajāyanta tā abruvannarāḥ smottiṣṭhāmopaśā no 'jñateti tā udatiṣṭhan
analyzed: gāvaḥ vai etat sattram āsata tāsām daśasu māssu śṛṅgaṇī ajāyanta tāḥ abruvan narāḥ sma uttiṣṭhāma upaśāḥ naḥ ajñata iti tāḥ udatiṣṭhan

original: (PB 4.1.2) tāsāṃ tv evābruvann āsāmahā evemau dvādaśau māsau saṃsaṃvvatsaram āpayāmeti
analyzed: tāsām tu eva bruvan āsāmahai eva imau dvādaśau māsau saṃsaṃvatsaram āpayāma iti

original: tāsāṃ dvādaśasu māḥsu śṛṅgāṇi prāvartanta tāḥ sarvam annādyam āpnuvaṃs tā etās tūparās
analyzed: tāsām dvādaśasu māḥsu śṛṅgāṇi prāvartanta tāḥ sarvam annādyam āpnuvan tāḥ etāḥ tūparāḥ

original: tasmāt tāḥ sarvān dvādaśamāsaḥ prerate sarvaṃ hi tā annādyam āpnuvan
analyzed: tasmāt tāḥ sarvān dvādaśa māsaḥ prerate sarvam hi tāḥ annādyam āpnuvan

original: (PB 4.1.3) sarvam annādyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: sarvam annādyam āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 4.1.4) prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam atirātram apaśyat tam āharat tenāhorātre prājanayat
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ vai idam ekaḥ āsīt saḥ akāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti saḥ etam atirātram apaśyat tam āharat tena ahar rātre prājanayat

original: (PB 4.1.5) yad eṣo 'tirātro bhavaty ahorātre eva prajanayanty ahorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhanty etāvān vāva saṃvvatsaro yad ahas ca rātriś cāhorātrābhyām  #
analyzed: yat eṣaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati ahar rātre eva prajanayanti ahar rātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhanti etāvān vāva saṃvatsaraḥ yat ahar ca rātriḥ ca ahar rātrābhyām

original: eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
analyzed: eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti

original: (PB 4.1.6) yaj jyotiṣṭomo bhavati yajñamukhaṃ tad ṛdhnuvanti yad uktho yajñakrator anantarayāya yad rātriḥ sarvasyāptyai
analyzed: yat jyotiṣṭomaḥ bhavati yajña mukham tat ṛdhnuvanti yat ukthaḥ yajñakratoḥ anantarayāya yat rātriḥ sarvasya āptyai

original: (PB 4.1.7) sa etān stomān apaśyat jyotir gaur aur itīme vai lokā ete stomā ayam eva jyotir ayaṃ madhyamo gaur asāv uttama āyuḥ
analyzed: saḥ etān stomān apaśyat jyotiḥ gauḥ auḥ iti ime vai lokāḥ ete stomāḥ ayam eva jyotiḥ ayam madhyamaḥ gauḥ asau uttamaḥ āyuḥ

original: (PB 4.1.8) yad ete stomā bhavantīmān eva lokān prajanayanty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat ete stomāḥ bhavanti imān eva lokān prajanayanti eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.1.9) sa etaṃ tryahaṃ punaḥ prāyauṅkta tena ṣaḍahena ṣaṭkratūn prājanayat
analyzed: saḥ etam tri aham punar prāyauṅkta tena ṣaḍahena ṣaṭkratūn prājanayat

original: (PB 4.1.10) yad eṣa ṣaḍaho bhavati ṛtūn eva prajanayanti ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat eṣa ṣaṣ ahaḥ bhavati ṛtūn eva prajanayanti ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.1.11) sa etaṃ ṣaḍahaṃ punaḥ prāyuṅkta tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ṣaḍahābhyāṃ dvādaśamasaḥ prājanayat
analyzed: saḥ etam ṣaḍaham punar prāyuṅkta tābhyām dvābhyām ṣaḍahābhyām dvādaśamasaḥ prājanayat

original: (PB 4.1.12) yad etau ṣaḍahau bhavato māsān eva prajanayanti māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat etau ṣaḍahau bhavataḥ māsān eva prajanayanti māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.1.13) sa etau dvau ṣaḍahau punaḥ prayuṅkta taiś caturbhiḥ ṣaḍahaiś caturviṃśatim ardhamāsān prājanayat
analyzed: saḥ etau dvau ṣaḍahau punar prayuṅkta taiḥ caturbhiḥ ṣaḍahaiḥ caturviṃśatim ardha māsān prājanayat

original: (PB 4.1.14) yad ete catvāraḥ ṣaḍahā bhavanty ardhamāsān eva prajanayanty ardhamāseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat ete catvāraḥ ṣaḍahāḥ bhavanti ardha māsān eva prajanayanti ardha māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.1.15) sa idaṃ bhuvanaṃ prajanayitva pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahena vīryam ātmany adhatta
analyzed: saḥ idam bhuvanam prajanayitvā pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahena vīryam ātmani adhatta

original: (PB 4.1.16) yad eṣaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati vīrya evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat eṣaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ bhavati vīrye eva antatas pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.1.17) tena māsān saṃvvatsaraṃ prājanayad yad eṣa māso bhavati saṃvvatsaram eva prajanayanti saṃvvatsare pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: tena māsān saṃvatsaram prājanayat yat eṣa māsaḥ bhavati saṃvvatsaram eva prajanayanti saṃvatsare pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.2.1) prāyaṇīyam etad ahar bhavati
analyzed: prāyaṇīyam etat ahar bhavati

original: (PB 4.2.2) prāyaṇīyena vā ahnā devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāyan yat prāyaṃs tat prāyaṇīyasya prāyaṇīyatvam
analyzed: prāyaṇīyena vai ahnā devāḥ svargam lokam prāyan yat prāyan tat prāyaṇīyasya prāyaṇīya tvam

original: (PB 4.2.3) tasmāt prāyaṇīyasyāhna ṛtvijā bhavitavyam etad dhi svargasya lokasya nediṣṭhaṃ ya etasyartviṅ na bhavati hīyate svargāl lokāt
analyzed: tasmāt prāyaṇīyasya ahnaḥ ṛtvijā bhavitavyam etat hi svargasya lokasya nediṣṭham yaḥ etasya ṛtvij na bhavati hīyate svargāt lokāt

original: (PB 4.2.4) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati
analyzed: caturviṃśam bhavati

original: (PB 4.2.5) caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam ārabhya prayanti
analyzed: caturviṃśati akṣarā gāyatrī tejaḥ brahmavarcasam gāyatrī tejaḥ eva brahmavarcasam ārabhya prayanti

original: (PB 4.2.6) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaraḥ sākṣād eva saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
analyzed: caturviṃśam bhavati caturviṃśaḥ vai saṃvvatsaraḥ sākṣāt eva saṃvatsaram ārabhante

original: (PB 4.2.7) yāvatyaś caturviṃśasyokthasya stotrīyās tāvatyaḥ saṃvvatsarasya rātrayaḥ stotrīyābhir eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ caturviṃśasya ukthasya stotrīyāḥ tāvatyaḥ saṃvvatsarasya rātrayaḥ stotrīyābhiḥ eva tat saṃvatsaram āpnuvanti

original: (PB 4.2.8) pañcadaśastotrāṇi bhavanti pañcadaśārdhamāsasya rātrayo 'rdhamāsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
analyzed: pañcadaśa stotrāṇi bhavanti pañcadaśa ardha māsasya rātrayaḥ ardha māsaśas eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti

original: (PB 4.2.9) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśaśastrāṇi samāso māsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
analyzed: pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśa śastrāṇi samāsaḥ māsaśas eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti

original: (PB 4.2.10) tad āhur īrma iva vā eṣā hotrā yad acchāvākyā yad acchāvākam anusaṃtiṣṭhata
analyzed: tat āhuḥ īrme iva vai eṣā hotrā yat acchāvākyā yat acchāvākam anusaṃtiṣṭhata

original: īśvarermā bhavitor iti yady ukthaṃ smātraikakubhañcodvaṃśīyañcāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpye
analyzed: īśvarermā bhavitoḥ iti yadi uktham sma atraikakubham ca udvaṃśīyam ca antatas pratiṣṭhāpye

original: vīryaṃ vā ete samanī vīrya evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: vīryam vai ete samanī vīrye eva antatas pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.2.11) atho khalv āhur agniṣṭomam eva kāryam eṣa vai yajñaḥ svargyo yad agniṣṭoma ūrdhvo hi hotāram anusaṃtiṣṭhate
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ agniṣṭomam eva kāryam eṣa vai yajñaḥ svargyaḥ yat agniṣṭomaḥ ūrdhvaḥ hi hotāram anusaṃtiṣṭhate

original: (PB 4.2.12) dvādaśastotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaras tena saṃvvatsarasaṃmito
analyzed: dvādaśa stotrāṇi agniṣṭomaḥ dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ tena saṃvvatsara saṃmitaḥ

original: dvādaśa stotraṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaras
analyzed: dvādaśa stotraṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tat caturviṃśatiḥ caturviṃśatiḥ ardha māsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ

original: tena saṃvvatsarasaṃmitaḥ
analyzed: tena saṃvvatsara saṃmitaḥ

original: (PB 4.2.13) atho khalv āhur uktham eva kāryam ahnaḥ samṛddhyai
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ uktham eva kāryam ahnaḥ samṛddhyai

original: (PB 4.2.14) sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kriyante sarvaṃ hy etāhnāpyate
analyzed: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kriyante sarvam hi etad ahnā āpyate

original: (PB 4.2.15) pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasa iti sahasravatī pratipat kāryā
analyzed: pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasra pājasaḥ iti sahasravatī pratipad kāryā

original: (PB 4.2.16) saṃvvatsarasya rūpaṃ sarvan evainān etayā punāti sarvān abhivadati
analyzed: saṃvvatsarasya rūpam sarvan eva enān etayā punāti sarvān abhivadati

original: (PB 4.2.17) atho khalv āhuḥ pavasva vāco agriya ity eva kāryā mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yad vāco 'graṃ mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ pavasva vācaḥ agriyaḥ iti eva kāryā mukham vai etat saṃvvatsarasya yat vācaḥ agram mukhataḥ eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhante

original: (PB 4.2.18) mithunam iva vā eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ pavasveti puṃso rūpaṃ vāca iti striyāḥ someti puṃso rūpaṃ citrābhir iti striyā mithunam evaibhyo yajñamukhe  #
analyzed: mithunam iva vai eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ pavasva iti puṃsaḥ rūpam vācaḥ iti striyāḥ soma iti puṃsaḥ rūpam citrābhiḥ iti striyāḥ mithunam eva ebhyaḥ yajña mukhe

original: dadhāti prajananāya
analyzed: dadhāti prajananāya

original: (PB 4.2.19) agne yuṅkṣvā hi ye taveti jarābodhīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryaṃ yuktenaiva saṃvvatsareṇa prayanti caturviṃśatyakṣarāsu bhavati caturviṃśasya
analyzed: agne yuṅkṣva hi ye tava iti jarābodhīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam yuktena eva saṃvatsareṇa prayanti caturviṃśati akṣarāsu bhavati caturviṃśasya

original: (PB 4.2.20) atho khalv āhur yajñāyajñīyam eva kāryam

original: (PB 4.2.21) panthā vai yajñāyajñīyaṃ patha eva tan na yanti

original: (PB 4.3.1) abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati
analyzed: abhīvartaḥ brahma sāma bhavati

original: (PB 4.3.2) abhīvartena vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati svargasya lokasyābhivṛttyai

analyzed: sāma vai asau lokaḥ ṛc ayam yat itas sāmnā yanti svargam lokam ārabhya yanti yat ṛcā punar āyanti asmin loke pratitiṣṭhanti

analyzed: brahma vādinaḥ vadanti yātayāmāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ ayātayāmāḥ iti te na ayātayāma iti vaktavyam punar anyāni stotrāṇi nivartante ūrdhvam eva

original: (PB 4.4.1) pañcasu māḥsu bārhatāḥ pragāthā āpyante

analyzed: bhavitā iti jagatīm upeyuḥ

original: (PB 4.5.16) trayastriṃśād eva saptadaśa upetyo varṣma vai trayastriṃśo varṣma saptadaśo varṣmaṇa eva tad varṣmābhisaṃkrāmanti

analyzed: madhyatas eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti

analyzed: yanti vai ete prāṇāt iti āhuḥ ye gāyatryāḥ pratipadaḥ yanti iti yat vayavyāḥ bhavanti tena prāṇāt na yanti prāṇaḥ hi vāyuḥ

analyzed: atha u śamayanti eva enam etayā śantiḥ hi vāyuḥ

analyzed: divākīrtya sāmā bhavati

original: tamo 'paghnanti
analyzed: tamaḥ apaghnanti

original: (PB 4.6.18) mūrdhānaṃ diva iti svargaṃ lokam ārabhante
analyzed: mūrdhānam divaḥ iti svargam lokam ārabhante

original: (PB 4.6.20) vaiśvānaram ṛta ājātam agnim iti viṣuvata eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
analyzed: vaiśvānaram ṛte ājātam agnim iti viṣuvataḥ eva tat rūpam kriyate

original: (PB 4.6.23) tat triṣṭub jagatīṣu bhavati traiṣṭubhjāgato vā ādityo yad ato 'nyāsu syād ava svargāl lokāt padyeran
analyzed: tat triṣṭubh jagatīṣu bhavati traiṣṭubha jāgataḥ vai ādityaḥ yat atas anyāsu syāt ava svargāt lokāt padyeran

original: (PB 4.6.24) samrāḍvatīṣu bhavati sāmrājyaṃ vai svargo lokaḥ svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: samrāḍvatīṣu bhavati sāmrājyam vai svargaḥ lokaḥ svarge eva loke pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.7.1) ātmā vā eṣa saṃvvatsarasya yad viṣuvān pakṣāv etāv abhito bhavato yena
analyzed: ātmā vai eṣa saṃvatsarasya yat viṣuvān pakṣau etau abhitas bhavataḥ yena

original: ceto 'bhīvartena yanti yaś ca parasmāt pragātho bhavati tāv ubhau viṣuvati kāryau
analyzed: ca itas abhīvartena yanti yaḥ ca parasmāt pragāthaḥ bhavati tau ubhau viṣuvati kāryau

original: pakṣāv eva tad yajñasyātman pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
analyzed: pakṣau eva tat yajñasya ātman pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: (PB 4.7.2) indra kratuṃ na ābhareti pragātho bhavati
analyzed: indra kratum naḥ ābhara iti pragāthaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 4.7.3) vasiṣṭho vā etaṃ putrahato 'paśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad eṣa pragātho bhavati prajātyai
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vai etam putra hataḥ apaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yat eṣa pragāthaḥ bhavati prajātyai

original: (PB 4.7.4) jīvā jyotir aśīmahīti ye vai svasti saṃvvatsaraṃ saṃtaranti te jīvā jyotir aśnuvate
analyzed: jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi iti ye vai svasti saṃvatsaram saṃtaranti te jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśnuvate

original: (PB 4.7.5) māno ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso 'vakramur iti ye vai stenā ripavas te durādhyas tān eva tad atikrāmati
analyzed: mā anaḥ ajñātāḥ vṛjanā durādhyaḥ mā aśivāsaḥ avakramuḥ iti ye vai stenāḥ ripavaḥ te durādhyaḥ tān eva tat atikrāmati

original: (PB 4.7.6) tvayā vyayaṃ pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāma so 'tisaṃvvatsaro vai pravataḥ śaśvatīr apas tam eva tat taranti
analyzed: tvayā vyayam pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apaḥ ati śūra tarāma saḥ atisaṃvatsaraḥ vai pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apaḥ tam eva tat taranti

original: (PB 4.7.7) adyādyāśvaḥ śvas tvām idā hyo naro vayam enam idā hya iti saṃtanayaḥ pragāthā bhavanti teṣām ekaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya śvastanam evābhisaṃtanvanti
analyzed: adya adya aśvas śvas tvām idā hyas naraḥ vayam enam idā hyas iti saṃtanayaḥ pragāthāḥ bhavanti teṣām ekaḥ kāryaḥ saloma tvāya śvastanam eva abhisaṃtanvanti

original: (PB 4.7.8) atho khalv āhur indra kratuṃ na ābharety eva kāryaṃ samṛddhyai
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ indra kratum naḥ ābhara iti eva kāryam samṛddhyai

original: (PB 4.7.9) pratyavarohiṇo māsā bhavanti
analyzed: pratyavarohiṇaḥ māsāḥ bhavanti

original: (PB 4.7.10) yathā vā ito vṛkṣaṃ rohanty evam enaṃ pratyavarohanti svargam eva lokaṃ rūḍhvāsmiṃl loke pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yathā vai itas vṛkṣam rohanti evam enam pratyavarohanti svargam eva lokam rūḍhvā asmin loke pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.8.1) gauś cāyuś ca stomau bhavataḥ
analyzed: gauḥ ca āyuḥ ca stomau bhavataḥ

original: (PB 4.8.2) dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 4.8.3) ūnātiriktau bhavata ūnātiriktaṃ vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante prajātyai
analyzed: ūna atiriktau bhavataḥ ūna atiriktam vai anu prajāḥ prajāyante prajātyai

original: (PB 4.8.4) vairājau bhavato 'nnaṃ virāḍ annādya eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: vairājau bhavataḥ annam virāj annādye eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.8.5) dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni bhavanti
analyzed: dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni bhavanti

original: (PB 4.8.6) virāḍ vā eṣā samṛddhā yad daśāhāni virājy eva samṛddhāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: virāj vai eṣā samṛddhā yat daśa ahāni virāji eva samṛddhāyām pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.8.7) pṛṣthāni bhavanti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya eva pratitiṣṭhanti cchandomā
analyzed: pṛṣthāni bhavanti vīryam vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrye eva pratitiṣṭhanti chandomāḥ

original: bhavanti paśavo vai cchandomāḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanty athaitad daśamam ahar āptastomam
analyzed: bhavanti paśavaḥ vai chandomāḥ paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhanti atha etat daśamam ahar āpta stomam

original: āptacchanda āptavibhaktikam aniruktaṃ prājāpatyam
analyzed: āpta chandaḥ āpta vibhaktikam aniruktam prājāpatyam

original: (PB 4.8.8) yad adhyāhur ati tad recayanti tasmān na vyucyam
analyzed: yat adhyāhuḥ ati tat recayanti tasmāt na vyucyam

original: (PB 4.8.9) parokṣam anuṣṭubham upayanti prajāpatir vā anuṣṭub yat pratyakṣam upeyuḥ prajāpatim ṛccheyuḥ
analyzed: parokṣam anuṣṭubham upayanti prajāpatiḥ vai anuṣṭubh yat pratyakṣam upeyuḥ prajāpatim ṛccheyuḥ

original: (PB 4.8.10) yo vai sattrasya sad veda sad bhavati vāmadevyaṃ vai sāmnāṃ sad agnir devatānāṃ virāṭ chandasāṃ trayastriṃśaḥ stomānāṃ tāny eva  #
analyzed: yaḥ vai sattrasya sat veda sat bhavati vāmadevyam vai sāmnām sat agniḥ devatānām virāj chandasām trayastriṃśaḥ stomānām tāni eva

original: tad ekadhā saṃbhṛtyottiṣṭhanti
analyzed: tat ekadhā saṃbhṛtya uttiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.8.11) brahmavādino vadanti yataḥ sattrād udasthātā3sthitā3d iti
analyzed: brahma vādinaḥ vadanti yatas sattrāt iti

original: (PB 4.8.12) ye rathantareṇa stutvottiṣṭhanti te yata uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyād apratiṣṭhānā
analyzed: ye rathantareṇa stutvā uttiṣṭhanti te yatas uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyāt a pratiṣṭhānā

original: bhaviṣyantīti ye bṛhatā stutyottiṣṭhanti te sthitād uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyāt sthāyukaiṣāṃ
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti iti ye bṛhatā stutya uttiṣṭhanti te sthitāt uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyāt sthāyukā eṣām

original: śrīr bhaviṣyati na vasīyāṃso bhaviṣyantīti
analyzed: śrīḥ bhaviṣyati na vasīyāṃsaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti

original: (PB 4.8.13) ye vāmadevyena stutvottiṣṭhanti te sataḥ sad abhyuttiṣṭhanti pūrṇāt pūrṇam āyatanād āyatanam antarikṣāyatanā hi prajā
analyzed: ye vāmadevyena stutvā uttiṣṭhanti te sataḥ sat abhyuttiṣṭhanti pūrṇāt pūrṇam āyatanāt āyatanam antarikṣa āyatanā hi prajā

original: (PB 4.8.14) trayastriṃśadakṣarāsu bhavati trayastriṃśaddevatāsv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti
analyzed: trayastriṃśat akṣarāsu bhavati trayastriṃśat devatāsu eva pratiṣṭhāya uttiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.8.15) prājāpatyaṃ vai vāmadevyaṃ prajāpatāv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ paśuṣv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti
analyzed: prājāpatyam vai vāmadevyam prajāpatau eva pratiṣṭhāya uttiṣṭhanti paśavaḥ vai vāmadevyam paśuṣu eva pratiṣṭhāya uttiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.1) patnīḥ saṃyājya prāñca udetyāyaṃ sahasramānava ity aticchandasāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante
analyzed: patnīḥ saṃyājya prāñcaḥ udetya ayam sahasra mānavaḥ iti aticchandasā āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante

original: (PB 4.9.2) ime vai lokā aticchandā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: ime vai lokāḥ aticchandāḥ eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.3) gor iti nidhanaṃ bhavati virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad gaur virājy eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: goḥ iti nidhanam bhavati virājaḥ vai etat rūpam yat gauḥ virāji eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.4) pratyañcaḥ prapadya sārparājñyā ṛgbhiḥ stuvanti
analyzed: pratyañcaḥ prapadya sārparājñyāḥ ṛgbhiḥ stuvanti

original: (PB 4.9.5) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhirs tvacam apaghnate
analyzed: arbudaḥ sarpaḥ etābhiḥ mṛtām tvacam apāhata mṛtām eva etābhiḥ tvacam apaghnate

original: (PB 4.9.6) iyaṃ vai sārparājñy asyām eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: iyam vai sārparājñī asyām eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.7) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti traya ime lokā eṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti trayaḥ ime lokāḥ eṣu eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.8) manasopāvartayati
analyzed: manasā upāvartayati

original: (PB 4.9.9) manasā hiṅ karoti manasā prastauti manasodgāyati manasā pratiharati manasā nidhanam upayanty asamāptasya samāptyai
analyzed: manasā hiṅ karoti manasā prastauti manasā udgāyati manasā pratiharati manasā nidhanam upayanti a samāptasya samāptyai

original: (PB 4.9.10) yad vai vācā na samāpnuvanti manasā tat samāpnuvanti
analyzed: yat vai vācā na samāpnuvanti manasā tat samāpnuvanti

original: (PB 4.9.11) pariśrite stuvanti brahmaṇaḥ parigṛhītyai
analyzed: pariśrite stuvanti brahmaṇaḥ parigṛhītyai

original: (PB 4.9.12) brahmodyaṃ vadanti brahmavarcasa eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: brahmodyam vadanti brahmavarcase eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 4.9.13) caturhotāraṃ hotā vyācaṣṭe stutam eva tad anuśaṃsati nahi tat stutaṃ yad ananuśastam
analyzed: caturhotāram hotā vyācaṣṭe stutam eva tat anuśaṃsati nahi tat stutam yat an anuśastam

original: (PB 4.9.14) prajāpatiṃ parivadanty āptvevainaṃ tad vyācakṣate tāvad āpāmainam iti
analyzed: prajāpatim parivadanti āptvā iva enam tat vyācakṣate tāvat āpāma enam iti

original: (PB 4.9.15) gṛhapatir audumbarīṃ dhārayati gṛhapatir vā ūrjo yantorjam evaibhyo yacchati
analyzed: gṛhapatiḥ audumbarīm dhārayati gṛhapatiḥ vai ūrjaḥ yantā ūrjam eva ebhyaḥ yacchati

original: (PB 4.9.16) vācaṃ yacchanti
analyzed: vācam yacchanti

original: (PB 4.9.17) dugdhānīva vai tarhi chandasāṃsi yātayāmāny antargatāni tāny eva tad rasenāpyāyayanti
analyzed: dugdhāni iva vai tarhi chandasāṃsi yātayāmāni antargatāni tāni eva tat rasena āpyāyayanti

original: (PB 4.9.18) atho śvastanam evābhisaṃtanvanti
analyzed: atha u śvastanam eva abhisaṃtanvanti

original: (PB 4.9.19) ātmadakṣiṇaṃ vā etad yat sattram
analyzed: ātma dakṣiṇam vai etat yat sattram

original: (PB 4.9.20) yadā vai puruṣa ātmano 'vadyati yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnute
analyzed: yadā vai puruṣaḥ ātmanaḥ avadyati yam kāmam kāmayate tam abhyaśnute

original: (PB 4.9.21) dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ dvābhyām asthi dvābhyāṃ majjānaṃ dvābhyāṃ pīvaś ca lohitaṃ ca
analyzed: dvābhyām loma avadyati dvābhyām tvacam dvābhyām māṃsam dvābhyām asthi dvābhyām majjānam dvābhyām pīvaḥ ca lohitam ca

original: (PB 4.9.22) śikhā anupravapante pāpmānam eva tad apaghnate laghīyāṃsaḥ svargaṃ lokam ayāmeti
analyzed: śikhāḥ anupravapante pāpmānam eva tat apaghnate laghīyāṃsaḥ svargam lokam ayāma iti

original: (PB 4.9.23) atho gavām evānurūpā bhavanti sarvasyānnādyasyāvaruddhyai
analyzed: atha u gavām eva anurūpāḥ bhavanti sarvasya annādyasya avaruddhyai

original: (PB 4.10.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'ricyata so 'padyata taṃ devā abhisamagacchanta
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata saḥ aricyata saḥ apadyata tam deva abhisamagacchanta

original: te 'bruvan mahad asmai vrataṃ saṃbharāma yad imaṃ dhinavad iti tasmai yat saṃvvatsaram
analyzed: te abruvan mahat asmai vratam saṃbharāma yat imam dhinavat iti tasmai yat saṃvvatsaram

original: annaṃ pacyate tat samabharaṃs tad asmai prāyacchaṃs tad avrajayat tad enam adhinon
analyzed: annam pacyate tat samabharan tat asmai prāyacchan tat avrajayat tat enam adhinon

original: mahan maryā vrataṃ yad imam adhinvīd iti tan mahāvratasya mahāvratatvam
analyzed: mahat maryāḥ vratam yat imam adhinvīt iti tat mahāvratasya mahāvrata tvam

original: (PB 4.10.2) prajāpatir vāva mahāṃs tasyaitad vratam annam eva
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ vāva mahān tasya etat vratam annam eva

original: (PB 4.10.3) tad āhur madhyaḥ saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ madhyato vā annaṃ jagdhaṃ dhinoti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ madhyaḥ saṃvatsarasya upetyam madhyatas vai annam jagdham dhinoti

original: (PB 4.10.4) tad v āhur yan madhyata upayanty ardham annādyasyāpnuvanty ardhaṃ sambaṭ kurvantīty upariṣṭād eva saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ saṃvvatsare  #
analyzed: tat u āhuḥ yat madhyataḥ upayanti ardham annādyasya āpnuvanti ardham saṃbaṭ kurvanti iti upariṣṭāt eva saṃvatsarasya upetyam saṃvatsare  /

original: vā annaṃ sarvaṃ pacyate
analyzed: vai annam sarvam pacyate

original: (PB 4.10.5) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaro 'nnaṃ pañcaviṃśam
analyzed: caturviṃśam bhavati caturviṃśaḥ vai saṃvatsaraḥ annam pañcaviṃśam

original: (PB 4.10.6) yad vā adaś caturviṃśaṃprāyaṇīyaṃ tad etad udayanīyam
analyzed: yat vai adaḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam tat etat udayanīyam

original: (PB 4.10.7) yat saṃvvatsaram annaṃ saṃbharanti saiṣā pañcaviṃśy upajāyate
analyzed: yat saṃvatsaram annam saṃbharanti sā eṣā pañcaviṃśī upajāyate

original: (PB 5.1.1) vāmadevyaṃ mahāvrataṃ kāryam
analyzed: vāmadevyam mahāvratam kāryam

original: (PB 5.1.2) trivṛc chiro bhavati
analyzed: trivṛt śiraḥ bhavati

original: (PB 5.1.3) trivṛd dhy eva śiro loma tvag asthi
analyzed: trivṛt hi eva śiraḥ loma tvac asthi

original: (PB 5.1.4) pāṅkta itara ātmā loma tvaṅ māṃsam asthi majjā
analyzed: pāṅktaḥ itaraḥ ātmā loma tvac māṃsam asthi majjā

original: (PB 5.1.5) sakṛd dhiṅkṛtena śirasā pārācā stuvate
analyzed: sakṛt hiṅkṛtena śirasā pārācā stuvate

original: (PB 5.1.6) tasmāc chiro 'ṅgāni medyanti nānumedyati na kṛśyanty anukṛśyati
analyzed: tasmāt śiraḥ aṅgāni medyanti na anumedyati na kṛśyanti anukṛśyati

original: (PB 5.1.7) punar abhyāvartam itareṇātmanā stuvate tasmād itara ātmā medyati ca kṛśyati ca
analyzed: punar abhyāvartam itareṇa ātmanā stuvate tasmāt itaraḥ ātmā medyati ca kṛśyati ca

original: (PB 5.1.8) arkavatīṣu gāyatrīṣu śiro bhavati
analyzed: arkavatīṣu gāyatrīṣu śiraḥ bhavati

original: (PB 5.1.9) annaṃ vā arko brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatry annādyaṃ caivaibhyo brahmavarcasaṃ ca mukhato dadhāti
analyzed: annam vai arkaḥ brahmavarcasam gāyatrī annādyam ca eva ebhyaḥ brahmavarcasam ca mukhataḥ dadhāti

original: (PB 5.1.10) pañcadaśasaptadaśau pakṣau bhavataḥ prakṣābhyāṃ vai yajamāno vayo bhūtvā svargaṃ lokam eti
analyzed: pañcadaśa saptadaśau pakṣau bhavataḥ prakṣābhyām vai yajamānaḥ vayaḥ bhūtvā svargam lokam eti

original: (PB 5.1.11) tāv āhuḥ samau kāryau pañcadaśau vā saptadaśau vā savīvadhatvāya
analyzed: tau āhuḥ samau kāryau pañcadaśau vā saptadaśau vā sa vīvadha tvāya

original: (PB 5.1.12) tad v āhur yat samau bhavata ekavīryau tarhi bhavata iti pañcadaśasaptadaśāv eva kāryau sācīva vai vayaḥ pakṣau kṛtvāpatīyaḥ patati
analyzed: tat u āhuḥ yat samau bhavataḥ eka vīryau tarhi bhavataḥ iti pañcadaśa saptadaśau eva kāryau sāci iva vai vayaḥ pakṣau kṛtvā apatīyas patati

original: (PB 5.1.13) dakṣiṇato bṛhat kāryaṃ dakṣiṇo vā ardha ātmano vīryavattaraḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas bṛhant kāryam dakṣiṇaḥ vai ardhaḥ ātmanaḥ vīryavattaraḥ

original: (PB 5.1.14) atho khalv āhur uttarata eva kāryaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino 'rdhāt traiṣṭubhaṃ vai bṛhat traiṣṭubho vai brāhmaṇācchaṃsī traiṣṭubhaḥ pañcadaśastomaḥ
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ uttaratas eva kāryam brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ ardhāt traiṣṭubham vai bṛhat traiṣṭubhaḥ vai brāhmaṇācchaṃsī traiṣṭubhaḥ pañcadaśa stomaḥ

original: (PB 5.1.15) dakṣiṇato rathantaraṃ kāryaṃ maitrāvaruṇasyārdhād gāyatraṃ vai rathantaraṃ gāyatro maitrāvaruṇo gāyatraḥ saptadaśastomaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas rathantaram kāryam maitrāvaruṇasya ardhāt gāyatram vai rathantaram gāyatraḥ maitrāvaruṇaḥ gāyatraḥ saptadaśa stomaḥ

original: (PB 5.1.16) ekaviṃśaṃ pucchaṃ bhavati
analyzed: ekaviṃśam puccham bhavati

original: (PB 5.1.17) ekaviṃśo vai stomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā tasmād vayaḥ pucchena pratiṣṭhāyotpatati pucchena pratiṣṭhāya niṣīdati
analyzed: ekaviṃśaḥ vai stomānām pratiṣṭhā tasmāt vayaḥ pucchena pratiṣṭhāya utpatati pucchena pratiṣṭhāya niṣīdati

original: (PB 5.1.18) yajñāyajñīyaṃ pucchaṃ kāryaṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ hy eva mahāvratasya puccham
analyzed: yajñāyajñīyam puccham kāryam yajñāyajñīyam hi eva mahāvratasya puccham

original: (PB 5.1.19) atho khalv āhur atiśayaṃ vai dvipadāṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ bhadram kāryaṃ samṛddhyai

analyzed: yajñāyajñīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam

original: dhi sṛṣṭas tasmād u bahupaśur vaiśvadevo hi jāgato varṣā hy asyartus tasmād brāhmaṇasya
analyzed: dhi sṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt u bahu paśuḥ vaiśvadevaḥ hi jāgataḥ varṣāḥ hi asya ṛtuḥ tasmāt brāhmaṇasya

original: ca rājanyasya cādyo 'dharo hi sṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: ca rājanyasya ca ādyaḥ adharaḥ hi sṛṣṭaḥ

original: (PB 6.1.11) sa patta eva pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśam asṛjata tam anuṣṭup chando 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa pattas eva pratiṣṭhāyāḥ ekaviṃśam asṛjata tam anuṣṭubh chandaḥ anvasṛjyata

analyzed: na kā cana devatā śūdraḥ manuṣyaḥ tasmāt śūdraḥ uta bahu paśuḥ a yajñiyaḥ videvaḥ hi na

original: hi taṃ kā cana devatā 'nvasṛjyata tasmāt pādāv anejyaṃ nāti vardhate patto hi sṛṣṭas
analyzed: hi tam kā cana devatā anvasṛjyata tasmāt pādau an ijyam na ati vardhate pattas hi sṛṣṭaḥ

original: tasmād ekaviṃśastomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhāyā hi sṛṣṭas tasmād anuṣṭubhaṃ chandāṃsi nānu vyūhanti
analyzed: tasmāt ekaviṃśa stomānām pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhāyāḥ hi sṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt anuṣṭubham chandāṃsi na anu vyūhanti

analyzed: pāpavasīyasaḥ vidhṛtyai

analyzed: yaḥ vai stomān upadeśanavataḥ veda upadeśanavān bhavati

original: ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.2.6) sa devena yajñena yajate ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: sa devena yajñena yajate yaḥ evaṃv veda

analyzed: eṣa vāva yajñaḥ yat agniṣṭomaḥ

analyzed: ekasmai anyaḥ yajñaḥ kāmāya āhriyate sarvebhyaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ

original: (PB 6.3.4) dvādaśa stotrāṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nuprajāyante tena  #
analyzed: dvādaśa stotrāṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tat caturviṃśatiḥ caturviṃśatiḥ ardha māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram paśavaḥ anuprajāyante tena

original: paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
analyzed: paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ

original: (PB 6.3.6) kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiṣṭomatvam ity āhur virājaṃ saṃstutaḥ saṃpadyate virāḍ vai cchandasāṃ jyotiḥ
analyzed: kim jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiṣṭoma tvam iti āhuḥ virājam saṃstutaḥ saṃpadyate virāj vai chandasām jyotiḥ

analyzed: jyotiḥ samānānām bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

analyzed: jyeṣṭha yajñaḥ vai eṣa yat agniṣṭomaḥ

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ asmai śraiṣṭhyāya na atiṣṭhanta saḥ etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tatas asmai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya atiṣṭhanta

analyzed: tiṣṭhante asmai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya yaḥ evaṃv veda

analyzed: aṣṭa akṣarā gāyatrī hiṅkāraḥ navamaḥ ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh dvādaśa akṣarā jagatī chandobhiḥ eva anuṣṭubham āpnoti yajamānasya an avalopāya

original: (PB 6.3.14) yo vā anuṣṭubhaṃ sarvatrāpiṃ savanāny anvāyattāṃ veda sarvatrāsyāpir bhavaty eṣā vā anuṣṭup sarvatrāpiḥ savanāny anvāyattā tad  #
analyzed: yaḥ vai anuṣṭubham sarvatra āpim savanāni anvāyattām veda sarvatra asya āpiḥ bhavati eṣā vai anuṣṭubh sarvatra āpiḥ savanāni anvāyattā tat

analyzed: yaḥ evam vveda sarvatrāpiḥ bhavati

analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai catuṣṭomaḥ pratiṣṭhityai

analyzed: tām ucchrayati dyutānaḥ tvā mārutaḥ ucchrayatu ud divam stabhāna antarikṣam pṛṇa dṛṃha pṛthivīm

analyzed: namaḥ samudrāya namaḥ samudrasya cakṣuṣe iti āha vāc vai samudraḥ manaḥ samudrasya cakṣuḥ tābhyām eva tat namaḥ karoti

analyzed: sāmā yūnarvā aha āsīt iti āha sāma vai yūnarvā sāmne eva tat namaskaroti ārtvijyam kariṣyan

original: prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvanti tasmād eṣā diśāṃ vīryavattamaitāṃ hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ prīṇanti

analyzed: viparikramya udgātāraḥ iti diśām abhīṣṭyai diśām abhiprītyai iti brūyāt tasmāt sarvāsu

analyzed: dikṣu annam vidyate sarvāḥ hi abhīṣṭāḥ prītāḥ

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti saḥ aśocat tasya śocataḥ ādityaḥ

analyzed: mūrdhnaḥ asṛjyata saḥ asya mūrdhānam udahan sa droṇakalaśaḥ abhavat tasmin devāḥ śukram

analyzed: agṛhṇata tām vai saḥ āyuṣā ārtim atyajīvat

original: (PB 6.5.2) āyuṣārtim atijīvati ya evaṃv veda /
analyzed: āyuṣā ārtim atijīvati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.5.3) raṃ prohed vānaspatyo 'si bārhaspatyo 'si prājāpatyo 'si prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase
analyzed: raṃ prohet vānaspatyaḥ asi bārhaspatyaḥ asi prājāpatyaḥ asi prajāpateḥ mūrdhā asi atyāyu pātram asi idam aham mām prāñcam prohāmi tejase

original: (PB 6.5.4) yad āha vānaspatya iti satyenaivainaṃ tat prohati
analyzed: yat āha vānaspatyaḥ iti satyena eva enam tat prohati

analyzed: yat āha bārhaspatyaḥ iti bṛhaspatiḥ vai devānām udgātā tam eva tat yunakti

analyzed: yat āha prājāpatyaḥ iti prājāpatyaḥ hi eṣa devatāyāḥ yat droṇakalaśaḥ yat āha prajāpateḥ mūrdhā iti prajāpateḥ hi eṣa mūrdhnaḥ udahanyata

original: (PB 6.5.7) yad āhātyāyupātram ity ati hy etad anyāni pātrāṇi yad droṇakalaśo devapātraṃ droṇakalaśaḥ
analyzed: yat āha atyāyu pātram iti ati hi etat anyāni pātrāṇi yat droṇakalaśaḥ deva pātram droṇakalaśaḥ

original: (PB 6.5.8) devapātrī bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: deva pātrī bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.5.9) brāhmaṇaṃ pātre na mīmāṃseta yaṃ brāhmaṇam iva manyate pra devapātram āpnoti na manuṣyapātrāc chidyate
analyzed: brāhmaṇam pātre na mīmāṃseta yam brāhmaṇam iva manyate pra deva pātram āpnoti na manuṣya pātrāt chidyate

original: abruvan yat punar dadyāma kiṃ nas tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayadhva ity abruvaṃs tā abruvan
analyzed: abruvan yat punar dadyāma kim naḥ tatas syāt iti yat kāmayadhve iti abruvan tāḥ abruvan

original: yad evāsmāsu manuṣyā apūtaṃ praveśayāṃs tenāsaṃsṛṣṭā asāmeti
analyzed: yat eva asmāsu manuṣyāḥ a pūtam praveśayān tena a saṃsṛṣṭāḥ asāma iti

analyzed: śuddhāḥ asmai āpaḥ pūtāḥ bhavanti yaḥ evaṃv veda

analyzed: sā punartā atyakrāmat sā vanaspatīn prāviśat tān devāḥ punar ayācan tām

original: na punar adadus tān aśapan svena vaḥ kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścān iti tasmād vanaspatīn
analyzed: na punar adaduḥ tān aśapan svena vaḥ kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścān iti tasmāt vanaspatīn

original: svena kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścanti devaśaptā hi
analyzed: svena kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścanti deva śaptāḥ hi

original: (PB 6.5.13) tāṃv vanaspatayaś caturdhā vācaṃv vinyadadhur dundubhau vīṇāyām akṣe tūṇave tasmād eṣā vadiṣṭhaiṣā valgutamā vāg vā vanaspatīnāṃ  #
analyzed: tān vanaspatayaḥ caturdhā vācam vinyadadhuḥ dundubhau vīṇāyām akṣe tūṇave tasmāt eṣā vadiṣṭhā eṣā valgutamā vāc vā vanaspatīnām  /

original: devānāṃ hy eṣā vāg āsīt
analyzed: devānām hi eṣā vāc āsīt

original: (PB 6.5.14) adho-'dho 'kṣaṃ droṇakalaśaṃ prohanti tasyā vāco 'varudhyā upary-upary akṣaṃ pavitraṃ prayacchanty ubhayata eva vācaṃ parigṛhṇanti
analyzed: adhas adhas akṣam droṇakalaśam prohanti tasyāḥ vācaḥ avarudhyāḥ upari upari akṣam pavitram prayacchanti ubhayatas eva vācam parigṛhṇanti

original: (PB 6.5.15) yasya kāmayetāsuryam asya yajñaṃ kuryāṃv vācaṃv vṛñjīyeti droṇakalaśaṃ
analyzed: yasya kāmayeta asuryam asya yajñam kuryām vācam vṛñjīya iti droṇakalaśam

original: prohan bāhubhyām akṣan upaspṛśed asuryam asya yajñaṃ karoti vācaṃv vṛṅkte yo 'sya
analyzed: prohan bāhubhyām akṣan upaspṛśet asuryam asya yajñam karoti vācam vṛṅkte yaḥ asya

original: priyaḥ syād anupaspṛśann akṣaṃ prohet prāṇā vai droṇakalaśaḥ prāṇān evāsya kalpayati
analyzed: priyaḥ syāt an upaspṛśan akṣam prohet prāṇāḥ vai droṇakalaśaḥ prāṇān eva asya kalpayati

original: (PB 6.5.16) yan nv ity āhur vācānyān ṛtvijo vṛṇate kasmād udgātāro vṛtā ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ vācā anyān ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇate kasmāt udgātāraḥ vṛtāḥ ārtvijyam kurvanti iti

original: (PB 6.5.17) yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti tenodgātāro vṛtāḥ
analyzed: yat droṇakalaśam upasīdanti tena udgātāraḥ vṛtāḥ

original: (PB 6.5.18) prājāpatyā vā udgātāraḥ prājāpatyo droṇakalaśo droṇakalaśa evainām ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte
analyzed: prājāpatyāḥ vai udgātāraḥ prājāpatyaḥ droṇakalaśaḥ droṇakalaśe eva enām ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte

original: (PB 6.5.19) prāñca upasīdanti prāñco yajñasyāgre karavāmeti
analyzed: prāñcaḥ upasīdanti prāñcaḥ yajñasya agre karavāma iti

original: (PB 6.5.20) anabhijitā vā eṣodgātṝṇāṃ dig yat prācī yad droṇakalaśaṃ prāñcaṃ prohanti diśo 'bhijityai
analyzed: an abhijitā vai eṣā udgātṝṇām diś yat prācī yat droṇakalaśam prāñcam prohanti diśaḥ abhijityai

original: (PB 6.5.21) yan nv ity āhur antarāśvaḥ prāsevau yujyate 'ntarā śamya anaḍvān ka udgātṝṇāṃ
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ antarā aśvaḥ prāsevau yujyate antarā śamyau anaḍvān kaḥ udgātṝṇām

original: yoga iti yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti sa eṣāṃ yogas tasmād yuktair evopasadyaṃ na hy ayukto vahati
analyzed: yogaḥ iti yat droṇakalaśam upasīdanti saḥ eṣām yogaḥ tasmāt yuktaiḥ eva upasadyam na hi a yuktaḥ vahati

original: (PB 6.6.1) grāvṇaḥ saṃsādya droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viḍ vai grāvāṇo 'nnaṃ somo rāṣṭraṃ droṇakalaśo yad grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viśy  #
analyzed: grāvṇaḥ saṃsādya droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viś vai grāvāṇaḥ annam somaḥ rāṣṭram droṇakalaśaḥ yat grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viśi

original: eva tad rāṣṭram adhyūhanti
analyzed: eva tat rāṣṭram adhyūhanti

original: (PB 6.6.2) yaṃ dviṣyād vimukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amum amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyā viśo 'muṣmād annādyān nirūhāmīti nirūhed viśa  #
analyzed: yam dviṣyāt vimukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā idam aham amum amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāḥ viśaḥ amuṣmāt annādyāt nirūhāmi iti nirūhet viśa

original: evainam annādyān nirūhati
analyzed: eva enam annādyāt nirūhati

original: (PB 6.6.3) yo 'sya priyaḥ syāt saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāṃ viśy amuṣinn annādye 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhed  #
analyzed: yaḥ asya priyaḥ syāt saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā idam aham amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyām viśi amuṣin annādye adhyūhāmi iti adhyūhet  /

original: viśy evainam annādye 'dhyūhati
analyzed: viśi eva enam annādye adhyūhati

original: (PB 6.6.4) atho tad ubhayam anādṛtyedam ahaṃ māṃ tejasi brahmavarcasse 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhet tejasy eva brahmavarcasa ātmānam adhyūhati
analyzed: atha u tat ubhayam an ādṛtya idam aham mām tejasi brahmavarcasse adhyūhāmi iti adhyūhet tejasi eva brahmavarcase ātmānam adhyūhati

original: (PB 6.6.5) yaḥ kāmayeta viśā rāṣṭraṃ hanyām iti vyūhya grāvṇo 'dho droṇakalaśaṃ sādayitvopāṃśusavanam
analyzed: yaḥ kāmayeta viśā rāṣṭram hanyām iti vyūhya grāvṇaḥ adhas droṇakalaśam sādayitvā upāṃśusavanam

original: upariṣṭād abhinidadhyād idam aham amuyā viśā 'do rāṣṭraṃ hanmīti viśaiva tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti
analyzed: upariṣṭāt abhinidadhyāt idam aham amuyā viśā adaḥ rāṣṭram hanmi iti viśā eva tat rāṣṭram hanti

original: (PB 6.6.6) yo vai daivāni pavitrāṇi veda pūto yajñiyo bhavati cchandāṃsi vai daivāni pavitrāṇi tair droṇakalaśaṃ pāvayanti
analyzed: yaḥ vai daivāni pavitrāṇi veda pūtaḥ yajñiyaḥ bhavati chandāṃsi vai daivāni pavitrāṇi taiḥ droṇakalaśam pāvayanti

original: (PB 6.6.7) vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa cchandasā punantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena cchandasā
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā punantu rudrāḥ tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā

original: punantv ādityās tvā jāgatena cchandasā punantv etāni vai daivāni pavitrāṇi pūto yajñiyo
analyzed: punantu ādityāḥ tvā jāgatena chandasā punantu etāni vai daivāni pavitrāṇi pūtaḥ yajñiyaḥ

original: bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.6.8) svarbhānur vā āsura ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat taṃ devā na vyajānaṃs te 'trim
analyzed: svarbhānuḥ vai āsuraḥ ādityam tamasā vidhyat tam devāḥ na vyajānan te atrim

original: upādhāvaṃs tasyātrir bhāsena tamo 'pāhan yat prathamam apāhan sā kṛṣṇāvir abhavad
analyzed: upādhāvan tasya atriḥ bhāsena tamaḥ apāhan yat prathamam apāhan sā kṛṣṇā aviḥ abhavat

original: yad dvitīyaṃ sā rajatā yat tṛtīyaṃ sā lohinī yayā varṇam abhyatṛṇat sā śuklāsīt
analyzed: yat dvitīyam sā rajatā yat tṛtīyam sā lohinī yayā varṇam abhyatṛṇat sā śuklā āsīt

original: (PB 6.6.9) tasmāc chuklaṃ pavitraṃ śukraḥ somaḥ sa śukratvāya
analyzed: tasmāt śuklam pavitram śukraḥ somaḥ sa śukra tvāya

original: (PB 6.6.10) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaiteṣāṃ varṇānām api pavitre kuryāt pāpmanaivainaṃ tamasā
analyzed: yam dviṣyāt tasya eteṣām varṇānām api pavitre kuryāt pāpmanā eva enam tamasā

original: vidhyati kṛṣṇam iva hi tamo yo 'sya priyaḥ syād āsaktiśuklaṃ kuryāj jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ
analyzed: vidhyati kṛṣṇam iva hi tamaḥ yaḥ asya priyaḥ syāt āsakti śuklam kuryāt jyotiḥ vai hiraṇyam

original: jyotir evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: jyotiḥ eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 6.6.11) tasmād ātreyaṃ candreṇecchanty atrir hi tasya jyotiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ātreyam candreṇa icchanti atriḥ hi tasya jyotiḥ

original: (PB 6.6.12) abhyatṛṇat pavitraṃv vigṛhṇanti hastakāryam eva tad yajñasya kriyata etad vā udgātṝṇāṃ hastakāryaṃ yat pavitrasya vigrahaṇam
analyzed: abhyatṛṇat pavitram vigṛhṇanti hasta kāryam eva tat yajñasya kriyate etat vai udgātṝṇām hasta kāryam yat pavitrasya vigrahaṇam

original: (PB 6.6.13) na hastaveṣyān nir ṛcchati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: na hasta veṣyāt niḥ ṛcchati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.6.14) yo 'pi na vigṛhṇāti prāṇād enam antaryanti
analyzed: yaḥ api na vigṛhṇāti prāṇāt enam antaryanti

original: (PB 6.6.15) taṃ brūyād vepamānaḥ prameṣyasa iti vepamāna eva pramīyate
analyzed: tam brūyāt vepamānaḥ prameṣyase iti vepamānaḥ eva pramīyate

original: (PB 6.6.16) pra śukraitu devī manīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājīty udgātā dhārām anumantrayate
analyzed: pra śukrā etu devī manīṣā asmat rathaḥ su taṣṭaḥ na vājī iti udgātā dhārām anumantrayate

original: (PB 6.6.17) āyuṣe me pavasva varcase me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāyety āha mahyaṃ tejase
analyzed: āyuṣe me pavasva varcase me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyāḥ divaḥ janitrāt śṛṇvantu āpaḥ adhas kṣarantīḥ soma iha udgāya iti āha mahyam tejase

original: (PB 6.6.18) eṣa vai somasyodgītho yat pavate somodgītham eva sāma gāyati
analyzed: eṣa vai somasya udgīthaḥ yat pavate soma udgītham eva sāma gāyati

original: (PB 6.6.19) ācchinnaṃ pāvayanti yajñaṃ caiva prāṇāṃś ca saṃtanvanti saṃtataṃ pāvayanti yajñasya saṃtatyai
analyzed: ācchinnam pāvayanti yajñam ca eva prāṇān ca saṃtanvanti saṃtatam pāvayanti yajñasya saṃtatyai

original: (PB 6.7.1) bṛhaspatir vai devānām udagāyat taṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsan sa ya eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopādhāvat
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ vai devānām udagāyat tam rakṣāṃsi ajighāṃsan sa ye eṣām lokānām adhipatayaḥ tān bhāgadheyena upādhāvat

original: (PB 6.7.2) sūryo mā divābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāheti juhoti
analyzed: sūryaḥ mā divābhyaḥ nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyuḥ antarikṣābhyaḥ agniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāhā iti juhoti

original: (PB 6.7.3) ete vā eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopāsarat
analyzed: ete vai eṣām lokānām adhipatayaḥ tān bhāgadheyena upāsarat

original: (PB 6.7.4) karoti vācā vīryaṃ na sadasyām ārtim ārcchati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: karoti vācā vīryam na sadasyām ārtim ārcchati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.7.5) vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat tāṃ devā anvamantrayanta sā 'bravīd abhāgāsmi
analyzed: vāc vai devebhyaḥ apākrāmat tām devāḥ anvamantrayanta sā abravīt a bhāgā asmi

original: bhāgadheyaṃ me 'stv iti kas te bhāgadheyaṃ kuryād ity udgātāra ity abravīd udgātāro
analyzed: bhāgadheyam me astu iti kaḥ te bhāgadheyam kuryāt iti udgātāraḥ iti abravīt udgātāraḥ

original: vai vāce bhāgadheyaṃ kurvanti
analyzed: vai vāce bhāgadheyam kurvanti

original: (PB 6.7.6) tasyai juhuyād bekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai
analyzed: tasyai juhuyāt bekurā nāmā asi juṣṭā devebhyaḥ namaḥ vāce namaḥ vācaḥ pataye devi vāc yat te vācaḥ madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai

original: (PB 6.7.7) vāh vai sarasvatī tām eva tad bhāgadheyenārabhate
analyzed: vā ah vai sarasvatī tām eva tat bhāgadheyena ārabhate

original: (PB 6.7.8) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaitām āhutiṃ juhuyād vācaṃ manasā dhyāyed vācam evāsya vṛṅkte
analyzed: yam dviṣyāt tasya etām āhutim juhuyāt vācam manasā dhyāyet vācam eva asya vṛṅkte

original: (PB 6.7.9) bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti svargam eva tal lokaṃ sarpanti
analyzed: bahiṣpavamānam sarpanti svargam eva tat lokam sarpanti

original: (PB 6.7.10) prakvāṇā iva sarpanti pratikūlam iva hītaḥ svargo lokaḥ tsaranta iva sarpanti mṛgadharmo vai yajño yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
analyzed: prakvāṇāḥ iva sarpanti pratikūlam iva hītaḥ svargaḥ lokaḥ tsarantaḥ iva sarpanti mṛga dharmaḥ vai yajñaḥ yajñasya śāntyai a pratrāsāya

original: (PB 6.7.11) vācaṃ yacchanti yajñam eva tad yacchanti yad vyavavadeyur yajñaṃ nirbrūyus tasmān na vyavavadyam
analyzed: vācam yacchanti yajñam eva tat yacchanti yat vyavavadeyuḥ yajñam nirbrūyuḥ tasmāt na vyavavadyam

original: (PB 6.7.12) pañcartvijaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpanti pā-nkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam eva saṃtanvanti
analyzed: pañca ṛtvijaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpanti pānktaḥ yajñaḥ yāvān yajñaḥ tam eva saṃtanvanti

original: (PB 6.7.13) yadi prastotāvacchidyate yajñasya śiraś chidyate brahmaṇe varaṃ dattvā sa eva punar vartavyaś chinnam eva tat pratidadhāti
analyzed: yadi prastotā avacchid yajñasya śiraḥ chidyate brahmaṇe vara dattvā saḥ eva punar vartavyaḥ chinnam eva tat pratidadhāti

original: (PB 6.7.14) yady udgātāvacchidyate yajñena yajamāno vyṛdhyate 'dakṣiṇaḥ sa yajñakratuḥ saṃsthāpyo 'thānya āhṛtyas tasmin deyaṃ yāvad dāsyan
analyzed: yadi udgātā avacchidyate yajñena yajamānaḥ vyṛdhyate adakṣiṇaḥ sa yajñakratuḥ saṃsthāpyaḥ atha anyaḥ āhṛtyaḥ tasmin deyam yāvat dāsyan

original: (PB 6.7.15) yadi pratihartā 'vacchidyate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai pratihartā sarvavedasaṃ deyaṃ yadi sarvavedasaṃ na dadāti sarvajyāniṃ
analyzed: yadi pratihartā avacchidyate paśubhiḥ yajamānaḥ vyṛdhyate paśavaḥ vai pratihartā sarvavedasam deyam yadi sarvavedasam na dadāti sarva jyānim

original: (PB 6.7.16) adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati
analyzed: adhvaryuḥ prastaram harati

original: (PB 6.7.17) yajamāno vai prastaro yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ harati
analyzed: yajamānaḥ vai prastaraḥ yajamānam eva tat svargam lokam harati

original: (PB 6.7.18) yajño vai devebhyo 'śvo bhūtvāpākrāmat taṃ devāḥ prastareṇāsamayaṃs tasmād
analyzed: yajñaḥ vai devebhyaḥ aśvaḥ bhūtvā apākrāmat tam devāḥ prastareṇa asamayan tasmāt

original: aśvaḥ prastareṇa saṃmṛjyamāna upāvarabhate yad adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
analyzed: aśvaḥ prastareṇa saṃmṛjyamānaḥ upāvarabhate yat adhvaryuḥ prastaram harati yajñasya śāntyai a pratrāsāya

original: (PB 6.7.19) prajāpatiḥ paśun asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā aśanāyanto 'pākrāmaṃs tebhyaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ paśun asṛjata te asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ aśanāyantaḥ apākrāman tebhyaḥ

original: prastaram annaṃ prāyacchat enam upāvartanta tasmād adhvaryuṇā prastara īṣad iva vidhūyo
analyzed: prastaram annam prāyacchat enam upāvartanta tasmāt adhvaryuṇā prastaraḥ īṣat iva vidhūya

original: vidhūtim iva hi tṛṇaṃ paśava upāvartante
analyzed: vidhūtim iva hi tṛṇam paśavaḥ upāvartante

original: (PB 6.7.20) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: upa enam paśavaḥ āvartante yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 6.7.21) prastaram āsadyodgāyed dhaviṣo 'skandāya
analyzed: prastaram āsadya udgāyet haviṣaḥ a skandāya

original: (PB 6.7.22) yajamānaṃ tu svargāl lokā avagṛhṇāti
analyzed: yajamānam tu svargāt lokāḥ avagṛhṇāti

original: (PB 6.7.23) aṣṭhīvatopaspṛśatodgeyaṃ tenāsya havir askannaṃ bhavati na yajamānaṃ svargāl lokād avagṛhṇāti
analyzed: aṣṭhīvatā upaspṛśatā udgeyam tena asya haviḥ a skannam bhavati na yajamānam svargāt lokāt avagṛhṇāti

original: (PB 6.7.24) cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanty atra vā asāv āditya āsīt ta
analyzed: cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānam stuvanti atra vai asau ādityaḥ āsīt te

original: devā bahiṣpavamānena svargaṃl lokam aharan yac cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanti
analyzed: devāḥ bahiṣpavamānena svargan lokam aharan yat cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānam stuvanti

original: yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ haranti
analyzed: yajamānam eva tat svargan lokam haranti

original: (PB 6.8.1) sa tu vai yajñena yajetety āhur yasya virājaṃ yajñamukhe dadhyur iti
analyzed: sa tu vai yajñena yajeta iti āhuḥ yasya virājam yajña mukhe dadhyuḥ iti

original: (PB 6.8.2) navabhiḥ stuvanti hiṅkāro daśamo daśākṣarā virāḍ virājam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti
analyzed: navabhiḥ stuvanti hiṅkāraḥ daśamaḥ daśa akṣarā virāj virājam eva asya yajña mukhe dadhāti

original: (PB 6.8.3) navabhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāḥ prāṇair evainaṃ samarddhayanti hiṅkāro daśamas tasmān nābhir anavatṛṇṇā daśamī prāṇānām
analyzed: navabhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāḥ prāṇaiḥ eva enam samarddhayanti hiṅkāraḥ daśamaḥ tasmāt nābhiḥ an avatṛṇṇā daśamī prāṇānām

original: (PB 6.8.4) navabhiḥ stuvanti navādhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti tān eva tat pāvayanti teṣāṃ prāṇān utsṛjanti
analyzed: navabhiḥ stuvanti nava adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti tān eva tat pāvayanti teṣām prāṇān utsṛjanti

original: (PB 6.8.5) prajāpatir vai hiṅkāras trayo bahiṣpavamānyo yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti mithunam evāsyā yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
