original: (PB 7.1.8) aniruktaṃ geyam etad vai gāyatrasya krūraṃ yan niruktaṃ yad aniruktaṃ gāyati krūram evāsya parivṛṇakti
analyzed: a niruktam geyam etat vai gāyatrasya krūram yat niruktam yat a niruktam gāyati krūram eva asya parivṛṇakti

original: (PB 7.1.9) prāṇo gāyatraṃ na vyavānyāt prāṇasyāvicchedāya yadi vyavāniti pramāyuko bhavati yadi na vyavāniti sarvam āyur eti
analyzed: prāṇaḥ gāyatram na vyavānyāt prāṇasya a vicchedāya yadi vyavāniti pramāyukaḥ bhavati yadi na vyavāniti sarvam āyuḥ eti

original: (PB 7.1.10) yadi vyavānyān madhya ṛco vyavānyāt prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇam eva tan madhyata ātman dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti
analyzed: yadi vyavānyāt madhye ṛcaḥ vyavānyāt prāṇaḥ vai gāyatram prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇam eva tat madhyataḥ ātman dadhāti sa sarvam āyuḥ eti

original: (PB 7.1.11) iḍāṃ paśukāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt svaḥ svargakāmāya yaśo brahmavarcasakāmāyāyur āmayāvine haṃsīty abhicarate
analyzed: iḍām paśu kāmāya nidhanam kuryāt svar svarga kāmāya yaśaḥ brahmavarcasa kāmāya āyuḥ āmayāvine haṃsi iti abhicarate

original: (PB 7.1.12) ete vai gāyatrasya dohāḥ
analyzed: ete vai gāyatrasya dohāḥ

original: (PB 7.1.13) brahmavarcasasī paśumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: brahmavarcasasī paśumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.2.1) prajāpatir devebhya ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ kṛtvā prāyacchat te 'nyo 'nyasmā agrāya nātiṣṭhanta tān abravīd ājim asminn iteti ta ājim āyan  #
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ devebhyaḥ ātmānam yajñam kṛ prāyacchat tad anyaḥ anyasmai agrāya na atiṣṭhanta tān abravīt ājim asmin i iti te ājim āyan  /

original: yad ājim āyaṃs tad ājyānām ājyatvam
analyzed: yat ājim āyan tat ājyānām ājya tvam

original: (PB 7.2.2) sa indro 'ved agnir vā idam agra ujjyeṣyatīti so 'bravīd yataro nāv idam
analyzed: saḥ indraḥ avet agniḥ vai idam agre ujjyeṣyati iti saḥ abravīt yataraḥ āvayoḥ idam

original: agra ujjayat tan nau saheti so 'gnir agra udajayad atha mitrāvaruṇāv athendro 'thaiṣaikā
analyzed: agre ujjayat tat nau saha iti saḥ agniḥ agre udajayat atha mitrāvaruṇau atha indraḥ atha eṣā ekā

original: hotrānujjitāsīt sa indro 'gnim abravīd yat sahāvocāvahī yan nau tad iti saiṣaindrāgny
analyzed: hotrā an ujjitā āsīt saḥ indraḥ agnim abravīt yat saha avocāvahī yat nau tat iti sā eṣā aindrāgnī

original: adhyardham agne stotram adhyardham indrasya
analyzed: adhyardham agneḥ stotram adhyardham indrasya

original: (PB 7.2.3) catvāri santi ṣaḍ devatyāni
analyzed: catvāri santi ṣaḍ devatyāni

original: (PB 7.2.4) ṣaḍdhā vihito yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
analyzed: ṣaḍdhā vihitaḥ yajñaḥ yāvān yajñaḥ tam eva ārabhate

original: (PB 7.2.5) sarvāṇi svārāṇy ājyāni taj jāmi nānādevatyaiḥ stuvanty ajāmitāyai
analyzed: sarvāṇi svārāṇi ājyāni tat jāmi nānā devatyaiḥ stuvanti a jāmi tāyai

original: (PB 7.2.6) grāmyebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad ājyaiḥ punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prājyante pratyañcaḥ prajāyante tasmād  #
analyzed: grāmyebhyaḥ vai etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yat ājyaiḥ punar abhyāvartam stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prājyante pratyañcaḥ prajāyante tasmāt

original: u pretya punar āyanti
analyzed: u pretya punar āyanti

original: (PB 7.3.1) etāvatā vāva mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ pupuve
analyzed: etāvatā vāva mādhyandinam savanam pupuve

original: (PB 7.3.2) tribhiś ca cchandobhiḥ pañcabhiś ca sāmabhiḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ ca chandobhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ca sāmabhiḥ

original: (PB 7.3.3) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti mādhyandinam eva tat savanaṃ pāvayanti
analyzed: yat mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti mādhyandinam eva tat savanam pāvayanti

original: (PB 7.3.4) etāvanti vāva sarvāṇi sāmāni yāvanti mādhyandine pavamāne
analyzed: etāvanti vāva sarvāṇi sāmāni yāvanti mādhyandine pavamāne

original: (PB 7.3.5) gāyatraṃ nidhanavad anidhanam aiḍam
analyzed: gāyatram nidhanavat a nidhanam aiḍam

original: (PB 7.3.6) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti sarvair eva tat sāmabhiḥ stuvanti
analyzed: yat mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti sarvaiḥ eva tat sāmabhiḥ stuvanti

original: (PB 7.3.7) ātmā vai yajñasya pavamāno mukhaṃ gāyatrī prāṇo gāyatraṃ yad gāyatryāṃ gāyatreṇa stuvanti mukhata eva tat prāṇān dadhati
analyzed: ātmā vai yajñasya pavamānaḥ mukham gāyatrī prāṇaḥ gāyatram yat gāyatryām gāyatreṇa stuvanti mukhataḥ eva tat prāṇān dadhati

original: (PB 7.3.8) prāṇāpānā vā etāni cchandāṃsi prāṇo gāyatrī vyāno bṛhaty apānas triṣṭub yad etaiś chandobhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāpānānām avicchedāya
analyzed: prāṇa apānāḥ vai etāni chandāṃsi prāṇaḥ gāyatrī vyānaḥ bṛhatī apānaḥ triṣṭubh yat etaiḥ chandobhiḥ stuvanti prāṇa apānānām a vicchedāya

original: (PB 7.3.9) ime vai lokā etāni cchandāṃsy ayam eva gāyatry ayaṃ madhyamo bṛhaty asāv uttamas triṣṭub yad etaś chandobhiḥ saṃhitaiḥ stuvanty  #
analyzed: ime vai lokāḥ etāni chandāṃsi ayam eva gāyatrī ayam madhyamaḥ bṛhatī asau uttamaḥ triṣṭubh yat etaḥ chandobhiḥ saṃhitaiḥ stuvanti  /

original: eṣāṃ lokānām avicchedāya
analyzed: eṣām lokānām a vicchedāya

original: (PB 7.3.10) yad anyac chando 'ntarā vyaveyād imāṃl lokān vicchindyāt
analyzed: yat anyat chandaḥ antarā vyaveyāt imān lokān vicchindyāt

original: (PB 7.3.11) gāyatreṇa stutvā nidhanavatā stuvantīyaṃ vai gāyatry asyām eva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
analyzed: gāyatreṇa stutvā nidhanavatā stuvanti iyam vai gāyatrī asyām eva tat āyatanam kriyate

original: (PB 7.3.12) yad anidhanenāgre stuyur anāyatano yajamānaḥ syāt
analyzed: yat a nidhanena agre stuyuḥ anāyatanaḥ yajamānaḥ syāt

original: (PB 7.3.13) nidhanavatā stuvanti vīryaṃ vai gāyatrī vīryaṃ nidhanaṃ vīryeṇaiva tad vīryaṃ samardhayati
analyzed: nidhanavatā stuvanti vīryam vai gāyatrī vīryam nidhanam vīryeṇa eva tat vīryam samardhayati

original: (PB 7.3.14) aiḍena bṛhatīm ārabhante
analyzed: aiḍena bṛhatīm ārabhante

original: (PB 7.3.15) paśavo vā iḍā paśavo bṛhatī paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai iḍā paśavaḥ bṛhatī paśuṣu eva tat paśūn dadhāti

original: (PB 7.3.16) bṛhatyāṃ bhūyiṣṭhāni sāmāni bhavanti
analyzed: bṛhatyām bhūyiṣṭhāni sāmāni bhavanti

original: (PB 7.3.17) tatrāpi triṇidhanam
analyzed: tatra api triṇidhanam

original: (PB 7.3.18) abaliṣṭha iva vā ayaṃ madhyami lokas tasyaiva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
analyzed: a baliṣṭhaḥ iva vai ayam madhyami lokaḥ tasya eva tat āyatanam kriyate

original: (PB 7.3.19) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati trīṇi savanānāṃ chidrāṇi tāni tenāpidhīyante
analyzed: triṇidhanam bhavati trīṇi savanānām chidrāṇi tāni tena apidhīyante

original: (PB 7.3.20) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati traya ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: triṇidhanam bhavati trayaḥ ime lokāḥ eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 7.3.21) triṇidhanaṃ bhavaty etena vai mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ mādhyandinaṃ  #
analyzed: triṇidhanam bhavati etena vai mādhyandinam savanam pratiṣṭhitam yat triṇidhanam yat triṇidhanam na syāt a pratiṣṭhitam mādhyandinam

original: savanaṃ syāt
analyzed: savanam syāt

original: (PB 7.3.22) dvyakṣarāṇi nidhanāni bhavanti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣthāpayati
analyzed: dvi akṣarāṇi nidhanāni bhavanti dvipād yajamānaḥ yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣthāpayati

original: (PB 7.3.23) anidhanam antato bhavati svargasya lokasyānatipādāya
analyzed: a nidhanam antataḥ bhavati svargasya lokasya an atipādāya

original: (PB 7.3.24) yan nidhanavat syād yajamānaṃ svargāl lokān nirhanyāt
analyzed: yat nidhanavat syāt yajamānam svargāt lokāt nirhanyāt

original: (PB 7.3.25) svāraṃ bhavati
analyzed: svāram bhavati

original: (PB 7.3.26) svareṇa vai devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pradīyate svareṇaiva tad devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ prayacchati
analyzed: svareṇa vai devebhyaḥ antatas annādyam pradīyate svareṇa eva tat devebhyaḥ antatas annādyam prayacchati

original: (PB 7.3.27) gāyatraṃ purastād bhavati svāram antataḥ
analyzed: gāyatram purastāt bhavati svāram antatas

original: (PB 7.3.28) prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evatad ubhayato dadhāti tasmād ubhayataḥ prāṇāḥ paśavaḥ
analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai gāyatram prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān eva tat ubhayatas dadhāti tasmāt ubhayatas prāṇāḥ paśavaḥ

original: (PB 7.3.29) yad gāyatraṃ purastād bhavati svāram antataḥ prāṇair eva praity apāne pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat gāyatram purastāt bhavati svāram antatas prāṇaiḥ eva praiti apāne pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 7.4.1) etad vai yajñasya svargyaṃ yan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ mādhyandinasya pavamānaḥ
analyzed: etat vai yajñasya svargyam yat mādhyandinam savanam mādhyandinasya pavamānaḥ

original: pavamānasya bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante svargasyaiva tal lokasyāyatane dīyante
analyzed: pavamānasya bṛhatī yat bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇāḥ dīyante svargasya eva tat lokasya āyatane dīyante

original: (PB 7.4.2) devā vai cchandāṃsy abruvan yuṣmābhiḥ svargyaṃl lokam ayāmeti te gāyatrīṃ
analyzed: devāḥ vai chandāṃsi abruvan yuṣmābhiḥ svargyan lokam ayāma iti te gāyatrīm

original: prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvaṃs triṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvañ jagatīṃ prāyuñjata
analyzed: prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvan triṣṭubham prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvam jagatīm prāyuñjata

original: tayā na vyāpnuvann anuṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayālpakādi na vyāpnuvaṃs ta āsāṃ diśāṃ
analyzed: tayā na vyāpnuvan anuṣṭubham prāyuñjata tayā alpaka ādi na vyāpnuvan te āsām diśām

original: rasān prabṛhya catvāry akṣarāṇy upādadhuḥ sā bṛhaty abhavat tayemāṃl lokān vyāpnuvan
analyzed: rasān prabṛhya catvāri akṣarāṇi upādadhuḥ sā bṛhatī abhavat tayā imān lokān vyāpnuvan

original: (PB 7.4.3) bṛhatī maryā yayemāṃl lokān vyāpāmeti tad bṛhatyā bṛhattvam
analyzed: bṛhatī maryā yayā imān lokān vyāpāma iti tat bṛhatyāḥ bṛhat tvam

original: (PB 7.4.4) paśūn vā asyāntān upādadhuḥ paśavo vai bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante sva eva tad āyatane dīyante
analyzed: paśūn vai asya antān upādadhuḥ paśavaḥ vai bṛhatī yat bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇāḥ dīyante sve eva tat āyatane dīyante

original: (PB 7.4.5) yan nv ity āhur anyāni cchandāṃsi varṣīyāṃsi kasmād bṛhaty ucyata eṣā
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ anyāni chandāṃsi varṣīyāṃsi kasmāt bṛhatī ucyate eṣā

original: hīmāṃl lokān vyāpnon nānyac chandaḥ kiṃ cana yāni sapta caturuttarāṇi cchandāṃsi
analyzed: hi imān lokān vyāpnot na anyat chandaḥ kim cana yāni sapta catur uttarāṇi chandāṃsi

original: tāni bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyante tasmād bṛhaty ucyate
analyzed: tāni bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyante tasmāt bṛhatī ucyate

original: (PB 7.4.6) yan nv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kasmād bṛhatyā madhyandine stuvantīti
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ gāyatram prātaḥsavanam traiṣṭubham mādhyandinam savanam jāgatam tṛtīyasavanam kasmāt bṛhatyā madhyandine stuvanti iti

original: (PB 7.4.7) bahiṣpavamānena vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃl lokam aharan sa nādhriyata taṃ
analyzed: bahiṣpavamānena vai devāḥ ādityam svargam lokam aharan sa na adhriyata tam

original: bṛhatyā madhyandine 'stabhnuvaṃs tasmād bṛhatyā madhyandinaṃ stuvanty ādityaṃ hy
analyzed: bṛhatyā madhyandine astabhnuvan tasmāt bṛhatyā madhyandinam stuvanti ādityam hi

original: eṣā madhyandine dādhāra
analyzed: eṣā madhyandine dādhāra

original: (PB 7.4.8) yair u kaiś ca cchandobhir madhyandine stuvanti tāni triṣṭubham abhi saṃpadyante tasmāt triṣṭubho nayanti mādhyandināt savanāt
analyzed: yaiḥ u kaiḥ ca chandobhiḥ madhyandine stuvanti tāni triṣṭubham abhi saṃpadyante tasmāt triṣṭubhaḥ nayanti mādhyandināt savanāt

original: (PB 7.5.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa śocann amahīyamāno 'tiṣṭhat
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti sa śocan a mahīyamānaḥ atiṣṭhat

original: sa etad āmahīyavam apaśyat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā amahīyanta yad amahīyanta tasmād āmahīyavam
analyzed: saḥ etat āmahīyavam apaśyat tena imāḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ amahīyanta yat amahīyanta tasmāt āmahīyavam

original: (PB 7.5.2) tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tāsāṃ divi sad bhūmy ādada iti prāṇān ādatta
analyzed: tāḥ asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ apākrāman tāsām divi sat bhūmī ādade iti prāṇān ādatta

original: tā enaṃ prāṇeṣv ātteṣu punar upāvartanta tābhya ugraṃ śarma mahi śrava iti punaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ enam prāṇeṣu ātteṣu punar upāvartanta tābhyaḥ ugram śarma mahi śravaḥ iti punar

original: prāṇān prāyacchat tā asmād ud evāyodhaṃs tāsāṃ stauṣa iti manyūn avāśṛṇāt tato vai
analyzed: prāṇān prāyacchat tāḥ asmāt ud eva ayodhan tāsām stauṣe iti manyūn avāśṛṇāt tatas vai

original: tasmai tāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
analyzed: tasmai tāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya atiṣṭhanta

original: (PB 7.5.3) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: tiṣṭhante asmai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.5.4) prajānāṃ ca vā eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ pāpavasīyaś ca vidhṛtir yad āmahīyavam
analyzed: prajānām ca vai eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ pāpavasīyaḥ ca vidhṛtiḥ yat āmahīyavam

original: (PB 7.5.5) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyasaḥ bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.5.6) devā vai yaśaskāmāḥ sattram āsatāgnir indro vāyur makhas te 'bruvsn yan
analyzed: devāḥ vai yaśaskāmāḥ sattram āsata agniḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ makhaḥ te abruvan yan

original: no yaśa ṛcchāt tan naḥ sahāsad iti teṣā makhaṃ yaśa ārcchat tad ādāyāpākrāmat tad
analyzed: naḥ yaśaḥ ṛccha āt tat naḥ saha asat iti teṣām makham yaśaḥ ārcchat tat ādāya apākrāmat tat

original: asya prāsahāditsanta taṃ paryayatanta svadhanuḥ pratiṣṭhābhyātiṣṭhat tasya dhanurārtnir
analyzed: asya prāsahā āditsanta tam paryayatanta sva dhanuḥ pratiṣṭhā abhyātiṣṭhat tasya dhanuḥ ārtniḥ

original: ūrdhvā patitvā śiro 'cchinat sa pravargyo 'bhavad yajño vai makho yat pravargyaṃ
analyzed: ūrdhvā patitvā śiraḥ acchinat sa pravargyaḥ abhavat yajñaḥ vai makhaḥ yat pravargyam

original: pravṛñjanti yajñasyaiva tac chiraḥ pratidadhati
analyzed: pravṛñjanti yajñasya eva tat śiraḥ pratidadhati

original: (PB 7.5.7) tad devā yaśo vyabhajanta tasyāgnī rauravaṃ prābṛhata
analyzed: tat devāḥ yaśaḥ vyabhajanta tasya agniḥ rauravam prābṛhata

original: (PB 7.5.8) tad vai sa paśuvīryaṃ prābṛhata paśavo vai rauravam
analyzed: tat vai sa paśu vīryam prābṛhata paśavaḥ vai rauravam

original: (PB 7.5.9) paśumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: paśumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.5.10) agnir vai rūras tasyaitad rauravam
analyzed: agniḥ vai rūraḥ tasya etat rauravam

original: (PB 7.5.11) asurā vai devān paryayatanta tata etāv agnī rūrau viṣvañcau stobhāv apaśyat tābhyām enān pratyauṣat te pratyuṣyamāṇā aravanta yad  #
analyzed: asurāḥ vai devān paryayatanta tatas etau agniḥ rūrau viṣvañcau stobhau apaśyat tābhyām enān pratyauṣat te pratyuṣyamāṇāḥ aravanta yat

original: aravanta tasmād rauravam
analyzed: aravanta tasmāt rauravam

original: (PB 7.5.12) athendro yaudhājayaṃ prābṛhata tad vai sa vajraṃ prābṛhata vajro vai yaudhājayam
analyzed: atha indraḥ yaudhājayam prābṛhata tat vai sa vajram prābṛhata vajraḥ vai yaudhājayam

original: (PB 7.5.13) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: vajram bhrātṛvyāya praharati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.5.14) indro vai yudhājit tasyaitad yaudhājayam
analyzed: indraḥ vai yudhājit tasya etat yaudhājayam

original: (PB 7.5.15) yudhā maryā ajaiṣmeti tasmād yaudhājayam
analyzed: yudhā maryāḥ ajaiṣma iti tasmāt yaudhājayam

original: (PB 7.5.16) atha vāyur auśanaṃ prābṛhata
analyzed: atha vāyuḥ auśanam prābṛhata

original: (PB 7.5.17) tad vai sa prāṇvīryaṃ prābṛhata prāṇā vā auśanam
analyzed: tat vai sa prāṇa vīryam prābṛhata prāṇāḥ vai auśanam

original: (PB 7.5.18) sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: sarvam āyuḥ eti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.5.19) vāyur vā uśanaṃs tasyaitad auśanam
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai uśanan tasya etat auśanam

original: (PB 7.5.20) uśanā vai kāvyo 'surāṇāṃ purohita āsīt taṃ devāḥ kāmadughābhir apāmantrayanta tasmā etāny auśanāni prāyacchan kāmadughā vā auśanāni
analyzed: uśanāḥ vai kāvyaḥ asurāṇām purohitaḥ āsīt tam devāḥ kāmadughābhiḥ apāmantrayanta tasmai etāni auśanāni prāyacchan kāmadughāḥ vai auśanāni

original: (PB 7.5.21) kāmadughā enam upatiṣṭhante ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: kāmadughāḥ enam upatiṣṭhante yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 7.6.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa tūṣṇīṃ manasādhyāyat tasya yan manasy āsīt tad bṛhat samabhavat
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti sa tūṣṇīm manasā adhyāyat tasya yat manasi āsīt tat bṛhat samabhavat

original: (PB 7.6.2) sa ādadhīta garbho vai me 'yam antarhitas taṃv vācā prajanayā iti
analyzed: saḥ ādadhīta garbhaḥ vai me ayam antarhitaḥ tam vācā prajanayā iti

original: (PB 7.6.3) sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sā vāg rathantaram anvapadyata
analyzed: sa vācam vyasṛjata sā vāc rathantaram anvapadyata

original: (PB 7.6.4) ratham aryāḥ kṣeplātārīd iti tad rathantarasya rathantaratvam
analyzed: ratham aryāḥ kṣeplā atārīt iti tat rathantarasya rathantara tvam

original: (PB 7.6.5) tato bṛhad anu prājāyata bṛhan maryā idaṃ sa jyog antarabhūd iti tad bṛhato bṛhattvam
analyzed: tatas bṛhat anu prājāyata bṛhat maryāḥ idam sa jyok antarabhūt iti tat bṛhataḥ bṛhat tvam

original: (PB 7.6.6) yathā vai putro jyeṣṭha evaṃ bṛhat prajāpateḥ
analyzed: yathā vai putraḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ evam bṛhat prajāpateḥ

original: (PB 7.6.7) jyeṣṭhabrāhmaṇaṃ vā etat
analyzed: jyeṣṭha brāhmaṇam vai etat

original: (PB 7.6.8) pra jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: pra jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.6.9) yan nv ity āhur bṛhat pūrvaṃ prajāpatau samabhavat kasmād rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśa iti
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ bṛhat pūrvam prajāpatau samabhavat kasmāt rathantaram pūrvam yogam ānaśe iti

original: (PB 7.6.10) bṛhad eva pūrvaṃ samabhavad rathantaraṃ tu pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyāsṛjata tasmāt pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
analyzed: bṛhat eva pūrvam samabhavat rathantaram tu pūrvam sṛṣṭyā asṛjata tasmāt pūrvam yogam ānaśe

original: (PB 7.6.11) tayoḥ samānaṃ nidhanam āsīt tasmin nātiṣṭhetāṃ ta ājim aitāṃ tayor has iti bṛhat prāṇam udajayad as iti rathantaram apānam abhisamaveṣṭata
analyzed: tayoḥ samānam nidhanam āsīt tasmin na atiṣṭhetām te ājim aitām tayoḥ haḥ iti bṛhat prāṇam udajayat aḥ iti rathantaram apānam abhisamaveṣṭata

original: (PB 7.6.12) prāṇāpānau vai bṛhadrathantare jyog āmayāvina ubhe kuryād apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānāv evāsmin
analyzed: prāṇa apānau vai bṛhat rathantare jyok āmayāvinaḥ ubhe kuryāt apakrāntau vai etasya prāṇa apānau yasya jyok āmayati prāṇa apānau eva asmin

original: (PB 7.6.13) yan nv ity āhur ubhe bṛhadrathantare bahirṇidhane kasmād bṛhad bahirṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntarṇidhanāni rathantaram iti
analyzed: yat nu iti āhuḥ ubhe bṛhat rathantare bahirṇidhane kasmāt bṛhat bahirṇidhanāni bhajate antarṇidhanāni rathantaram iti

original: (PB 7.6.14) prāṇo bṛhat tasmād bahirṇidhanāni bhajate bahir hi prāṇo 'pāno rathantaraṃ tasmād antarṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntar hy apānaḥ
analyzed: prāṇaḥ bṛhat tasmāt bahirṇidhanāni bhajate bahis hi prāṇaḥ apānaḥ rathantaram tasmāt antarṇidhanāni bhajate antar hi apānaḥ

original: (PB 7.6.15) mahāvṛkṣau vai bṛhadrathantare nidhanena samarpye
analyzed: mahā vṛkṣau vai bṛhat rathantare nidhanena samarpye

original: (PB 7.6.16) yad vai mahāvṛkṣau samṛcchete bahu tatra vibhagnaṃ prabhagnaṃ śete
analyzed: yat vai mahā vṛkṣau samṛcchete bahu tatra vibhagnam prabhagnam śete

original: (PB 7.6.17) airaṃ vai bṛhad aiḍaṃ rathantaraṃ mano vai bṛhad vāg rathantaraṃ sām
analyzed: airam vai bṛhat aiḍam rathantaram manaḥ vai bṛhat vāc rathantaram sām

original: a vai bṛhad ṛg rathantaraṃ prāṇo vai bṛhad apāno rathantaram asau vai loko bṛhad
analyzed: a vai bṛhat ṛc rathantaram prāṇaḥ vai bṛhat apānaḥ rathantaram asau vai lokaḥ bṛhat

original: ayaṃ rathantaram etāni manasānvīkṣyodgāyet kḷptābhyām evābhyām udgāyati
analyzed: ayam rathantaram etāni manasā anvīkṣya udgāyet kḷptābhyām eva ābhyām udgāyati

original: (PB 7.7.1) paśavo vai bṛhadrathantare aṣṭākṣareṇa prathamāyā (?)
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai bṛhat rathantare aṣṭa akṣareṇa prathamāyā

original: ṛcaḥ prastauty aṣṭāśaphāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
analyzed: ṛcaḥ prastauti aṣṭāśaphān tat paśūn avarundhe

original: (PB 7.7.2) dvyakṣareṇottarayor ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: dvi akṣareṇa uttarayoḥ ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamānaḥ yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 7.7.3) pañcākṣareṇa rathantarasya pratiharati pāṅktāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
analyzed: pañca akṣareṇa rathantarasya pratiharati pāṅktān tat paśūn avarundhe

original: (PB 7.7.4) caturakṣareṇa bṛhataḥ pratiharati catuṣpadas tat paśūn avarundhe
analyzed: catur akṣareṇa bṛhataḥ pratiharati catuṣpadaḥ tat paśūn avarundhe

original: (PB 7.7.5) na vai bṛhan na rathantaram ekaṃ chando 'yacchat tataḥ kakubhāv uttare
analyzed: na vai bṛhat na rathantaram ekam chandaḥ ayacchat tatas kakubhau uttare

original: upādadhus tasmād bṛhatī prathamā kakubhāv uttare tasmād bṛhadrathantare ekarcena
analyzed: upādadhuḥ tasmāt bṛhatī prathamā kakubhau uttare tasmāt bṛhat rathantare ekarcena

original: kurvanti na hi te ekaṃ chando 'yacchat
analyzed: kurvanti na hi te ekam chandaḥ ayacchat

original: (PB 7.7.6) nava bṛhato rohān rohati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇān evāvarundhe
analyzed: nava bṛhataḥ rohān rohati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇān eva avarundhe

original: (PB 7.7.7) trīn prathamāyāṃ rohati bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyat tān evāvarundhe trīn madhyamāyāṃ
analyzed: trīn prathamāyām rohati bhūtam bhavat bhaviṣyat tān eva avarundhe trīn madhyamāyām

original: rohaty ātmānaṃ prajāṃ paś+ūṃs tān evāvarundhe trīn uttamāyāṃ rohati traya ime lokā
analyzed: rohati ātmānam prajām paśūn tān eva avarundhe trīn uttamāyām rohati trayaḥ ime lokāḥ

original: eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 7.7.8) sarvān kāmān avarundhe ya evaṃv vidvān bṛhato rohān rohati
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avarundhe yaḥ evaṃv vidvān bṛhataḥ rohān rohati

original: (PB 7.7.9) vajreṇa vā etat prastotodgātāram abhipravartayati yad rathantaraṃ prastauti samudram antardhāyodgāyed vāg ity ādeyaṃv vāg vai samudraḥ  #
analyzed: vajreṇa vai etat prastotā udgātāram abhipravartayati yat rathantaram prastauti samudram antardhāya udgāyet vāc iti vāc vai samudraḥ  /

original: samudram evāntardadhāty ahiṃsāyai
analyzed: samudram eva antardadhāti ahiṃsāyai

original: (PB 7.7.10) balavad geyaṃ vajram evaṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyudgṛhṇāti
analyzed: balavat geyam vajram evam pravṛttam pratyudgṛhṇāti

original: (PB 7.7.11) balvalā kurvatā geyam abhilobhayateva vajram evābhilobhayati
analyzed: balvalā kurvatā geyam abhilobhayatā iva vajram eva abhilobhayati

original: (PB 7.7.12) kṣipraṃ geyaṃ svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
analyzed: kṣipram geyam svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: (PB 7.7.13) devaratho vai rathantaram akṣareṇākṣareṇa pratiṣṭhāpayatodgeyam areṇāreṇa hi rathaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: deva rathaḥ vai rathantaram akṣareṇa akṣareṇa pratiṣṭhāpayatā udgeyam areṇa areṇa hi rathaḥ pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 7.7.14) yo vai devaratham ananvālabhyātiṣṭhaty avāsmāt padyata iyaṃ vai devaratha imām ālabhyodgāyen nāsmād avapadyate
analyzed: yaḥ vai deva ratham an anvālabhya ātiṣṭhati ava asmāt padyate iyam vai deva rathaḥ imām ālabhya udgāyet na asmāt avapadyate

original: (PB 7.7.15) īśvaraṃ vai rathantaram udgātuś cakṣuḥ pramathitoḥ prastuyamāne saṃmīlet svardṛśaṃ prativīkṣeta nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti
analyzed: īśvaram vai rathantaram udgātuḥ cakṣuḥ pramathitoḥ prastuyamāne saṃmīlet svar dṛśam prativīkṣeta na enam cakṣuḥ jahāti

original: (PB 7.7.16) prajananaṃ vai rathantaraṃ yat tasthuṣa ity āhāsthāyukodgātur vāg bhavaty
analyzed: prajananam vai rathantaram yat tasthuṣaḥ iti āha a sthāyukā udgātuḥ vāc bhavati

original: api prajananaṃ hanty asthuṣa iti vaktavyaṃ susthuṣa iti vā sthāyukodgātur vāg bhavati
analyzed: api prajananam hanti asthuṣaḥ iti vaktavyam susthuṣaḥ iti vā sthāyukā udgātuḥ vāc bhavati

original: na prajananam api hanti
analyzed: na prajananam api hanti

original: (PB 7.7.17) pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta tair devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ rathantaraṃ mahimnā nāśaknod utpatat
analyzed: pṛṣṭhāni vai asṛjyanta taiḥ devāḥ svargan lokam āyan teṣām rathantaram mahimnā na aśaknot utpatat

original: (PB 7.7.18) tasya vaśiṣṭho mahimno vinidhāya tena stutvā svargaṃl lokam ait tān saṃbhṛtyodgāyet
analyzed: tasya vasiṣṭhaḥ mahimnaḥ vinidhāya tena stutvā svargam lokam ait tān saṃbhṛtya udgāyet

original: (PB 7.7.19) yas te goṣu mahimā yas te apsu rathe vā te stanayitnau ya u te yas te agnau mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇavan na edhi
analyzed: yaḥ tvad go PLM mahimā yaḥ tvad SG apsu ap PLF rathe vā te stanayitnau yaḥ u tvad yaḥ te agnau mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇavat naḥ edhi

original: (PB 7.8.1) apo vā ṛtvyam ārcchat tāsāṃv vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vasu vāmaṃ samabhavat
analyzed: apaḥ vai ṛtvyam ārcchat tāsām vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tatas vasu vāmam samabhavat

original: tasmin mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatāṃ tāv abrūtāṃv vāmaṃ maryā idaṃ deveṣv ājānīti tasmād vāmadevyam
analyzed: tasmin mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatām tau abrūtām vāmam maryāḥ idam deveṣu ājāni iti tasmāt vāmadevyam

original: (PB 7.8.2) tat parigṛhṇantāv abrūtām idam avidāvedaṃ nau mābhyartiḍhvam iti tat prajāpatir abravīn mad vā etad dhy ajani mama vā etad iti tad  #
analyzed: tat parigṛhṇantau abrūtām idam avidāva idam nau mā abhyartiḍhvam iti tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt mat vai etat hi ajani mama vai etat iti tat

original: agnir abravīn māṃ (?)
analyzed: agniḥ abravīt mām

original: vā etad annam ajani mama vā etad iti tad indro 'bravīc chreṣṭhasthā vā etad ahaṃ
analyzed: vai etat annam ajani mama vai etat iti tat indraḥ abravīt śreṣṭha sthāḥ vai etat aham

original: vaḥ śreṣṭho 'smi mama vā etad iti tad viśve devā abruvann asmaddevatyaṃ vā etad yad
analyzed: vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ asmi mama vai etat iti tat viśve devāḥ abruvan asmad devatyam vai etat yat

original: adbhyo 'dhi samabhūd asmākaṃ vā etad iti tat prajāpatir abravīt sarveṣāṃ na idam
analyzed: adbhyaḥ adhi samabhūt asmākam vai etat iti tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt sarveṣām naḥ idam

original: astu sarva idam upajīvāmeti tat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ sarvadevatyaṃ vai vāmadevyam
analyzed: astu sarve idam upajīvāma iti tat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ sarva devatyam vai vāmadevyam

original: (PB 7.8.3) yat kavatīṣu tena prājāpatyaṃ ko hi prajāpatir yad aniruktāsu tena prājāpatyam anirukto hi prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: yat kavatīṣu tena prājāpatyam kaḥ hi prajāpatiḥ yat aniruktāsu tena prājāpatyam aniruktaḥ hi prajāpatiḥ

original: (PB 7.8.4) yad gāyatrīṣu tenāgneyaṃ gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
analyzed: yat gāyatrīṣu tena āgneyam gāyatra chandāḥ hi agniḥ

original: (PB 7.8.5) yat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadadhus tenaindraṃ sarvāṇi hi pṛṣṭhānīndrasya niṣkevalyāni
analyzed: yat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadadhuḥ tena aindram sarvāṇi hi pṛṣṭhāni indrasya niṣkevalyāni

original: (PB 7.8.6) yan maitrāvaruṇo 'nuśaṃsati tena maitrāvaruṇam
analyzed: yat maitrāvaruṇaḥ anuśaṃsati tena maitrāvaruṇam

original: (PB 7.8.7) yad bahudevatyam uttamaṃ padaṃ tena vaiśvadevaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat bahu devatyam uttamam padam tena vaiśvadevam sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 7.8.8) prajāpatir vā etāṃ gāyatrīṃ yonim apaśyat sa ādīdhītāsmād yoneḥ pṛṣṭhāni sṛjā iti
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ vai etām gāyatrīm yonim apaśyat saḥ ādīdhīta asmāt yoneḥ pṛṣṭhāni sṛjai iti

original: (PB 7.8.9) sa rathantaram asṛjata tad rathasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa rathantaram asṛjata tat rathasya ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata

original: (PB 7.8.10) sa bṛhad asṛjata tat stanayitnor ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata sa vairūpam asṛjata tad vā tasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa bṛhat asṛjata tat stanayitnoḥ ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata sa vairūpam asṛjata tat vā tasya ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata

original: (PB 7.8.11) sa vairūpam asṛjata tad agner ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa vairūpam asṛjata tat agneḥ ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata

original: (PB 7.8.12) sa śakvarīr asṛjata tad apāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa śakvarīḥ asṛjata tat apām ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata

original: (PB 7.8.13) sa revatīr asṛjata tad gavāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
analyzed: sa revatīḥ asṛjata tat gavām ghoṣaḥ anvasṛjyata

original: (PB 7.8.14) etair vā etāni saha ghoṣair asṛjyanta
analyzed: etaiḥ vai etāni saha ghoṣaiḥ asṛjyanta

original: (PB 7.8.15) sarve 'smin ghoṣāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyā vāco vadanti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: sarve asmin ghoṣāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyāḥ vācaḥ vadanti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.9.1) pitā vai vāmadevyaṃ putrāḥ pṛṣṭhāni
analyzed: pitā vai vāmadevyam putrāḥ pṛṣṭhāni

original: (PB 7.9.2) etasmād vā etāni yoner asṛjyanta
analyzed: etasmāt vai etāni yoneḥ asṛjyanta

original: (PB 7.9.3) tasmāt pṛṣṭhānāṃ stotraṃ vāmadevyenānuṣṭuvanti śāntyai
analyzed: tasmāt pṛṣṭhānām stotram vāmadevyena anuṣṭuvanti śāntyai

original: (PB 7.9.4) yad dhi putro 'śāntaṃ carati pitā tac chamayati
analyzed: yat hi putraḥ a śāntam carati pitā tat śamayati

original: (PB 7.9.5) ayaṃ vai loko madhyamo vāmadevyam etasmād vā imau lokau viṣvañcāv asṛjyetāṃ bṛhac ca ratantaraṃ ca
analyzed: ayam vai lokaḥ madhyamaḥ vāmadevyam etasmāt vai imau lokau viṣvañcau asṛjyetām bṛhat ca ratantaram ca

original: (PB 7.9.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvanti ye rathantarāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti
analyzed: yat rathantareṇa stuvanti ye rathantarāḥ paśavaḥ antarīkṣam te upaśrayanti

original: yad bṛhatā stuvanti ye bārhatāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti te vāmadevyasya stotreṇāvaruddhāḥ
analyzed: yat bṛhatā stuvanti ye bārhatāḥ paśavaḥ antarīkṣam te upaśrayanti te vāmadevyasya stotreṇa avaruddhāḥ

original: (PB 7.9.7) dhruva āsīno vāmadevyenodgāyet paśūnām upavṛtyai
analyzed: dhruve āsīnaḥ vāmadevyena udgāyet paśūnām upavṛtyai

original: (PB 7.9.8) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: upa enam paśavaḥ āvartante yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.9.9) antarikṣaṃ vai vāmadevyam adhūnvatevodgeyam adhūtam ivāntarikṣaṃ paśavo vai vāmadevyam ahiṃsatevodgeyaṃ paśūnām ahiṃsāyai
analyzed: antarikṣam vai vāmadevyam a dhūnvatā iva udgeyam a dhūtam iva antarikṣam paśavaḥ vai vāmadevyam a hiṃsatā iva udgeyam paśūnām ahiṃsāyai

original: (PB 7.9.10) katham iva vāmadevyaṃ geyam ity āhuḥ
analyzed: katham iva vāmadevyam geyam iti āhuḥ

original: (PB 7.9.11) yathāṅkulī putrān saṃdaśyāsaṃbhindantī harati yathā vāto 'psu śanair vāti
analyzed: yathā aṅkulī putrān saṃdaśya a sambhindantī harati yathā vātaḥ apsu śanais vāti

original: (PB 7.9.12) svadhūr vāmadevyaṃ geyam
analyzed: svadhūḥ vāmadevyam geyam

original: (PB 7.9.13) yo vai svadhūr vāmadevyaṃ gāyati svadhūr bhavati
analyzed: yaḥ vai svadhūḥ vāmadevyam gāyati svadhūḥ bhavati

original: (PB 7.9.14) yāty asyānyo niyānena nānyasya niyānena yāti
analyzed: yāti asya anyaḥ niyānena na anyasya niyānena yāti

original: (PB 7.9.15) na bṛhato na rathantarasyānurūpaṃ geyaṃ svenaivāyatanena geyam āyatanavān bhavati
analyzed: na bṛhataḥ na rathantarasya anurūpam geyam svena eva āyatanena geyam āyatanavān bhavati

original: (PB 7.9.16) devā vai paśūn vyabhajanta te rudram antarāyaṃs tān vāmadevyasya stotra upekṣate
analyzed: devāḥ vai paśūn vyabhajanta te rudram antarāyan tān vāmadevyasya stotre upekṣate

original: (PB 7.9.17) aniruktaṃ geyam
analyzed: aniruktam geyam

original: (PB 7.9.18) yan nirāha rudrāya paśūn apidadhāti rudras tāṃ samāṃ paśūn dhātuko bhavati
analyzed: yat nirāha rudrāya paśūn apidadhāti rudraḥ tām samām paśūn dhātukaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 7.9.19) revatīṣu vāmadevyena paśukāmaḥ stuvīta
analyzed: revatīṣu vāmadevyena paśu kāmaḥ stuvīta

original: (PB 7.9.20) āpo vai revatyaḥ paśavo vāmadevyam adbhya evāsmai paśūn prajanayati
analyzed: āpaḥ vai revatyaḥ paśavaḥ vāmadevyam adbhyaḥ eva asmai paśūn prajanayati

original: (PB 7.9.21) anavartiḥ paśuto bhavati prajā svasya mīliteva bhavati
analyzed: anavartiḥ paśutaḥ bhavati prajā svasya mīlitā iva bhavati

original: (PB 7.9.22) kavatībhyo hy eti prajāpateḥ
analyzed: kavatībhyaḥ hi eti prajāpateḥ

original: (PB 7.10.1) imau vai lokau sahāstāṃ tau viyantāv abrūtāṃv vivāhaṃv vivahāvahai saha nāv astv iti
analyzed: imau vai lokau saha āstām tau viyantau abrūtām vivāhan vivahāvahai saha mau astu iti

original: (PB 7.10.2) tayor ayam amuṣmai śyaitaṃ prāyacchan naudhasam asāv asmai
analyzed: tayoḥ ayam amuṣmai śyaitam prāyacchat naudhasam asau asmai

original: (PB 7.10.3) tata enayor nidhane viparyakrāmatāṃ devavivāho vai śyaitanaudhase
analyzed: tatas enayoḥ nidhane viparyakrāmatām deva vivāhaḥ vai śyaita naudhase

original: (PB 7.10.4) pravasīyāṃsaṃ vivāham āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: pravasīyāṃsam vivāham āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.10.5) ito vā ime lokā ūrdhvāḥ kalpamānā yanty amuto 'rvāñcaḥ kalpamānā āyanti
analyzed: itas vai ime lokāḥ ūrdhvāḥ kalpamānāḥ yanti amutas arvāñcaḥ kalpamānāḥ āyanti

original: (PB 7.10.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvantīmaṃl lokaṃ tena yunakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena naudhasenāmuṃ yad bṛhatā stuvanty amuṃl lokaṃ tena yanakty  #
analyzed: yat rathantareṇa stuvanti iman lokam tena yunakti antarikṣam vāmadevyena naudhasena amum yat bṛhatā stuvanti amun lokam tena yanakti  /

original: antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena śyaitenemam
analyzed: antarikṣam u vāmadevyena śyaitena imam

original: (PB 7.10.7) kḷptān imāl lokān upāste ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: kṷptān imān lokān upāste yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 7.10.8) bṛhadrathantare vai śaitanaudhase yad rathantarāya naudhasaṃ prati prayuñjanti
analyzed: bṛhat rathantare vai śaita naudhase yat rathantarāya naudhasam prati prayuñjanti

original: bṛhad evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti bṛhad dhy etat paro'kṣaṃ yan naudhasaṃ yad bṛhate
analyzed: bṛhat eva asmai tat prati prayuñjanti bṛhat hi etat paro'kṣam yat naudhasam yat bṛhate

original: śyaitaṃ prati prayuñjanti rathantaram evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti rathantaraṃ hy
analyzed: śyaitam prati prayuñjanti rathantaram eva asmai tat prati prayuñjanti rathantaram hi

original: etat paro'kṣaṃ yac chyaitam
analyzed: etat paro'kṣam yat śyaitam

original: (PB 7.10.9) ubhabhyāṃ bṛhadrathantarābhyāṃ stute ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: ubhabhyām bṛhat rathantarābhyām stute yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 7.10.10) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tāṃ nodhāḥ kākṣīvata āgacchat te 'bruvann
analyzed: devāḥ vai brahma vyabhajanta tām nodhāḥ kākṣīvataḥ āgacchat te abruvan

original: ṛṣir na āgaṃs tasmai brahma dadāmeti tasmā etat sāma prāyacchaṃs tasmān naudhasaṃ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ naḥ āgan tasmai brahma dadāma iti tasmai etat sāma prāyacchan tasmāt naudhasam

original: brahma vai naudhasam
analyzed: brahma vai naudhasam

original: (PB 7.10.11) brahmavarcasakāma etena stuvīta brahmavarcasī bhavati
analyzed: brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ etena stuvīta brahmavarcasī bhavati

original: (PB 7.10.12) athaitac chyaitam
analyzed: atha etat śyaitam

original: (PB 7.10.13) prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān etena sāmnābhivyāharat
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ apākrāman tān etena sāmnā abhivyāharat

original: te 'smā atiṣṭhanta te śetyā abhavan yac chetyā abhavaṃs tasmāc chyaitaṃ paśavo vai śyaitam
analyzed: te asmai atiṣṭhanta te śetyāḥ abhavan yat śetyāḥ abhavan tasmāt śyaitam paśavaḥ vai śyaitam

original: (PB 7.10.14) paśukāma etena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
analyzed: paśu kāmaḥ etena stuvīta paśumān bhavati

original: (PB 7.10.15) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā aśocaṃs tāḥ śyaitena huṃmā ity abhyajighrat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā  #
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ aśocan tāḥ śyaitena hum mā iti abhyajighrat tatas vai tāḥ samaidhanta samedhante tām samām prajā

original: yatraivaṃ vidvāñ chyaitenodgāyati
analyzed: yatra evam vidvān śyaitena udgāyati

original: (PB 7.10.16) eṣa vai yajamānasya prajāpatir yad udgātā yac chyaitena hiṅ karoti prajāpatir eva bhūtvā prajā abhijihgrati
analyzed: eṣa vai yajamānasya prajāpatiḥ yat udgātā yat śyaitena hiṅ karoti prajāpatiḥ eva bhūtvā prajāḥ abhijihgrati

original: (PB 7.10.17) vasunidhanaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vasu paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: vasu nidhanam bhavati paśavaḥ vai vasu paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.1.1) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃv vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanam abhicaraṇīyasya brahmasāma kuryād abhinidhanaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne
analyzed: āṣkāra nidhanam vaṣaṭkāra nidhanam abhicaraṇīyasya brahma sāma kuryāt abhi nidhanam mādhyandine pavamāne

original: (PB 8.1.2) deveṣur vā eṣā yad vaṣatkāro 'bhīti vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharad abhītyevāsmai vajraṃ prahṛtya deveṣv ā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vidhyati
analyzed: deva iṣuḥ vai eṣā yat vaṣatkāraḥ abhi iti vai indraḥ vṛtrāya vajram prāharat abhi iti eva asmai vajram prahṛtya deveṣu ā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vidhyati

original: (PB 8.1.3) traikakubhaṃ paśukāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣa ity etāsu
analyzed: traikakubham paśu kāmāya brahma sāma kuryāt tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣaḥ iti etāsu

original: (PB 8.1.4) indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta rāyovājo
analyzed: indraḥ yatīn śālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣām trayaḥ udaśiṣyanta rāyovājaḥ

original: bṛhadgiriḥ pṛthuraśmis te 'bruvan ko naḥ putrān bhariṣyantīty aham intīndro 'bravīt
analyzed: bṛhadgiriḥ pṛthuraśmiḥ te abruvan kaḥ naḥ putrān bhariṣyanti iti aham inti indraḥ abravīt

original: tāṃs trikakub adhinidhāyācarat sa etat sāmāpaśyad yat trikakub apaśyat tasmāt traikakubham
analyzed: tān tri kakubh adhinidhāya acarat saḥ etat sāma apaśyat yat tri kakubh apaśyat tasmāt traikakubham

original: (PB 8.1.5) sa ātmānam eva punar upādhāvat tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam eva punar upādhāvat tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣaḥ devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam

original: na tvad anyo maghavann asti ca marḍitendra bravīmi te vaca iti sa etena ca pragāthenaitena
analyzed: na tvat anyaḥ maghavan asti ca marḍitā indra bravīmi te vacaḥ iti saḥ etena ca pragāthena etena

original: sāmnā sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata tān ebhyaḥ prāyacchat te pratyatiṣṭhan
analyzed: sāmnā sahasram paśūn asṛjata tān ebhyaḥ prāyacchat te pratyatiṣṭhan

original: (PB 8.1.6) yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syād yah pratiṣṭhākāma etasmin pragātha etena sāmnā stuvīta pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ syāt pratiṣṭhā kāmaḥ etasmin pragāthe etena sāmnā stuvīta pra sahasram paśūn āpnoti pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.1.7) trivīryaṃ vā etat sāma trīndriyam aindrya ṛca aindraṃ sāmaindreti nidhanam indriya eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: tri vīryam vai etat sāma tri indriyam aindryaḥ ṛcaḥ aindram sāma aindra iti nidhanam indriye eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.1.8) traiśokaṃ jyogāmayāvine brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: traiśokam jyok āmayāvine brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.1.9) ime vai lokāḥ sahāsaṃs te 'śocantaṃs teṣām indra etena sāmnā śucam apāhan yat trayāṇāṃ śocatām apāhaṃs tasmāt traiśokam
analyzed: ime vai lokāḥ saha āsan te aśocantan teṣām indraḥ etena sāmnā śucam apāhan yat trayāṇām śocatām apāhan tasmāt traiśokam

original: (PB 8.1.10) yāsmād apāhan sā puṃścalīṃ prāviśad yām antarikṣāt sā klībaṃ yām amuṣmāt sainasvinam
analyzed: yā asmāt apāhan sā puṃścalīm prāviśat yām antarikṣāt sā klībam yām amuṣmāt sā enasvinam

original: (PB 8.1.11) tasmāt teṣāṃ nāśaitavyā ya eṣām āśāmeti tasmā eva śuco 'pabhajate
analyzed: tasmāt teṣām na āśā etavyā yaḥ eṣām āśām eti tasmai eva śucaḥ apabhajate

original: (PB 8.1.12) śucā vā eṣa viddho yasya jyog āmayati yat traiśokaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śucam evāsmād apahanti
analyzed: śucā vai eṣa viddhaḥ yasya jyok āmayati yat traiśokam brahma sāma bhavati śucam eva asmāt apahanti

original: (PB 8.1.13) diveti nidhanam upayanti vyuṣṭir vai divā vy evāsmai vāsayati
analyzed: divā iti nidhanam upayanti vyuṣṭiḥ vai divā vi eva asmai vāsayati

original: (PB 8.2.1) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃ pratiṣṭhākāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: āṣkāra nidhanam kāṇvam pratiṣṭhā kāmāya brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.2.2) kaṇvo vā etat sāmarte nidhanam apaśyat sa na pratyatiṣṭhat sa vṛṣadaṃśasyāṣiti
analyzed: kaṇvaḥ vai etat sāma ṛte nidhanam apaśyat sa na pratyatiṣṭhat sa vṛṣadaṃśasya aṣiti

original: kṣuvata upāśṛṇot sa tad eva nidhanam apaśyat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhad yad etat sāma
analyzed: kṣuvataḥ upāśṛṇot sa tat eva nidhanam apaśyat tatas vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat yat etat sāma

original: bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 8.2.3) vasiṣṭhasya janitraṃ prajākāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya janitram prajā kāmāya brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.2.4) vasiṣṭho vā etat putrahataḥ sāmāpaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad etat sāma bhavati prajātyai
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vai etat putra hataḥ sāma apaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yat etat sāma bhavati prajātyai

original: (PB 8.2.5) ātharvaṇaṃ lokakāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: ātharvaṇam loka kāmāya brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.2.6) atharvāṇo vā etal lokākāmāḥ sāmāpaśyaṃs tenāmartyaṃl lokam apaśyan yad etat sāma bhavati svargasya lokasya prajātyai
analyzed: atharvāṇaḥ vai etat loka akāmāḥ sāma apaśyan tena amartyan lokam apaśyan yat etat sāma bhavati svargasya lokasya prajātyai

original: (PB 8.2.7) abhīvartaṃ bhrātṛvyavate brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: abhīvartam bhrātṛvyavate brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.2.8) abhīvartena vai devā asurān abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati bhrātṛvyasyābhivṛtyai
analyzed: abhīvartena vai devāḥ asurān abhyavartanta yat abhīvartaḥ brahma sāma bhavati bhrātṛvyasya abhivṛtyai

original: (PB 8.2.9) śrāyantīyaṃ yajñavibhraṣṭāya brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: śrāyantīyam yajña vibhraṣṭāya brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 8.2.10) prajāpatir uṣasam adhyait svāṃ duhitaraṃ tasya retaḥ parāpatat tad asyāṃ nyaṣicyata tad aśrīṇād idaṃ me mā duṣad iti tat sad akarot  #
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ uṣasam adhyait svām duhitaram tasya retaḥ parāpatat tat asyām nyaṣicyata tat aśrīṇāt idam me mā duṣat iti tat sat akarot  /

original: paśūn eva
analyzed: paśūn eva

original: (PB 8.2.11) yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śrīṇāti caivenaṃ sac ca karoti
analyzed: yat śrāyantīyam brahma sāma bhavati śrīṇāti ca eva inam sat ca karoti

original: (PB 8.3.1) devāś ca vā asurāś caiṣu lokeṣv aspardhanta te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs
analyzed: devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca eṣu lokeṣu aspardhanta te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvan

original: tebhya etat sāma prāyacchad etenainān kālayiṣyaddham iti tenainān ebhyo lokebhyo
analyzed: tebhyaḥ etat sāma prāyacchat etena enān kālayiṣyat ham iti tena enān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ

original: 'kālayanta yad akālayanta tasmāt kāleyam
analyzed: akālayanta yat akālayanta tasmāt kāleyam

original: (PB 8.3.2) ebhyo vai lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ kālayate ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: ebhyaḥ vai lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam kālayate yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.3.3) stomo vai deveṣu taro nāmāsīd yajño 'sureṣu vidadvasus te devās tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomena yajñam asurāṇām āvṛñjata
analyzed: stomaḥ vai deveṣu taraḥ nāma āsīt yajñaḥ asureṣu vidadvasuḥ te devāḥ tarobhiḥ vaḥ vidadvasum iti stomena yajñam asurāṇām āvṛñjata

original: (PB 8.3.4) stomena yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: stomena yajñam bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.3.5) sāhdyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena
analyzed: sāhdyāḥ vai nāma devāḥ āsan te avacchidya tṛtīyasavanam mādhyandinena savanena

original: saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ lokeyena samatanvan yat kāleyaṃ bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya saṃtatyai
analyzed: saha svargan lokam āyan tat devāḥ lokeyena samatanvan yat kāleyam bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya saṃtatyai

original: (PB 8.3.6) vidadvasu vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanam eva tad abhyativadati
analyzed: vidadvasu vai tṛtīyasavanam yat tarobhiḥ vaḥ vidadvasum iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanam eva tat abhyativadati

original: (PB 8.3.7) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi kāleyaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato
analyzed: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi kāleyam yat pada prastāvam tena rāthantaram yat bṛhantaḥ

original: rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yat stobhavān pratihāras tena bārhataṃ yad dravadiḍaṃ
analyzed: rohān rohati tena bārhatam yat stobhavān pratihāraḥ tena bārhatam yat dravat iḍam

original: tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: tena rāthantaram sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.4.1) sādhyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te sarveṇa yajñena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs
analyzed: sādhyāḥ vai nāma devāḥ āsan te sarveṇa yajñena saha svargam lokam āyan

original: te devāśīchandāṃsy abruvan somam āharateti te jagatīṃ prāhiṇvan sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi
analyzed: te devāśī chandāṃsi abruvan somam āharata iti te jagatīm prāhiṇvan sā trīṇi akṣarāṇi

original: hitvaikākṣarā bhūtvāgacchat triṣṭubhaṃ prāhiṇvan saikam akṣaraṃ hitvā tryakṣarā bhūtvāgacchad
analyzed: hitvā eka akṣarā bhūtvā āgacchat triṣṭubham prāhiṇvan sā ekam akṣaram hitvā tri akṣarā bhūtvā āgacchat

original: gāyatrīṃ prāhiṇvaṃś caturakṣarāṇi vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsan sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty
analyzed: gāyatrīm prāhiṇvan catur akṣarāṇi vai tarhi chandāṃsi āsan sā tāni ca akṣarāṇi harantī

original: āgacchad aṣṭākṣarā bhūtvā trīṇi ca savanāni hastābhyāṃ dve savane dantair daṃṣṭvā
analyzed: āgacchat aṣṭa akṣarā bhūtvā trīṇi ca savanāni hastābhyām dve savane dantaiḥ daṃṣṭvā

original: tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād dve aṃśumatī savane dhītaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dantair hi tad daṃṣṭvā
analyzed: tṛtīyasavanam tasmāt dve aṃśumatī savane dhītam tṛtīyasavanam dantaiḥ hi tat daṃṣṭvā

original: dhayanty aharat tasya ye hriyamāṇasyāṃśavaḥ parāpataṃs te pūtīkā abhavan yāni puṣpāṇy
analyzed: dhayantī aharat tasya ye hriyamāṇasya aṃśavaḥ parāpatan te pūtīkāḥ abhavan yāni puṣpāṇi

original: avāśīyanta tāny arjjunāni yat prāprothat te praprothās tasmāt tṛtīyasavana āśiram
analyzed: avāśīyanta tāni arjjunāni yat prāprothat te praprothāḥ tasmāt tṛtīyasavane āśiram

original: avanayanti yam eva taṃ gāvaḥ somam adanti tasya taṃ rasam avanayanti sasomatvāya
analyzed: avanayanti yam eva tam gāvaḥ somam adanti tasya tam rasam avanayanti sa soma tvāya

original: (PB 8.4.2) te triṣṭub jagatyai gāyatrīm abrūtām upa tvāyāveti sābravīt kiṃ me tataḥ
analyzed: te triṣṭubh jagatyai gāyatrīm abrūtām upa tvā āyāva iti sā bravīt kim me tatas

original: syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abrūtāṃ sābvravīn mama sarvaṃ prātaḥsavanam aham uttare
analyzed: syāt iti yat kāmayase iti abrūtām sā abvravīt mama sarvam prātaḥsavanam aham uttare

original: savane praṇayānīti tasmād gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ gāyatry uttare savane praṇayati
analyzed: savane praṇayāni iti tasmāt gāyatram prātaḥsavanam gāyatrī uttare savane praṇayati

original: (PB 8.4.3) tān triṣṭup tribhir akṣarair upait saikādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata tāṃ jagaty ekenākṣareṇopait sā dvādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata
analyzed: tān triṣṭubh tribhiḥ akṣaraiḥ upait sā ekādaśa akṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata tām jagatī ekena akṣareṇa upait sā dvādaśa akṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata

original: (PB 8.4.4) tasmād āhur gāyatrī vāva sarvāṇi cchandāṃsi gāyatrī hy etān poṣān puṣyanty aid iti
analyzed: tasmāt āhuḥ gāyatrī vāva sarvāṇi chandāṃsi gāyatrī hi etān poṣān puṣyantī ait iti

original: (PB 8.4.5) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat tad devāḥ svādiṣṭhayeti asvadayan
analyzed: indraḥ tṛtīyasavanāt bībhatsamānaḥ udakrāmat tat devāḥ svādiṣṭhayā iti asvadayan

original: madiṣṭhayeti madvad akurvan pavasva soma dhārayety apāvayann indrāya pātave suta
analyzed: madiṣṭhayā iti madvat akurvan pavasva soma dhārayā iti apāvayan indrāya pātave suta

original: iti tato vai tad indra upāvartata yat svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti prastauti tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya
analyzed: iti tatas vai tat indraḥ upāvartata yat svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanasya sa indra tvāya

original: (PB 8.4.6) svādiṣṭhā vai deveṣu paśava āsan madiṣṭhā asureṣu te devāḥ svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti paśūn asurāṇām avṛñjata
analyzed: svādiṣṭhāḥ vai deveṣu paśavaḥ āsan madiṣṭhāḥ asureṣu te devāḥ svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā iti paśūn asurāṇām avṛñjata

original: (PB 8.4.7) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.4.8) tāsu saṃhitam
analyzed: tāsu saṃhitam

original: (PB 8.4.9) sādhyā vai nāmadevā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ saṃhitena samadadhur  #
analyzed: sādhyāḥ vai nāmadevāḥ āsan te avacchidya tṛtīyasavanam mādhyandinena savanena saha svargan lokam āyan tat devāḥ saṃhitena samadadhuḥ

original: yat samadadhus tasmāt saṃhitam
analyzed: yat samadadhuḥ tasmāt saṃhitam

original: (PB 8.4.10) kāleyaṃ purastād bhavati saṃhitam upariṣṭād etābhyāṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ saṃtāyate
analyzed: kāleyam purastāt bhavati saṃhitam upariṣṭāt etābhyām hi tṛtīyasavanam saṃtāyate

original: (PB 8.4.11) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi saṃhitaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yad padanidhanaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ  #
analyzed: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi saṃhitam yat pada prastāvam tena rāthantaram yat bṛhataḥ rohān rohati tena bārhatam yat pada nidhanam tena rāthantaram

original: sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.5.1) uṣṇikkakubhāv ete bhavataḥ
analyzed: uṣṇih kakubhau ete bhavataḥ

original: (PB 8.5.2) uṣṇikkakubbhyāṃ vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat kakubhi parākramatoṣṇihā
analyzed: uṣṇih kakubbhyām vai indraḥ vṛtrāya vajram prāharat kakubhi parākramata uṣṇihā

original: prāharat tasmāt kakubho madhyamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ parākramaṇaṃ hi tad abhi
analyzed: prāharat tasmāt kakubhaḥ madhyamam padam bhūyiṣṭha akṣaram parākramaṇam hi tat abhi

original: samauhat tasmād uṣṇiha uttamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ puro gurur iva hi vajraḥ
analyzed: samauhat tasmāt uṣṇihaḥ uttamam padam bhūyiṣṭha akṣaram puras guruḥ iva hi vajraḥ

original: (PB 8.5.3) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: vajram bhrātṛvyāya praharati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.5.4) nāsike vā ete yajñasya yad uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt samānaṃ chandaḥ satī nānā yajñaṃv vahatas tasmāt samānāyā nāsikāyāḥ satyā nānā prāṇāv
analyzed: nāsike vai ete yajñasya yat uṣṇih kakubhau tasmāt samānam chandaḥ satī nānā yajñam vahataḥ tasmāt samānāyāḥ nāsikāyāḥ satyāḥ nānā prāṇau

original: (PB 8.5.5) prāṇā vā uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vaṣaṭ kurvanti yad vaṣaṭ kuryuḥ prāṇān agnau pradadhyuḥ
analyzed: prāṇāḥ vai uṣṇih kakubhau tasmāt tābhyām na vaṣaṭ kurvanti yat vaṣaṭ kuryuḥ prāṇān agnau pradadhyuḥ

original: (PB 8.5.6) tāsu saphaṃ vipham iva vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanasya saphatvāyāthauṣkalam
analyzed: tāsu sapham vipham iva vai tṛtīyasavanam tṛtīyasavanasya sapha tvāya atha auṣkalam

original: etena vai prajāpatiḥ puṣkalān paśūn asṛjata teṣu rūpam adadhād yad etat sāma bhavati
analyzed: etena vai prajāpatiḥ puṣkalān paśūn asṛjata teṣu rūpam adadhāt yat etat sāma bhavati

original: paśuṣv eva rūpaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: paśuṣu eva rūpam dadhāti

original: (PB 8.5.7) purojitī vo andhasa iti padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ padyayā vai
analyzed: purojitī vaḥ andhasaḥ iti padyā ca akṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ padyayā vai

original: devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyann akṣaryayā ṛṣayo nu prājānān yad ete padyā cākṣaryā ca
analyzed: devāḥ svargan lokam āyan akṣaryayā ṛṣayaḥ nu prājānān yat ete padyā ca akṣaryā ca

original: virājau bhavataḥ svargasya lokasya prajñātyai
analyzed: virājau bhavataḥ svargasya lokasya prajñātyai

original: (PB 8.5.8) tāsu śyāvāśvam
analyzed: tāsu śyāvāśvam

original: (PB 8.5.9) śyāvāśvam ārvanānasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ dhanvodavahan sa etat sāmāpaśyat tena vṛṣṭim asṛjata tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata  #
analyzed: śyāvāśvam ārvanānasam sattram āsīnam dhanva udavahan saḥ etat sāma apaśyat tena vṛṣṭim asṛjata tatas vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tatas gātum avindata

original: gātuvid vā etat sāma
analyzed: gātu vid vai etat sāma

original: (PB 8.5.10) vindate gātuṃ pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: vindate gātum pratitiṣṭhati etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 8.5.11) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat taṃ devāḥ śyāvāślvenaihāyi ehiyety anvāhvayan sa upāvartata yad etat sāma bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya
analyzed: indraḥ tṛtīyasavanāt bībhatsamānaḥ udakrāmat tam devāḥ anvāhvayan saḥ upāvartata yat etat sāma bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya

original: (PB 8.5.12) athaitad āndhīgavam andhīgur vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ
analyzed: atha etat āndhīgavam andhīguḥ vai etat paśu kāmaḥ sāma apaśyat tena sahasram

original: paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ bhavaty
analyzed: paśūn asṛjata yat etat sāma bhavati paśūnām puṣṭyai madhye nidhanam aiḍam bhavati

original: etena vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yan madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ syāt
analyzed: etena vai tṛtīyasavanam pratiṣṭhitam yat madhye nidhanam aiḍam na syāt a pratiṣṭhitam tṛtīyasavanam syāt

original: (PB 8.5.13) daśākṣaraṃ madhyato nidhanam upayanti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: daśa akṣaram madhyataḥ nidhanam upayanti daśa akṣarā virāj virāji eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.5.14) abhi priyāṇi pavata iti kāvaṃ prājāpatyaṃ sāma
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi pavate iti kāvam prājāpatyam sāma

original: (PB 8.5.15) prajā vai priyāṇi paśavaḥ priyāṇi prajāyām eva paśuṣu pratitiṣtśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: prajāḥ vai priyāṇi paśavaḥ priyāṇi prajāyām eva paśuṣu pratitiṣtūṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.5.16) raśmī vā etau yajñasya yad auśanakāve devakośo vā eṣa yajñam abhisamubjito yad ete antato bhavato yajñasyāriṣṭyai
analyzed: raśmī vai etau yajñasya yat auśana kāve deva kośaḥ vai eṣa yajñam abhisamubjitaḥ yat ete antatas bhavataḥ yajñasya ariṣṭyai

original: (PB 8.6.1) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tasya yo raso 'tyaricyata tad yajñāyajñīyam abhavat
analyzed: devāḥ vai brahma vyabhajanta tasya yaḥ rasaḥ atyaricyata tat yajñāyajñīyam abhavat

original: (PB 8.6.2) brahmaṇo vā eṣa raso yad yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad yajñāyajñīyena stuvanti brahmaṇa eva rase yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ vai eṣa rasaḥ yat yajñāyajñīyam yat yajñāyajñīyena stuvanti brahmaṇaḥ eva rase yajñam pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 8.6.3) yonir vai yajñāyajñīyam etasmād vai yoneḥ prajāpatir yajñam asṛjata tasmād yajñāyajñīyam
analyzed: yoniḥ vai yajñāyajñīyam etasmāt vai yoneḥ prajāpatiḥ yajñam asṛjata tasmāt yajñāyajñīyam

original: (PB 8.6.4) tasmād vā etena purā brāhmaṇā bahiṣpavamānam astoṣata yoner yajñaṃ pratanavāmahā iti yajñaṃ tataḥ stuvanti yonau yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: tasmāt vai etena purā brāhmaṇāḥ bahiṣpavamānam astoṣata yoneḥ yajñam pratanavāmahai iti yajñam tatas stuvanti yonau yajñam pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 8.6.5) asureṣu vai sarvo yajña āsīt te devā yajñāyajñīyam apaśyaṃs teṣāṃ yajñā-yajñā
analyzed: asureṣu vai sarvaḥ yajñaḥ āsīt te devāḥ yajñāyajñīyam apaśyan teṣām yajñāyajñā

original: vo agnaya ity agnihotram avṛñjata girā-girā ca dakṣasa iti darśapūrṇamāsau pra-pra
analyzed: vaḥ agnaye iti agnihotram avṛñjata girā girā ca dakṣasaḥ iti darśapūrṇamāsau prapra

original: vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam iti cāturmāsyāni priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam iti saumyam adhvaram
analyzed: vayam amṛtam jātavedasam iti cāturmāsyāni priyam mitram na śaṃsiṣam iti saumyam adhvaram

original: (PB 8.6.6) yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣase pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ
analyzed: yajñāḥ vaḥ agnaye girā ca dakṣase pra vayam amṛtam jātavedasam priyam mitram

original: na śaṃsiṣam iti vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsaṃs te devā abhyārambham abhinivartyaṃ cchandobhir
analyzed: na śaṃsiṣam iti vai tarhi chandāṃsi āsan te devāḥ abhyārambham abhinivartyam chandobhiḥ

original: yajñam asurāṇām avṛñjata
analyzed: yajñam asurāṇām avṛñjata

original: (PB 8.6.7) chandobhir yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: chandobhiḥ yajñam bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.6.8) etad dha sma vā āha kūśāmbaḥ svāyavo brahmā lātavyaḥ kaṃ svid adya śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā gariṣyati
analyzed: etat ha sma vai āha kūśāmbaḥ svāyavaḥ brahmā lātavyaḥ kam svid adya śiśumārī yajña pathe apyastā gariṣyati

original: (PB 8.6.9) eṣā vai śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad girā-girety āhātmānaṃ tad udgātā girati
analyzed: eṣā vai śiśumārī yajña pathe apyastā yajñāyajñīyam yat girā girā iti āha ātmānam tat udgātā girati

original: (PB 8.6.10) airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam irāyāṃ yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaty apramāyuka udgātā bhavati
analyzed: airam kṛtvā udgeyam irāyām yajñam pratiṣṭhāpayati a pramāyukaḥ udgātā bhavati

original: (PB 8.6.11) vaiśvānare vā etad udgātātmānaṃ pradadhāti yat pra-pra vayam ity āha praprīṃ vayam iti vaktavyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
analyzed: vaiśvānare vai etat udgātā ātmānam pradadhāti yat pra pra vayam iti āha vayam iti vaktavyam vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati

original: (PB 8.6.12) yo vai nihnuvānaṃ cchanda upaiti pāpīyān ujjagivān bhavaty etad vai nihnuvānaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ vai nihnuvānam chandaḥ upaiti pāpīyān ujjagivān bhavati etat vai nihnuvānam

original: cchando yan na śaṃsiṣam iti nu śaṃsiṣam iti vaktavyaṃ suśaṃsiṣam iti vā na nihnuvānaṃ
analyzed: chandaḥ yat na śaṃsiṣam iti nu śaṃsiṣam iti vaktavyam su śaṃsiṣam iti vā na nihnuvānam

original: chanda upaiti vasīyān ujjagivān bhavati
analyzed: chandaḥ upaiti vasīyān ujjagivān bhavati

original: (PB 8.6.13) yasya vai yajñā vāgantā bhavanti vācaś chidreṇa sravanty ete vai yajñā
analyzed: yasya vai yajñāḥ vāc antāḥ bhavanti vācaḥ chidreṇa sravanti ete vai yajñāḥ

original: vāgantā ye yajñāyajñīyāntā etad vācaś chidraṃ yad anṛtaṃ yad agniṣṭomayājy anṛtam
analyzed: vāc antāḥ ye yajñāyajñīya antāḥ etat vācaḥ chidram yat anṛtam yat agniṣṭoma yāji anṛtam

original: āha tad anv asya yajñaḥ sravaty akṣareṇāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpyam akṣareṇaiva yajñasya
analyzed: āha tat anu asya yajñaḥ sravati akṣareṇa antatas pratiṣṭhāpyam akṣareṇa eva yajñasya

original: cchidram api dadhāti
analyzed: chidram api dadhāti

original: (PB 8.6.14) virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad akṣaraṃ virājy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: virājaḥ vai etat rūpam yat akṣaram virāji eva antatas pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.7.1) ito vai prātar ūrdhvāṇi cchandāṃsi yujyante 'muto 'vāñci yajñāyajñīyasya
analyzed: itas vai prātar ūrdhvāṇi chandāṃsi yujyante amutas avāñci yajñāyajñīyasya

original: stotre yujyante yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣasa iti dvādaśākṣaraṃ pra vayam amṛtaṃ
analyzed: stotre yujyante yajñāḥ vaḥ agnaye girā ca dakṣase iti dvādaśa akṣaram pra vayam amṛtam

original: jātavedasam ity ekādaśākṣaraṃ priyaṃ mitraṃn na śaṃsiṣam ity aṣṭākṣaram
analyzed: jātavedasam iti ekādaśa akṣaram priyam mitram na śaṃsiṣam iti aṣṭa akṣaram

original: (PB 8.7.2) anuṣṭubham uttamāṃ saṃpādayatīyaṃ vā anuṣṭub asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: anuṣṭubham uttamām saṃpādayati iyam vai anuṣṭubh asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.7.3) vāg vā anuṣṭub vācy eva pratitiṣṭhati jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vā anuṣṭub jaiṣṭhya eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: vāc vai anuṣṭubh vāci eva pratitiṣṭhati jyaiṣṭhyam vai anuṣṭubh jaiṣṭhye eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.7.4) katham iva yajñāyajñīyaṃ geyam ity āhur yathānaḍvān prasrāvayamāṇa ittham iva cettham iva ceti
analyzed: katham iva yajñāyajñīyam geyam iti āhuḥ yathā anaḍvān prasrāvayamāṇaḥ ittham iva ca ittham iva ca iti

original: (PB 8.7.5) vaiśvānaraṃ vā etad udgātānu prasīdann etīty āhur yad yajñāyajñīyasyarcaṃ saṃpratyāheti parikrāmatevodgeyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
analyzed: vaiśvānaram vai etat udgātā anu prasīdan eti iti āhuḥ yat yajñāyajñīyasya ṛcam saṃpratyāha iti parikrāmatā iva udgeyam vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati

original: (PB 8.7.6) vaiśvānare vā etad adhvaryuḥ sadasyān abhisṛjati yad yajñāyajñīyasya stotram upāvartayati prāvṛtenodgeyaṃv vaiśvānareṇānabhidāhāya
analyzed: vaiśvānare vai etat adhvaryuḥ sadasyān abhisṛjati yat yajñāyajñīyasya stotram upāvartayati prāvṛtena udgeyam vaiśvānareṇa an abhidāhāya

original: (PB 8.7.7) na ha tu vai pitaraḥ prāvṛtaṃ jānanti yajñāyajñīyasya vai stotre pitaro
analyzed: na ha tu vai pitaraḥ prāvṛtam jānanti yajñāyajñīyasya vai stotre pitaraḥ

original: yathāyathaṃ jijñāsanta ākarṇābhyāṃ prāvṛtyaṃ tad eva prāvṛtaṃ tad aprāvṛtaṃ jānanti
analyzed: yathāyatham jijñāsantaḥ ākarṇābhyām prāvṛtyam tat eva prāvṛtam tat a prāvṛtam jānanti

original: pitaro na vaiśvānaro hinasti
analyzed: pitaraḥ na vaiśvānaraḥ hinasti

original: (PB 8.7.8) apaḥ paścāt patnya upasṛjanti vaiśvānaram eva tac chamayanty āpo hi śāntiḥ
analyzed: apaḥ paścāt patnyaḥ upasṛjanti vaiśvānaram eva tat śamayanti āpaḥ hi śāntiḥ

original: (PB 8.7.9) atho reta eva tat siñcanty āpo hi retaḥ
analyzed: atha u retaḥ eva tat siñcanti āpaḥ hi retaḥ

original: (PB 8.7.10) dakṣiṇān ūrūn abhiṣiñcanti dakṣiṇato hi retaḥ sicyate
analyzed: dakṣiṇān ūrūn abhiṣiñcanti dakṣiṇatas hi retaḥ sicyate

original: (PB 8.7.11) mahad iva pratyūhyaṃ mana evāsya taj janayanti
analyzed: mahat iva pratyūhyam manaḥ eva asya tat janayanti

original: (PB 8.7.12) udgātrā patnīḥ saṃkhyāpayanti retodheyāya
analyzed: udgātrā patnīḥ saṃkhyāpayanti retodheyāya

original: (PB 8.7.13) hiṅkāraṃ prati saṃkhyāpayanti hiṅkṛtād dhi reto 'dhīyata
analyzed: hiṅkāram prati saṃkhyāpayanti hiṅkṛtāt hi retaḥ adhīyata

original: (PB 8.7.14) ātṛtīyāyāḥ saṃkhyāpayanti trivad dhi retaḥ
analyzed: ā tṛtīyāyāḥ saṃkhyāpayanti trivat hi retaḥ

original: (PB 8.8.1) devā vā agniṣṭomam abhijityokthāni nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'gnim abruvaṃs
analyzed: devāḥ vai agniṣṭomam abhijitya ukthāni na aśaknuvan abhijetum te agnim abruvan

original: tvayā mukhenedaṃ cayāmeti so 'bravīt kiṃ me tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abruvan
analyzed: tvayā mukhena idam cayāma iti saḥ abravīt kim me tatas syāt iti yat kāmayase iti abruvan

original: so 'bravīn maddevatyāsūkthāni praṇayān iti
analyzed: saḥ abravīt mad devatyāsu ukthāni praṇayān iti

original: (PB 8.8.2) tasmād āgneyīṣūkthāni praṇayanti
analyzed: tasmāt āgneyīṣu ukthāni praṇayanti

original: (PB 8.8.3) tasmād u gāyatrīṣu gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
analyzed: tasmāt u gāyatrīṣu gāyatra chandāḥ hi agniḥ

original: (PB 8.8.4) te 'gniṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā sākam aśvenābhyakrāman yat sākam aśvenābhyakrāmaṃs tasmāt sākamaśvam
analyzed: te agnim mukham kṛtvā sākam aśvena abhyakrāman yat sākam aśvena abhyakrāman tasmāt sākamaśvam

original: (PB 8.8.5) tasmāt sākamaśvenokthāni praṇayanty etena hi tāny agre 'bhyajayan
analyzed: tasmāt sākamaśvena ukthāni praṇayanti etena hi tāni agre abhyajayan

original: (PB 8.8.6) sa indro 'bravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti varuṇas taṃv varuṇo 'nvatiṣṭhad indra āharat tasmād aindrāvaruṇam anuśasyate
analyzed: saḥ indraḥ abravīt kaḥ ca aham ca idam anvavaiṣyāvaḥ iti aham ca iti varuṇaḥ tam varuṇaḥ anvatiṣṭhat indraḥ āharat tasmāt aindrāvaruṇam anuśasyate

original: (PB 8.8.7) sa evābravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti bṛhaspatis taṃ
analyzed: saḥ eva abravīt kaḥ ca aham ca idam anvavaiṣyāvaḥ iti aham ca iti bṛhaspatiḥ tam

original: bṛhaspatir anvatiṣṭad indra āharat tasmād aindrābārhaspatyam anuśasyate sa evābravīt
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ anvatiṣṭat indraḥ āharat tasmāt aindrābārhaspatyam anuśasyate saḥ eva abravīt

original: kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti viṣṇus taṃ viṣṇur anvatiṣṭad indra āharat
analyzed: kaḥ ca aham ca idam anvavaiṣyāvaḥ iti aham ca iti viṣṇuḥ tam viṣṇuḥ anvatiṣṭat indraḥ āharat

original: tasmād aindrāvaiṣṇavam anuśasyate
analyzed: tasmāt aindrāvaiṣṇavam anuśasyate

original: (PB 8.8.8) paśūn vā ebhyas tān āharat paśavo vā ukthāni paśukāma ukthena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
analyzed: paśūn vai ebhyaḥ tān āharat paśavaḥ vai ukthāni paśu kāmaḥ ukthena stuvīta paśumān bhavati

original: (PB 8.8.9) bṛhatā vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat tasya tejaḥ parāpatat tat saubharam abhavat
analyzed: bṛhatā vai indraḥ vṛtrāya vajram prāharat tasya tejaḥ parāpatat tat saubharam abhavat

original: (PB 8.8.10) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yad rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ rathantaraṃ
analyzed: jāmi vai etat yajñe kriyate iti āhuḥ yat rathantaram pṛṣṭham rathantaram

original: saṃdhir nāntarā bṛhatā stuvantīti yat saubhareṇa stuvanti bṛhataiva tad antarā stuvanti
analyzed: saṃdhiḥ na antarā bṛhatā stuvanti iti yat saubhareṇa stuvanti bṛhatā eva tat antarā stuvanti

original: bṛhato hy etat tejo yat saubharam
analyzed: bṛhataḥ hi etat tejaḥ yat saubharam

original: (PB 8.8.11) yadi bṛhat sāmātirātraḥ syāt saubharam ukthānāṃ brahma sāma kāryaṃ bṛhad eva tat tejasā samardhayati
analyzed: yadi bṛhat sāma atirātraḥ syāt saubharam ukthānām brahma sāma kāryam bṛhat eva tat tejasā samardhayati

original: (PB 8.8.12) yadi rathantarasāmnā saubharaṃ kuryād ajāmitāyai
analyzed: yadi rathantara sāmnā saubharam kuryāt a jāmi tāyai

original: (PB 8.8.13) devānāṃ vai svargaṃl lokaṃ +yatāṃ diśo 'vlīyanta tāḥ saubhareṇo ity udastaṃbhuvaṃs
analyzed: devānām vai svargam lokam yatām diśaḥ avlīyanta tāḥ saubhareṇa u iti udastaṃbhuvan

original: tato vai tā adṛṃhanta tataḥ pratyatiṣṭhaṃs tataḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ prājānan yaḥ svargakāmaḥ
analyzed: tatas vai tāḥ adṛṃhanta tatas pratyatiṣṭhan tatas svargan lokam prājānan yaḥ svarga kāmaḥ

original: syād yaḥ pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta pra svargaṃl lokaṃ jānāti pratitṣṭhati
analyzed: syāt yaḥ pratiṣṭhā kāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta pra svargan lokam jānāti pratitṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.8.14) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā āśanāyaṃs tābhyaḥ saubhareṇorg ity annaṃ prāyacchat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ āśanāyan tābhyaḥ saubhareṇa ūrj iti annam prāyacchat tatas vai tāḥ samaidhanta

original: (PB 8.8.15) samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃv vidvān saubhareṇodgāyati
analyzed: samedhante tām samām prajāḥ yatra evaṃv vidvān saubhareṇa udgāyati

original: (PB 8.8.16) tā abruvan subhṛtaṃ no 'bhārṣīr iti tasmāt saubharam
analyzed: tāḥ abruvan su bhṛtam naḥ abhārṣīḥ iti tasmāt saubharam

original: (PB 8.8.17) vṛṣṭiṃ vā abhyastāṃ prāyacchad annam eva
analyzed: vṛṣṭim vai abhyastām prāyacchat annam eva

original: (PB 8.8.18) yo vṛṣṭikāmaḥ syād yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta
analyzed: yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ syāt yaḥ annādya kāmaḥ yaḥ svarga kāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta

original: (PB 8.8.19) hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryād ūrg ity annādyakāmāyo iti svargakāmāya
analyzed: hi iṣ iti vṛṣṭi kāmāya nidhanam kuryāt ūrj iti annādya kāmāya u iti svarga kāmāya

original: (PB 8.8.20) sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharaṃ sarveṣv eva kāmeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharam sarveṣu eva kāmeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.8.21) athaitan nārmedham
analyzed: atha etat nārmedham

original: (PB 8.8.22) nṛmedhasam āṅgirasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ śvabhir abhyāhvayan so 'gnim upādhāvat
analyzed: nṛmedhasam āṅgirasam sattram āsīnam śvabhiḥ abhyāhvayan saḥ agnim upādhāvat

original: pāhi no agna ekayeti taṃv vaiśvānaraḥ paryudatiṣṭhat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne ekayā iti tam vaiśvānaraḥ paryudatiṣṭhat tatas vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tatas gātum avindata

original: (PB 8.8.23) gātuvid vā etat sāma vindate gātuṃ pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: gātu vid vai etat sāma vindate gātum pratitiṣṭhati etad tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 8.8.24) naiva hy etad ahno rūpaṃ na rātrer yad ukthānām
analyzed: na eva hi etat ahnaḥ rūpam na rātreḥ yat ukthānām

original: (PB 8.8.25) kakup prathamāthoṣṇig atha purauṣṇig anuṣṭup tenānuṣṭubho nayanty acchāvākasāmnaḥ
analyzed: kakubh prathamā atha uṣṇih atha purā oṣṇih anuṣṭubh tena anuṣṭubhaḥ nayanti acchāvāka sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 8.9.1) hārivarṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: hārivarṇam bhavati

original: (PB 8.9.2) asurā vā eṣu lokeṣv āsaṃs tān devā hariśriyam ity asmāl lokāt prāṇudanta virājasīty antarikṣād divo-diva ity amuṣmāt
analyzed: asurāḥ vai eṣu lokeṣu āsan tān devāḥ hari śriyam iti asmāt lokāt prāṇudanta virājasi iti antarikṣāt divaḥ divaḥ iti amuṣmāt

original: (PB 8.9.3) tad ya evaṃ vedaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudyemāṃl lokān abhyārohati
analyzed: tat yaḥ evam veda ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam praṇudya imān lokān abhyārohati

original: (PB 8.9.4) harivarṇo vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭaiḥ
analyzed: harivarṇaḥ vai etat paśu kāmaḥ sāma apaśyat tena sahasram paśūn asṛjata yat etat sāma bhavati paśūnām puṣṭaiḥ

original: (PB 8.9.5) aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ yato rakṣāṃsy anvasacanta tāny etena harivarṇo 'pāhanta yad etat sāma bhavati rakṣasām apahatyai
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ svargam lokam yataḥ rakṣāṃsi anvasacanta tāni etena harivarṇaḥ apāhanta yat etat sāma bhavati rakṣasām apahatyai

original: (PB 8.9.6) pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta teṣāṃ yat tejo raso 'tyaricyata tad devāḥ samabharaṃs tad udvaṃśīyam abhavat
analyzed: pṛṣṭhāni vai asṛjyanta teṣām yat tejaḥ rasaḥ atyaricyata tat devāḥ samabharan tat udvaṃśīyam abhavat
