analyzed: sarveṣām vai etat pṛṣṭhānām tejaḥ yat udvaṃśīyam tasmāt vai etat purā sajātāya na akran pāpa vasīyasaḥ vidhṛtyai

original: (PB 8.9.8) eṣa hy eva pṛṣṭhais tuṣṭuvāno ya udvaṃśīyena stuvate
analyzed: eṣa hi eva pṛṣṭhaiḥ tuṣṭuvānaḥ yaḥ udvaṃśīyena stuvate

original: (PB 8.9.9) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇy udvaṃśīyam
analyzed: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi udvaṃśīyam

original: (PB 8.9.10) gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇa eti rathantarasya rūpam eti hi rathantaram
analyzed: gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇaḥ ā iti rathantarasya rūpam ā iti hi rathantaram

original: (PB 8.9.11) ādir bṛhata ūrdhvam iva hi bṛhat
analyzed: ādiḥ bṛhataḥ ūrdhvam iva hi bṛhat

original: (PB 8.9.12) pariṣṭobho vairūpasya pariṣṭubhaṃ hi vairūpam
analyzed: pariṣṭobhaḥ vairūpasya pariṣṭubham hi vairūpam

original: (PB 8.9.13) anutodo vairājasyānutunnaṃ hi vairājam
analyzed: anutodaḥ vairājasya anutunnam hi vairājam

original: (PB 8.9.14) ardheḍā śakvarīṇām atisvāro revatīnām
analyzed: ardheḍā śakvarīṇām atisvāraḥ revatīnām

original: (PB 8.9.15) ardheḍayā vai devā asurān avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohan
analyzed: ardheḍayā vai devāḥ asurān avahatya atisvāreṇa svargam lokam ārohan

original: (PB 8.9.16) tad ya evaṃv vedārdheḍayaiva bhrātṛvyam avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohati
analyzed: tat yaḥ evam veda ardheḍayā eva bhrātṛvyam avahatya atisvāreṇa svargam lokam ārohati

original: (PB 8.9.17) ardheḍayā vai pūrvaṃ yajñaṃ saṃsthāpayanty atisvāreṇottram ārabhante
analyzed: ardheḍayā vai pūrvam yajñam saṃsthāpayanti atisvāreṇa uttram ārabhante

original: (PB 8.9.18) upainam uttaro yajño namati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: upa enam uttaraḥ yajñaḥ namati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 8.9.19) pāṅktaṃ vā etat sāma pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: pāṅktam vai etat sāma pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ yajñaḥ eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 8.9.20) āṣṭādaṃṣṭre ṛddhikāmāya kuryāt
analyzed: āṣṭādaṃṣṭre ṛddhi kāmāya kuryāt

original: (PB 8.9.21) aṣṭādaṃṣṭro vairūpo 'putro 'prajā ajīryat sa imāṃl lokān vicicchidvāṃ
analyzed: aṣṭādaṃṣṭraḥ vairūpaḥ a putraḥ a prajāḥ ajīryat saḥ imān lokān vicicchidvān

original: amanyata sa ete jarasi sāmanī apaśyat tayor aprayogād abibhet so 'bravīd ṛdhnavad
analyzed: amanyata saḥ ete jarasi sāmanī apaśyat tayoḥ a prayogāt abibhet saḥ abravīt ṛdhnavat

original: yobhe sāmabhyāṃ stavatā iti
analyzed: yā ubhe sāmabhyām stavate iti

original: (PB 8.9.22) ṛṣer vā etat prāśodbhūtaṃ yad aṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavata ṛdhyā eva
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ vai etat prāśā udbhūtam yat aṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavataḥ ṛdhyai eva

original: (PB 8.10.1) gāyatrīṣu brahmavarcasakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur gāyatryāṃ brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā gāyatrī saṃpadyate
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu brahmavarcasa kāmāya ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ gāyatryām brahma sāma anuṣṭubhi acchāvāka sāma sā eṣā gāyatrī saṃpadyate

original: (PB 8.10.2) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
analyzed: tejaḥ brahmavarcasam gāyatrī tejaḥ eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe

original: (PB 8.10.3) gāyatrīṣu paśukāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣoṣṇik saṃpadyate
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu paśu kāmāya ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ uṣṇihi brahma sāma anuṣṭubhi acchāvāka sāma sā eṣā uṣṇih saṃpadyate

original: (PB 8.10.4) paśavo vā uṣṇik paśūn evāvarundhe
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai uṣṇih paśūn eva avarundhe

original: (PB 8.10.5) gāyatrīṣu puruṣakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyuḥ kakubhi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā kakup saṃpadyate
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu puruṣa kāmāya ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ kakubhi brahma sāma anuṣṭubhi acchāvāka sāma sā eṣā kakubh saṃpadyate

original: (PB 8.10.6) puruṣo vai kakup puruṣān evāvarundhe
analyzed: puruṣaḥ vai kakubh puruṣān eva avarundhe

original: (PB 8.10.7) virāṭsv annādyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā virāṭ saṃpadyate
analyzed: virāṭsu annādya kāmāya ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ uṣṇihi brahma sāma anuṣṭubhi acchāvāka sāma sā eṣā virāj saṃpadyate

original: (PB 8.10.8) annaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāvarundhe
analyzed: annam virāj annādyam eva avarundhe

original: (PB 8.10.9) akṣarapaṅktiṣu jyaiṣṭhyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣānuṣṭup saṃpadyate
analyzed: akṣarapaṅktiṣu jyaiṣṭhya kāmāya ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ uṣṇihi brahma sāma anuṣṭubhi acchāvāka sāma sā eṣā anuṣṭubh saṃpadyate

original: (PB 8.10.10) jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vā anuṣṭub jyaiṣṭhyam avāvarundhe
analyzed: jyaiṣṭhyam vai anuṣṭubh jyaiṣṭhyam avāvarundhe

original: (PB 9.1.1) devā vā ukthāny abhijitya rātriṃ nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'surān rātriṃ
analyzed: devāḥ vai ukthāni abhijitya rātrim na aśaknuvan abhijetum te asurān rātrim

original: tamaḥ praviṣṭāṃ nānuvyapaśyaṃs ta etam anuṣṭupśirasaṃ pragāthm apaśyan virājaṃ jyotiḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ praviṣṭām na anuvyapaśyan te etam anuṣṭubh śirasam pragāthm apaśyan virājam jyotiḥ

original: tān virājā jyotiṣānupaśyanto 'nuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātrer nirāghnan
analyzed: tān virājā jyotiṣā anupaśyantaḥ anuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātreḥ nirāghnan

original: (PB 9.1.2) yad eṣo 'nuṣṭupśirāḥ pragātho bhavati virāḍ eva jyotiṣānupaśyann anuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātrer bhrātṛvyaṃ nirhanti
analyzed: yat eṣaḥ anuṣṭubh śirāḥ pragāthaḥ bhavati virāj eva jyotiṣā anupaśyan anuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātreḥ bhrātṛvyam nirhanti

original: (PB 9.1.3) tān samantaṃ paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta yat paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta tat paryāyāṇāṃ paryāyatvam
analyzed: tān samantam paryāyam prāṇudanta yat paryāyam prāṇudanta tat paryāyāṇām paryāya tvam

original: (PB 9.1.4) prathamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti prathamasya paryāyasya
analyzed: prathamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti prathamasya paryāyasya

original: (PB 9.1.5) prathamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāya prathamarātrāt prāṇudanta
analyzed: prathamaiḥ hi padaiḥ punar ādāya prathamarātrāt prāṇudanta

original: (PB 9.1.6) pāntam ā vo andhasa iti prastauti
analyzed: ā vaḥ andhasaḥ iti prastauti

original: (PB 9.1.7) ahar vai pāntam andho rātrir ahnaiva tad rātrim ārabhante
analyzed: ahar vai pāntam andhaḥ rātriḥ ahnā eva tat rātrim ārabhante

original: (PB 9.1.8) tāsu vaitahavyam
analyzed: tāsu vaitahavyam

original: (PB 9.1.9) vītahavyaḥ śrāyaso jyog niruddha etat sāmāpaśyat so 'vagacchat pratyatiṣṭhad avagacchati pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ jyok niruddhaḥ etat sāma apaśyat saḥ avagacchat pratyatiṣṭhat avagacchati pratitiṣṭhati etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 9.1.10) tam iva vā ete praviśantiye rātrim upayanti yad eko nidhanaṃ rātrer mukhe bhavati prajñātyai
analyzed: tam iva vai ete praviśanti ye rātrim upayanti yat ekaḥ nidhanam rātreḥ mukhe bhavati prajñātyai

original: (PB 9.1.11) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati
analyzed: yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam okaḥ āgacchati sarvam tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati

original: (PB 9.1.12) te madhyamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣām aurdhvasadmanena vācam avṛñjata
analyzed: te madhyamam paryāyam aśrayanta teṣām aurdhvasadmanena vācam avṛñjata

original: (PB 9.1.13) vācaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: vācam bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 9.1.14) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati
analyzed: triṇidhanam bhavati

original: (PB 9.1.15) yathā vā ahno mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ triṇidhanāyatanam evam eṣa rātrer madhyamaḥ paryāyas triṇidhanāyatanaḥ salokatvāya
analyzed: yathā vai ahnaḥ mādhyandinam savanam tri nidhana āyatanam evam eṣa rātreḥ madhyamaḥ paryāyaḥ tri nidhana āyatanaḥ sa loka tvāya

original: (PB 9.1.16) madhyamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti madhyamasya paryāyasya madhyamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāyaṃ madhyamarātrāt prāṇudanta
analyzed: madhyamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti madhyamasya paryāyasya madhyamaiḥ hi padaiḥ punar ādāyam madhyamarātrāt prāṇudanta

original: (PB 9.1.17) ta uttamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣāṃ ghṛtaścyun nidhanena paśūn avṛñjata paśavo vai ghṛtaścyutaḥ
analyzed: te uttamam paryāyam aśrayanta teṣām ghṛtaścyut nidhanena paśūn avṛñjata paśavaḥ vai ghṛtaścyutaḥ

original: (PB 9.1.18) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 9.1.19) uttamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanty uttamasya paryāyasyottamair hi padaiḥpunar ādāyam uttamarātrāt prāṇudanta
analyzed: uttamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti uttamasya paryāyasya uttamaiḥ hi padaiḥ punar ādāyam uttama rātrāt prāṇudanta

original: (PB 9.1.20) tān sandhinābhipalāyanta
analyzed: tān sandhinā abhipalāyanta

original: (PB 9.1.21) tān āśvinenāsaṃhāyyam agamayan
analyzed: tān āśvinena a saṃhāyyam agamayan

original: (PB 9.1.22) asaṃhāyyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ gamayati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: a saṃhāyyam bhrātṛvyam gamayati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 9.1.23) eṣā vā agniṣṭomasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
analyzed: eṣā vai agniṣṭomasya saṃmā yat rātriḥ

original: (PB 9.1.24) dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa strotrāṇi rātriḥ
analyzed: dvādaśa stotrāṇi agniṣṭomaḥ dvādaśa strotrāṇi rātriḥ

original: (PB 9.1.25) eṣā vā ukthasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
analyzed: eṣā vai ukthasya saṃmā yat rātriḥ

original: (PB 9.1.26) trīṇy ukthāni tridevatyaḥ sandhiḥ
analyzed: trīṇi ukthāni tri devatyaḥ sandhiḥ

original: (PB 9.1.27) yathā vā ahna ukthāny evam eṣa rātreḥ sandhir nānārūpāṇy ahna ukthāni nānārūpā ete tṛcā bhavanti
analyzed: yathā vai ahnaḥ ukthāni evam eṣa rātreḥ sandhiḥ nānā rūpāṇi ahnaḥ ukthāni nānā rūpāḥ ete tṛcāḥ bhavanti

original: (PB 9.1.28) rathantaraṃ pratiṣṭhākāmāya sandhiṃ kuryāt
analyzed: rathantaram pratiṣṭhā kāmāya sandhim kuryāt

original: (PB 9.1.29) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: iyam vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 9.1.30) bṛhat svargakāmāya sandhiṃ kuryāt
analyzed: bṛhat svarga kāmāya sandhim kuryāt

original: (PB 9.1.31) svargo loko bṛhat svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: svargaḥ lokaḥ bṛhant svarge eva loke pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 9.1.32) vāravantīyaṃ vā vāmadevyaṃ vā śruddhyaṃ vai teṣām ekaṃ paśukāmāya sandhiṃ kuryāt
analyzed: vāravantīyam vā vāmadevyam vā śruddhyam vai teṣām ekam paśu kāmāya sandhim kuryāt

original: (PB 9.1.33) paśavo vā etāni sāmāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai etāni sāmāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 9.1.34) āśvinaṃ hotānuśaṃsati
analyzed: āśvinam hotā anuśaṃsati

original: (PB 9.1.35) prajāpatir vā etat sahasram asṛjata tad devebhyaḥ prāyacchat tasmin na samarādhayaṃs te sūryaṃ kāṣṭhāṃ kṛtvājim adhāvan
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ vai etat sahasram asṛjata tat devebhyaḥ prāyacchat tasmin na samarādhayan te sūryam kāṣṭhām kṛtvā ājim adhāvan

original: (PB 9.1.36) teṣām aśvinau prathamāv adhāvatāṃ tāv anvavadan saha no 'stv iti tāv
analyzed: teṣām aśvinau prathamau adhāvatām tau anvavadan saha naḥ astu iti tau

original: abrūtāṃ kiṃ tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayethe ity abruvaṃs tāv abrūtām asmaddevatyam idam
analyzed: abrūtām kim tatas syāt iti yat kāmayethe iti abruvan tau abrūtām asmad devatyam idam

original: uktham ucyātā iti tasmād āśvinam ucyate
analyzed: uktham ucyātai iti tasmāt āśvinam ucyate

original: (PB 9.1.37) sarvāḥ khalu devatāḥ śasyante
analyzed: sarvāḥ khalu devatāḥ śasyante

original: (PB 9.1.38) kṣipraṃ śasyam ājim iva hy ete dhāvanty ā sūryasyodetoḥ śaṃset sūryaṃ hi kāṣṭhām akurvata
analyzed: kṣipram śasyam ājim iva hi ete dhāvanti ā sūryasya udetoḥ śaṃset sūryam hi kāṣṭhām akurvata

original: (PB 9.2.1) pāntam ā vo andhasa iti vaitahavyam anyakṣetraṃvā ete prayanti ye rātrim upayanti yad okonidhanaṃ rātrer mukhe bhavaty okaso 'pracyāvāya
analyzed: ā vaḥ andhasaḥ iti vaitahavyam anya kṣetram vai ete prayanti ye rātrim upayanti yat okonidhanam rātreḥ mukhe bhavati okasaḥ a pracyāvāya

original: (PB 9.2.2) pra va indrāya mādanam iti gaurīvitam
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya mādanam iti gaurīvitam

original: (PB 9.2.3) brahma yad devā vyakurvata tato yad atyaricyata tad gaurīvitam abhavat
analyzed: brahma yat devāḥ vyakurvata tatas yat atyaricyata tat gaurīvitam abhavat

original: (PB 9.2.4) atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atiriktam etat stotraṃ yad rātrir atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: atiriktam gaurīvitam atiriktam etat stotram yat rātriḥ atirikte eva atiriktam dadhāti

original: (PB 9.2.5) vayam u tvā tad id arthā iti kāṇvam
analyzed: vayam u tvā tat id arthāḥ iti kāṇvam

original: (PB 9.2.6) etena vai kaṇva indrasya sāṃvidyam agacchad indrasyaivaitena sāṃvidyaṃ gacchati
analyzed: etena vai kaṇvaḥ indrasya sāṃvidyam agacchat indrasya eva etena sāṃvidyam gacchati

original: (PB 9.2.7) indrāya madvane sutam iti śrautakakṣaṃ kṣatrasāma pra kṣatram evaitena bhavati
analyzed: indrāya madvane sutam iti śrautakakṣam kṣatra sāma pra kṣatram eva etena bhavati

original: (PB 9.2.8) ayaṃ ta indra soma iti daivodāsam
analyzed: ayam te indra somaḥ iti daivodāsam

original: (PB 9.2.9) agniṣṭomena vai devā imaṃl lokam abhyajayann antarikṣam ukthenātirātreṇāmuṃ.
analyzed: agniṣṭomena vai devāḥ iman lokam abhyajayan antarikṣam ukthena atirātreṇa amum

original: ta imaṃl lokaṃ punar abhyakāmayanta ta ihety asmiṃl loke pratyatiṣṭhan yad etat sāma
analyzed: te iman lokam punar abhyakāmayanta te iha iti asmin loke pratyatiṣṭhan yat etat sāma

original: bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 9.2.10) ūrdhvasadmanam api śarvarīṣu prohanti
analyzed: ūrdhvasadmanam api śarvarīṣu prohanti

original: (PB 9.2.11) asurā vā eṣu lokeṣv āsaṃs tān devā ūrdhvasadmanenaibhyo lokebhyaḥ prāṇudanta
analyzed: asurāḥ vai eṣu lokeṣu āsan tān devāḥ ūrdhvasadmanena ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ prāṇudanta

original: (PB 9.2.12) tad ya evaṃv vedaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudya sva āyatane sattram āste
analyzed: tat yaḥ evam veda ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam praṇudya sve āyatane sattram āste

original: (PB 9.2.13) ā tū na indra kṣumantam ity ākūpāram
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indra kṣumantam iti ākūpāram

original: (PB 9.2.14) akūpārāṅgirasasyāsīt tasyā yathā godhāyās tvag eva tvag āsīt tām etena
analyzed: akūpārā āṅgirasasya āsīt tasyāḥ yathā godhāyāḥ tvac eva tvac āsīt tām etena

original: triḥsāmnendraḥ pūtvā sūryatvacasam akarot tad vāva sā tarhy akāmayata yatkāmā etena
analyzed: tris sāmnā indraḥ pūtvā sūrya tvacasam akarot tat vāva sā tarhi akāmayata yad kāmāḥ etena

original: sāmnā stuvate sa ebhyaḥ kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
analyzed: sāmnā stuvate saḥ ebhyaḥ kāmaḥ samṛdhyate

original: (PB 9.2.15) abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sutaṃ ity ārṣabhaṃ kṣatrasāma kṣatram evaitena bhavati
analyzed: abhi tvā vṛṣabha sutam iti ārṣabham kṣatra sāma kṣatram eva etena bhavati

original: (PB 9.2.16) idaṃv vaso sutam andha iti gāram etena vai gara indram aprīṇāt prīta evāsyaitenendro bhavati
analyzed: idam u vaso sutam andhaḥ iti gāram etena vai garaḥ indram aprīṇāt prītaḥ eva asya etena indraḥ bhavati

original: (PB 9.2.17) idaṃ hy anv ojaseti mādhucchandasaṃ prajāpater vā eṣā tanūr ayātayāmnī prayujyate
analyzed: idam hi anu ojasā iti mādhucchandasam prajāpateḥ vai eṣā tanūḥ ayātayāmnī prayujyate

original: (PB 9.2.18) ā tv etā niṣīdateti daivātitham
analyzed: ā tu etāḥ niṣīdata iti daivātitham

original: (PB 9.2.19) devātithiḥ saputro 'śanāyaṃś carann araṇya urvārūṇy avindat tāny etena sāmnopāsīdat tā asmai gāvaḥ pṛśnayo bhūtvodatiṣṭhan yad  #
analyzed: devātithiḥ sa putraḥ aśanāyan caran araṇye urvārūṇi avindat tāni etad sāmnā upāsīdat tāḥ asmai gāvaḥ pṛśnayaḥ bhūtvā udatiṣṭhan yat

original: etat sām a bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai
analyzed: etat sām a bhavati paśūnām puṣṭyai

original: (PB 9.2.20) yoge-yoge tavastaram iti saumedhaṃ rātriṣāma rātrer eva samṛdhyai
analyzed: yoge yoge tavastaram iti saumedham rātriṣāma rātreḥ eva samṛdhyai

original: (PB 9.2.21) indra suteṣu someṣv iti kautsam
analyzed: indra suteṣu someṣu iti kautsam

original: (PB 9.2.22) kutsaś ca luśaś cendraṃ vyahvayetāṃ sa indraḥ kutsam upāvartata taṃ śatena
analyzed: kutsaḥ ca luśaḥ ca indram vyahvayetām saḥ indraḥ kutsam upāvartata tam śatena

original: vārdhrībhir āṇḍayor abadhnāt taṃ luśo 'bhyavadat pramucyasva pari kutsād ihāgahi
analyzed: vārdhrībhiḥ āṇḍayoḥ abadhnāt tam luśaḥ abhyavadat pramucyasva pari kutsāt iha āgahi

original: kim u tvāvān āṇḍayor baddha āsātā iti tās saṃcchidya prādravat sa etat kutsaḥ sāmāpaśyat
analyzed: kim u tvāvān āṇḍayoḥ baddhaḥ āsātai iti tāḥ saṃcchidya prādravat saḥ etat kutsaḥ sāma apaśyat

original: tenainam anvavadat sa upāvartata
analyzed: tena enam anvavadat saḥ upāvartata

original: (PB 9.2.23) yad etat sāma bhavati sendratvāya
analyzed: yat etat sāma bhavati sa indra tvāya

original: (PB 9.3.1) yadi sattrāya dīkṣerann atha sāmy uttiṣṭhet somam apabhajya viśvajitātirātreṇa yajeta sarvavedasena sarvasmā eva dīkṣate sarvam
analyzed: yadi sattrāya dīkṣeran atha sāmi uttiṣṭhet somam apabhajya viśvajitā atirātreṇa yajeta sarvavedasena sarvasmai eva dīkṣate sarvam

original: (PB 9.3.2) yā id dakṣiṇā dadāti tābhir iti prayuṅkte
analyzed: yāḥ id dakṣiṇāḥ dadāti tābhiḥ iti prayuṅkte

original: (PB 9.3.3) yadi paryāyair astutam abhivyucchet pancadaśabhir hotre stuyuḥ pañcabhiḥ-pañcabhir itarebhyaḥ
analyzed: yadi paryāyaiḥ a stutam abhivyucchet pancadaśabhiḥ hotre stuyuḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ itarebhyaḥ

original: (PB 9.3.4) agne vivasvad uṣasa iti sandhinā stuyuḥ prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā rathantaraṃ sāmnāṃ prāṇāṃs caivopayanti pratiṣṭhāṃ ca
analyzed: agne vivasvat uṣase iti sandhinā stuyuḥ prāṇāḥ vai trivṛt stomānām pratiṣṭhā rathantaram sāmnām prāṇān ca eva upayanti pratiṣṭhām ca

original: (PB 9.3.5) ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni hotā śaṃsati
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim ca trīṇi ca śatāni hotā śaṃsati

original: (PB 9.3.6) tāvatyaḥ saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarasaṃmitābhir eva tad ṛgbhir āśīvinam āpnoti
analyzed: tāvatyaḥ saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ saṃvatsara saṃmitābhiḥ eva tat ṛgbhiḥ āśīvinam āpnoti

original: (PB 9.3.7) yad arvāk stuvanti tad astutaṃ yat samprati stuvanti tat stutaṃ yad atiṣṭuvanti tat suṣṭutam
analyzed: yat arvāk stuvanti tat astutam yat samprati stuvanti tat stutam yat atiṣṭuvanti tat suṣṭutam

original: (PB 9.3.8) yady arvāk stuyur yāvatībhir na stuyus tāvatībhir vātiṣṭuyur bhūyo 'kṣarābhir vā
analyzed: yadi arvāk stuyuḥ yāvatībhiḥ na stuyuḥ tāvatībhiḥ vā ātiṣṭuyuḥ bhūyas akṣarābhiḥ vā

original: (PB 9.3.9) yady atiṣṭuyur yāvatībhir atiṣṭuyus tāvatībhir vā na stuyuḥ kanīyo 'kṣarābhir vā
analyzed: yadi atiṣṭuyuḥ yāvatībhiḥ atiṣṭuyuḥ tāvatībhiḥ vā na stuyuḥ kanīyaḥ akṣarābhiḥ vā

original: (PB 9.3.10) yady arvāk stuyus trīḍam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ nidhanam ekeḍayā ye dve tābhyām eva tat samaṃ kriyate
analyzed: yadi arvāk stuyuḥ tri iḍam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam nidhanam eka iḍayā ye dve tābhyām eva tat samam kriyate

original: (PB 9.3.11) yady atiṣṭuyuḥ svāram agniṣṭomasāma kāryam ūnam iva vā etat sāmno yat svaras tenaiva tat samaṃ kriyate
analyzed: yadi atiṣṭuyuḥ svāram agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam ūnam iva vai etat sāmnaḥ yat svaraḥ tena eva tat samam kriyate

original: (PB 9.4.1) yadi somau saṃsutau syātāṃ mahati rātreḥ prātaranuvākam upākuryāt
analyzed: yadi somau saṃsutau syātām mahati rātreḥ prātaranuvākam upākuryāt

original: (PB 9.4.2) pūrvo vācaṃ pūrvaś chandāṃsi pūrvo devatā vṛṅkte
analyzed: pūrvaḥ vācam pūrvaḥ chandāṃsi pūrvaḥ devatāḥ vṛṅkte

original: (PB 9.4.3) vṛṣaṇvatīṃ pratipadaṃ kuryād indro vai vṛṣā prātaḥsavanād evaiṣām indraṃv vṛṅkte
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvatīm pratipadam kuryāt indraḥ vai vṛṣā prātaḥsavanāt eva eṣām indram vṛṅkte

original: (PB 9.4.4) atho khalv āhuḥ savanamukhe-savanamukhe kāryā savanamukhāt-savanamukhād evaiṣām indraṃv vṛṅkte
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ savana mukhe savana mukhe kāryā savana mukhāt savana mukhāt eva eṣām indram vṛṅkte

original: (PB 9.4.5) susamiddhe hotavyam agnir vai sarvā devatāḥ sarvā eva devatāḥ paśyañ juhoti
analyzed: su samiddhe hotavyam agniḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ eva devatāḥ paśyam juhoti

original: (PB 9.4.6) saṃveśāyopaveśāya gāyatryai cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāyopaveśāya
analyzed: saṃveśāya upaveśāya gāyatryai chandase abhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāya upaveśāya

original: triṣṭubhe cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāyopaveśāya jagatyai cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāheti juhoti
analyzed: triṣṭubhe chandase abhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāya upaveśāya jagatyai chandase abhibhūtaye svāhā iti juhoti

original: (PB 9.4.7) cchandāṃsi vā abhibhūtayas tair evainān abhibhavaty ubhe bṛhadrathantare kārye
analyzed: chandāṃsi vai abhibhūtayaḥ taiḥ eva enān abhibhavati ubhe bṛhat rathantare kārye

original: (PB 9.4.8) yatra vā indrasya harī tad indraḥ. indrasya vai harī bṛhadrathantare yad ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavataḥ pūrva evendrasya harī ārabhante
analyzed: yatra vai indrasya harī tat indraḥ indrasya vai harī bṛhat rathantare yat ubhe bṛhat rathantare bhavataḥ pūrve eva indrasya harī ārabhante

original: (PB 9.4.9) tair aśravase kārye
analyzed: taiḥ aśravase kārye

original: (PB 9.4.10) turaśravasaś ca vai pārāvatānāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata ete turaśravāḥ
analyzed: turaśravasaḥ ca vai pārāvatānām ca somau saṃsutau āstām tatas ete turaśravāḥ

original: sāmanī apaśyat tābhyām asmā indraḥ śalmalināṃ yamunāyā havyaṃ nirāvahat yat tair
analyzed: sāmanī apaśyat tābhyām asmai indraḥ yamunāyāḥ havyam nirāvahat yat taiḥ

original: aśravase bhavato havyam evaiṣāṃv vṛṅkte
analyzed: aśravase bhavataḥ havyam eva eṣām vṛṅkte

original: (PB 9.4.11) pūrve 'bhiṣuṇuyuḥ
analyzed: pūrve abhiṣuṇuyuḥ

original: (PB 9.4.12) yā vai pūrvāḥ prasnānti tāḥ pūrvās tīrthaṃ jayanti pūrva evendram ārabhante
analyzed: yāḥ vai pūrvāḥ prasnānti tāḥ pūrvāḥ tīrtham jayanti pūrve eva indram ārabhante

original: (PB 9.4.13) vihavyaṃ śasyam
analyzed: vihavyam śasyam

original: (PB 9.4.14) jamadagneś ca vā ṛṣīṇāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata etaj gamadagnir vihavyam apaśyat tam indra upāvartata yad vihavyaṃ hotā śaṃsatīndram  #
analyzed: jamadagneḥ ca vai ṛṣīṇām ca somau saṃsutau āstām tatas etat gamadagniḥ vihavyam apaśyat tam indraḥ upāvartata yat vihavyam hotā śaṃsati indram  /

original: evaiṣāṃv vṛṅkte
analyzed: eva eṣām vṛṅkte

original: (PB 9.4.15) yadītaro 'gniṣṭomaḥ syād ukthaḥ kāryo yady uktho 'tirātro yo vai bhūyān yajñakratuḥ sa indrasya priyo bhūyasaivaiṣāṃ yajnakratunendraṃv
analyzed: yadi itaraḥ agniṣṭomaḥ syāt ukthaḥ kāryaḥ yadi ukthaḥ atirātraḥ yaḥ vai bhūyān yajña kratuḥ saḥ indrasya priyaḥ bhūyasā eva eṣām yajna kratunā indraṃvat

original: (PB 9.4.16) atho khalv āhur duṣprāpa iva vai paraḥ panthā yam evāgre yajñakratum ārabheta tasmān neyād iti
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ duṣprāpaḥ iva vai paraḥ panthāḥ yam eva agre yajña kratum ārabheta tasmāt na iyāt iti

original: (PB 9.4.17) sajanīyaṃ śasyam agastyasya kayāśubhīyaṃ śasyam
analyzed: sajanīyam śasyam agastyasya kayāśubhīyam śasyam

original: (PB 9.4.18) asyā amuṣyā adyaśvān mithunād ahorātrābhyām evainān nirbhajati
analyzed: asyāḥ amuṣyāḥ adyaśvāt mithunāt ahar rātrābhyām eva enān nirbhajati

original: (PB 9.5.1) yadi somam akrītam apahareyur anyaḥ kretavyaḥ
analyzed: yadi somam a krītam apahareyuḥ anyaḥ kretavyaḥ

original: (PB 9.5.2) yadi krītaṃ yo 'nyo 'bhyāśaṃ syāt sa āhṛtyaḥ somavikrayaṇe tu kiṃ cid dadyāt
analyzed: yadi krītam yaḥ anyaḥ abhyāśam syāt saḥ āhṛtyaḥ soma vikrayaṇe tu kim cit dadyāt

original: (PB 9.5.3) yadi somaṃ na vindeyuḥ pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyur yadi na pūtīkān arjjunāni
analyzed: yadi somam na vindeyuḥ pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyuḥ yadi na pūtīkān arjunāni

original: (PB 9.5.4) gāyatrī somam āharat tasyā anu visṛjya somarakṣiḥ parṇam acchinat tasya
analyzed: gāyatrī somam āharat tasyāḥ anu visṛjya somarakṣiḥ parṇam acchinat tasya

original: yo 'ṃśuḥ parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavat tasmin devā ūtim avindann ūtīko vā eṣa yat pūtīkān
analyzed: yaḥ aṃśuḥ parāpatat sa pūtīkaḥ abhavat tasmin devāḥ ūtim avindan ūtīkaḥ vai eṣa yat pūtīkān

original: abhiṣuṇvanty ūtim evāsmai vindanti
analyzed: abhiṣuṇvanti ūtim eva asmai vindanti

original: (PB 9.5.5) pratidhuk ca prātaḥ pūtīkāś ca śṛtaṃ ca madhyandine pūtīkāś ca dadhi cāparāhṇe pūtīkāś ca
analyzed: pratidhuk ca prātar pūtīkāḥ ca śṛtam ca madhyandine pūtīkāḥ ca dadhi ca aparāhṇe pūtīkāḥ ca

original: (PB 9.5.6) somapītho vā etasmād apakrāmatīty āhur yasya somam apaharantīti sa oṣadhīś ca paśūṃś ca praviśati tam oṣadhibhyaś ca paśubhyaś cāvarundhe
analyzed: soma pīthaḥ vai etasmāt apakrāmati iti āhuḥ yasya somam apaharanti iti saḥ oṣadhīḥ ca paśūn ca praviśati tam oṣadhibhyaḥ ca paśubhyaḥ ca avarundhe

original: (PB 9.5.7) indro vṛtram ahaṃs tasya yo nastaḥ somaḥ samadhāvat tāni babhrutūlāny
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram ahan tasya yaḥ nastas somaḥ samadhāvat tāni babhru tūlāni

original: arjunāni yo vapāyā utkhinnāyās tāni lohitatūlāni yāni babhrutūlāny arjunāni tāny
analyzed: arjunāni yaḥ vapāyāḥ utkhinnāyāḥ tāni lohita tūlāni yāni babhru tūlāni arjunāni tāni

original: abhiṣuṇuyād etad vai brahmaṇo rūpaṃ sākṣād eva somam abhiṣuṇoti
analyzed: abhiṣuṇuyāt etat vai brahmaṇaḥ rūpam sākṣāt eva somam abhiṣuṇoti

original: (PB 9.5.8) śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma kāryaṃ sad evainaṃ karoti
analyzed: śrāyantīyam brahma sāma kāryam sat eva enam karoti

original: (PB 9.5.9) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi prohed vācaivainaṃ samardhayati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryam indriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai
analyzed: yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi prohet vācā eva enam samardhayati vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam indriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai

original: (PB 9.5.10) pañca dakṣiṇā deyāḥ
analyzed: pañca dakṣiṇāḥ deyāḥ

original: (PB 9.5.11) pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
analyzed: pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ yāvān yajñaḥ tam eva ārabhate

original: (PB 9.5.12) avabhṛthād udetya punar dīkṣeta
analyzed: avabhṛthāt udetya punar dīkṣeta

original: (PB 9.5.13) tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt
analyzed: tatra tat dadyāt yat dāsyam syāt

original: (PB 9.6.1) yadi kalaśo dīryeta vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ brahmasāma kuryāt
analyzed: yadi kalaśaḥ dīryeta vaṣaṭkāra nidhanam brahma sāma kuryāt

original: (PB 9.6.2) avaṣaṭkṛto vā etasya somaḥ parāsicyate yasya kalaśo dīryate yad vaṣaṭkāraṇīdhanaṃ brahmasāma bhavati vaṣaṭkṛta evāsya somo bhavati
analyzed: a vaṣaṭkṛtaḥ vai etasya somaḥ parāsicyate yasya kalaśaḥ dīryate yat vaṣaṭkāraṇī dhanam brahma sāma bhavati vaṣaṭkṛtaḥ eva asya somaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 9.6.3) vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnām ity etāsu kāryam
analyzed: vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām iti etāsu kāryam

original: (PB 9.6.4) eṣa hi bahūnāṃ samane dīryate yat kalaśaḥ
analyzed: eṣa hi bahūnām samane dīryate yat kalaśaḥ

original: (PB 9.6.5) tad āhur na vā ārtyārtir anūdyārtyā vā eṣa ārtim anuvadati yaḥ kalaśo dīrṇe dadrāṇavatīṣu karotīti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ na vai ārtyā ārtiḥ anūdyā ārtyā vai eṣaḥ ārtim anuvadati yaḥ kalaśaḥ dīrṇe dadrāṇavatīṣu karoti iti

original: (PB 9.6.6) śrāyantīyam eva kāryam
analyzed: śrāyantīyam eva kāryam

original: (PB 9.6.7) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricāno 'manyata sa etac chrāyantīyam apaśyat tenātmānaṃ samaśrīṇāt prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata sa dugdhaḥ riricānaḥ amanyata saḥ etat śrāyantīyam apaśyat tena ātmānam samaśrīṇāt prajayā paśubhiḥ indriyeṇa

original: (PB 9.6.8) dugdha iva eṣa riricāno yasya kalaśo dīryate yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati punar evātmānaṃ saṃśrīṇāti prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa
analyzed: dugdhaḥ iva eṣa riricānaḥ yasya kalaśaḥ dīryate yat śrāyantīyam brahma sāma bhavati punar eva ātmānam saṃśrīṇāti prajayā paśubhiḥ indriyeṇa

original: (PB 9.6.9) yadi śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma syād vaiṣṇavīṣv anuṣṭupsu vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ kuryāt
analyzed: yadi śrāyantīyam brahma sāma syāt vaiṣṇavīṣu anuṣṭupsu vaṣaṭkāra nidhanam kuryāt

original: (PB 9.6.10) yad vai yajñasya sravati vācaṃ pratisravati vāg anuṣṭup yajño viṣṇur vācaiva yajñasya cchidram apidadhāti
analyzed: yat vai yajñasya sravati vācam pratisravati vāc anuṣṭubh yajñaḥ viṣṇuḥ vācā eva yajñasya chidram apidadhāti

original: (PB 9.6.11) yad vai yajñasya sravaty antataḥ sravati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ yajñasyaiva cchidraṃ vārayate
analyzed: yat vai yajñasya sravati antatas sravati vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam yajñasya eva chidram vārayate

original: (PB 9.7.1) yadi prātassavanāt somo 'tiricyeta asti somo ayaṃ suta iti marutvatīṣu gāyatreṣu stuyuḥ
analyzed: yadi prātassavanāt somaḥ atiricyeta asti somaḥ ayam sutaḥ iti marutvatīṣu gāyatreṣu stuyuḥ

original: (PB 9.7.2) mādhyandinaṃ vā eṣa savanaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yaḥ prātassavanād
analyzed: mādhyandinam vai eṣa savanam nikāmayamānaḥ abhyatiricyate yaḥ prātassavanāt

original: atiricyate tasmān marutvatīṣu stuvanti marutvad dhi mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ tasmād u
analyzed: atiricyate tasmāt marutvatīṣu stuvanti marutvat hi mādhyandinam savanam tasmāt u

original: gāyatrīṣu gāyatraṃ hi prātassavanam
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu gāyatram hi prātassavanam

original: (PB 9.7.3) yasmāt stomād atiricyate sa eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya
analyzed: yasmāt stomāt atiricyate saḥ eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ saloma tvāya

original: (PB 9.7.4) aindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ hotānuśaṃsati
analyzed: aindrāvaiṣṇavam hotā anuśaṃsati

original: (PB 9.7.5) vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya eva yajñe pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: vīryam vai indraḥ yajñaḥ viṣṇuḥ vīrye eva yajñe pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 9.7.6) yadi mādhyandināt savanād atiricyeta baṇ mahāṃ asi sūryety ādityavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ
analyzed: yadi mādhyandināt savanāt atiricyeta baṭ mahān asi sūrya iti ādityavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ

original: (PB 9.7.7) tṛtīyasavanaṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo mādhyandināt savanād
analyzed: tṛtīyasavanam vai eṣa nikāmayamānaḥ abhyatiricyate yaḥ mādhyandināt savanāt

original: atiricyate tasmād ādityavatīṣu stuvanty ādityaṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād u bṛhatīṣu
analyzed: atiricyate tasmāt ādityavatīṣu stuvanti ādityam hi tṛtīyasavanam tasmāt u bṛhatīṣu

original: bārhataṃ hi mādhyandinaṃ savanam
analyzed: bārhatam hi mādhyandinam savanam

original: (PB 9.7.8) yasmāt stomād atiricyeta sa eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāyaindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ hotānuśaṃsati vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya eva yajñe
analyzed: yasmāt stomāt atiricyeta saḥ eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ saloma tvāya aindrāvaiṣṇavam hotā anuśaṃsati vīryam vai indraḥ yajñaḥ viṣṇuḥ vīrye eva yajñe

original: (PB 9.7.9) yadi tṛtīyasavanād atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ
analyzed: yadi tṛtīyasavanāt atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ

original: (PB 9.7.10) yajño vai viṣṇuś śipiviṣṭo yajña eva viṣṇau pratitiṣṭhaty atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: yajñaḥ vai viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭaḥ yajñe eva viṣṇau pratitiṣṭhati atiriktam gaurīvitam atirikte eva atiriktam dadhāti

original: (PB 9.7.11) etad anyat kuryur ukthāni praṇayeyur ukthāni vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate
analyzed: etat anyat kuryuḥ ukthāni praṇayeyuḥ ukthāni vai eṣa nikāmayamānaḥ abhyatiricyate

original: yo 'gniṣṭomād atiricyate yady ukthyebhyo 'tiricyetātirātraḥ kāryo rātriṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno
analyzed: yaḥ agniṣṭomāt atiricyate yadi ukthyebhyaḥ atiricyeta atirātraḥ kāryaḥ rātrim vai eṣa nikāmayamānaḥ

original: 'bhyatiricyate ya ukthyebhyo 'tiricyate yadi rātrer atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu
analyzed: abhyatiricyate yaḥ ukthyebhyaḥ atiricyate yadi rātreḥ atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu

original: bṛhatā stuyur eṣu tu vā atiricyata ity āhur yo rātrer atiricyata iti
analyzed: bṛhatā stuyuḥ eṣu tu vai atiricyate iti āhuḥ yaḥ rātreḥ atiricyate iti

original: (PB 9.7.12) amuṃ vā eṣa lokaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo rātrer atiricyate bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
analyzed: amum vai eṣa lokam nikāmayamānaḥ abhyatiricyate yaḥ rātreḥ atiricyate bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhat amum lokam āptum arhati tam eva āpnoti

original: (PB 9.8.1) yadi dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate dagdhvāsthīny upanahya yo nediṣṭhī syāt taṃ dīkṣayitvā saha yajeran
analyzed: yadi dīkṣitānām pramīyate dagdhvā asthīni upanahya yaḥ nediṣṭhī syāt tam dīkṣayitvā saha yajeran

original: (PB 9.8.2) etad anyat kuryur abhiṣutyānyat somam agṛhītvā grahān yāsau dakṣiṇā sraktis tad vā stuyur mārjālīye vā
analyzed: etat anyat kuryuḥ abhiṣutya anyat somam a grahītvā grahān yā asau dakṣiṇā sraktiḥ tat vā stuyuḥ mārjālīye vā

original: (PB 9.8.3) api vā etasya yajñe yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate tam etena niravadayante
analyzed: api vai etasya yajñe yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate tam etena niravadayante

original: (PB 9.8.4) yāmena stuvanti yamalokam evainaṃ gamayanti
analyzed: yāmena stuvanti yama lokam eva enam gamayanti

original: (PB 9.8.5) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti tṛtīye hi loke pitaraḥ
analyzed: tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti tṛtīye hi loke pitaraḥ

original: (PB 9.8.6) parācībhiḥ stuvanti parāṅ hīto 'sau lokaḥ
analyzed: parācībhiḥ stuvanti parāṅ hi itas asau lokaḥ

original: (PB 9.8.7) sarparājñyā ṛgbhiḥ stuvanti
analyzed: sarparājñyāḥ ṛgbhiḥ stuvanti

original: (PB 9.8.8) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhis tvacam apaghnate
analyzed: arbudaḥ sarpaḥ etābhiḥ mṛtām tvacam apāhata mṛtām eva etābhiḥ tvacam apaghnate

original: (PB 9.8.9) tā ṛco 'nubruvantas trir mārjālīyaṃ pariyanti savyān ūrūn āghnānāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ṛcaḥ anubruvantaḥ tris mārjālīyam pariyanti savyān ūrūn āghnānāḥ

original: (PB 9.8.10) stutam anuśaṃsaty amuṣminn evainaṃ loke nidhnuvanti
analyzed: stutam anuśaṃsati amuṣmin eva enam loke nidhnuvanti

original: (PB 9.8.11) yanti vā ete patha ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīty aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇate punaḥ panthānam apiyanti
analyzed: yanti vai ete pathaḥ iti āhuḥ ye mṛtāya kurvanti iti aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇate punar panthānam apiyanti

original: (PB 9.8.12) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipatkāryā ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti
analyzed: agne āyūṃṣi pavase iti pratipad kāryā ye eva jīvanti teṣu āyuḥ dadhāti

original: (PB 9.8.13) saṃvatsare 'sthīni yājayeyuḥ saṃvvatsaro vai sarvasya śāntir yat purā saṃvvatsarād yājayeyur vācam aruṣkṛtāṃ krūrām ṛccheyuḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsare asthīni yājayeyuḥ saṃvatsaraḥ vai sarvasya śāntiḥ yat purā saṃvatsarāt yājayeyuḥ vācam aruṣkṛtām krūrām ṛccheyuḥ

original: (PB 9.8.14) vṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ syuḥ saptadaśam itarat sarvam
analyzed: vṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ syuḥ saptadaśam itarat sarvam

original: (PB 9.8.15) yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān evopayanti yat saptadaśam itarat sarvaṃ prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajatim
analyzed: yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ bhavanti prāṇāḥ vai trivṛt prāṇān eva upayanti yat saptadaśam itarat sarvam prajāpatiḥ vai saptadaśaḥ prajatim

original: (PB 9.8.16) prāṇāpānair vā ete vyṛdhyanta ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīti maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇate prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānair  #
analyzed: prāṇa apānaiḥ vai ete vyṛdhyante iti āhuḥ ye mṛtāya kurvanti iti maitrāvaruṇa agrān grahān gṛhṇate prāṇa apānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇa apānaiḥ

original: eva samṛdhyante
analyzed: eva samṛdhyante

original: (PB 9.9.1) yasya kalaśa upadasyati kalaśam evāsyopadasyantaṃ prāṇo 'nūpadasyati prāṇo hi somaḥ
analyzed: yasya kalaśaḥ upadasyati kalaśam eva asya upadasyantam prāṇaḥ anūpadasyati prāṇaḥ hi somaḥ

original: (PB 9.9.2) tad āhuḥ payo 'vanayed iti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ payaḥ avanayet iti

original: (PB 9.9.3) atho khalv āhur antarhitam iva vā etad yat payo hiraṇyam evāpo'bhyavanayed dhiraṇyam abhyunnayed iti
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ antarhitam iva vai etat yat payaḥ hiraṇyam eva apaḥ abhyavanayet hiraṇyam abhyunnayet iti

original: (PB 9.9.4) prāṇā vā āpo 'mṛtaṃ hiraṇyam amṛta evāsya prāṇān dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti
analyzed: prāṇāḥ vai āpaḥ amṛtam hiraṇyam amṛte eva asya prāṇān dadhāti sa sarvam āyuḥ eti

original: (PB 9.9.5) yasya nārāśaṃsa upavāyati nārāśaṃsam evāsyopa+vāyantaṃ prāṇo 'nūpadasyati prāṇo hi somaḥ
analyzed: yasya nārāśaṃsaḥ nārāśaṃsam upavāyati nārāśaṃsam eva asya upavāyantam prāṇaḥ anūpadasyati prāṇaḥ hi somaḥ

original: (PB 9.9.6) yam adhvaryur antato grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tasyāptum avanayet
analyzed: yam adhvaryuḥ antatas graham gṛhṇīyāt tasya aptum avanayet

original: (PB 9.9.7) prāyaścityai vai graho gṛhyate prāyaścityevāsmai prāyaścittiṃ karoti
analyzed: prāyaścityai vai grahaḥ gṛhyate prāyaścityā iva asmai prāyaścittim karoti

original: (PB 9.9.8) yadi pītāpītau somau saṃgaccheyātām antaḥ paridhyaṅgārān nirvartya juhuyāt hutasya cāhutasya cāhutasya hutasya ca /
analyzed: yadi pīta a pī domau saṃgaccheyātām antar paridhi aṅgārān nirvartya juhuyāt hutasya ca a hutasya ca a hutasya hutasya ca

original: pītāpītasya somasyendrāgnī pibataṃ sutaṃ svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
analyzed: pīta a pītasya somasya indra agnī pibatam sutam svāhā iti sā eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ

original: (PB 9.9.9) prajāpataye svāhety abhakṣaṇīyasya juhuyād uttarārdhyapūrvārdhya uparavaḥ
analyzed: prajāpataye svāhā iti a bhakṣaṇīyasya juhuyāt uttarārdhya pūrvārdhyaḥ uparavaḥ

original: (PB 9.9.10) indur indum avāgād ity avavṛṣṭasya bhakṣayet
analyzed: induḥ indum avāgāt iti avavṛṣṭasya bhakṣayet

original: (PB 9.9.11) tasya ta indrav indrapītasyendriyāvatas sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
analyzed: tasya te indra indra pītasya indriyāvataḥ sarva gaṇasya sarva gaṇaḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: (PB 9.9.12) hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgra ity ājyenābhyupākṛtasya juhuyād agnīdhraṃ
analyzed: hiraṇya garbhaḥ samavartata agre iti ājyena abhyupākṛtasya juhuyāt agnīdhram

original: paretya bhūtānāṃ jātaḥ patir eka āsīt sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ tasmai ta indo
analyzed: paretya bhūtānām jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt sa dādhāra pṛthivīm dyām uta imām tasmai te indo

original: haviṣā vidhema svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
analyzed: haviṣā vidhema svāhā iti sā eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ

original: (PB 9.9.13) yadi grāvāpi śīryate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai grāvāṇo dyutānasya mārutasya sāmnā stuyuḥ
analyzed: yadi grāvā api śīryate paśubhiḥ yajamānaḥ vyṛdhyate paśavaḥ vai grāvāṇaḥ dyutānasya mārutasya sāmnā stuyuḥ

original: (PB 9.9.14) mārutā vai grāvāṇaḥ svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
analyzed: mārutāḥ vai grāvāṇaḥ svena eva enān tat rūpeṇa samardhayati

original: (PB 9.9.15) yadi somam abhidahed grahān adhvaryuḥ spāśayeta stotrāṇy udgātā śastrāṇi
analyzed: yadi somam abhidahet grahān adhvaryuḥ spāśayeta stotrāṇi udgātā śastrāṇi

original: hotātha yathāpūrvaṃ yajñena careyuḥ pañca dakṣiṇā deyāḥ pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas
analyzed: hotā atha yathāpūrvam yajñena careyuḥ pañca dakṣiṇāḥ deyāḥ pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ yāvān yajñaḥ

original: tam ārabhate 'vabhṛthād udetya punar dīkṣate tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt purā
analyzed: tam ārabhate avabhṛthāt udetya punar dīkṣate tatra tat dadyāt yat dāsyam syāt purā

original: dvādaśyā dīkṣeta yad dvādaśīm atinayed antardhīyeta
analyzed: dvādaśyā dīkṣeta yat dvādaśīm atinayet antardhīyeta

original: (PB 9.10.1) yadi mahāvīro bhidyeta taṃ bhinnam abhimṛśed ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ /
analyzed: yadi mahāvīraḥ bhidyeta tam bhinnam abhimṛśet yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaḥ ātṛdaḥ

original: saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ mā bhema niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva /
analyzed: saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasuḥ niṣkartā vihrutam punar mā bhema niṣṭyāḥ iva indra tvat araṇāḥ iva

original: vanāni na prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi /
analyzed: vanāni na prajahitāni adrivas duroṣāsaḥ amanmahi

original: amanmahīd anāśavo 'nugrābhaś ca vṛtrahan /
analyzed: amanmahi id anāśavaḥ anugrābhaḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: sakṛt sute mahatā śūra rādhasānu stomaṃ mademahīti mahāvīraṃ bhinnam abhimṛśet saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
analyzed: sakṛt sute mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mademahi iti mahāvīram bhinnam abhimṛśet sā eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ

original: (PB 9.10.2) asuryaṃ vā etasmād varṇaṃ kṛtvā teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ prajāḥ paśavo 'pakrāmanti yasya yūpo virohati sa īśvaraḥ pāpīyān
analyzed: asuryam vai etasmāt varṇam kṛtvā tejaḥ indriyam vīryam annādyam prajāḥ paśavaḥ apakrāmanti yasya yūpaḥ virohati saḥ īśvaraḥ pāpīyān

original: (PB 9.10.3) tvāṣṭraṃ paśuṃ bahurūpam ālabheta tvaṣṭā vai paśūnāṃ rūpāṇāṃ vikartā
analyzed: tvāṣṭram paśum bahu rūpam ālabheta tvaṣṭā vai paśūnām rūpāṇām vikartā

original: tam eva tad upadhāvati sa enaṃ tejaseindriyeṇa vīryeṇānnādyena prajayā paśubhiḥ punas
analyzed: tam eva tat upadhāvati saḥ enam tejasā indriyeṇa vīryeṇa annādyena prajayā paśubhiḥ punar

original: samardhayati saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
analyzed: samardhayati sā eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ

original: (PB 10.1.1) agninā pṛthivyauṣadhibhis tenāyaṃ lokas trivṛd vāyunāntarikṣeṇa vayobhis
analyzed: agninā pṛthivyā oṣadhibhiḥ tena ayam lokaḥ trivṛt vāyunā antarikṣeṇa vayobhiḥ

original: tenaiṣa lokās trivṛd yo 'yam antar ādityena divā nakṣatrais tenāsau lokas trivṛd
analyzed: tena eṣa lokāḥ trivṛt yaḥ ayam antar ādityena divā nakṣatraiḥ tena asau lokaḥ trivṛt

original: etad eva trivṛta āyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: etat eva trivṛtaḥ āyatanam eṣā asya bandhu tā

original: (PB 10.1.2) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.3) tam u pratiṣṭhetyāhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: tam u pratiṣṭhā iti āhuḥ trivṛt hi eva eṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: (PB 10.1.4) ardhamāsa eva pañcadaśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: ardha māsaḥ eva pañcadaśasya āyatanam eṣā asya bandhu tā

original: (PB 10.1.5) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.6) taṃ caujo balam ity āhur ardhamāsaśo hi prajāḥ paśava ojo balaṃ puṣyanti
analyzed: tam ca ojaḥ balam iti āhuḥ ardhamāsaśas hi prajāḥ paśavaḥ ojaḥ balam puṣyanti

original: (PB 10.1.7) saṃvatsara eva saptadaśasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcadartava etad eva saptadaśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ eva saptadaśasya āyatanam dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcadaśa ṛtavaḥ etat eva saptadaśasya āyatanam eṣā asya bandhutā

original: (PB 10.1.8) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.9) tam u prajāpatir ity āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ hi prajāḥ paśavo 'nuprajāyante
analyzed: tam u prajāpatiḥ iti āhuḥ saṃvatsaram hi prajāḥ paśavaḥ anuprajāyante

original: (PB 10.1.10) āditya evaikaviṃsasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcavartas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśa etad evaikaviṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: ādityaḥ eva ekaviṃsasya āyatanam dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca vartaḥ trayaḥ ime lokāḥ asau ādityaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ etat eva ekaviṃśasya āyatanam eṣā asya bandhutā

original: (PB 10.1.11) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.12) tam u devatalpa ity āhuḥ pra devatalpam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: tam u deva talpe iti āhuḥ pra deva talpam āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.13) trivṛd eva triṇavasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: trivṛt eva triṇavasya āyatanam eṣā asya bandhu tā

original: (PB 10.1.14) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.15) tam u puṣṭir ity āhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣa puṣṭaḥ
analyzed: tam u puṣṭiḥ iti āhuḥ trivṛt hi eva eṣa puṣṭaḥ

original: (PB 10.1.16) devatā eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanaṃ trayastriṃśad devatāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśa etad eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
analyzed: devatāḥ eva trayastriṃśasya āyatanam trayastriṃśat devatāḥ prajāpatiḥ catustriṃśaḥ etat eva trayastriṃśasya āyatanam eṣā asya bandhutā

original: (PB 10.1.17) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.18) tam u nāka ity āhur na hi prajāpatiḥ kasmai canākam
analyzed: tam u nākaḥ iti āhuḥ na hi prajāpatiḥ kasmai ca nākam

original: (PB 10.1.19) chandāṃsy eva chandomānām āyatanam eṣaiṣāṃ bandhutā
analyzed: chandāṃsi eva chandomānām āyatanam eṣā eṣām bandhutā

original: (PB 10.1.20) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.1.21) tān u puṣṭir ity āhuḥ paśavo hi chandomāḥ
analyzed: tān u puṣṭiḥ iti āhuḥ paśavaḥ hi chandomāḥ

original: (PB 10.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'tāmyat tasmai vāj jyotir udagṛhṇāt so 'bravīt
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata saḥ atāmyat tasmai vāc jyotiḥ udagṛhṇāt saḥ abravīt

original: ko me 'yaṃ jyotir udagṛhṇād iti svaiva te vāg ity abravīt tām abravīd virājaṃ tvā
analyzed: kaḥ me ayam jyotiḥ udagṛhṇāt iti svā eva te vāc iti abravīt tām abravīt virājam tvā

original: cchandasāṃ jyotiṣkṛtvā yajāntā iti
analyzed: chandasām jyotiṣkṛtvā yajāntau iti

original: (PB 10.2.2) tasmād yo virājaṃ stomaṃ saṃpadyate taṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭoma ity ācakṣate virāḍ ḍhi chandasāṃ jyotiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ virājam stomam saṃpadyate tam jyotiṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ iti ācakṣate virāj hi chandasām jyotiḥ

original: (PB 10.2.3) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: jyotiḥ samānānām bhavati yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.2.4) anuṣṭup ca vai saptadaśaś ca samabhavatāṃ sānuṣṭup caturuttarāṇi chandāṃsy asṛjata ṣaḍuttarān stomān saptadaśas tāv etān madhyataḥ
analyzed: anuṣṭubh ca vai saptadaśaḥ ca samabhavatām sā anuṣṭubh catur uttarāṇi chandāṃsi asṛjata ṣaṣ uttarān stomān saptadaśaḥ tau etān madhyatas

original: (PB 10.2.5) trivṛc ca triṇavaś ca rāthantarau tāv ajaś cāśvaś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau rāthantaraṃ prācīnaṃ pradhūnutaḥ
analyzed: trivṛt ca triṇavaḥ ca rāthantarau tau ajaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca anvasṛjyetām tasmāt tau rāthantaram prācīnam pradhūnutaḥ

original: (PB 10.2.6) pañcadaśaś caikaviṃśaś ca bārhatau tau gauś cāviś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau bārhataṃ prācīnaṃ bhāskurutaḥ
analyzed: pañcadaśaḥ ca ekaviṃśaḥ ca bārhatau tau gauḥ ca aviḥ ca anvasṛjyetām tasmāt tau bārhatam prācīnam bhāskurutaḥ

original: (PB 10.2.7) evaṃ vai vidvāṃsam āhur api grāmyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ vāca ājānāti
analyzed: evam vai vidvāṃsam āhuḥ api grāmyāṇām paśūnām vācaḥ ājānāti

original: (PB 10.3.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa ātmann ṛtvyam apaśyat tata
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahu syām prajāyeya iti saḥ ātman ṛtvyam apaśyat tata

original: ṛtvijo 'sṛjata yad ṛtvyād asṛjata tad ṛtvijām ṛtviktvaṃ tair etaṃ dvādaśāham upāsīdat so 'rādhnot
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ asṛjata yat ṛtvyāt asṛjata tat ṛtvijām ṛtvij tvam taiḥ etam dvādaśa aham upāsīdat saḥ arādhnot

original: (PB 10.3.2) pitā no 'rātsīd iti māsā upāsīdaṃs te dīkṣayaivārādhnuvann upasatsu trayodaśam
analyzed: pitā naḥ arātsīt iti māsāḥ upāsīdan te dīkṣayā eva arādhnuvan upasatsu trayodaśam

original: adīkṣayan so ' nuvyam abhavat tasmād upasatsu didīkṣāṇo 'nuvyaṃ bhavaty eva ca hi
analyzed: adīkṣayan saḥ a nuvyam abhavat tasmāt upasatsu didīkṣāṇaḥ anuvyam bhavati eva ca hi

original: trayodaśaṃ māsaṃ cakṣate naiva ca
analyzed: trayodaśam māsam cakṣate na eva ca

original: (PB 10.3.3) eko dīkṣetaiko hi prajāpatir arādhnod dvādaśa dīkṣeran dvādaśa hi māsā arādhnuvaṃś caturviṃśatir dīkṣeraṃś caturviṃśatir hy ardhamāsā
analyzed: ekaḥ dīkṣeta ekaḥ hi prajāpatiḥ arādhnot dvādaśa dīkṣeran dvādaśa hi māsāḥ arādhnuvan caturviṃśatiḥ dīkṣeran caturviṃśatiḥ hi ardha māsāḥ

original: (PB 10.3.4) yadi pañcadaśo dīkṣeteme pañceme pañceme pañceme pañceme catvāro 'sāv eka iti nirdiśeyur yasmā arāddhikāmāḥ syus tam evārāddhir  #
analyzed: yadi pañcadaśaḥ dīkṣeta ime pañca ime pañca ime pañca ime pañca ime catvāraḥ asau ekaḥ iti nirdiśeyuḥ yasmai arāddhi kāmāḥ syuḥ tam eva arāddhiḥ

original: anveti sarva itare rādhnuvanti
analyzed: anveti sarve itare rādhnuvanti

original: (PB 10.3.5) yo vai devānāṃ gṛhapatiṃ vedāśnute gārhapataṃ pra gārhapatam āpnoti
analyzed: yaḥ vai devānām gṛhapatim veda aśnute gārhapatam pra gārhapatam āpnoti

original: (PB 10.3.6) saṃvatsaro vai devānāṃ gṛhapatiḥ sa eva prajāpatis tasya māsā eva saha dīkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ vai devānām gṛhapatiḥ saḥ eva prajāpatiḥ tasya māsāḥ eva saha dīkṣiṇaḥ

original: (PB 10.3.7) vindate saha dīkṣiṇo 'śnute gārhapatyaṃ pra gārhapatyaṃ āpnoti ya evaṃv veda /
analyzed: vindate saha dīkṣiṇaḥ aśnute gārhapatyam pra gārhapatyam āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.3.8) yo vai chandasāṃ svarājaṃ vedāśnute svārājyaṃ pra svārājyaṃ āpnoti bṛhatī vāva chandasāṃ svarāḍ aśnute svārājyaṃ pra svārājyaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ vai chandasām svarājam veda aśnute svārājyam pra svārājyam āpnoti bṛhatī vāva chandasām svarāj aśnute svārājyam pra svārājyam

original: āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: āpnoti yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.3.9) tām etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ dvādaśa dīkṣā svādaśopasado dvādaśa prasutaḥ ṣaṭriṃśad etā rātrayo bhavanti  #
analyzed: tām etām annādyāya vyāvṛjya āsate yat etam dvādaśa aham dvādaśa dīkṣā svādaśa upasadaḥ dvādaśa prasutaḥ ṣaṭriṃśat etāḥ rātrayaḥ bhavanti  /

original: ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣarā bṛhatī

original: (PB 10.3.10) jāyate vāva dīkṣayā punīta upasadbhir devalokam eva sutyayāpyeti
analyzed: jāyate vāva dīkṣayā punīte upasadbhiḥ deva lokam eva sutyayā apyeti

original: (PB 10.3.11) etāvad vāva saṃvatsara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ yad etā rātrayo dvādaśa pūṛnamāsyo
analyzed: etāvat vāva saṃvatsare indriyam vīryam yat etāḥ rātrayaḥ dvādaśa pūṛ namāsyaḥ

original: dvādaśaikaṣṭakā dvādaśāmāvāsyā yāvad eva saṃvatsara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ tad etenāptvāvarundhe dvādaśāhena
analyzed: dvādaśa aikaṣṭakāḥ dvādaśa amāvāsyāḥ yāvat eva saṃvatsare indriyam vīryam tat etena āptvā avarundhe dvādaśa ahena

original: (PB 10.3.12) triṃśadakṣarā vā eṣā virāḍ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva virājā pratitiṣṭhaty ṛtubhir virāji
analyzed: triṃśat akṣarā vai eṣā virāj ṣaṭ ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva virājā pratitiṣṭhati ṛtubhiḥ virāji

original: (PB 10.3.13) dvātriṃśadakṣarā vā eṣānuṣṭub vāg anuṣṭup catuṣpādaḥ paśavo vācā paśūn dādhāra tasmād vācā siddhā vācāhūtā āyanti tasmād u nāma
analyzed: dvātriṃśat akṣarā vai eṣā anuṣṭubh vāc anuṣṭubh catuṣpādaḥ paśavaḥ vācā paśūn dādhāra tasmāt vācā siddhāḥ vācā āhūtāḥ āyanti tasmāt u nāma

original: (PB 10.4.1) bhūtaṃ pūrvo 'tirātro bhaviṣyad uttaraḥ pṛthivī pūrvo 'tirātro dyaur uttaro 'gniḥ pūrvo 'tirātra āditya uttaraḥ prāṇaḥ pūrvo 'tirātra  #
analyzed: bhūtam pūrvaḥ atirātraḥ bhaviṣyat uttaraḥ pṛthivī pūrvaḥ atirātraḥ dyauḥ uttaraḥ agniḥ pūrvaḥ atirātraḥ ādityaḥ uttaraḥ prāṇaḥ pūrva atirātra

original: udāna uttaraḥ
analyzed: udānaḥ uttaraḥ

original: (PB 10.4.2) cakṣuṣī atirātrau kanīnike agniṣṭomau yasmād antarā agniṣṭomāv atirātrābhyāṃ tasmād antare satyau kanīnike bhuṅktaḥ
analyzed: cakṣuṣī atirātrau kanīnike agniṣṭomau yasmāt antarā agniṣṭomau atirātrābhyām tasmāt antare satyau kanīnike bhuṅktaḥ

original: (PB 10.4.3) saṃvatsarasya vā etau daṃṣṭrau yad atirātrau tayor na svaptavyaṃ saṃvatsarasya daṃṣṭrayor ātmānaṃ ned apidadhānīti
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya vai etau daṃṣṭrau yat atirātrau tayoḥ na svaptavyam saṃvatsarasya daṃṣṭrayoḥ ātmānam na id apidadhāni iti

original: (PB 10.4.4) tad āhuḥ ko 'svaptum arhati yad vāva prāṇo +jāgāra tad eva jāgaritam iti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ kaḥ a svaptum arhati yat vāva prāṇaḥ jāgāra tat eva jāgaritam iti

original: (PB 10.4.5) gāyatrīṃ vā etāṃ jyotiḥpakṣām āsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham aṣṭau madhya ukthā agniṣṭomāv abhito māsā svargṃ lokam etyājarasaṃ brahmādyam  #
analyzed: gāyatrīm vai etām jyotiḥ pakṣām āsate yat etam dvādaśa aham aṣṭau madhye ukthāḥ agniṣṭomau abhitas māsā svargam lokam eti ājarasam brahma adyam  /

original: annam atti dīpyamānaḥ
analyzed: annam atti dīpyamānaḥ

original: (PB 10.4.6) triṣpurastād rathantaraṃ upayanti tryāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ tanvate
analyzed: tris purastāt rathantaram upayanti tri āvṛt vai vāc sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyam dvādaśa aham tanvate

original: (PB 10.4.7) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yat triṣpurastād rathantaram upayantīti saubharam ukthānāṃ brahmasāma bhavati tenaiva tad ajāmi
analyzed: jāmi vai etat yajñe kriyate iti āhuḥ yat tris purastāt rathantaram upayanti iti saubharam ukthānām brahma sāma bhavati tena eva tat ajāmi

original: (PB 10.4.8) pratnavatyaḥ prāyaṇīyasyāhnaḥ pratipado bhavanti teno eva tad ajāmi
analyzed: pratnavatyaḥ prāyaṇīyasya ahnaḥ pratipadaḥ bhavanti tena u eva tat ajāmi

original: (PB 10.4.9) trir vevopariṣṭād rathantaram upayanti trāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhād uttiṣṭhanti
analyzed: tris u eva upariṣṭāt rathantaram upayanti trāvṛt vai vāc sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyam dvādaśa ahāt uttiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 10.5.1) trayo vā ete trirātrā yad eṣa dvādaśāho gāytramukhaḥ prathamo gāyatramadhyo dvitīyo gāyatrottamas tṛtīyaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ vai ete trirātrāḥ yat eṣa dvādaśa ahaḥ gāyatra mukhaḥ prathamaḥ gāyatra madhyaḥ dvitīyaḥ gāyatra uttamaḥ tṛtīyaḥ

original: (PB 10.5.2) yasmād gāyatramukhaḥ prathamas tasmād ūrdhvo 'gnir dīdāya yasmād gāyatramadhyo dvitīyas tasmāt tiryaṅ vāyuḥ pavate
analyzed: yasmāt gāyatra mukhaḥ prathamaḥ tasmāt ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ dīdāya yasmāt gāyatra madhyaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasmāt tiryaṅ vāyuḥ pavate

original: (PB 10.5.5) tejasā vā ete prayanti tejo madhye dadhati tejo 'bhyudyanti jyotiṣā vā
analyzed: tejasā vai ete prayanti tejaḥ madhye dadhati tejaḥ abhyudyanti jyotiṣā vā

original: ete prayanti jyotir madhye dadhati jyotir abhyudyanti cakṣuṣā vā ete prayanti cakṣur
analyzed: ete prayanti jyotiḥ madhye dadhati jyotiḥ abhyudyanti cakṣuṣā vai ete prayanti cakṣuḥ

original: madhye dadhati cakṣur abhyudyanti prāṇena vā ete prayanti prāṇaṃ madhye dadhati prāṇam
analyzed: madhye dadhati cakṣuḥ abhyudyanti prāṇena vai ete prayanti prāṇam madhye dadhati prāṇam

original: abhyudyanti ye gāyatryā prayanti gāyatrīṃ madhye dadhati gāyatrim abhyudyanti
analyzed: abhyudyanti ye gāyatryā prayanti gāyatrīm madhye dadhati gāyatrim abhyudyanti

original: (PB 10.5.6) tantraṃ vā etad vitāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tasyetair (?)
analyzed: tantram vai etat vitāyate yat eṣa dvādaśa ahaḥ tasya itaiḥ

original: mayūkhā yad gāyatry asaṃvyāthāya
analyzed: mayūkhāḥ yat gāyatrī a saṃvyāthāya

original: (PB 10.5.7) girikṣidauccāmanyaveti hovācābhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ kathaṃ dvādaśāha iti
analyzed: girikṣit auccāmanyava iti ha uvāca abhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ katham dvādaśa ahaḥ iti

original: yathārān nemiḥ paryety evam enaṃ gāyatrī paryeti avisraṃsāya yathārā nābhau dhṛtā
analyzed: yathā arāt nemiḥ paryeti evam enam gāyatrī paryeti a visraṃsāya yathā ārā nābhau dhṛtā

original: evam asyāṃ dvādaśāho dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: evam asyām dvādaśa ahaḥ dhṛtaḥ

original: (PB 10.5.8) anuṣṭubhaṃ vā etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham
analyzed: anuṣṭubham vai etām annādyāya vyāvṛjya āsate yat etam dvādaśa aham

original: (PB 10.5.9) aṣṭābhir vā akṣair anuṣṭup prathamaṃ dvādaśāhasyāhar duyacchaty ekādaśabhir dvitīyaṃ dvādaśābhis tṛtīyam
analyzed: aṣṭābhiḥ vai akṣaiḥ anuṣṭubh prathamam dvādaśa ahasya ahar duyacchati ekādaśabhiḥ dvitīyam dvādaśābhiḥ tṛtīyam

original: (PB 10.5.10) akṣaraṃ tryakṣaram ucchiṣyate tad evottaraṃ trirātram anuvidadhāti
analyzed: akṣaram tri akṣaram ucchiṣyate tat eva uttaram tri rātram anuvidadhāti

original: (PB 10.5.11) chandāṃsy evāsyās tṛtīyaṃ trirātraṃ vahanti
analyzed: chandāṃsi eva asyāḥ tṛtīyam trirātram vahanti

original: (PB 10.5.12) tāṃ vā etāṃ pratīcīṃ tiraścīṃ parācīm āsate 'nnādyāya tasmāt pratyañcaṃ tiryañcaṃ parāñcaṃ prajāḥ paśum upajīvanti
analyzed: tām vai etām pratīcīm tiraścīm parācīm āsate annādyāya tasmāt pratyañcam tiryañcam parāñcam prajāḥ paśum upajīvanti

original: (PB 10.5.13) chandāṃsi vā anyo'nyasya lokam abhadhyāyan gāyatrī triṣṭubhas triṣṭub
analyzed: chandāṃsi vai anyaḥ anyasya lokam abhadhyāyan gāyatrī triṣṭubhaḥ triṣṭubh

original: jagatyā jagatī gāyatryās tāni vyauhan yathālokaṃ tato vai tāni yaṃ-yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta tam asanvan
analyzed: jagatyāḥ jagatī gāyatryāḥ tāni vyauhan yathālokam tatas vai tāni yam yam kāmam akāmayanta tam asanvan

original: (PB 10.5.14) yatkāmo vyūḍhacchandasā dvadaśāhena yajate so 'smai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
analyzed: yad kāmaḥ vyūḍha chandasā dvadaśa ahena yajate saḥ asmai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate

original: (PB 10.5.15) oko vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho yatho vai manuṣyā imaṃ lokam āviṣṭā evaṃ devatā dvādaśāham āviṣṭā devatā ha vā etena yajate ya evaṃv  #
analyzed: okaḥ vai devānām dvādaśa ahaḥ yathā u vai manuṣyāḥ imam lokam āviṣṭāḥ evam devatāḥ dvādaśa aham āviṣṭāḥ devatāḥ ha vai etena yajate yaḥ evam

original: vidvān dvādaśāhena yajate
analyzed: vidvān dvādaśa ahena yajate

original: (PB 10.5.16) gṛhā vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho nāgṛhatāyā bhayyam
analyzed: gṛhāḥ vai devānām dvādaśa ahaḥ na a gṛha tāyāḥ bhayyam

original: (PB 10.5.17) yo vai dvādaśāham agniṣṭomena kalpamānaṃ veda kalpate 'smai prātaḥsavanenaiva
analyzed: yaḥ vai dvādaśa aham agniṣṭomena kalpamānam veda kalpate asmai prātaḥsavanena eva

original: prathamas trirātraḥ kalpate mādhyandinena dvitīyas tṛtīyasavanena tṛtīyo 'gniṣṭomasāmnaiva
analyzed: prathamaḥ trirātraḥ kalpate mādhyandinena dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyasavanena tṛtīyaḥ agniṣṭoma sāmnā eva

original: daśamam ahaḥ kalpate
analyzed: daśamam ahar kalpate

original: (PB 10.5.18) kalpate 'smai ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: kalpate asmai yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.6.1) eti prety āśumad vītimad rukmat tejasvad yuñjānaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpaṃ trivṛtaḥ stomasya gāyatrasya chandaso rathantarasya sāmnaḥ
analyzed: ā iti pra iti āśumat vītimat rukmat tejasvat yuñjānam prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam trivṛtaḥ stomasya gāyatrasya chandasaḥ rathantarasya sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.2) vṛṣavad vṛtravad rayimad viśvavad upasthitaṃ dvitīyasyāhno rūpaṃ pañcadaśasya stomasya traiṣṭubhasya chandaso bṛhataḥ sāmnaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣavat vṛtravat rayimat viśvavat upasthitam dvitīyasya ahnaḥ rūpam pañcadaśasya stomasya traiṣṭubhasya chandasaḥ bṛhataḥ sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.3) udvat trivad digvat gomaṭ ṭaṣabhavat tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ saptadaśasya stomasya jāgatasya chandaso vairūpasya sāmnaḥ
analyzed: udvat trivat digvat gomat ṭaṣabhavat tṛtīyasya ahnaḥ rūpam saptadaśasya stomasya jāgatasya chandasaḥ vairūpasya sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.4) rājanvaj janavadvat sūryavad virāḍanutodavac caturthasyāhno rūpam ekaviṃśasya stomasyānuṣṭubhasya chandaso (?)
analyzed: rājanvat janavadvat sūryavat virāj anutodavat caturthasya ahnaḥ rūpam ekaviṃśasya stomasya ānuṣṭubhasya chandasaḥ

original: rājasya vai sāmnaḥ
analyzed: rājasya vai sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.5) citravac chiśumat paṅktiḥ śakvarī dyūnākṣarā gomad ṛṣabhavad vajryabhimat pañcamasyāhno rūpaṃ triṇavasya stomasya pāṅktena chandaso  #
analyzed: citravat śiśumat paṅktiḥ śakvarī dyūna akṣarā gomat ṛṣabhavat vajri abhimat pañcamasya ahnaḥ rūpam triṇavasya stomasya pāṅktena chandasā

original: śakvarīṇāṃ sāmnaḥ
analyzed: śakvarīṇām sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.6) parivat prativat saptapadā dvipadā vinārāśaṃsā gomad ṛṣabhavat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ trayastriṃśasya stomasya sarveṣāṃ chandasāṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: parivat prativat sapta padā dvi padā vinārāśaṃsā gomat ṛṣabhavat ṣaṣṭhasya ahnaḥ rūpam trayastriṃśasya stomasya sarveṣām chandasām rūpam

original: revatīnāṃ sāmnaḥ
analyzed: revatīnām sāmnaḥ

original: (PB 10.6.7) yasmād eṣā samānā satī ṣaḍahavibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād virūpaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ
analyzed: yasmāt eṣā samānā satī ṣaṣ aha vibhaktiḥ nānā rūpā tasmāt virūpaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ

original: (PB 10.6.8) virūpam enam anuprajāyate ya evaṃv veda
analyzed: virūpam enam anuprajāyate yaḥ evaṃv veda

original: (PB 10.7.1) agna iti prathamasyāhno rūpam agnivibhakter agnim iti dvitīyasyāgnineti tṛtīyasyāgnir iti caturthasya
analyzed: agne iti prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam agni vibhakteḥ agnim iti dvitīyasya agninā iti tṛtīyasya agniḥ iti caturthasya

original: (PB 10.7.2) devā vai śriyam aicchaṃs tān na prathame 'hany avindan na dvitīye na
analyzed: devāḥ vai śriyam aicchan tān na prathame ahani avindat na dvitīye na

original: tṛtīye tāñ caturthe 'hany avindan vindate śriyaṃ ya evaṃ vedāgner iti pañcamasya
analyzed: tṛtīye tām caturthe ahani avindan vindate śriyam yaḥ evam veda agneḥ iti pañcamasya

original: teno śrīḥ pratyupoditety āhuḥ
analyzed: tena u śrīḥ pratyupoditā iti āhuḥ

original: (PB 10.7.3) aprativādy enaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: a prativādī enam bhrātṛvyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 10.7.4) agna iti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa prayanti tad abhyudyanti
analyzed: agne iti ṣaṣṭhasya yena eva rūpeṇa prayanti tat abhyudyanti

original: (PB 10.7.5) yasmād eṣā samānā saty agnivbhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv ādityas tapati
analyzed: yasmāt eṣā samānā satī agni bhaktiḥ nānā rūpā tasmāt yathartu ādityaḥ tapati

original: (PB 10.8.1) indreti prathamasyāhno rūpam indravibhakter indram iti dvitīyasyendreṇeti
analyzed: indra iti prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam indra vibhakteḥ indram iti dvitīyasya indreṇa iti

original: tṛtīyasyendra iti caturthasyendrād iti pañcamasyendreti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa
analyzed: tṛtīyasya indraḥ iti caturthasya indrāt iti pañcamasya indra iti ṣaṣṭhasya yena eva rūpeṇa

original: prayanti tad abhyudyanti yasmād eṣā samānā satīndravibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv oṣadhayaḥ pacyante
analyzed: prayanti tat abhyudyanti yasmāt eṣā samānā satī indra vibhaktiḥ nānā rūpā tasmāt yathartu oṣadhayaḥ pacyante

original: (PB 10.9.1) yad ṛcā prastauti tat prathamasyāhno rūpam svaravibhakter yat purastāt
analyzed: yat ṛcā prastauti tat prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam svara vibhakteḥ yat purastāt

original: stobhaṃ tad dvitīyasya yad ubhayataḥ stobhaṃ tat tṛtīyasya yad anutunnaṃ tac caturthasya
analyzed: stobham tat dvitīyasya yat ubhayatas stobham tat tṛtīyasya yat anutunnam tat caturthasya

original: yad abhyārabdhaṃ tat pañcamasya yad ihakāreṇābhyastaṃ tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpam
analyzed: yat abhyārabdham tat pañcamasya yat ihakāreṇa abhyastam tat ṣaṣṭhasya ahnaḥ rūpam

original: (PB 10.9.2) svarāṇāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī svaravibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmād yathartu vāyuḥ pavate
analyzed: svarāṇām yasmāt eṣā samānā satī svara vibhaktiḥ n nānā rūpā tasmāt yathartu vāyuḥ pavate

original: (PB 10.10.1) padanidhanaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam nidhanavibhakter bahirṇidhanaṃ dvitīyasya
analyzed: pada nidhanam prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam nidhana vibhakteḥ bahirṇidhanam dvitīyasya

original: niṃnidhanaṃ tṛtīyasyenidhanañ caturthasyāthakāraṇidhanaṃ pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ
analyzed: niṃnidhanam tṛtīyasya inidhanam caturthasya athakāra nidhanam pañcamasya yat iha ākāreṇa abhyastam

original: tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ nidhanānāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī nidhanavibhaktir nnānārūpā
analyzed: tat ṣaṣṭhasya ahnaḥ rūpam nidhanānām yasmāt eṣā samānā satī nidhana vibhaktiḥ n nānā rūpā

original: tasmād ime lokāḥ saha santo nānaiva
analyzed: tasmāt ime lokāḥ saha santaḥ nānā eva

original: (PB 10.11.1) dravadiḍaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam iḍāvibhakter ūrdhveḍaṃ dvitīyasya pariṣṭubdheḍaṃ
analyzed: dravat iḍam prathamasya ahnaḥ rūpam iḍā vibhakteḥ ūrdhva iḍam dvitīyasya pariṣṭubdha iḍam

original: tṛtīyasyeḍābhir aiḍaṃ caturthasyādhyardheḍaṃ pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ tat
analyzed: tṛtīyasya iḍābhiḥ aiḍam caturthasya adhyardha iḍam pañcamasya yat iha ākāreṇa abhyastam tat

original: ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpam iḍānāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satīḍāvibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmāt samānāḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhasya ahnaḥ rūpam iḍānām yasmāt eṣā samānā satī iḍā vibhaktiḥ n nānā rūpā tasmāt samānāḥ

original: santaḥ paśavo nānārūpāḥ
analyzed: santaḥ paśavaḥ nānā rūpāḥ

original: (PB 10.12.1) bharadvājāyanā vai sattram āsata tān apṛcchan kiṃ prathamenāhnā kuruteti
analyzed: bharadvājāyanāḥ vai sattram āsata tān apṛcchan kim prathamena ahnā kuruta iti

original: praivaimeti kiṃ dvitīyenety avasam evākurmahīti kiṃ tṛtīyeneti pary evāplavāmahīti
analyzed: pra eva aima iti kim dvitīyena iti avasam eva akurmahi iti kim tṛtīyena iti pari eva aplavāmahi iti

original: kiṃ caturtheneti sataiva sad apyadadhmeti kiṃ pañcameneti prāṇān eva vicchindanta
analyzed: kim caturthena iti satā eva sat apyadadhma iti kim pañcamena iti prāṇān eva vicchindanta

original: aimeti kiṃ ṣaṣṭhenetīdam evāgacchāmeti iti
analyzed: aima iti kim ṣaṣṭhena iti idam eva āgacchāma iti iti

original: (PB 10.12.2) yasya padena prastauty atha svāram abhi vāva tena devāḥ paśūn apaśyan
analyzed: yasya padena prastauti atha svāram abhi vāva tena devāḥ paśūn apaśyan

original: yat purastāt stobhaṃ atha svāram ud eva tenāsṛjanata yad ubhayataḥ stobham atha svāram
analyzed: yat purastāt stobham atha svāram ud eva tena asṛjanata yat ubhayatas stobham atha svāram

original: ebhya eva tena lokebhyo devāḥ paśubhyo 'nnādyaṃ prāyacchan yad anutunnam atha svāram
analyzed: ebhyaḥ eva tena lokebhyaḥ devāḥ paśubhyaḥ annādyam prāyacchan yat anutunnam atha svāram

original: upaiva tenāśikṣan yasya madhye nidhanam atha svāraṃ garbhāṃs tenādadhata tāni havatāsvāreṇa prājanayan

analyzed: yajñāyajñīyam bhavati

original: (PB 11.5.28) vāg yajñāyajñīyaṃ vāci yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhito vācy eva tad yajñam antataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti taṃ vāco 'dhi śva ārabhante
analyzed: vāc yajñāyajñīyam vāci yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ vāci eva tat yajñam antatas pratiṣṭhāpayanti tam vācaḥ adhi śvas ārabhante

original: (PB 11.5.29) trivṛd eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
analyzed: trivṛt eva stomaḥ bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya

original: (PB 11.6.1) pratipad bhavati
analyzed: pratipad bhavati

original: (PB 11.6.2) samārabhate dvirātrasyāvrisraṃsāya
analyzed: samārabhate dvirātrasya a vrisraṃsāya

original: (PB 11.6.3) pavasvendo vṛṣāsuta ity anurūpyo bhavati vṛṣāvad vā eta aindraṃ traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: pavasva indo vṛṣā āsutaḥ iti anurūpyaḥ bhavati vṛṣāvat vai ete aindram traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 11.6.4) pūrvam u tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam
analyzed: pūrvam u tat rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇa anuvadati yat pūrvam rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇa anuvadati tat anurūpasya anurūpa tvam

original: (PB 11.6.5) anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: anurūpaḥ enam putraḥ jāyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 11.6.6) stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ prāṇāpānānām avarudhyai
analyzed: stotrīya anurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ prāṇa apānānām avarudhyai

original: (PB 11.6.7) vṛṣaṇvantas tṛcā bhavatīndriyasya vīryasyāvarudhyai
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvantaḥ tṛcāḥ bhavati indriyasya vīryasya avarudhyai

original: (PB 11.6.8) tṛca uttamo bhavati
analyzed: tṛcaḥ uttamaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 11.6.9) yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
analyzed: yena eva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti

original: (PB 11.6.10) pañdadaśa eva stomo bhavati
analyzed: pañdadaśaḥ eva stomaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 11.6.11) ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhati ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ
analyzed: ojasi eva tat vīrye pratitiṣṭhati ojaḥ vīryam pañcadaśaḥ

original: (PB 11.7.1) ubhābhyāṃ vai rūpābhyāṃ bahiṣpavamānyo yujyante yatsāmā stomo bhavati tad ājyeṣu
analyzed: ubhābhyām vai rūpābhyām bahiṣpavamānyaḥ yujyante yad sāmā stomaḥ bhavati tat ājyeṣu

original: (PB 11.7.2) nirāhopasthitāny ājyāni bhavanti
analyzed: nirāha upasthitāni ājyāni bhavanti

original: (PB 11.7.3) agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmaha indram id gāthino bṛhad indro agnā namo bṛhad iti bārhatam eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati
analyzed: agnim dūtam vṛṇīmahe mitram vayam havāmahe indram id gāthinaḥ bṛhat indraḥ agnā namaḥ bṛhat iti bārhatam eva tat rūpam nirdyotayati

original: (PB 11.8.1) vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai
analyzed: vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā iti gāyatrī bhavati ahnaḥ dhṛtyai

original: (PB 11.8.2) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvatyaḥ triṣṭubhaḥ rūpeṇa traiṣṭubham hi etat ahar

original: (PB 11.8.3) punānas soma dhārayeti dhṛtyai
analyzed: punānaḥ soma dhārayā iti dhṛtyai

original: (PB 11.8.4) vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā iti
analyzed: vṛṣā śoṇaḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ iti

original: (PB 11.8.5) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa samṛddhā vṛṣaṇvad vā etad aindraṃ traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvatyaḥ triṣṭubhaḥ rūpeṇa samṛddhāḥ vṛṣaṇvat vai etat aindram traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 11.8.6) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gāyatram bhavati yat eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 11.8.7) yauktāśvaṃ bhavati
analyzed: yauktāśvam bhavati

original: (PB 11.8.8) yuktāśvo va āṅgirasaḥ śiśū jātau viparyaharat tasmān mantro 'pākrāmat
analyzed: yuktāśvaḥ vaḥ āṅgirasaḥ śiśū jātau viparyaharat tasmāt mantraḥ apākrāmat

original: sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad yauktāśvam apaśyat taṃ mantra upāvartata tad vāva sa tarhy
analyzed: sa tapaḥ atapyata saḥ etat yauktāśvam apaśyat tam mantraḥ upāvartata tat vāva sa tarhi

original: akāmayata kāmasani sama yauktāśvaṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
analyzed: akāmayata kāma sani sama yā aukta aśvam kāmam eva etena avarundhe

original: (PB 11.8.9) āyāsye bhavataḥ
analyzed: āyāsye bhavataḥ

original: (PB 11.8.10) ayāsyo vā āṅgirasa ādityānāṃ dīkṣitānām annādyam āśnāt taṃ śug ārcchat sa tapo 'tapyata sa ete āyāsye apaśyat tābhyāṃ śucam apāhatāpa  #
analyzed: ayāsyaḥ vai āṅgirasaḥ ādityānām dīkṣitānām annādyam āśnāt tam śuc ārcchat sa tapaḥ atapyata saḥ ete āyāsye apaśyat tābhyām śucam apāhata apa   /

original: śucaṃ hata āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: śucam hate āyāsyābhyām tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.8.11) ebhyo vai lokebhyo vṛṣṭir apākrāmat tām ayāsya āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayati vṛṣṭim āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: ebhyaḥ vai lokebhyaḥ vṛṣṭiḥ apākrāmat tām ayāsyaḥ āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayati vṛṣṭim āyāsyābhyām tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.8.12) annādyaṃ vāva tad ebhyo lokebhyo 'pākrāmat tad ayāsya āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayaty annādyam āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: annādyam vāva tat ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ apākrāmat tat ayāsyaḥ āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayati annādyam āyāsyābhyām tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.8.13) vāsiṣṭhaṃ bhavati
analyzed: vāsiṣṭham bhavati

original: (PB 11.8.14) vasiṣṭho vā etena vaiḍavaḥ stutvāñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vai etena vaiḍavaḥ stutvā añjasā svargam lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai svargāt lokāt na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ

original: (PB 11.9.1) tvām id dhi havāmaha iti tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: tvām id hi havāmahe iti tvam iti bṛhantaḥ rūpam bārhatam hi etat ahar

original: (PB 11.9.2) abhipravaḥ surādhasam iti yuñjate vai pūrveṇāhnā hy etena prayanti
analyzed: abhipravaḥ surādhasam iti yuñjate vai pūrveṇa ahnā hi etena prayanti

original: (PB 11.9.3) tvām idā hyo nara ity adya caiva hyaś ca samārabhate dvirātrasyāvisraṃsāya
analyzed: tvām idā hyas naraḥ iti adya ca eva hyas ca samārabhate dvirātrasya a visraṃsāya

original: (PB 11.9.4) bṛhad bhavati varṣma vai bṛhad varṣma dvitīyam ahar varṣmaṇa eva tad varṣmākramante
analyzed: bṛhat bhavati varṣma vai bṛhat varṣma dvitīyam ahar varṣmaṇaḥ eva tat varṣma ākramante

original: (PB 11.9.5) śyetaṃ bhavati sāmnorvāho yajñasya santatyai
analyzed: śyetam bhavati sāmnoḥ vāhaḥ yajñasya santatyai

original: (PB 11.9.6) mādhucchandasaṃ bhavati sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.9.7) ūrdhveḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
analyzed: ūrdhva iḍam tathā hi etasya ahnaḥ rūpam stomaḥ

original: (PB 11.10.1) yas te mado vareṇya iti gāyatrī bhavati
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ vareṇyaḥ iti gāyatrī bhavati

original: (PB 11.10.2) madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: madavat vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanam madam eva tat rasam dadhāti

original: (PB 11.10.3) pavasva madhumattama iti pavanta iva hy etenāhnā madhumattama ity annaṃ vai madhv annādyam eva tad yajamāne dadhāti
analyzed: pavasva madhumattamaḥ iti pavante iva hi etena ahnā madhumattamaḥ iti annam vai madhu annādyam eva tat yajamāne dadhāti

original: (PB 11.10.4) indram accha sutā ima itīndriyasya vīryasyāvarudhyai
analyzed: indram accha sutāḥ ime iti indriyasya vīryasya avarudhyai

original: (PB 11.10.5) ayaṃ pūṣā rayir bhaga iti
analyzed: ayam pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ iti

original: (PB 11.10.6) anuṣṭubhaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: anuṣṭubhaḥ satyaḥ triṣṭubhaḥ rūpeṇa traiṣṭubham hi etat ahar

original: (PB 11.10.7) vṛṣāmatīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇa iti jagatyaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣāmatīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ iti jagatyaḥ satyaḥ triṣṭubhaḥ rūpeṇa traiṣṭubham hi etat ahar

original: (PB 11.10.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gāyatram bhavati yat eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 11.10.9) hāviṣmataṃ bhavati
analyzed: hāviṣmatam bhavati

original: (PB 11.10.10) haviṣmāṃś ca vai haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv āstāṃ dvitīye 'hani haviṣmān arādhnon navame 'hani haviṣkṛt
analyzed: haviṣmān ca vai haviṣkṛt ca āṅgirasau āstām dvitīye ahani haviṣmān arādhnot navame ahani haviṣkṛt

analyzed: ayam haviṣmān iti eva jātam ahar jātam somam prāha devebhyaḥ sāmnā eva asmai āśiṣam āśāste sāma hi satī āśīḥ

analyzed: śaṅku bhavati ahnaḥ dhṛtyai yat vai a dhṛtam śaṅkunā tat dādhāra

analyzed: tat u sīdantīyam id āhuḥ etena vai prajāpatiḥ ūrdhve imān lokān asīdat yat asīdat tat sīdantīyasya sīdantīya tvam ūrdhve imān

original: lokān sīdati sīdantīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: lokān sīdati sīdantīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.10.14) sujñānaṃ bhavati
analyzed: sujñānam bhavati

analyzed: svarvat vai rāthantaram rūpam svarṇa dhanam bārhatam

analyzed: svarṇa dhanam bhavati tathā hi etasya ahnaḥ rūpam

original: (PB 11.10.17) pluvau vā etāv upohante svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
analyzed: pluvau vai etau upohante svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: (PB 11.10.18) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gaurīvitam bhavati yat eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam

analyzed: krauñcam bhavati

analyzed: vāc vai krauñcam vāc dvādaśa ahaḥ vāci eva tat vācā stuvate yajñasya prabhūtyai

analyzed: yāmam bhavati

analyzed: etena vai yamaḥ anapajayyam amuṣya lokasya ādhipatyam āśnuta anapajayyam amuṣya lokasya ādhipatyam aśnute yāmena tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 11.10.23) etena vai yamī yamaṃ svargaṃ lokam agamayat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
analyzed: etena vai yamī yamam svargam lokam agamayat svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai svargāt lokāt na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ

original: (PB 11.11.1) ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi ta ity ehivatyai bhavanti tṛtīyasyāhna upahavāya santatyai
analyzed: ehi u su bravāṇi te iti ehivatyai bhavanti tṛtīyasya ahnaḥ upahavāya santatyai

original: (PB 11.11.2) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yad ukthāni yad eti salomatvāya
analyzed: apacchid iva vai etat yajña kāṇḍam yat ukthāni yat ā iti saloma tvāya

original: (PB 11.11.3) evāhy asi vīrayur iti samānaṃ vadantīdam ittham asad iti
analyzed: eva ahi asi vīrayuḥ iti samānam vadanti idam ittham asat iti

original: (PB 11.11.4) indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann ity avardhanta hy etarhi yajamānam evaitayā vardhanti
analyzed: indram viśvāḥ avīvṛdhan iti avardhanta hi etarhi yajamānam eva etayā vardhanti

original: (PB 11.11.5) sākam aśvaṃ bhavaty ukthānām abhijityā abhikrāntyai
analyzed: sākam aśvam bhavati ukthānām abhijityai abhikrāntyai

original: (PB 11.11.6) etena hy agra ukthāny adhyajayann etenābhyakrāman
analyzed: etena hi agre ukthāni adhyajayan etena abhyakrāman

original: (PB 11.11.7) āmahīyavaṃ bhavati kḷptiś cānnādyañ ca samānaṃ vadantīṣu kriyata idam ittham asad iti
analyzed: āmahīyavam bhavati kḷptiḥ ca annādyam ca samānam vadantīṣu kriyate idam ittham asat iti

original: (PB 11.11.8) kṣatraṃ vā etad ahar abhinirvadati yat pañcadaśaṃ yad gāyatrīṣu brahmasāma
analyzed: kṣatram vai etat ahar abhinirvadati yat pañcadaśam yat gāyatrīṣu brahma sāma

original: bhavati brahma caiva tat kṣatrañ ca sayujī karoti brahmaiva kṣatrasya purastān nidadhati
analyzed: bhavati brahma ca eva tat kṣatram ca sayujī karoti brahma eva kṣatrasya purastāt nidadhati

original: brahmaṇe kṣatrañ ca viśañ cānuge karoti
analyzed: brahmaṇe kṣatram ca viśam ca anuge karoti

original: (PB 11.11.9) brahma vai pūrvam ahaḥ kṣatraṃ dvitīyaṃ yad gāyatrīṣu brahma sāma bhavati brahma tad yaśasārdhayati brahma hi gāyatrī
analyzed: brahma vai pūrvam ahar kṣatram dvitīyam yat gāyatrīṣu brahma sāma bhavati brahma tat yaśasā ardhayati brahma hi gāyatrī

original: (PB 11.11.10) tad u samānaṃ vadantīṣu kriyate samṛddhyai
analyzed: tat u samānam vadantīṣu kriyate samṛddhyai

original: (PB 11.11.11) āṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavataḥ
analyzed: āṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavataḥ

original: (PB 11.11.12) aiyāhā iti vā indro vṛtram ahann aiyādohoveti nyagṛhṇād vārtraghne sāmanī vīryavatī
analyzed: iti vai indraḥ vṛtram ahan nyagṛhṇāt vārtraghne sāmanī vīryavatī

original: (PB 11.11.13) ojo evaitābhyāṃ vīryam avarundhe
analyzed: ojaḥ eva etābhyām vīryam avarundhe

original: (PB 11.11.14) pañcadaśa eva stomo bhavaty ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhaty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ
analyzed: pañcadaśaḥ eva stomaḥ bhavati ojasi eva tat vīrye pratitiṣṭhati ojaḥ vīryam pañcadaśaḥ

original: (PB 12.1.1) davidyutaty āruceti tṛtīyasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati
analyzed: davidyutati ārucā iti tṛtīyasya ahnaḥ pratipad bhavati

original: (PB 12.1.2) davidyutatī vai gāyatrī pariṣṭobhantī triṣṭub gavāśīr jagatī trīṇi rūpāṇi samārabhate trirātrasyāvisraṃsāya
analyzed: davidyutatī vai gāyatrī pariṣṭobhantī triṣṭubh gavāśīḥ jagatī trīṇi rūpāṇi samārabhate trirātrasya a visraṃsāya

original: (PB 12.1.3) ete asṛgram indava ity anurūpo bhavati
analyzed: ete asṛgram indavaḥ iti anurūpaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 12.1.4) eta iti vai prajāpatir devān asṛjatāsṛgram iti manuṣyān indava iti pit.ṛṃs tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: ete iti vai prajāpatiḥ devān asṛjata asṛgram iti manuṣyān indavaḥ iti pitṛn tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.1.5) pūrvam u caiva tad repam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam apareṇa rūpaṇo 'nuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam anurūpa enaṃ  #
analyzed: pūrvam u ca eva tat repam apareṇa rūpeṇa anuvadati yat pūrvam rūpam apareṇa rūpaṇaḥ anuvadati tat anurūpasya anurūpa tvam anurūpaḥ enam

original: putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: putraḥ jāyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 12.1.6) stotrīyānurūpau tṛco bhavataḥ prāṇāpānānām avarudhyai
analyzed: stotrīya anurūpau tṛcaḥ bhavataḥ prāṇa apānānām avarudhyai

original: (PB 12.1.7) rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhy antarikṣeṇa yātava iti
analyzed: rājā medhābhiḥ īyate pavamānaḥ manau adhi antarikṣeṇa yātave iti

original: (PB 12.1.8) antarikṣadevatyas tṛco bhavaty antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: antarikṣa devatyaḥ tṛcaḥ bhavati antarikṣa devatyam etat ahar yat tṛtīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.1.9) pañcarcau bhavati pañcapadā paṅktiḥ pāṅktam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
analyzed: pañca ṛcau bhavati pañca padā paṅktiḥ pāṅktam annam annādyasya avarudhyai

original: (PB 12.1.10) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhy upayānti
analyzed: tṛcaḥ uttamaḥ bhavati yena eva prāṇena prayanti tam abhi upayānti

original: (PB 12.1.11) saptadaśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai prajātyai
analyzed: saptadaśaḥ eva stomaḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai prajātyai

original: (PB 12.2.1) agnināgniḥ samidhyata ity āgreyam ājyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: agninā agniḥ samidhyate iti āgreyam ājyam bhavati

original: (PB 12.2.2) pūrve eva tad ahanī samiddhe tṛtīyam ahar abhisamindhe
analyzed: pūrve eva tat ahanī samiddhe tṛtīyam ahar abhisamindhe

original: (PB 12.2.3) mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣam iti rāthantaram maitrāvaruṇam

original: (PB 12.2.4) huva iti vai rāthantaraṃ rūpam

original: (PB 12.2.5) rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yad vairūpaṃ rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati
analyzed: rathantaram etat parokṣam yat vairūpam rāthantaram eva tat rūpam nirdyotayati

original: (PB 12.2.6) indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣusa ity aindram
analyzed: indreṇa sam hi iti aindram

original: (PB 12.2.7) sam iva vā ime lokā dadṛśire 'ntarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: sam iva vai ime lokāḥ dadṛśire antarikṣa devatyam etat ahar yat tṛtīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.2.8) tā huve yayor idam iti rāthantaram aindrāgnam
analyzed: tā huve yayoḥ idam iti rāthantaram aindrāgnam

original: (PB 12.2.9) huva iti vai rāthantaraṃ rūpaṃ rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yad vairūpaṃ rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ
analyzed: huve iti vai rāthantaram rūpam rathantaram etat parokṣam yat vairūpam rāthantaram eva tat rūpam nirdyotayati stomaḥ

original: (PB 12.3.1) uccā te jātam andhasa iti gāyatrī bhavati
analyzed: uccā te jātam andhasaḥ iti gāyatrī bhavati

original: (PB 12.3.2) udvad vā etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: udvat vai etat ahar yat tṛtīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.3.3) andhasvatī bhavaty ahar vā andho 'hna ārambhaḥ
analyzed: andhasvatī bhavati ahar vai andhaḥ ahnaḥ ārambhaḥ

original: (PB 12.3.4) abhi somāsa āyava iti
analyzed: abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ iti

original: (PB 12.3.5) abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ bṛhad iti bṛhata ubhayoḥ saha rūpam upaity ubhau hi varṇāv etad ahaḥ
analyzed: abhi iti rathantarasya rūpam bṛhat iti bṛhataḥ ubhayoḥ saha rūpam upaiti ubhau hi varṇau etat ahar
