analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ īrayati pravahniḥ iti tṛtīyasya ahnaḥ rūpam tena tṛtīyam ahar ārabhante

original: (PB 12.3.7) triṣṭubhaḥ satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa jāgataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: triṣṭubhaḥ satyaḥ jagatyaḥ rūpeṇa jāgatam hi etat ahar

original: (PB 12.3.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gāyatram bhavati yat eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 12.3.9) vaiṣṭambhaṃ bhavati

analyzed: ahar vai etat avlīyata tat devāḥ vaiṣṭambhaiḥ vyaṣṭabhnuvan tat vaiṣṭambhasya vaiṣṭambha tvam

original: (PB 12.3.11) diśa iti nidhanam upayanti diśāṃ dhṛtyai
analyzed: diśaḥ iti nidhanam upayanti diśām dhṛtyai

original: (PB 12.3.12) paurūmadgaṃ bhavati
analyzed: paurūmadgam bhavati

analyzed: ahar vai etat a vlīyamānam tat rakṣāṃsi anvasacanta tasmāt devāḥ paurūmadgena rakṣāṃsi apāghnan apa pāpmānam hate paurūmadgena

original: (PB 12.3.14) devāś ca vāsurāś cāspardhanta te devā asurāṇāṃ paurūmadgena puro 'majjayan yat puro 'majjayaṃs tasmāt paurūmadgaṃ pāpmānam evaitena  #
analyzed: devāḥ ca vā asurāḥ ca aspardhanta te devāḥ asurāṇām paurūmadgena puraḥ amajjayan yat puraḥ amajjayan tasmāt paurūmadgam pāpmānam eva etena  /

original: bhrātṛvyaṃ majjayati
analyzed: bhrātṛvyam majjayati

analyzed: gautamam bhavati

original: (PB 12.3.16) yad eva gautamasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: yat eva gautamasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 12.3.17) ubhayataḥ stotraṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpam
analyzed: ubhayatas stotram tathā hi etasya ahnaḥ rūpam

analyzed: antarikṣam bhavati

analyzed: antarikṣa devatyam etat ahar yat tṛtīyam antarikṣe eva tat antarikṣeṇa stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai

original: (PB 12.3.20) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃ bhavati
analyzed: āṣkāra nidhanam kāṇvam bhavati

analyzed: aḥ iti vai rāthantaram rūpam haḥ iti bārhatam tṛtīyam eva tat rūpam upayanti samṛdhyai

original: (PB 12.3.22) aṅgirasāṃ saṃkrośo bhavati
analyzed: aṅgirasām saṃkrośaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 12.3.23) etena vā aṅgirasaḥ saṃkrośamānāḥ svargaṃ lokam āpan svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
analyzed: etena vai aṅgirasaḥ saṃkrośamānāḥ svargam lokam āpan svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai svargāt lokāt na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ

original: (PB 12.4.1) yady āva indra te śatam iti śatavatyo bhavanti
analyzed: yadi āvaḥ indra te śatam iti śatavatyaḥ bhavanti

analyzed: śatavat vai paśūnām rūpam sahasravat paśūnām eva etābhiḥ rūpam avarūndhe

original: (PB 12.4.3) vayaṅ ghatvā sutāvanta iti satobṛhatyo varṣīyaś chanda ākramate 'napabhraṃśāya
analyzed: vayam ghatvā sutāvantaḥ iti satobṛhatyaḥ varṣīyaḥ chandaḥ ākramate an apabhraṃśāya

original: (PB 12.4.4) taraṇir it siṣāsati vājaṃ purandhyā yujā/
analyzed: taraṇiḥ id siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā

original: āva indraṃ puruhūtaṃ na me girety āvad akṣaram uddhatam iva vai tṛtīyam ahar yad eva tāvad akṣaraṃ bhavaty ahar evaitena pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: āvaḥ indram puru hūtam na me girā iti āvat akṣaram uddhatam iva vai tṛtīyam ahar yat eva tāvat akṣaram bhavati ahar eva etena pratiṣṭhāpayati

analyzed: pañca padā paṅktiḥ pāṅktam annam anna aghasya avarūdhyai

original: (PB 12.4.7) diśāṃ vā etat sāma yad vairūpaṃ diśo hy evaitenābhivadati
analyzed: diśām vai etat sāma yat vairūpam diśaḥ hi eva etena abhivadati

analyzed: ṛtubhiḥ ca vai ime lokāḥ digbhiḥ ca āvṛtāḥ teṣu eva ubhayeṣu yajamānam pratiṣṭhāpayati yajamānam vai anupratitiṣṭhantam udgātā pratitiṣṭhati  /

original: ya evaṃ vidvān vairūpeṇodgāyati
analyzed: yaḥ evam vidvān vairūpeṇa udgāyati

analyzed: digvat bhavati bhrātṛvyasya apanutyai

analyzed: diśam viśam iti nidhanam upayanti diśām dhṛtyai

analyzed: anaḍvāhau vai etau deva yānau yajamānasya yat bṛhat rathantare tau eva tat yunakti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

analyzed: aśvavat bhavati prajātyai

analyzed: yadā vai puruṣaḥ annam atti atha antarataḥ viṣṭabdhaḥ

analyzed: diśaḥ iti nidhanam upayanti diśām dhṛtyai

analyzed: agniḥ vai etasya paśūn apakramayati yasya paśavaḥ apakrāmanti agniḥ eva tasya paśūn abhikramayati yasya paśavaḥ abhikrāmanti

original: (PB 12.5.2) udvad vā etat trivad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: udvat vai etat trivat ahar yat tṛtīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.5.3) ''ā sotā pariṣiñcata'' iti parivatyo bhavanti
analyzed: pariṣiñcata iti   bhavanti

original: (PB 12.5.4) anto vai tṛtīyam ahas tasyaitāḥ paryāptyai

analyzed: āniṣīdata iti uddhattam iva vai tṛtīyam ahar yat āha niṣīdata iti ahar eva etena pratiṣṭhāpayati

analyzed: iti anuṣṭubhaḥ satyaḥ jagatyaḥ rūpeṇa jāgatam hi etat ahar

original: (PB 12.5.7) ''pavitraṃ te vitataṃ brahmaṇaspata'' iti
analyzed: pavitram te vitan brahmaṇaspate iti

original: (PB 12.5.8) vitatam iva vā idam antarikṣam antareme antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
analyzed: vitatam iva vai idam antarikṣam antarā ime antarikṣa devatyam etat ahar yat tṛtīyam tat eva tat abhivadati

original: (PB 12.5.9) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gāyatram bhavati yat eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 12.5.10) pāṣṭhauhaṃ bhavati
analyzed: pāṣṭhauham bhavati

analyzed: paṣṭhavāh vai etena āṅgirasaḥ caturthasya ahnaḥ vācam vadantīm upāśṛṇot sa ho vāc iti nidhanam upait tat asya abhyuditam tat ahar avasat

original: (PB 12.5.12) vācaḥ sāma bhavati
analyzed: vācaḥ sāma bhavati

original: (PB 12.5.13) vāg vai dvādaśāho vācy eva tad vācā stuvate yajñasya prabhūtyai
analyzed: vāc vai dvādaśa ahaḥ vāci eva tat vācā stuvate yajñasya prabhūtyai

original: (PB 12.5.14) niṣkirīyāḥ sattram āsata te tṛtīyam ahar na prājānaṃs tān etat sāma
analyzed: niṣkirīyāḥ sattram āsata te tṛtīyam ahar na prājānan tān etat sāman

original: gāyamānān vāg upāplavat tena tṛtīyam ahaḥ prājānaṃs te 'bruvann iyaṃ vāva nas tṛtīyam
analyzed: gāyamānān vāc upāplavat tena tṛtīyam ahar prājānan te abruvan iyam vāva naḥ tṛtīyam

original: ahar adīdṛśad iti tṛtīyasyaivaiṣāhno dṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: ahar adīdṛśat iti tṛtīyasya eva eṣā ahnaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ

original: (PB 12.5.15) śauktaṃ bhavati
analyzed: śauktam bhavati

original: (PB 12.5.16) śuktir vā etenāṅgiraso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
analyzed: śuktiḥ vai etena āṅgirasaḥ añjasā svargam lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai svargāt lokāt na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ

original: (PB 12.5.17) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: gaurīvitam bhavati yat eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 12.5.18) tvāṣṭrīsāma bhavati
analyzed: tvāṣṭrīsāma bhavati

original: (PB 12.5.19) indraṃ vā akṣyāmayiṇaṃ bhūtāni nāsvāpayaṃs tam etena tvāṣṭrayo 'svāpayaṃs tad vāva tās tarhy akāmayanta
analyzed: indram vai akṣyāmayiṇam bhūtāni na asvāpayan tam etena tvāṣṭrayaḥ asvāpayan tat vāva tāḥ tarhi akāmayanta

analyzed: kāma sani sāma tvāṣṭrī sāma kāmam eva etena avarundhe

original: (PB 12.5.21) indro vṛtrād vibhyad gāṃ prāviśat taṃ tvāṣṭrayo 'bruvaṃ janayāmeti tam etaiḥ sāmabhir ajanayaṃ jāyāmahā iti vai sattram āsate

original: (PB 12.5.22) ariṣṭaṃ bhavati
analyzed: ariṣṭam bhavati

original: (PB 12.5.23) devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta yaṃ devānām aghnan na sa samabhavad
analyzed: devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca aspardhanta yam devānām aghnan na sa samabhavat

original: yam asurāṇāṃ saṃ so 'bhavat te devās tapo 'tapyanta ta etad ariṣṭam apaśyaṃs tato
analyzed: yam asurāṇām sam saḥ abhavat te devāḥ tapaḥ atapyanta te etat ariṣṭam apaśyan

original: 'yaṃ devānām aghnat saṃ so 'bhavad yam asurāṇāṃ na sa samabhavad anenāriṣāmeti tad
analyzed: ayam devānām aghnat sam saḥ abhavat yam asurāṇām na sa samabhavat anena ariṣāma iti tat

original: ariṣṭasyāriṣṭatvam ariṣṭayā evāriṣṭam antataḥ kriyate
analyzed: ariṣṭasya ariṣṭa tvam ariṣṭayāḥ eva ariṣṭam antatas kriyate

original: (PB 12.5.24) trīḍaṃ bhavati trirātrasya dhṛtyai
analyzed: tri iḍam bhavati tri rātrasya dhṛtyai

original: (PB 12.5.25) dravantīm iḍām uttamām upayanti caturthasyāhnaḥ santatyai stomaḥ
analyzed: dravantīm iḍām uttamām upayanti caturthasya ahnaḥ santatyai stomaḥ

original: (PB 12.6.1) pramaṃhiṣṭhāya gāyateti
analyzed: pramaṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata iti

original: (PB 12.6.2) yad gāyateti mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
analyzed: yat gāyata iti mahasaḥ eva tat rūpam kriyate

original: (PB 12.6.3) ''taṃ te mad aṅgaṇīm asīti madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: pa te mat aṅgaṇīm asi iti madavat vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanam madam eva tat rasam dadhāti

original: (PB 12.6.4) ''śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā'' iti śrutyā eva
analyzed: iti   eva

analyzed: devasthānam bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai saṃskṛti bhavati saṃṃskṛtyai

original: (PB 15.3.29) ahar vā etad avlīyata tad devā devasthāne tiṣṭhantaḥ saṃkṛtinā samaskurvaṃs
analyzed: ahar vai etat avlīyata tat devāḥ deva sthāne tiṣṭhantaḥ saṃkṛtinā samaskurvan

original: tat saṃkṛteḥ saṃkṛtitvaṃ devasthānena vai devāḥ svarge loke pratyatiṣṭhan svarge
analyzed: tat saṃkṛteḥ saṃkṛti tvam devasthānena vai devāḥ svarge loke pratyatiṣṭhan svarge

original: loke pratitiṣṭām ety etat
analyzed: loke pratitiṣṭām eti etat

original: (PB 15.3.30) varuṇāya devatā rājyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa etad devasthānam apaśyat tato vai tās tasmai rājyāyātiṣṭhanta tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śreṣṭhyāya
analyzed: varuṇāya devatāḥ rājyāya na atiṣṭhanta saḥ etat devasthānam apaśyat tatas vai tāḥ tasmai rājyāya atiṣṭhanta tiṣṭhante asmai samānāḥ śreṣṭhyāya

original: (PB 15.3.31) kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: kṣatrasya iva asya prakāśaḥ bhavati pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 15.3.32) bhargo bhargeṇa tuṣṭuvāno bhavati yaśo yaśasā

original: (PB 15.3.33) vāsiṣṭhaṃ bhavati yad eva vāsiṣṭhasya brāhmaṇam
analyzed: vāsiṣṭham bhavati yat eva vāsiṣṭhasya brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 15.3.34) dīrghatamaso 'rko bhavaty annaṃ vā arko 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai

analyzed: nidhana antāḥ pavamānāḥ bhavanti ahnaḥ dhṛtyai stomaḥ

original: (PB 15.4.1) ''śrāyanta iva sūryam'' iti sūryavatyo bhavanti
analyzed: iva   iti   bhavanti

original: (PB 15.4.2) ādityadevatyaṃ hy etad ahar anto vai sūro 'nta etan navamam ahnām anta eva tad antena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
analyzed: āditya devatyam hi etat ahar antaḥ vai sūraḥ antaḥ etat navamam ahnām ante eva tat antena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai

analyzed: indra bhayāvahe tatas naḥ abhayam kṛdhi

analyzed: maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ ūtaye vidviṣaḥ vimṛdhaḥ jahi iti dviṣaḥ ca eva mṛdhaḥ ca navamena ahnā vihatya daśamena ahnā uttiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 15.4.5) śrīr vai śrāyantīyaṃ śrīr navamam ahaḥ śriyam eva tac chriyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati

analyzed: samantam bhavati

analyzed: āgneyī pṛthivī āgneyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ aindrī dyauḥ aindraḥ rājanyaḥ antarikṣeṇa

analyzed: asi   iti   bhavati     iti   bhavati     iti   rūpam   hi

original: (PB 15.5.2) ''tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā'' iti tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ

original: (PB 15.5.3) ''pavasva deva vītaya'' iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
analyzed: pū deva vītaye iti bṛhataḥ rūpam bārhatam hi etat ahar

original: (PB 15.5.4) ''parityaṃ haryataṃ harim'' iti parivatyo bhavanty anto vai navamam ahasyaitāḥ paryāptyai
analyzed: iti   bhavanti   vai

original: (PB 15.5.5) ''pavasva soma mahe dakṣāya-'' ity akṣarapaṅktiḥ stomānāṃ prabhūtir atho
analyzed: iti

original: etad dhy evaitarhi chando 'yātayāma yad akṣarapaṅktis tena chandomā ayātayāmānaḥ
analyzed: etat hi eva etarhi chandaḥ ayātayāma yat akṣarapaṅktiḥ tena chandomāḥ ayātayāmānaḥ

original: kriyante brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś chandomā
analyzed: kriyante brahma vādinaḥ vadanti yat ṣaṣ ahe stomāḥ chandāṃsi āpyante kim chandasaḥ chandomāḥ

analyzed: iti etat chandasaḥ yat etāḥ akṣarapaṅktayaḥ iti brūyāt

analyzed: gāyatram bhavati yat eva gāyatrasya brahmaṇam

analyzed: agnim vai pūrvaiḥ aharbhiḥ ājuhoti atha etat āditya daivatyam ahar śukraḥ āhutaḥ iti asau vai ādityaḥ śukraḥ tam eva etena ājuhoti

original: (PB 15.5.10) śāmmadaṃ bhavati
analyzed: śāmmadam bhavati

analyzed: śammad vai etena āṅgirasaḥ añjasā svargam lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasya anukhyātyai svargāt lokāt na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ

analyzed: dāvasuḥ vai etat āṅgirasaḥ paśu kāmaḥ sāma apaśyat tena sahasram paśūn asṛjat yat etat sāma bhavati paśūnām puṣṭyai

original: (PB 15.5.15) pratīcīneḍaṃ kāśītaṃ bhavati

analyzed: hāviṣkṛtam bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai kṛta anuvādaḥ eva saḥ

analyzed: viśvamanasam vai ṛṣim adhyāyam udvrajitam rakṣaḥ agṛhṇāt tam indraḥ acāyat ṛṣim vai rakṣaḥ agrahīt iti tam abhyavadat ṛṣe kaḥ tvā eṣa

original: sthāṇur iti brūhīti rakṣo 'bravīt,
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ iti brūhi iti rakṣaḥ abravīt

analyzed: sa sthāṇuḥ iti abravīt tasmai vai etena prahara iti asmai iṣīkām vajram prayacchan abravīt

original: tenāsya sīmānam abhinat saiṣendreṇateṣīkā pāpmā vāva sa tam agṛhṇāt taṃ vaiśvamanasenāpāhatāpapāpmānaṃ
analyzed: tena asya sīmānam abhinat sā eṣā indreṇatā iṣīkā pāpmā vāva sa tam agṛhṇāt tam vaiśvamanasena apāhata apapāpmānam

analyzed: hate vaiśvamanasena tuṣṭuvānaḥ

analyzed: nihavaḥ bhavati annādyasya avarudhyai

analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ vai indram pratyakṣa na apaśyan sa vasiṣṭhaḥ akāmayata katham indram pratyakṣam paśyeyam iti saḥ etat nihavam apaśyat tatas vai

analyzed: akūpāraḥ vai etena kaśyapaḥ jemānam mahimānam agacchat jemānam mahimānam gacchati ākūpāreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ

analyzed: vidharma bhavati dharmasya vidhṛtyai

analyzed: brahma vādinaḥ vadanti yat ṣaṣ ahe stomāḥ chandāṃsi āpyante kim chandasaḥ

analyzed: chandomāḥ iti puruṣa chandasaḥ iti brūyāt puruṣaḥ vai pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ dvipadā chandomānām ayātayāma tāyai

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ apākrāman tān etena sāmnā anvahvayat te enam upāvartanta yat etat sāma

analyzed: bhavati paśūnām upāvṛtyai

analyzed: tat paśūn dadhāti stomaḥ

analyzed: āgreyīṣu pūrveṣām ahnām ukthāni praṇayanti atha etasya ahnaḥ āgneyī aindrayām praṇayanti ubhayoḥ eva rūpayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 15.6.2) aidhmavāhaṃ bhavati
analyzed: aidhma vāham bhavati

original: (PB 15.6.3) āgneyy aindrīṣu stuvanti brahma caiva tat kṣatraṃ ca sayujīkaroti brahmaiva kṣatrasya purastān nidadhāti brāhmaṇe kṣatraṃ ca viśaṃ  #
analyzed: āgneyīḥ aindrīṣu stuvanti brahma ca eva tat kṣatram ca sayujīkaroti brahma eva kṣatrasya purastāt nidadhāti brāhmaṇe kṣatram ca viśam

original: cānuge karoti
analyzed: ca anuge karoti

analyzed: traikakubham bhavati

analyzed: gāyatram vai saptamam ahar traiṣṭubham aṣṭamam jāgatam navamam atha etat ānuṣṭubham ahar yat daśamam

original: (PB 15.7.2) tad āhur yad ānuṣṭubhaṃ stomyāṃ pratyakṣam upeyuḥ parāṃ parāvataṃ yajamāno
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat ānuṣṭubham stomyām pratyakṣam upeyuḥ parām parāvatam yajamānaḥ

analyzed: gacchet na pratitiṣṭhet iti yāḥ vai caturviṃśatiḥ gāyatryaḥ tāḥ aṣṭādaśa anuṣṭubhaḥ anuṣṭubham

analyzed: eva tat stomyām parokṣam upayanti pratiṣṭhāyai pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: prajāpatim vai etena ahnā pariveviṣati tatra vyavavadyam yat vai śreṣṭhe pariviṣyamāṇaḥ vadati annādyasya saḥ avagrahaḥ tasmāt na vyavavadyam

original: (PB 15.7.4) tad u vyavavadyaṃ yathā śreṣṭhāya baliṃ hriyamāṇaṃ panthānaṃ paryanuvedayati gatyai tathā tat
analyzed: tat u vyavavadyam yathā śreṣṭhāya balim hriyamāṇam panthānam paryanuvedayati gatyai tathā tat

original: (PB 15.7.5) yāvaty anuṣṭup tāvatīṃ vācaṃ sampādya vibrūyus tad v anatiriktaṃ svasyo caiva yajñasyāriṣṭyai

original: vā eṣa āhriyate yad vai taj jyotir abhavat tat jyotiṣo jyotiṣṭvam
analyzed: vai eṣaḥ āhriyate yat vai tat jyotiḥ abhavat tat jyotiṣaḥ jyotiḥ tvam

original: (PB 16.1.2) eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajate gartapatyam eva taj jīyate pra vā mīyate
analyzed: eṣa vāva prathamaḥ yajñānām yaḥ etena an iṣṭvā atha anyena yajate garta patyam eva tat jīyate pra vā mīyate

original: (PB 16.1.3) yathā vā idam agner jātād agnayo vihriyanta evam etasmād adhy anye yajñā vihriyante
analyzed: yathā vai idam agneḥ jātāt agnayaḥ vihriyante evam etasmāt adhi anye yajñāḥ vihriyante

original: (PB 16.1.4) yo hi trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśaḥ sa taṃ yaḥ saptadaśaḥ sa taṃ ya ekaviṃśaḥ sa tam
analyzed: yaḥ hi trivṛt anyam yajña kratum āpadyate sa tam dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśaḥ sa tam yaḥ saptadaśaḥ sa tam yaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ sa tam

original: (PB 16.1.5) etat tad yad āhur eko yajña ity etad dhi sarve jyotiṣṭomā bhavanti
analyzed: etat tat yat āhuḥ ekaḥ yajñaḥ iti etat hi sarve jyotiṣṭomāḥ bhavanti

original: (PB 16.1.6) asthūrir vā eṣa santato yajño dvau dvau hi stomau savanaṃ vahatas trivṛt
analyzed: asthūriḥ vai eṣa santataḥ yajñaḥ dvau dvau hi stomau savanam vahataḥ trivṛt

original: pañcadaśau prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśasaptadaśau mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaikaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam
analyzed: pañcadaśau prātaḥsavanam pañcadaśa saptadaśau mādhyandinam savanam saptadaśa ekaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam

original: (PB 16.1.7) yā mitadakṣiṇaiva syād eṣa eva kārya iyaṃ vai jyotir iyam amitasya yantrikaiṣā vā etaṃ yantum arhati
analyzed: yā mita dakṣiṇā eva syāt eṣaḥ eva kāryaḥ iyam vai jyotiḥ iyam amitasya yantrikā eṣā vai etam yantum arhati

original: (PB 16.1.8) tasya navatiśataṃ stotrīyās tāsāṃ yā aśītiśataṃ tāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśinyo virājaḥ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva virājā pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: tasya navatiśatam stotrīyāḥ tāsām yāḥ aśītiśatam tāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśinyaḥ virājaḥ ṣaṭ ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva virājā pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 16.1.9) atha yā daśaiṣā vā ātmanyā virāḍ etasyāṃ vā idaṃ puruṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: atha yāḥ daśa eṣā vai ātmanyā virāj etasyām vai idam puruṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: (PB 16.1.5) gauś cāśvaś cāśvataraś ca gardabhaś cājāś cāvayaś ca vrīhayaś ca yavāś ca tilāś ca māṣāś caitasyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvataraḥ ca gardabhaḥ ca ajāḥ ca avayaḥ ca vrīhayaḥ ca yavāḥ ca tilāḥ ca māṣāḥ ca etasyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 16.1.11) tasya dvādaśaṃ śataṃ dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: tasya dvādaśam śatam dakṣiṇāḥ

original: (PB 16.1.12) vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yaḥ somam abhiṣuṇoti yāḥ śataṃ vairaṃ tad devān
analyzed: vīra hā vai eṣa devānām yaḥ somam abhiṣuṇoti yāḥ śatam vairam tat devān

original: avadayate 'tha yā daśa daśa prāṇāḥ prāṇāṃs tābhiḥ spṛṇoti yaikādaśyātmānaṃ tayā yā
analyzed: avadayate atha yāḥ daśa daśa prāṇāḥ prāṇān tābhiḥ spṛṇoti yā ekādaśyā ātmānam tayā yā

original: dvādaśī saiva dakṣiṇā
analyzed: dvādaśī sā eva dakṣiṇā

original: (PB 16.1.13) śleṣma vā etad yajñasya yad dakṣiṇā na vā aśleṣmā ratho vahaty atha
analyzed: śleṣma vai etat yajñasya yat dakṣiṇā na vai a śleṣmā rathaḥ vahati atha

original: śleṣmavatā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnuta evam etena dakṣiṇāvatā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnute
analyzed: śleṣmavatā yam kāmam kāmayate tam abhyaśnute evam etena dakṣiṇāvatā yam kāmam kāmayate tam abhyaśnute

original: (PB 16.1.14) śubho vā etā yajñasya yad dakṣiṇā yad dakṣiṇāvatā yajate śubham evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: śubhaḥ vai etāḥ yajñasya yat dakṣiṇā yat dakṣiṇāvatā yajate śubham eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 16.1.1) athaiṣa gauḥ
analyzed: atha eṣa gauḥ

original: (PB 16.1.2) gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudantaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nudate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gavā vai devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ anudanta ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam nudate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.1.3) yad vai tad devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo govayaṃs tad gor gotvam
analyzed: yat vai tat devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ govayan tat goḥ go tvam

original: (PB 16.1.4) govayati pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: govayati pāpmānam bhrātṛvyam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.1.5) tasya pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ vajro vai pañcadaśo vajram eva tat purastān nidadhāti tena vijayate
analyzed: tasya pañcadaśam bahiṣpavamānam vajraḥ vai pañcadaśaḥ vajram eva tat purastāt nidadhāti tena vijayate

original: (PB 16.1.6) paśustomo vā eṣa evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyo 'ṇīyas yo grīvā pārśvābhyāṃ varīyāṃ sakthibhyāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: paśu stomaḥ vai eṣaḥ evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyaḥ aṇīyaḥ yaḥ grīvā pārśvābhyām sakthibhyām variṣṭhaḥ

original: (PB 16.1.7) yat pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati trivṛt tyājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ rūpeṇaivainaṃ tat
analyzed: yat pañcadaśam bahiṣpavamānam bhavati trivṛt tyājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinam savanam ekaviṃśam tṛtīyasavanam rūpeṇa eva enam tat

original: (PB 16.1.8) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate tasmāt paśoḥ paścād atiriktam
analyzed: ekā saṃstu virāj atiric tasmāt paśoḥ paścāt atiric

original: (PB 16.2.1) athaiṣa gauḥ
analyzed: atha eṣa gauḥ

original: (PB 16.2.2) gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudantaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nudate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gavā vai devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ anudanta ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ bhrātṛvyam nudate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.2.3) yad vai tad devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo govayaṃs tad gor gotvam
analyzed: yat vai tat devāḥ asurān ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ govayan tat goḥ go tvam

original: (PB 16.2.4) govayati pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: govayati pāpmānam bhrātṛvyam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.2.5) tasya pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ vajro vai pañcadaśo vajram eva tat purastān nidadhāti tena vijayate
analyzed: tasya pañcadaśam bahiṣpavamānam vajraḥ vai pañcadaśaḥ vajram eva tat purastāt nidadhāti tena vijayate

original: (PB 16.2.6) paśustomo vā eṣa evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyo 'ṇīyasyo grīvā pārśvābhyāṃ varīyāṃsakthibhyāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: paśu stomaḥ vai eṣaḥ evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyaḥ aṇīyasyaḥ grīvā pārśvābhyām varīyān akthibhyām variṣṭhaḥ

original: (PB 16.2.7) yat pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati trivṛnty ājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ rūpeṇaivainaṃ tat
analyzed: yat pañcadaśam bahiṣpavamānam bhavati trivṛnti ājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinam savanam ekaviṃśam tṛtīyasavanam rūpeṇa eva enam tat

original: (PB 16.2.8) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate tasmāt paśoḥ paścād atiriktam
analyzed: ekā saṃstu virāj atiric tasmāt paśoḥ paścāt atiric

original: (PB 16.3.1) athaiṣa āyuḥ
analyzed: atha eṣaḥ āyuḥ

original: (PB 16.3.2) āyuṣā vai devā asurān āyuvatāyute bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: āyuṣā vai devāḥ asurān āyuvata āyute bhrātṛvyam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.3.3) svargakāmo yajeta
analyzed: svarga kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 16.3.4) ūrdhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya
analyzed: ūrdhvāḥ stomāḥ yanti an apabhraṃśāya

original: (PB 16.3.5) etenaivāmayāvinaṃ yājayed atirātraḥ kāryaḥ
analyzed: etena eva āmayāvinam yājayet atirātraḥ kāryaḥ

original: (PB 16.3.6) sa gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate prāṇo gāyatry āyur eṣa āyuś caivāsmin prāṇaṃ cobhe samīcī dadhāti
analyzed: sa gāyatrīm saṃpadyate prāṇaḥ gāyatrī āyuḥ eṣaḥ āyuḥ ca eva asmin prāṇam ca ubhe samīcī dadhāti

original: (PB 16.3.7) svargyā vā ete stomā yat jyotir bhavati jyotir evāsmai sa purastād dharaty
analyzed: svargyāḥ vai ete stomāḥ yat jyotiḥ bhavati jyotiḥ eva asmai sa purastāt dharati

original: athaiṣa gaur ekayā virājam atirikta ārambhaṇam eva tad athaiṣa āyur ekasyā virāja
analyzed: atha eṣa gauḥ ekayā virājam atiriktaḥ ārambhaṇam eva tat atha eṣaḥ āyuḥ ekasyāḥ virāja

original: ūna āsāda eva so 'tho ūnātiriktau stomau mithunau prajātyai
analyzed: ūnaḥ āsādaḥ eva saḥ atha u ūna atiriktau stomau mithunau prajātyai

original: (PB 16.3.8) ete vai trikadrukāḥ stomā etair vā indraḥ sarvāṃ tṛptim atṛpyat
analyzed: ete vai trikadrukāḥ stomāḥ etaiḥ vai indraḥ sarvām tṛptim atṛpyat

original: (PB 16.3.9) tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: tṛpyati prajayā paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.4.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmai śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa āsāṃ diśāṃ prajānāṃ ca rasaṃ pravṛhya srajaṃ kṛtvā pratyamuñcata tato  #
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ asmai śraiṣṭhyāya na atiṣṭhanta saḥ āsām diśām prajānām ca rasam pravṛhya srajam kṛtvā pratyamuñcata tatas

original: 'smai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
analyzed: asmai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya atiṣṭhanta

original: (PB 16.4.2) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: tiṣṭhante asmai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya yaḥ evam vid

original: (PB 16.4.3) so 'kāmayatendro me prajāyāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ syād iti tām asmai srajaṃ pratyamuñcat tato vā indrāya prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta tac chilpaṃ  #
analyzed: saḥ akāmayata indraḥ me prajāyām śreṣṭhaḥ syāt iti tām asmai srajam pratyamuñcat tatas vai indrāya prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya atiṣṭhanta tat śilpam

original: paśyantyo yat pitary apaśyan
analyzed: paśyantyaḥ yat pitari apaśyan

original: (PB 16.4.4) tasmād yaḥ putrāṇāṃ dāyaṃ dhanatamam ivopaiti taṃ manyante 'yam evedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ putrāṇām dāyam dhanatamam iva upaiti tam manyante ayam eva idam bhaviṣyati iti

original: (PB 16.4.5) tato vā idam indro viśvam ajayad yad viśvam ajayat tasmād viśvajit
analyzed: tatas vai idam indraḥ viśvam ajayat yat viśvam ajayat tasmāt viśvajit

original: (PB 16.4.6) so 'kāmayata yan me 'nabhijitaṃ tad abhijayeyam iti sa etam abhijitam apaśyat tenānabhijitam abhyajayat
analyzed: saḥ akāmayata yat me an abhijitam tat abhijayeyam iti saḥ etam abhijitam apaśyat tena an abhijitam abhyajayat

original: (PB 16.4.7) yad abhijid bhavaty anābhijitasyābhijityai
analyzed: yat abhijit bhavati an ābhijitasya abhijityai

original: (PB 16.4.8) tau vā etāv indrastomau vīryavantau śilpaṃ vā etau nāma stomāv āstām
analyzed: tau vai etau indrastomau vīryavantau śilpam vai etau nāma stomau āstām

original: (PB 16.4.9) paśyate gṛhe śilpaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: paśyate gṛhe śilpam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.4.10) na vai yamau nāma stomau sto yo yamābhyāṃ yajetaitābhyāṃ yajeta samṛdhyai
analyzed: na vai yamau nāma stomau staḥ yaḥ yamābhyām yajeta etābhyām yajeta samṛdhyai

original: (PB 16.4.11) punarabhyāvartaṃ stomā bhavanti punarabhyāvartaṃ hy etābhyām indro 'jitam ajayat
analyzed: punar abhyāvartam stomāḥ bhavanti punar abhyāvartam hi etābhyām indraḥ ajitam ajayat

original: (PB 16.4.12) trīṃs trivṛdabhijitaḥ praṇayati trīn pañcadaśaḥ trīn saptadaśaḥ trīn ekaviṃśas te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ  #
analyzed: trīn trivṛt abhijitaḥ praṇayati trīn pañcadaśaḥ trīn saptadaśaḥ trīn ekaviṃśaḥ te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ  /

original: prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 16.4.13) caturas trivṛdviśvajitaḥ praṇayati caturaḥ pañcadaśaś caturaḥ saptadaśas te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ  #
analyzed: caturaḥ trivṛt viśvajitaḥ praṇayati caturaḥ pañcadaśaḥ caturaḥ saptadaśaḥ te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ

original: prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 16.5.1) ''upa tvā jāmayo gira'' ity upavatī pratipad bhavati stomasya rūpam
analyzed: ''upa tvā jāmayaḥ giraḥ iti upavatī pratipad bhavati stomasya rūpam

original: (PB 16.5.2) prāṇair vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti sarvān stomān sarvāṇi pṛṣṭhāny upaitīti yad vāyavyā bhavati prāṇānāṃ samṛdhyai
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ vai eṣa vyṛdhyate iti āhuḥ yaḥ sarvam dadāti sarvān stomān sarvāṇi pṛṣṭhāni upaiti iti yat vāyavyā bhavati prāṇānām samṛdhyai

original: (PB 16.5.3) sarasvataś ca sarasvatyāś cottare bhavataḥ
analyzed: sarasvataḥ ca sarasvatyāḥ ca uttare bhavataḥ

original: (PB 16.5.4) mithunaṃ vā etad yat sarasvāṃś ca sarasvatī ca mithunam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
analyzed: mithunam vai etat yat sarasvān ca sarasvatī ca mithunam eva asya yajña mukhe dadhāti prajananāya

original: (PB 16.5.5) sāvitrī caturthī bhavati
analyzed: sāvitrī caturthī bhavati

original: (PB 16.5.6) duṣkaraṃ vā eṣa karoti yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti yat sāvitrī bhavati savitṛprasṛtaṃ me karmāsad iti savitṛprasūtam evāsya karma bhavati
analyzed: duṣkaram vai eṣa karoti yaḥ sarvam dadāti yat sāvitrī bhavati savitṛ prasṛtam me karma asat iti savitṛ prasūtam eva asya karma bhavati

original: (PB 16.5.7) brāhmaṇaspatyā pañcamī bhavati
analyzed: brāhmaṇaspatyā pañcamī bhavati

original: (PB 16.5.8) brahma vai brahmaṇaspatir brahmaivāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti
analyzed: brahma vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ brahma eva asya yajña mukhe dadhāti

original: (PB 16.5.9) āgnipāvamānī ṣaṣṭhī bhavati
analyzed: āgnipāvamānī ṣaṣṭhī bhavati

original: (PB 16.5.10) agnir evainaṃ niṣṭapati pavamānaḥ punāti pūtam evainaṃ yajñiyaṃ pṛṣṭhāny upanayati
analyzed: agniḥ eva enam niṣṭapati pavamānaḥ punāti pūtam eva enam yajñiyam pṛṣṭhāni upanayati

original: (PB 16.5.11) yanti vā ete patha ity āhur ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvate
analyzed: yanti vai ete pathaḥ iti āhuḥ ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvate

original: (PB 16.5.12) pāvamāna uttamas tṛco bhavati tena patho nayanti
analyzed: pāvamānaḥ uttamaḥ tṛcaḥ bhavati tena pathaḥ nayanti

original: (PB 16.5.13) sa tu vai pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvītety āhur ya etāni bahiṣpavamāne yuñjyād iti
analyzed: sa tu vai pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvīta iti āhuḥ yaḥ etāni bahiṣpavamāne yuñjyāt iti

original: (PB 16.5.14) upavatī pratipad bhavaty upa vai rathantaraṃ rathantaram evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: upavatī pratipad bhavati upa vai rathantaram rathantaram eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.15) sarasvatī dvitīyā bhavati svargo lokaḥ sarasvān svargo loko bṛhad bṛhad evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: sarasvatī dvitīyā bhavati svargaḥ lokaḥ sarasvān svargaḥ lokaḥ bṛhat bṛhat eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.16) sarasvatyās tṛtīyā bhavati vāg vai sarasvatī vāg vairūpaṃ vairūpam evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: sarasvatyāḥ tṛtīyā bhavati vāc vai sarasvatī vāc vairūpam vairūpam eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.17) sāvitrī caturthī bhavati prajāpatir vai savitā prajāpatir vairājaṃ vairājam evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: sāvitrī caturthī bhavati prajāpatiḥ vai savitā prajāpatiḥ vairājam vairājam eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.18) brāhmaṇaspatyā pañcamī bhavati brahma vai brahmaṇaspatir brahma śakvaryaḥ śakvarīr evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: brāhmaṇaspatyā pañcamī bhavati brahma vai brahmaṇaspatiḥ brahma śakvaryaḥ śakvarīḥ eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.19) āgnipāvamānī ṣaṣṭhī bhavati gāyatrī vai revatī gāyatracchandā agnī revatīr evāsmai tayā yunakti
analyzed: āgnipāvamānī ṣaṣṭhī bhavati gāyatrī vai revatī gāyatra chandāḥ agniḥ revatīḥ eva asmai tayā yunakti

original: (PB 16.5.20) na catvāri ṣaḍbhyo vibhavanti yad aniruktāni tena vibhavanti
analyzed: na catvāri ṣaḍbhyaḥ vibhavanti yat aniruktāni tena vibhavanti

original: (PB 16.5.21) sarvāṇi svārāṇy ājyāni taj jāmi nānādevatyaiḥ stuvanty ajāmitāyai
analyzed: sarvāṇi svārāṇi ājyāni tat jāmi nānā devatyaiḥ stuvanti a jāmi tāyai

original: (PB 16.5.22) ''suṣamiddho na āvaha-'' ity āpriya ājyāni bhavanti
analyzed: āvaha iti     bhavanti

original: (PB 16.5.23) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricāno 'manyata sa etāny āpriya ājyāny apaśyat tair ātmānam [thus BI;
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata sa dugdhaḥ riricānaḥ amanyata saḥ etāni āpriyaḥ ājyāni apaśyat taiḥ ātmānam thus bi

original: KSS ātmanam] āprīṇād dugdha iva vā eṣa riricāno yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti yad āpriya ājyāni bhavanty ātmānam evaitair āprīṇāti
analyzed: ātmanam āprīṇāt dugdhaḥ iva vai eṣa riricānaḥ yaḥ sarvam dadāti yat āpriyaḥ ājyāni bhavanti ātmānam eva etaiḥ āprīṇāti

original: (PB 16.5.24) etarhi tu vai pṛṣṭhāni yathāyatanaṃ kalpanta ity āhur yad rathantaraṃ prathamaṃ bṛhad uttamaṃ madhya itarāṇīti
analyzed: etarhi tu vai pṛṣṭhāni yathāyatanam kalpante iti āhuḥ yat rathantaram prathamam bṛhat uttamam madhye itarāṇi iti

original: (PB 16.5.24) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yat sarvāṇi nidhanavanti saha kriyanta iti yad antarā somā yanty antarokthāni śasyante 'ntarā  #
analyzed: jāmi vai etat yajñe kriyate iti āhuḥ yat sarvāṇi nidhanavanti saha kriyante iti yat antarā somāḥ yanti antarā ukthāni śasyante antarā

original: vaṣaṭkurvanti tenājāmi
analyzed: vaṣaṭkurvanti tena ajāmi

original: (PB 16.5.26) vyatyāsam iḍāś ca nidhanāni cāhus tenājāmi
analyzed: vyatyāsam iḍāḥ ca nidhanāni ca āhuḥ tena ajāmi

original: (PB 16.5.27) cyavante vā etad revatyaḥ svād āyatanād ity āhur yat trayastriṃśāt stomād yantīti yad gāyatryo bhavanti tenāyatanān na cyavante  #
analyzed: cyavante vai etat revatyaḥ svāt āyatanāt iti āhuḥ yat trayastriṃśāt stomāt yanti iti yat gāyatryaḥ bhavanti tena āyatanāt na cyavante  /

original: yā hi kā ca gāyatrī sā revatī
analyzed: yā hi kā ca gāyatrī sā revatī

original: (PB 16.6.1) paraśubhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti tac chavīṃ paridhatte paśubhir eva samṛdhyate
analyzed: paraśubhiḥ vai eṣa vyṛdhyate iti āhuḥ yaḥ sarvam dadāti tat chavīm paridhatte paśubhiḥ eva samṛdhyate

analyzed: rohiṇī chavī bhavati etat vai paśunām bhūyiṣṭham rūpam yat rohitam sākṣāt eva enān avarundhe

analyzed: araṇye tisraḥ vasati āraṇyam tābhiḥ annādyam avarundhe

original: (PB 16.6.4) udumbare vasaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarundhe
analyzed: udumbare vasati ūrj udumbare ūrjam eva avarundhe

original: (PB 16.6.5) khanitreṇa jīvaty avṛttim apajayati
analyzed: khanitreṇa jīvati avṛttim apajayati

analyzed: ubhayataḥkṣṇut abhriḥ bhavati ubhayatas eva asmai annādyam rajati asmāt ca lokāt amuṣmāt ca

analyzed: niṣādeṣu tisraḥ vasati asyām vai ete parīttāḥ yat eva asyām annādyam tat avarundhe

original: (PB 16.6.8) jane tisro vasati janyaṃ tābhir annādyam avarundhe
analyzed: jane tisraḥ vasati janyam tābhiḥ annādyam avarundhe

original: (PB 16.6.9) samānajane tisraḥ samānajanyaṃ tābhiḥ
analyzed: samāna jane tisraḥ samāna janyam tābhiḥ

original: (PB 16.6.10) dvādaśaitā rātrayo bhavanti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram anv annādyaṃ prajāyate tad evāptvāvarundhe
analyzed: dvādaśa etāḥ rātrayaḥ bhavanti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram anu annādyam prajāyate tat eva āptvā avarundhe

original: (PB 16.6.11) saṃvatsaraṃ na yāced āmādyam iva vā etad yaḥ sadyodattaṃ pratyatti sadyo vai devānaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsaram na yācet āmādyam iva vai etat yaḥ sadyodattam pratyatti sadyas vai devānam saṃvatsaraḥ

original: (PB 16.6.12) nodīyamānaṃ prati nuden nādyasyāpratinodāya
analyzed: na udīyamānam prati nudet na adyasya a pratinodāya

original: (PB 16.6.13) uṣṇīṣaṃ bibharti śilpatvāya
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam bibharti śilpa tvāya

original: (PB 16.6.14) na mṛnmayena pibed āhutir vā eṣā yad brāhmaṇasya mukhaṃ na vai mṛnmayam āhutim ānaśe 'tha yad amṛnmayapo bhavati sva eva mukha  #
analyzed: na mṛd mayena pibet āhutiḥ vai eṣā yat brāhmaṇasya mukham na vai mṛd mayam āhutim ānaśe atha yat a mṛd maya paḥ bhavati sve eva mukhe

original: āhutiṃ juhoti
analyzed: āhutim juhoti

original: (PB 16.7.1) pañcaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
analyzed: pañcaviṃśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ

analyzed: sarva jitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena āpnoti sarvam jayati

original: (PB 16.7.3) tasya mahāvrataṃ pṛṣṭham
analyzed: tasya mahāvratam pṛṣṭham

original: (PB 16.7.4) arkyaṃ śasyate
analyzed: arkyam śasyate

original: (PB 16.7.5) caturviṃśatiḥ saṃvatsarasyārdhamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ pañcaviṃśo 'nnaṃ vrataṃ saṃvatsarād etenānnādyam avarundhe
analyzed: caturviṃśatiḥ saṃvatsarasya ardha māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ pañcaviṃśaḥ annam vratam saṃvatsarāt etena annādyam avarundhe

original: (PB 16.7.6) annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: anna ādaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.8.1) athaiṣa jyotiḥ
analyzed: atha eṣa jyotiḥ

analyzed: parāṅ vai trirātraḥ arvāṅ agniṣṭomaḥ yaḥ trirātre vibhraṃśate na tasmin

original: yajeta yasmin hy eva yajñakratau vibhraṃśate saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
analyzed: yajeta yasmin hi eva yajñakratau vibhraṃśate sā eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ

original: (PB 16.8.3) upasadi sahasraṃ prātaranuvākam anvāha tad asau lokaḥ sahasraṃ dakṣiṇās tad antarikṣaṃ sahasram etāny akṣarāṇi tad ayaṃ loka eṣu  #
analyzed: upasadi sahasram prātaranuvākam anvāha tat asau lokaḥ sahasram dakṣiṇāḥ tat antarikṣam sahasram etāni akṣarāṇi tat ayam lokaḥ eṣu

original: lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 16.8.4) ṛksthā vā anyat sahasram ity āhur akṣaresthā anyad iti yat trirātre dīyate tadṛksthā/
analyzed: ṛk sthāḥ vai anyat sahasram iti āhuḥ akṣare sthāḥ anyat iti yat trirātre dīyate tat ṛk sthā

original: atha yad agniṣṭome tad akṣaresthā
analyzed: atha yat agniṣṭome tat akṣaresthā

original: (PB 16.8.5) yat sahasrākṣarāsu brahmasāma bhavati sahasrasyaiva sā pratiṣṭutiḥ

analyzed: yāvat vai sahasram gāvaḥ uttara adharāḥ iti āhuḥ tāvat asmāt lokāt svargaḥ lokaḥ iti tasmāt āhuḥ sahasra yājī vai imān lokān prāpnoti

original: (PB 16.8.7) paśubhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sadyaḥ sahasraṃ dadātīti paṅktiṣu brahmasāma bhavati pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajña  #
analyzed: paśubhiḥ vai eṣa vyṛdhyate iti āhuḥ yaḥ sadyas sahasram dadāti iti paṅktiṣu brahma sāma bhavati pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ yajña

original: eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai trivṛt annam virāj na vai prāṇaḥ ṛte annāt pārayati na annam ṛte prāṇāt prāṇeṣu ca eva annādye ca pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: paramaḥ vai eṣa yajñaḥ paramam sahasram parama tām gacchati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: atha eṣa viśvajyotiḥ ukthyaḥ

analyzed: aharbhiḥ vai trirātraḥ imān lokān āpnoti savanaiḥ eṣaḥ uttamam uttaram

analyzed: trirātrasya ahar varṣīyaḥ uttaram uttaram etasya savanam varṣīyaḥ tena trirātram āpnoti

analyzed: asthūriḥ vai eṣa santataḥ yajñaḥ dvau dvau hi stomau savanam vahataḥ

original: (PB 16.10.5) trivṛtpañcadaśau prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśapañcaviṃśau mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ caturviṃśaikaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam
analyzed: trivṛt pañcadaśau prātaḥsavanam saptadaśa pañcaviṃśau mādhyandinam savanam caturviṃśa ekaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam

original: (PB 16.10.6) yad vai yukte santata ādhīyate vahati tadyathā yukte santata ādadhyād evam etasmin sahasram ādhīyate
analyzed: yat vai yukte santataḥ ādhīyate vahati tat yathā yukte santataḥ ādadhyāt evam etasmin sahasram ādhīyate

original: (PB 16.10.7) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavataḥ
analyzed: ubhe bṛhat rathantare bhavataḥ

original: (PB 16.10.9) anuṣṭubhy ātharvaṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: anuṣṭubhi ātharvaṇam bhavati

analyzed: bheṣajam vai devānām atharvāṇaḥ bheṣajāya eva ariṣṭyai

original: (PB 16.10.11) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antatas bhavati sarveṣām vai etat pṛṣṭhānām rūpam sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: ukthaḥ bhavati paśavaḥ vai ukthāni paśavaḥ sahasram paśuṣu eva tat paśūn dadhāti

original: (PB 16.11.1) yo vā agniṣṭome trirātraṃ protaṃ vidyāt so 'gniṣṭome sahasraṃ dadyāt trirātrāyatanaṃ hi sahasram
analyzed: yaḥ vai agniṣṭome tri rātram protam vidyāt saḥ agniṣṭome sahasram dadyāt tri rātra āyatanam hi sahasram

original: (PB 16.11.2) ''upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ'' ''upoṣu jātam apturaṃ'' ''pavasva vāco agriya'' iti pratipado bhavanty etad vai trirātram akaḥ
analyzed: upa upa  asmai gāyata naraḥ  ''upa u su jātam ap turam '' ''pavasva vācaḥ agriya iti pratipadaḥ bhavanti etat vai tri rātram akaḥ

original: (PB 16.11.3) pavamāne rathantaraṃ karoti pavamānasyāntyaṃ vāmadevyaṃ bṛhat pṛṣṭham
analyzed: pavamāne rathantaram karoti pavamānasya antyam vāmadevyam bṛhat pṛṣṭham

original: (PB 16.11.4) iyaṃ vai rathantaram antarikṣaṃ vāmadevyaṃ dyaur bṛhad ime lokās trirātro yad etāni sāmāni sadhryañci karotīmān eva tal lokān  #
analyzed: iyam vai rathantaram antarikṣam vāmadevyam dyauḥ bṛhat ime lokāḥ trirātraḥ yat etāni sāmāni sadhryañci karoti imān eva tat lokān  /

original: saṃdadhāti tena trirātram āpnoti
analyzed: saṃdadhāti tena tri rātram āpnoti

original: (PB 16.11.5) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati
analyzed: kakubham prācīm udūhati

original: (PB 16.11.6) puro hy etayā satyā apaśuvīryaṃ karoti
analyzed: puras hi etayā satyā a paśu vīryam karoti

original: (PB 16.11.7) tasyām iḍānāṃ saṃkṣāraḥ puruṣo vai kakup paśava iḍānāṃ saṃkṣāra ātmany eva tat paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: tasyām iḍānām saṃkṣāraḥ puruṣaḥ vai kakubh paśavaḥ iḍānām saṃkṣāraḥ ātmani eva tat paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 16.11.8) ''pratnaṃ pīyūṣaṃ pūrvyaṃ yad uktham'' iti satobṛhatyo bhavanti
analyzed: pratnam pīyūṣam pūrvyam yat uktham iti satobṛhatyaḥ bhavanti

original: (PB 16.11.9) satobṛhatyā vai devā imān lokān vyāpnuvann imān evaitābhir lokān vyāpnoti
analyzed: satobṛhatyā vai devāḥ imān lokān vyāpnuvan imān eva etābhiḥ lokān vyāpnoti

original: (PB 16.11.10) tā vā etā gāyatryo yat tripadās tena gāyatryas tā vā etā jagatyo yad
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ gāyatryaḥ yat tri padāḥ tena gāyatryaḥ tāḥ vai etāḥ jagatyaḥ yat

original: dvādaśākṣarāṇi padāni tena jagatyas tā vā etā bṛhatyo yat ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarās tena
analyzed: dvādaśa akṣarāṇi padāni tena jagatyaḥ tāḥ vai etāḥ bṛhatyaḥ yat ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣarāḥ tena

original: bṛhatyaḥ sarveṣāṃ vā etāś chandasāṃ rūpaṃ sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśūnām avarundhe
analyzed: bṛhatyaḥ sarveṣām vai etāḥ chandasām rūpam sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśūnām avarundhe

original: (PB 16.11.11) etad vai pratyakṣaṃ mahāvrataṃ tasya gāyatraṃ śiro bṛhadrathantare
analyzed: etat vai pratyakṣam mahāvratam tasya gāyatram śiraḥ bṛhat rathantare

original: pakṣau vāmadevyam ātmā yajñāyajñīyaṃ pucchaṃ dakṣiṇā evārkyam eṣa vāva pratyakṣaṃ
analyzed: pakṣau vāmadevyam ātmā yajñāyajñīyam puccham dakṣiṇā eva arkyam eṣa vāva pratyakṣam

analyzed: tat āhuḥ śithilam iva vai etat chandaḥ carācaram yat satobṛhatī ''devaḥ vaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ iti eva kāryam

original: (PB 17.1.13) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā tad yat padaṃ punar ārabhate tasmāt putro mātaram adhyeti
analyzed: eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā tat yat padam punar ārabhate tasmāt putraḥ mātaram adhyeti

original: (PB 17.1.14) uṣṇīṣaṃ ca pratodaś ca jyāhṇoḍaś ca vipathaś ca phalakāstīrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇavalakṣe ajine rajato niṣkas tad gṛhapateḥ
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam ca pratodaḥ ca jyāhṇa ūḍaḥ ca vipathaḥ ca phalaka āstīrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśam vāsaḥ kṛṣṇa valakṣe ajine rajataḥ niṣkaḥ tat gṛhapateḥ

original: (PB 17.1.15) valūkāntāni dāmatūṣāṇītareṣāṃ dve dve dāmanī dve dve upānahau dviṣaṃhitāny ajināni
analyzed: valūkā antāni dāma tūṣāṇi itareṣām dve dve dāmanī dve dve upānahau dvi saṃhitāni ajināni

original: (PB 17.1.16) etad vai vrātyadhanaṃ yasmā etad dadati tasminn eva mṛjānā yānti
analyzed: etat vai vrātya dhanam yasmai etat dadati tasmin eva mṛjānāḥ yānti

original: (PB 17.1.17) trayastriṃśatā trayastriṃśatā gṛhapatim abhisamāyanti trayastriṃśad dhi devā ārdhnuvan ṛdhyā eva
analyzed: trayastriṃśatā trayastriṃśatā gṛhapatim abhisamāyanti trayastriṃśat hi devāḥ ārdhnuvan ṛdhyai eva

original: (PB 17.2.1) athaiṣa ṣaṭṣoḍaśī ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
analyzed: atha eṣa ṣaṣ ṣoḍaśī ye nṛśaṃsāḥ ninditāḥ santaḥ vrātyām pravaseyuḥ te etena yajeran

original: (PB 17.2.2) abhipūrveṇa vā ete pāpmanā gṛhītā ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat ṣaṭṣoḍaśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tena pāpmāno 'dhi
analyzed: abhipūrveṇa vai ete pāpmanā gṛhītāḥ ye nṛśaṃsāḥ ninditāḥ santaḥ vrātyām pravasanti yat ṣaḍ ṣoḍaśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tena pāpmānaḥ adhi

original: (PB 17.2.3) yad ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat ekaviṃśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyāḥ ekaviṃśaḥ madhyataḥ eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 17.2.4) uktho bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśavo nṛśaṃsam agryaṃ pariṇayanti paśubhir evainān agryaṃ pariṇayati
analyzed: ukthaḥ bhavati paśavaḥ vai ukthāni paśavaḥ nṛśaṃsam agryam pariṇayanti paśubhiḥ eva enān agryam pariṇayati

original: (PB 17.3.1) athaiṣa dviṣoḍaśo ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
analyzed: atha eṣa dviṣoḍaśaḥ ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santaḥ vrātyām pravaseyuḥ te etena yajeran

original: (PB 17.3.2) hīnā vā ete ahīyante ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti mukhaṃ vai trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhata evainān  #
analyzed: hīnāḥ vai ete a hīyante ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santaḥ vrātyām pravasanti yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ bhavanti mukham vai trivṛt stomānām mukhataḥ eva enān

original: yajñasya pariṇayati
analyzed: yajñasya pariṇayati

original: (PB 17.3.3) yad vai ṣoḍaśe stotre bhavatas tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
analyzed: yat vai ṣoḍaśe stotre bhavataḥ tena pāpmanaḥ adhi nirmucyante

original: (PB 17.3.4) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: ekaviṃśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai ekaviṃśaḥ antatas eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 17.4.1) athaiṣa śamanīcāmeḍhrāṇāṃ stomo ye jyeṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
analyzed: atha eṣa śamanīcāmeḍhrāṇām stomaḥ ye jyeṣṭhāḥ santaḥ vrātyām pravaseyuḥ te etena yajeran

original: (PB 17.4.2) agrād agraṃ rohanty ūrdhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya
analyzed: agrāt agram rohanti ūrdhvāḥ stomāḥ yanti an apabhraṃśāya

original: (PB 17.4.3) etena vai śamanīcāmeḍhrā ayajanta teṣāṃ kuṣītakaḥ sāmaśravaso gṛhapatir
analyzed: etena vai śamanīcāmeḍhrāḥ ayajanta teṣām kuṣītakaḥ sāmaśravasaḥ gṛhapatiḥ

original: āsīt tān luśākapiḥ khārgalir anuvyāharad avākīrṣata kanīyāṃsau stomāv upāgur iti
analyzed: āsīt tān luśākapiḥ khārgaliḥ anuvyāharat avākīrṣata kanīyāṃsau stomau upāguḥ iti

original: tasmāt kauṣītakānāṃ na kaś canātīva jihīte yajñāva kīrṇā hi
analyzed: tasmāt kauṣītakānām na kaḥ cana atīva jihīte yajña ava kīrṇāḥ hi

original: (PB 17.5.1) indro vai triśirasaṃ tvāṣṭram ahaṃs tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'gnim
analyzed: indraḥ vai triśirasam tvāṣṭram ahan tam aślīlā vāc abhyavadat saḥ agnim

original: upādhāvat sa etad agnistotram apaśyat tad ātmany adhividhāya tenainam ayājayat tenāsyāślīlāṃ vācam apāhan
analyzed: upādhāvat saḥ etat agni stotram apaśyat tat ātmani adhividhāya tena enam ayājayat tena asya aślīlām vācam apāhan

original: (PB 17.5.2) apāślīlāṃ vācaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: apāślīlām vācam hate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.5.3) yo 'pūta iva syād agniṣṭutā yajetāgninaivāsya pāpmānam apahatya trivṛtā tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: yaḥ a pūtaḥ iva syāt agniṣṭutā yajeta agninā eva asya pāpmānam apahatya trivṛtā tejaḥ brahmavarcasam dadhāti

original: (PB 17.5.4) tad āhur yat trivṛd bhavaty ekasmād evāṅgāt pāpmānam apahanti mukhād eveti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat trivṛt bhavati ekasmāt eva aṅgāt pāpmānam apahanti mukhāt eva iti

original: (PB 17.5.5) jyotiṣṭoma eva kāryaḥ
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva kāryaḥ

original: (PB 17.5.6) yat trivṛd bhavati yad evāsya mukhato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat pañcadaśo
analyzed: yat trivṛt bhavati yat eva asya mukhataḥ a pūtam tat tena apahanti yat pañcadaśaḥ

original: yad evāsyorasto bāhvor apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat saptadaśo yad evāsya madhyato 'pūtaṃ
analyzed: yat eva asya urastas bāhvoḥ a pūtam tat tena apahanti yat saptadaśaḥ yat eva asya madhyatas a pūtam

original: tat tenāpahanti yad ekaviṃśo yad evāsya pador aṣṭhīvator apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti
analyzed: tat tena apahanti yat ekaviṃśaḥ yat eva asya padoḥ aṣṭhīvatoḥ a pūtam tat tena apahanti

original: (PB 17.5.7) vaiśvānaraṃ vā eṣa praviśatīty āhur yo 'gniṣṭutā yajata iti vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ tasya yad apūtaṃ tad agniḥ kṣāpayaty  #
analyzed: vaiśvānaram vai eṣa praviśati iti āhuḥ yaḥ agniṣṭutā yajate iti vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryam tasya yat a pūtam tat agniḥ kṣāpayati  /

original: athetaraḥ śuciḥ pūta udeti
analyzed: atha itaraḥ śuciḥ pūtaḥ udeti

original: (PB 17.6.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ tasya vāyavyāsu agniṣṭoma sāma

original: (PB 17.6.2) brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta
analyzed: brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 17.6.3) tejo vai trivṛd brahmavarcasaṃ yad vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty upaivainaṃ tad dhamati
analyzed: tejaḥ vai trivṛt brahmavarcasam yat vāyavyāsu agniṣṭoma sāma bhavati upa eva enam tat dhamati

original: (PB 17.6.4) yathā hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭaped evam enam agniṣṭun niṣṭapati
analyzed: yathā hiraṇyam niṣṭapet evam enam agniṣṭut niṣṭapati

original: (PB 17.7.1) etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo yajeta
analyzed: etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 17.7.2) jaratkakṣo vā eṣa yo 'paśur yathā vai jaratkakṣe paśavo na ramanta evam
analyzed: jarat kakṣaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ apaśuḥ yathā vai jarat kakṣe paśavaḥ na ramante evam

original: etasmin paśavo na ramante yo 'paśur yadā vai jaratkakṣam agnir dahaty athainam abhivarṣaty
analyzed: etasmin paśavaḥ na ramante yaḥ a paśuḥ yadā vai jarat kakṣam agniḥ dahati atha enam abhivarṣati

original: athāsminn oṣadhayo jāyante 'tha vai tasmin paśavo ramante
analyzed: atha asmin oṣadhayaḥ jāyante atha vai tasmin paśavaḥ ramante

original: (PB 17.7.3) ramante 'smin paśavo ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: ramante asmin paśavaḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.7.4) yad evāsyāpaśavyaṃ tad agniṣṭun nirdahati yad agniṣṭun nirdahati tad adbhī revatībhiḥ śamayati
analyzed: yat eva asya a paśavyam tat agniṣṭut nirdahati yat agniṣṭut nirdahati tat adbhiḥ revatībhiḥ śamayati

original: (PB 17.8.1) jyotiṣṭomenāgniṣṭutā yajñavibhraṣṭo yajeta
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomena agniṣṭutā yajña vibhraṣṭaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 17.8.2) yasmin vā yajñakratau vibhraṃśeta
analyzed: yasmin vā yajñakratau vibhraṃśeta

original: (PB 17.8.3) agnir vā etasya havyam atti yo yajñe vibhraṃśate na devatā havyaṃ gamayaty agnim evaikadhardhnoti
analyzed: agniḥ vai etasya havyam atti yaḥ yajñe vibhraṃśate na devatāḥ havyam gamayati agnim eva ekadhā ṛdhnoti

original: (PB 17.8.4) yad vai saṃśīryate 'thānyan niṣkurvanti tena tad yāti yadā vāva tan niṣkurvanty
analyzed: yat vai saṃśīryate atha anyat niṣkurvanti tena tat yāti yadā vāva tat niṣkurvanti

original: atha tad yāti yeṣv eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau tair eva yajeta yeṣv
analyzed: atha tat yāti yeṣu eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau taiḥ eva yajeta yeṣu

original: eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau teṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau teṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 17.9.1) saptadaśenāgniṣṭutānnādyakāmo yajeta
analyzed: saptadaśena agniṣṭutā annādya kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 17.9.2) annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'gnir annādyasya pradātāgnir evāsmā annādyaṃ prayacchati
analyzed: annam vai saptadaśaḥ agniḥ annādyasya pradātā agniḥ eva asmai annādyam prayacchati

original: (PB 17.9.3) annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: anna ādaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.9.4) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: sarvaḥ saptadaśaḥ bhavati prajāpatiḥ vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 17.10.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomas tasyāniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanam
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ tasya aniruktam prātaḥsavanam

original: (PB 17.10.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāman sa etad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanam apaśyat tenāsāṃ madhyaṃ vyavait tā enam upāvartanta  #
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ apākrāman saḥ etat aniruktam prātaḥsavanam apaśyat tena āsām madhyam vyavait tāḥ enam upāvartanta  /

original: pary enam āviśan
analyzed: pari enam āviśan

original: (PB 17.10.3) grāmakāmo yajeta yad etad aniktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavati madhyam evāsāṃ vyavaity upainam āvartante pary enaṃ viśanti
analyzed: grāma kāmaḥ yajeta yat etat a niktam prātaḥsavanam bhavati madhyam eva āsām vyavaiti upa enam āvartante pari enam viśanti

original: (PB 17.10.4) sa eṣa prajāpater apūrvo nāsmāt pūrvo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: saḥ eṣa prajāpateḥ apūrvaḥ na asmāt pūrvaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.11.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ

original: (PB 17.11.2) tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣv ekādaśadakṣiṇā vyādiśaty aśvadvādaśā madhyandine tā ubhayīr apākaroty ekādaśa tṛtīyasavane  #
analyzed: tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣu ekādaśa dakṣiṇāḥ vyādiśati aśva dvādaśāḥ madhyandine tāḥ ubhayīḥ apākaroti ekādaśa tṛtīyasavane

original: tā vaśāyām apākaroti
analyzed: tāḥ vaśāyām apākaroti

original: (PB 17.11.3) trayastriṃśad etā dakṣiṇā bhavanti trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoty aśvaś catustriṃśo dakṣiṇānāṃ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ  #
analyzed: trayastriṃśat etāḥ dakṣiṇāḥ bhavanti trayastriṃśat devatāḥ devatāḥ eva āpnoti aśvaḥ catustriṃśaḥ dakṣiṇānām prajāpatiḥ catustriṃśaḥ devatānām

original: prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 17.11.4) sa eṣa bṛhaspatisavo bṛhaspatir akāmayata devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchat
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bṛhaspatisavaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ akāmayata devānām purodhām gaccheyam iti saḥ etena ayajata sa devānām purodhām agacchat

original: (PB 17.11.5) gacchati purodhāṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gacchati purodhām yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.11.6) sa eṣa sthapatisavo yaṃ sthāpatyāyābhiṣiñceran sa etena yajeta
analyzed: saḥ eṣa sthapatisavaḥ yam sthāpatyāya abhiṣiñceran saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 17.11.7) gacchati sthāpatyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gacchati sthāpatyam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 17.11.8) kṛṣṇājine 'dhy abhiṣicyata etad vai pratyakṣaṃ brahmavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasa evādhy abhiṣicyate
analyzed: kṛṣṇājine adhi abhiṣicyate etat vai pratyakṣam brahmavarcasam brahmavarcase eva adhi abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 17.11.9) ājyenābhiṣicyate teja ājyaṃ teja ātman dhatte
analyzed: ājyena abhiṣicyate tejaḥ ājyam tejaḥ ātman dhatte

original: (PB 17.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ sa sarvasvāro yaḥ kāmayetānāmayatāmuṃ lokam iyām iti sa etena yajeta
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ sa sarvasvāraḥ yaḥ kāmayeta anāmayata amum lokam iyām iti saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 17.12.2) prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evāsya bahir ṇirādadhāti tājak pramīyate
analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai trivṛt prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān eva asya bahis nirādadhāti tājak pramīyate

original: (PB 17.12.3) trivṛd vai stomānāṃ kṣepiṣṭho yat trivṛd bhavaty āśīyaḥ saṃgacchātā ity ananto vai svaro 'nanto 'sau loko 'nantam evainaṃ svargaṃ  #
analyzed: trivṛt vai stomānām kṣepiṣṭhaḥ yat trivṛt bhavati āśīyaḥ saṃgacchātai iti anantaḥ vai svaraḥ anantaḥ asau lokaḥ anantam eva enam svargam

original: lokaṃ gamayati
analyzed: lokam gamayati

original: (PB 17.12.4) abhivatyaḥ pravatyo bhavanty asmād evainaṃ lokāt svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
analyzed: abhivatyaḥ pravatyaḥ bhavanti asmāt eva enam lokāt svargam lokam gamayanti

original: (PB 17.12.5) ārbhavapavamāne stūyamāna audumbaryā dakṣiṇā prāvṛto nipadyate tad eva saṃgacchate
analyzed: ārbhavapavamāne stūyamāne audumbaryā dakṣiṇā prāvṛtaḥ nipadyate tat eva saṃgacchate

original: (PB 17.12.6) sa eṣa śunaskarṇastoma etena vai śunaskarṇo bāṣkiho 'yajata tasmāc chunaskarṇastoma ity ākhyāyate
analyzed: saḥ eṣa śunaskarṇa stomaḥ etena vai śunaskarṇaḥ bāṣkihaḥ ayajata tasmāt śunaskarṇa stomaḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: (PB 17.13.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomo vaiśvadevasya lokaḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ vaiśvadevasya lokaḥ

original: (PB 17.13.2) āgneyī pratipad vaiśvadevaḥ paśur bārhaspatyānubandhyā
analyzed: āgneyī pratipad vaiśvadevaḥ paśuḥ bārhaspatyā anubandhyā

original: (PB 17.13.3) na yūpaṃ minvanti nottaravediṃ nivapanti
analyzed: na yūpam minvanti na uttaravedim nivapanti

original: (PB 17.13.4) paridhau paśuṃ niyuñjanti
analyzed: paridhau paśum niyuñjanti

original: (PB 17.13.5) pañcāśad dakṣiṇā
analyzed: pañcāśat dakṣiṇā

original: (PB 17.13.6) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
analyzed: ahatam vasānaḥ avabhṛthāt udeti caturaḥ māsaḥ na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti

original: (PB 17.13.7) tataś caturṣu māseṣu varuṇapraghāsānāṃ loke dvidivaḥ
analyzed: tatas caturṣu māseṣu varuṇapraghāsānām loke dvidivaḥ

original: (PB 17.13.8) vāruṇī pratipan mārutaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: vāruṇī pratipad mārutaḥ paśuḥ

original: (PB 17.13.1) kavatī pratipad vāruṇaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: kavatī pratipad vāruṇaḥ paśuḥ

original: (PB 17.13.10) maitrāvaruṇy anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśū niyuñjanti
analyzed: maitrāvaruṇī anūbandhyāḥ minvanti yūpam ni uttaravedim vapanti yūpe paśū niyuñjanti

original: (PB 17.13.11) śataṃ dakṣiṇā ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti

analyzed: pratipad ekādaśinī paśavaḥ sauryā anūbandhyāḥ minvanti yūpam ni uttaravedim vapanti

analyzed: sarvaḥ saptadaśaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 18.5.3) somātipavitaṃ yājayet
analyzed: soma atipavitam yājayet

original: (PB 18.5.4) chidra iva vā eṣa yaṃ somo 'tipavate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
analyzed: chidraḥ iva vai eṣa yam somaḥ atipavate yat tīvra somena yajate pihityai eva a chidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.5) rājānam aparuddhaṃ yājayet
analyzed: rājānam aparuddham yājayet

original: (PB 18.5.6) viḍ vā etam atipavate yo rājāparudhyate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
analyzed: viś vai etam atipavate yaḥ rājā aparudhyate yat tīvra somena yajate pihityai eva acchidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.7) grāmakāmo yajeta
analyzed: grāma kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 18.5.8) grāmo vā etam atipavate yo 'laṃ grāmāya san grāmaṃ na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
analyzed: grāmaḥ vai etam atipavate yaḥ alam grāmāya san grāmam na vindate yat tīvra somena yajate pihityai eva acchidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.9) prajākāmo yajeta prajā vā etam atipavate yo 'laṃ prajāyāḥ san prajāṃ na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
analyzed: prajā kāmaḥ yajeta prajā vai etam atipavate yaḥ alam prajāyāḥ san prajām na vindate yat tīvra somena yajate pihityai eva acchidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.10) paśukāmo yajeta paśavo vā etam atipavante yo 'laṃ paśubhyaḥ san paśūn na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā [thus BI;
analyzed: paśu kāmaḥ yajeta paśavaḥ vai etam atipavante yaḥ alam paśubhyaḥ san paśūn na vindate yat tīvra somena yajate thus bi

original: 'pihityā KSS] evācchidratāyai
analyzed: apihityā kss eva acchidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.11) āmayāvinaṃ yājayet prāṇā vā etam atipavante ya āmayāvī yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
analyzed: āmayāvinam yājayet prāṇāḥ vai etam atipavante yaḥ āmayāvī yat tīvra somena yajate pihityai eva acchidra tāyai

original: (PB 18.5.12) śatam āśiraṃ duhanti tīvrayanty evainam
analyzed: śatam āśiram duhanti tīvrayanti eva enam

original: (PB 18.5.13) tat tā u eva dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: tat tāḥ u eva dakṣiṇāḥ

original: (PB 18.5.14) abhy abhisomān unnayanti tīvra enaṃ dhinavad ity ubhāv adhvaryū sarve camasādhvaryavo 'cchāvākāya pratigṛṇanti tīvrayanty evainam
analyzed: abhi abhisomān unnayanti tīvraḥ enam dhinavat iti ubhau adhvaryū sarve camasādhvaryavaḥ acchāvākāya pratigṛṇanti tīvrayanti eva enam

original: (PB 18.5.15) tad abhakṣayanta ṛtvijaś camasān avajighranti tīvrayanty evainaṃ tat tān acchāvākasya stotre bhakṣayanti tīvrayanty evainam
analyzed: tat a bhakṣayantaḥ ṛtvijaḥ camasān avajighranti tīvrayanti eva enam tat tān acchāvākasya stotre bhakṣayanti tīvrayanti eva enam

original: (PB 18.5.16) tad yat savanāni vyavabhakṣayeyur apakrāmukā yajamānāc chrīḥ syāt sakṛtsakṛt savanānām antato bhakṣayanti savanānām asaṃbhedāya
analyzed: tat yat savanāni vyavabhakṣayeyuḥ apakrāmukā yajamānāt śrīḥ syāt sakṛt sakṛt savanānām antatas bhakṣayanti savanānām a saṃbhedāya

original: (PB 18.5.17) rathantaraṃ sāma bhavati
analyzed: rathantaram sāma bhavati

original: (PB 18.5.18) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyāṃ vā eṣa na pratitiṣṭhati yo na pratitiṣṭhaty asyām evainaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: iyam vai rathantaram asyām vai eṣa na pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ na pratitiṣṭhati asyām eva enam pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 18.5.19) śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty etad evāsmiñ chrīṇāti
analyzed: śrāyantīyam brahma sāma bhavati etat eva asmin śrīṇāti

original: (PB 18.5.21) vāg anuṣṭup vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: vāc anuṣṭubh vācaḥ rasaḥ yajñāyajñīyam vāci eva asya rasam dadhāti

original: (PB 18.5.22) viśoviśīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty etad evāsmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: viśoviśīyam agniṣṭoma sāma bhavati etat eva asmin sarvam pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 18.5.23) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antatas bhavati sarveṣām vai etat pṛṣṭhānām rūpam sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 18.5.24) ukthyo bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: ukthyaḥ bhavati paśavaḥ vai ukthāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 18.6.1) saptadaśa ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśimān saptadaśī
analyzed: saptadaśaḥ ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśimān saptadaśī

original: (PB 18.6.2) yāvān vai prajāpatir ūrdhvas tāvāṃs tiryaṅ
analyzed: yāvān vai prajāpatiḥ ūrdhvaḥ tāvān tiryaṅ

original: (PB 18.6.3) yāvanta ime lokā ūrdhvās tāvantas tiryañcaḥ
analyzed: yāvantaḥ ime lokāḥ ūrdhvāḥ tāvantaḥ tiryañcaḥ

original: (PB 18.6.4) vājapeyayājī vāva prajāpatim āpnoti
analyzed: vājapeya yājī vāva prajāpatim āpnoti

original: (PB 18.6.5) yat saptadaśa stotrāṇi tenordhvam apnoti yat sarvaḥ saptadaśas tena tiryañcam
analyzed: yat saptadaśa stotrāṇi tena ūrdhvam apnoti yat sarvaḥ saptadaśaḥ tena tiryañcam

original: (PB 18.6.6) tasya nānāvīryāṇi savanāni
analyzed: tasya nānā vīryāṇi savanāni

original: (PB 18.6.7) aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ vājavan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ citravat tṛtīyasavanam
analyzed: aniruktam prātaḥsavanam vājavat mādhyandinam savanam citravat tṛtīyasavanam

original: (PB 18.6.8) yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavaty anirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim
analyzed: yat aniruktam prātaḥsavanam bhavati aniruktaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim

original: evāpnoti yad vājavan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai yac
analyzed: eva āpnoti yat vājavat mādhyandinam savanam annam vai vājaḥ annādyasya avarudhyai yat

original: citravat tṛtīyasavanaṃ svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
analyzed: citravat tṛtīyasavanam svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: (PB 18.6.9) viyonir vājapeya ity āhuḥ prājāpatyaḥ san niruktasāmeti yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ tena sayoniḥ
analyzed: viyoniḥ vājapeyaḥ iti āhuḥ prājāpatyaḥ san nirukta sāmā iti yat aniruktam prātaḥsavanam tena sayoniḥ

original: (PB 18.6.10) rathantaraṃ sāma bhavaty āśīya ujjhityai
analyzed: rathantaram sāma bhavati āśīyaḥ ujjhityai

original: (PB 18.6.11) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām evādhy abhiṣicyate
analyzed: iyam vai rathantaram asyām eva adhi abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 18.6.12) tasmād vājapeyayājy apratyavarohī
analyzed: tasmāt vājapeya yājī a pratyavarohī

original: (PB 18.6.13) asyāṃ hi so 'dhy abhiṣicyate
analyzed: asyām hi saḥ adhi abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 18.6.14) abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati brahmaṇo vā eṣa ṛṣabha ṛṣabhatām evainaṃ gamayati
analyzed: abhīvartaḥ brahma sāma bhavati brahmaṇaḥ vai eṣaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ ṛṣabha tām eva enam gamayati

original: (PB 18.6.15) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vāg anuṣṭup vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vāc anuṣṭubh vācaḥ rasaḥ yajñāyajñīyam vāci eva asya rasam dadhāti

original: (PB 18.6.16) vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīndriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai
analyzed: vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma bhavati indriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai

original: (PB 18.6.17) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antatas bhavati sarveṣām vai etat pṛṣṭhānām rūpam sarveṣu eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 18.6.18) gaurīvitaṃ ṣoḍaśisāma bhavati
analyzed: gaurīvitam ṣoḍaśi sāma bhavati

original: (PB 18.6.19) atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atiriktaḥ ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: atiriktam gaurīvitam atiriktaḥ ṣoḍaśī atirikte eva atiriktam dadhāti

original: (PB 18.6.20) tad āhur jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyate yad udvaṃśīyād gaurīvitena stuvate svārāt svāreṇeti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ jāmi vai etat yajñe kriyate yat udvaṃśīyāt gaurīvitena stuvate svārāt svāreṇa iti

original: (PB 18.6.21) na jāmy asti savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate
analyzed: na jāmi asti savanam saṃtiṣṭhate

original: (PB 18.6.22) ukthaṃ śasyate vaṣaṭkāro 'ntarā tenājāmi

analyzed: apacchid iva vai etat yajña kāṇḍam yat ṣoḍaśī tena ajāmi

analyzed: yajña araṇye saṃtiṣṭhate iti āhuḥ ati ukthāni eti ati ṣoḍaśinam na rātrim prāpnoti iti

analyzed: eṣā vai prajāpateḥ paśuṣṭhā tanūḥ yat śipiviṣṭaḥ prāṇaḥ vai bṛhat prāṇe eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ akāmayata vājam āpnuyām svargam lokam iti saḥ etam vājapeyam apaśyat vājapeyaḥ vai eṣa vājam eva etena svargam lokam āpnoti

original: (PB 18.7.2) śukravatyo jyotiṣmatyaḥ prātaḥsavane bhavanti tejo brahmavarcasaṃ tābhir avarundhe

original: (PB 18.7.4) annavatyo gaṇavatyaḥ paśumatyas tṛtīyasavane bhavanti bhūmānaṃ tābhir avarunadhe
analyzed: annavatyaḥ gaṇavatyaḥ paśumatyaḥ tṛtīyasavane bhavanti bhūmānam tābhiḥ avarunadhe

original: (PB 18.7.7) eṣa me 'muṣmin loke prakāśo 'sad iti
analyzed: eṣa me amuṣmin loke prakāśaḥ asat iti

original: (PB 18.7.8) jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ jyotir evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: jyotiḥ vai hiraṇyam jyotiḥ eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 18.7.9) ājiṃ dhāvanti yajamānam ujjāpayanti svargam evainaṃ tal lokam ujjāpayanti

original: (PB 18.7.10) nākaṃ rohati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rohati
analyzed: nākam rohati svargam eva tat lokam rohati

original: (PB 18.7.11) sarajase rohati manuṣyalokād evainam antar dadhāti
analyzed: sarajase rohati manuṣya lokāt eva enam antar dadhāti

analyzed: vājinām sāma brahmā ratha cakre abhigāyati vājaḥ vai svargaḥ lokaḥ svargam eva enam tat lokam ujjāpayati

original: (PB 18.7.13) viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu bṛhaduttamaṃ bhavati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rūḍhvā bradhnasya viṣṭapam abhyatikrāmati
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu bṛhat uttamam bhavati svargam eva tat lokam rūḍhvā bradhnasya viṣṭapam abhyatikrāmati

original: (PB 18.8.1) agniṣṭomaṃ prathamam āharati yajñamukhaṃ vā agniṣṭomo yajñamukham evārabhya savamākramate
analyzed: agniṣṭomam prathamam āharati yajña mukham vai agniṣṭomaḥ yajña mukham eva ārabhya savam ākramate

original: (PB 18.8.2) athaiṣo 'bhiṣecanīyaḥ
analyzed: atha eṣaḥ abhiṣecanīyaḥ

original: (PB 18.8.3) tasya dvātriṃśāḥ pavamānā dvātriṃśadakṣarā 'nuṣṭub vāg anuṣṭub yāvatī vāk tayaiva sūyate
analyzed: tasya dvātriṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ dvātriṃśat akṣarā anuṣṭubh vāc anuṣṭubh yāvatī vāc tayā eva sūyate

original: (PB 18.8.4) saṃśara iva vā eṣa chandasāṃ yad viṣamā stomā ayathāpūrvam iti
analyzed: saṃśaraḥ iva vai eṣa chandasām yat viṣamāḥ stomāḥ ayathāpūrvam iti

original: (PB 18.8.5) yat samāḥ pavamānās tenāsaṃśaras tena yathāpūrvam
analyzed: yat samāḥ pavamānāḥ tena a saṃśaraḥ tena yathāpūrvam

original: (PB 18.8.6) ātmanā vā agniṣṭomenardhnoty ātmanā puṇyo bhavaty atha yad ukthāni paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni yad ukthāni bhavanty anusantatyā
analyzed: ātmanā vai agniṣṭomena ṛdhnoti ātmanā puṇyaḥ bhavati atha yat ukthāni paśavaḥ vai ukthāni viś ukthāni yat ukthāni bhavanti anusantatyā

original: (PB 18.8.7) ''vāyo śukro ayāmita'' iti vāyavyā pratipad bhavati vāg vai vāyur vācam
analyzed: iti vāyavyā pratipad bhavati vāc vai vāyuḥ vācam

original: evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tayābhiṣicyate sarvasyā eva vācaḥ sūyate sarvā enaṃ vāco rājeti vadanti
analyzed: eva asya yajña mukhe yunakti tayā abhiṣicyate sarvasyāḥ eva vācaḥ sūyate sarvāḥ enam vācaḥ rājā iti vadanti

original: (PB 18.8.8) saṃbhāryā bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny eva tābhir yunakti yan nānādevatyās tena yunakti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
analyzed: saṃbhāryāḥ bhavanti pṛṣṭhāni eva tābhiḥ yunakti yat nānā devatyāḥ tena yunakti vīryam vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrye eva adhi abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 18.8.9) yanti vā ete yajñamukhād ity āhur ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvata iti
analyzed: yanti vai ete yajña mukhāt iti āhuḥ ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvate iti

original: (PB 18.8.10) yat ''pavasya vāco agriya'' iti tena yajñamukhān na yanti
analyzed: yat  ''pavasya vācaḥ agriya iti tena yajña mukhāt na yanti

original: (PB 18.8.11) ''davidyutatyā rucā-'' iti chandasāṃ rūpaṃ chandāṃsy evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tair abhiṣicyate
analyzed: iti chandasām rūpam chandāṃsi eva asya yajña mukhe yunakti taiḥ abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 18.8.12) ''etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipa'' ity ādityā ādityā vā imāḥ prajās tāsām eva madhyataḥ sūyate
analyzed: iti      vai         eva   sū

original: (PB 18.8.13) ''pavasvendo vṛṣā suta'' vṛṣaṇvatyo bhavanti triṣṭubho rūpaṃ vīryaṃ vai triṣṭup vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
analyzed: pavasva indo vṛṣā suta vṛṣaṇvatyaḥ bhavanti triṣṭubhaḥ rūpam vīryam vai triṣṭubh vīrye eva adhi abhiṣicyate

original: (PB 18.8.14) ''utte śuṣmāsa īrata'' ity udvatyo bhavanty udvad vā anuṣṭubho rūpam ānuṣṭubho rājanyas tasmād udvatyo bhavanti
analyzed: īrate iti   bhavanti   vai            tasmāt   bhavanti

original: (PB 18.8.15) ''pavamānasya te kava'' iti prāṇānāṃ kḷptyai
analyzed: iti

original: (PB 18.8.16) ''adha kṣapā pariṣkṛta'' ity anuṣṭup prathamānuṣṭub uttamā vāg vā anuṣṭub vācaiva prayanti vācam abhyudyanti
analyzed: iti anuṣṭubh prathamā anuṣṭubh uttamā vāc vai anuṣṭubh vācā eva prayanti vācam abhyudyanti

original: (PB 18.8.17) chinnam iva vā etad yad ekarcā yad etāvānuṣṭubhau tṛcāv abhito bhavato bahavaḥ puraetāro bhavanti bahavaḥ paścāpinaḥ
analyzed: chinnam iva vai etat yat eka ṛcā yat etau ānuṣṭubhau tṛcau abhitas bhavataḥ bahavaḥ puraetāraḥ bhavanti bahavaḥ paścāpinaḥ

original: (PB 18.8.18) sauryānuṣṭub uttamā bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
analyzed: sauryā anuṣṭubh uttamā bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai

original: (PB 18.9.1) varuṇasya vai suṣuvāṇasya bhargo 'pākrāmat sa tredhāpatad bhṛgus tṛtīyam abhavac chrāyantīyaṃ tṛtīyam apas tṛtīyaṃ prāviśat
analyzed: varuṇasya vai suṣuvāṇasya bhargaḥ apākrāmat sa tredhā apatat bhṛguḥ tṛtīyam abhavat śrāyantīyam tṛtīyam apaḥ tṛtīyam prāviśat

original: (PB 18.9.2) yad bhārgavo hotā bhavati tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvāvarundhe yat

analyzed: atha eṣa aupaśadaḥ

analyzed: mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ bhavati svargasya lokasya ākrāntyai caturviṃśati akṣarā gāyatrī

original: tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ
analyzed: tejaḥ brahmavarcasam gāyatrī tejaḥ eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇaḥ gāyatrī prajananam

original: prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
analyzed: prāṇāt eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate

original: (PB 19.11.8) pakṣi vā etac chandaḥ pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: pakṣi vai etat chandaḥ pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 19.11.9) madhyato vā agnir variṣṭhas tasmād ete stomā madhyato variṣṭhāḥ kriyante
analyzed: madhyatas vai agniḥ variṣṭhaḥ tasmāt ete stomāḥ madhyatas variṣṭhāḥ kriyante

analyzed: adhipatiḥ samānānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 19.12.8) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavata iyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ dyaur bṛhadevāsmāl lokād gāyatry evāmuṣmād ubhayor anayor lokayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: ubhe bṛhat rathantare bhavataḥ iyam vai rathantaram dyauḥ bṛhat eva asmāt lokāt gāyatrī eva amuṣmāt ubhayoḥ anayoḥ lokayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati

analyzed: na sa punar agram paryeti

original: (PB 19.13.2) svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda

original: (PB 19.13.4) parameṣṭhitāṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: parameṣṭhi tām gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 19.13.8) bṛhataḥ stotra pratyabhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: bṛhataḥ stotra pratyabhiṣicyate tat hi svārājyam svārājyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: sarvaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ tena gosavaḥ

analyzed: etena eva trīn yājayet

analyzed: yat trīṇi trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhanti

analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: etena eva dvau yājayet

analyzed: rājā ca purohitaḥ ca yajeyātām

analyzed: bhrātṛvyāya praharati

analyzed: eṣaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ eṣaḥ ukthyaḥ eṣaḥ atirātraḥ agniṣṭomena vai devāḥ imam lokam abhyajayan ukthyaiḥ antarikṣam rātryā amum lokam ajayan ahar rātrābhyām

analyzed: trivṛt bahiṣpavamānam pañcadaśāni ājyāni saptadaśaḥ mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna

analyzed: triṇavam prathamam dve ekaviṃśe sa ṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhiḥ

analyzed: saptadaśaḥ mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ tat saptadaśam stomam āpnoti jagatīm chandaḥ yat

original: ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭāni tad ekaviṃśaṃ stomam āpnoty anuṣṭubhaṃ chando yat triṇava ārbhavas
