original: (PB 20.16.8) ete vāva chandasāṃ vīryavattame yad gāyatrī ca triṣṭup ca yad ete abhito
analyzed: ete vāva chandasām vīryavattame yat gāyatrī ca triṣṭubh ca yat ete abhitas

original: bhavato madhye jagatī vīryavatībhyām eva tac chandobhyāṃ paśūn parigṛhṇāti prajananāya
analyzed: bhavataḥ madhye jagatī vīryavatībhyām eva tat chandobhyām paśūn parigṛhṇāti prajananāya

original: na hy amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante
analyzed: na hi amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante

original: (PB 20.16.9) asau vāva trirātro yathodety evaṃ prathamam ahar yathā madhyandina evaṃ dvitīyaṃ yathāstam ety evaṃ tṛtīyaṃ gacchaty amuṣyasāyujyaṃ  #
analyzed: asau vāva trirātraḥ yathā udeti evam prathamam ahar yathā madhyandinaḥ evam dvitīyam yathā astam eti evam tṛtīyam gacchati amuṣya sāyujyam

original: gacchati sāveśyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gacchati sāveśyam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.1.1) indro marutaḥ sahasram ajināt svāṃ viśaṃ somāya rājñe procya tasmād rājñe
analyzed: indraḥ marutaḥ sahasram ajināt svām viśam somāya rājñe procya tasmāt rājñe

original: procya viṃśa jinanti tau yamo 'śṛṇon maruto ha sahasram ajyāśiṣṭām iti sa āgacchat
analyzed: procya viṃśa jinanti tau yamaḥ aśṛṇot marutaḥ ha sahasram iti saḥ āgacchat

original: so 'bravīd upa māsmin sahasre hvayethām iti tam upāhvayetāṃ sa yamo 'paśyad ekāṅgāṃ
analyzed: saḥ abravīt upa mā asmin sahasre hvayethām iti tam upāhvayetām sa yamaḥ apaśyat eka aṅgām

original: sahasre 'pi sahasrasya payo bibhratīṃ so 'bravīd iyam eva mamāstu sahasraṃ yuvāṃ
analyzed: sahasre api sahasrasya payaḥ bibhratīm saḥ abravīt iyam eva mama astu sahasram yuvām

original: vikalpayethām iti tāv abrūtāṃ yathā vāva tvam etāṃ paśyasy evam āvam etāṃ paśyāva iti
analyzed: vikalpayethām iti tau abrūtām yathā vāva tvam etām paśyasi evam āvām etām paśyāvaḥ iti

original: (PB 21.1.2) tayā vā idaṃ sahasraṃ vikalpayāmahā ity abruvaṃs tām udake prāveśayaṃs
analyzed: tayā vai idam sahasram vikalpayāmahai iti abruvan tām udake prāveśayan

original: te 'bravan na śānāharāmahai yasmai na iyaṃ prathamāyādeṣyati iti te 'ṃśān āharanta
analyzed: te abravan na śān āharāmahai yasmai naḥ iyam prathamāya ādeṣyati iti te aṃśān āharanta

original: somasya prathama aid athendrasyātha yamasya
analyzed: somasya prathamaḥ ait atha indrasya atha yamasya

original: (PB 21.1.3) te 'bruvan somāya rājña udehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya
analyzed: te abruvan somāya rājñe udehi tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya

original: payasa iti sā babhruḥ piṅgākṣy ekavarṣodait tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya
analyzed: payasaḥ iti sā babhruḥ piṅga akṣī eka varṣā udait tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya

original: payasaḥ sā yā somakrayaṇī saiva sā
analyzed: payasaḥ sā yā somakrayaṇī sā eva sā

original: (PB 21.1.4) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ somaḥ krīto bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān somaṃ krīṇāti yasmā evaṃ viduṣe
analyzed: tṛtīyena ca asya tasyāḥ ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ somaḥ krītaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān somam krīṇāti yasmai evam viduṣe

original: (PB 21.1.5) te 'bruvann indrāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa
analyzed: te abruvan indrāya udehi tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa

original: iti sā śabalī paṣṭhauhy udait tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā
analyzed: iti sā śabalī paṣṭhauhī udait tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā

original: %yendriyaiṣyā saiva sā
analyzed: yā indriya eṣyā sā eva sā

original: (PB 21.1.6) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa indriyaiṣyā dattā bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti yasmā evaṃ  #
analyzed: tṛtīyena ca asya tasyāḥ ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ indriyaiṣyā dattā bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān indriyaiṣyām dadāti yasmai evam

original: viduṣa indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti
analyzed: viduṣe indriyaiṣyām dadāti

original: (PB 21.1.7) te 'bruvan yamāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa
analyzed: te abruvan yamāya udehi tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa

original: iti sā jaratī kuṣṭhāśṛṅgyad aid dhūmrā vā dityauhīrmato hrasīyasī tṛtīyena cātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti sā jaratī kuṣṭhāśṛṅgī at ait dhūmrā vā dityauhīḥ mataḥ hrasīyasī tṛtīyena ca ātmanaḥ

original: tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā yānustaraṇī saiva sā
analyzed: tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā yā anustaraṇī sā eva sā

original: (PB 21.1.8) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payaso 'nustaraṇī
analyzed: tṛtīyena ca asya tasyāḥ ātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ anustaraṇī

original: kṛtā bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān anustaraṇīṃ karoti yasmā evaṃ viduṣe 'nustaraṇīṃ kurvanti nācakṛvān manyate
analyzed: kṛtā bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān anustaraṇīm karoti yasmai evam viduṣe anustaraṇīm kurvanti na ācakṛvān manyate

original: (PB 21.1.9) tad āhur brahmavādino na vā amuṣmin loke sahasrayāḍ aloko 'stīti tad
analyzed: tat āhuḥ brahma vādinaḥ na vai amuṣmin loke sahasra yāj a lokaḥ asti iti tat

original: yāvad itaḥ sahasrasya gaur gavi pratiṣṭhitā tāvad asmāl lokād asau lokaḥ sarasrayājī
analyzed: yāvat itas sahasrasya gauḥ gavi pratiṣṭhitā tāvat asmāt lokāt asau lokaḥ sarasra yājī

original: vā imān lokān vyāpnoty atho yāvat sahasraṃ yojanāny atho sahasram āśvīnān yatho yāvat
analyzed: vai imān lokān vyāpnoti atha u yāvat sahasram yojanāni atha u sahasram āśvīnān yathā u yāvat

original: sahasram ahnayāni tad gavā gavā spṛṇoti samākramaṇāya vā etā dīyante
analyzed: sahasram ahnayāni tat gavā gavā spṛṇoti samākramaṇāya vai etāḥ dīyante

original: (PB 21.1.10) sahasraṃ yad asṛjata tasya tārpyaṃ yonir āsīd yat tārpyaṃ pratyasya nayati sayonitvāya
analyzed: sahasram yat asṛjata tasya tārpyam yoniḥ āsīt yat tārpyam pratyasya nayati sayoni tvāya

original: (PB 21.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ parācya āyan natsyati na iti
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ parācyaḥ āyan natsyati naḥ iti

original: bibhyatyaḥ so 'bravīd upa mā vartadhvaṃ tathā vai vo 'tsyāmi yathādyamānā bhūyasyaḥ
analyzed: bibhyatyaḥ saḥ abravīt upa mā vartadhvam tathā vai vaḥ atsyāmi yathā adyamānāḥ bhūyasyaḥ

original: prajaniṣyatha iti tābhyo vainaṃ ṛtaṃ brūhīty abruvaṃs tābhya ṛtanidhanenartam abravīd
analyzed: prajaniṣyathaḥ iti tābhyaḥ vā enam ṛtam brūhi iti abruvan tābhyaḥ ṛta nidhanena ṛtam abravīt

original: īnidhanenāvayat triṇidhanena prājanayad etair ha vā idaṃ sāmabhir mṛtyuḥ prajā atti ca prajanayati
analyzed: īnidhanena āvayat triṇidhanena prājanayat etaiḥ ha vai idam sāmabhiḥ mṛtyuḥ prajāḥ atti ca prajanayati

original: (PB 21.2.2) adyamānasya bhūyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: adyamānasya bhūyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.2.3) jyeṣṭhasāmāni vā etāni śreṣṭhasāmāni prajāpatisāmāni
analyzed: jyeṣṭhasāmāni vai etāni śreṣṭhasāmāni prajāpatisāmāni

original: (PB 21.2.4) gacchati jyaiṣṭhayaṃ śraiṣṭhayaṃ ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: gacchati jyaiṣṭhayam śraiṣṭhayam yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.2.5) etair vai sāmabhiḥ prajāpatir imān lokān sarvān kāmān dugdhe yad ācyā dugdhe tad ācyā dohānām ācyā dohatvam
analyzed: etaiḥ vai sāmabhiḥ prajāpatiḥ imān lokān sarvān kāmān dugdhe yat ācyā dugdhe tat ācyā dohānām ācyā doha tvam

original: (PB 21.2.6) sarvān imān lokān kāmān dugdhe ya evaṃ vidvān etais sāmabhiḥ stute
analyzed: sarvān imān lokān kāmān dugdhe yaḥ evam vidvān etaiḥ sāmabhiḥ stute

original: (PB 21.2.7) ime vai lokā etāni sāmāny ayam evartanidhanam antarikṣam īnidhanaṃ dyaus triṇidhanam
analyzed: ime vai lokāḥ etāni sāmāni ayam eva ṛta nidhanam antarikṣam ī nidhanam dyauḥ tri nidhanam

original: (PB 21.2.8) yathā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrāṇy anusañcaraty evam imān lokān anusañcarati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: yathā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrāṇi anusañcarati evam imān lokān anusañcarati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.2.9) agner vā etāni vaiśvānarasya sāmāni yatra vā etair aśāntaiḥ stuvanti
analyzed: agneḥ vai etāni vaiśvānarasya sāmāni yatra vai etaiḥ a śāntaiḥ stuvanti

original: tat prajā devo ghātuko bhavaty agnim upanidhāya stuvate svāyā eva tad devatāyāḥ sāmyekṣāya
analyzed: tat prajā devaḥ ghātukaḥ bhavati agnim upanidhāya stuvate svāyāḥ eva tat devatāyāḥ

original: namaskṛtyodgāyati śāntais stuvanti
analyzed: namaskṛtya udgāyati śāntaiḥ stuvanti

original: (PB 21.3.1) vāg vai śabalī tasyās trirātro vatsas trirātro vā etāṃ pradāpayati
analyzed: vāc vai śabalī tasyāḥ tri rātraḥ vatsaḥ tri rātraḥ vai etām pradāpayati

original: (PB 21.3.2) tad ya evaṃ veda tasmā eṣā prattā dugdhe
analyzed: tat yaḥ evam veda tasmai eṣā prattā dugdhe

original: (PB 21.3.3) yo 'lam annādyāya sann athānnaṃ nādyāt
analyzed: yaḥ alam annādyāya san atha annam na adyāt

original: (PB 21.3.4) barāsīṃ paridhāya taptaṃ piban dvādaśa rātrīr adhaḥ śayīta
analyzed: barāsīm paridhāya taptam piban dvādaśa rātrīḥ adhas śayīta

original: (PB 21.3.5) yā dvādaśī syāt tasyā upavyuṣaṃ śabalīhomaṃ hutvā purā vāgbhyaḥ sampravaditor
analyzed: yā dvādaśī syāt tasyāḥ upavyuṣam śabalī homam hutvā purā vāgbhyaḥ sampravaditoḥ

original: yatra grāmyasya paśor nāśṛṇuyāt tad araṇyaṃ paretya darbhastambam ālabhya śabali
analyzed: yatra grāmyasya paśoḥ na ā śṛṇuyāt tat araṇyam paretya darbha stambam ālabhya śabali

original: śabalīti trir āhvayed yad anyac chunaś ca gardabhāc ca prativāśyate sā samṛddhā
analyzed: śabalī iti tris āhvayet yat anyat śunaḥ ca gardabhāt ca prativāśyate sā samṛddhā

original: (PB 21.3.6) yadi na prativāśyeta saṃvatsare punar āhvayeta
analyzed: yadi na prativāśyeta saṃvatsare punar āhvayeta

original: (PB 21.3.7) śabali samudro 'si viśvavyacā brahma devānāṃ prathamajā ṛtasyānnam asi
analyzed: śabali samudraḥ asi viśva vyacāḥ brahma devānām prathama jāḥ ṛtasya annam asi

original: śukram asi tejo 'sy amṛtam asi tāṃ tvā vidma śabali dīdyānāṃ tasyāste pṛthivī pādo
analyzed: śukram asi tejaḥ asi amṛtam asi tām tvā vidma śabali dīdyānām tasyāḥ te pṛthivī pādaḥ

original: 'ntarikṣaṃ pādo dyauḥ pādaḥ samudraḥ pāda eṣāsi śabali tāṃ tvā vidma sā na iṣam ūrjaṃ
analyzed: antarikṣam pādaḥ dyauḥ pādaḥ samudraḥ pādaḥ eṣā asi śabali tām tvā vidma sā naḥ iṣam ūrjam

original: dhukṣva vasordhārāṃ śabali prajānāṃ śaciṣṭhā vratam anugeṣaṃ svāhā
analyzed: dhukṣva vasordhārām śabali prajānām śaciṣṭhāḥ vratam anugeṣam svāhā

original: (PB 21.4.1) catuṣṭomo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśa ukthyaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ ukthyaḥ sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 21.4.2) prajāpater vā akṣy aśvat tat parāpatat tad aśvo 'bhavat tad aśvasyāśvatvaṃ tad devā aśvamedhena pratyadadhur eṣa vāva prajāpatiṃ  #
analyzed: prajāpateḥ vai akṣi aśvat tat parāpatat tat aśvaḥ abhavat tat aśvasya aśva tvam tat devāḥ aśvamedhena pratyadadhuḥ eṣa vāva prajāpatim

original: sarvaṃ karoti yo 'śvamedhena yajate
analyzed: sarvam karoti yaḥ aśvamedhena yajate

original: (PB 21.4.3) eṣa vāva saśarīraḥ sambhavaty amuṣmai lokāyayo 'śvamedhī
analyzed: eṣa vāva sa śarīraḥ sambhavati amuṣmai loka āyayaḥ aśvamedhī

original: (PB 21.4.4) saraghā vā aśvasya sakthy āvṛhat tad devāś catuṣṭomena pratyadadhur yac catuṣṭomo bhavaty aśvasya sarvatvāya
analyzed: saraghā vai aśvasya sakthi āvṛhat tat devāḥ catuṣṭomena pratyadadhuḥ yat catuṣṭomaḥ bhavati aśvasya sarva tvāya

original: (PB 21.4.5) yat tisro 'nuṣṭubhaś catasro gāyatrīḥ karoti tasmāt tribhis tiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhati sarvān palāyamānaḥ pratidadhāti
analyzed: yat tisraḥ anuṣṭubhaḥ catasraḥ gāyatrīḥ karoti tasmāt tribhiḥ tiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhati sarvān palāyamānaḥ pratidadhāti

original: (PB 21.4.6) anto vā aśvaḥ paśūnām anto 'nuṣṭup chandasām anto viṣṇur devatānām antaś
analyzed: antaḥ vai aśvaḥ paśūnām antaḥ anuṣṭubh chandasām antaḥ viṣṇuḥ devatānām antaḥ

original: catuṣṭomas stomānām antas trirātro yajñānāṃ yad vaiplavyo 'nuṣṭubhaḥ pratipado bhavanti
analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ stomānām antaḥ trirātraḥ yajñānām yat vaiplavyaḥ anuṣṭubhaḥ pratipadaḥ bhavanti

original: catuṣṭoma stomas trirātro yajño 'nta eva tadantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ stomaḥ tri rātraḥ yajñaḥ ante eva tat antam pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: (PB 21.4.7) ekaviṃśam ahar bhavati yasminn aśva ālabhyata ekaviṃśo vā ito 'sāv ādityo dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya  #
analyzed: ekaviṃśam ahar bhavati yasmin aśvaḥ ālabhyate ekaviṃśaḥ vai itas asau ādityaḥ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ trayaḥ ime lokāḥ asau āditya  /

original: ekaviṃśa ādityasyaivainaṃ mātrāṃ gamayati
analyzed: ekaviṃśe ādityasya eva enam mātrām gamayati

original: (PB 21.4.8) tasya mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti
analyzed: tasya mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭham bhavanti

original: (PB 21.4.9) anyad-anyad vā etāś chando 'nyonya ete paśava ālabhyanta etā vā etaṃ samāpnuvanti yan mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanty aśvasya sarvatvāya
analyzed: anyat anyat vai etāḥ chandaḥ anyonye ete paśavaḥ ālabhyante etāḥ vai etam samāpnuvanti yat mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭham bhavanti aśvasya sarva tvāya

original: (PB 21.4.10) pārthuraśmaṃ brahmasāma bhavati
analyzed: pārthuraśmam brahma sāma bhavati

original: (PB 21.4.11) īśvaro vā eṣo 'yato 'dhṛtaḥ parāṃ parāvatam eto raśminā vā aśvo dhṛto yat pārthuraśmaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty aśvasyaiva yatyai
analyzed: īśvaraḥ vai eṣaḥ a yataḥ a dhṛtaḥ parām parāvatam raśminā vai aśvaḥ dhṛtaḥ yat pārthuraśmam brahma sāma bhavati aśvasya eva yatyai

original: (PB 21.4.12) sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
analyzed: sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena āpnoti sarvam jayati

original: (PB 21.4.13) ekayūpo vaikādaśinī vānyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavaty ekaviṃśiny aśvamedhasya
analyzed: eka yūpaḥ vā ekādaśinī vā anyeṣām yajñānām bhavati ekaviṃśinī aśvamedhasya

original: khādiro vā bailvo vā pārṇo vā 'nyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavati naicudāra ekaviṃśatyaratnir
analyzed: khādiraḥ vā bailvaḥ vā pārṇaḥ vā anyeṣām yajñānām bhavati naicudāraḥ ekaviṃśati aratniḥ

original: aśvamedhasya nānyeṣāṃ paśūnāṃ tejanyā avadyanty avadyanty aśvamedhasya dakṣiṇato
analyzed: aśvamedhasya na anyeṣām paśūnām tejanyāḥ avadyanti avadyanti aśvamedhasya dakṣiṇatas

original: 'nyeṣāṃ paśūnām avadyanty uttarato 'śvamedhasya plakṣaśākhāsv anyeṣāṃ paśūnām avadyanti
analyzed: anyeṣām paśūnām avadyanti uttaratas aśvamedhasya plakṣa śākhāsu anyeṣām paśūnām avadyanti

original: vetasaśākhāsv aśvamedhasya yūpe grāmyān paśūn niyuñjanty ārokeṣv āraṇyān dhārayanty
analyzed: vetasa śākhāsu aśvamedhasya yūpe grāmyān paśūn niyuñjanti ārokeṣu āraṇyān dhārayanti

original: ā grāmyān paśūn labhante prāraṇyān sṛjanti
analyzed: ā grāmyān paśūn labhante pra āraṇyān sṛjanti

original: (PB 21.5.1) trayas trivṛto 'tirātrāḥ sarve ṣoḍaśimantaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ trivṛtaḥ atirātrāḥ sarve ṣoḍaśimantaḥ

original: (PB 21.5.2) yo rājya āśaṃseta sa etena yajeta
analyzed: yaḥ rājye āśaṃseta saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 21.5.3) rājā vā eṣa stomānāṃ rājyam evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: rājā vai eṣa stomānām rājyam eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 21.5.4) yadākṣārāṇi prathamam ahar bhajanta ekākṣarā vai vāg vāco 'nativādāya
analyzed: yadā akṣārāṇi prathamam ahar bhajante eka akṣarā vai vāc vācaḥ an ativādāya

original: (PB 21.5.5) atha yat dvyakṣaraṇidhanam ājyadohaṃ bhavaty uttarayor ahor abhisantatyā anvaham ājyadohāni bhavanty anvaham evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayanti

analyzed: sāvitraḥ pañca kapālaḥ dhātraḥ ṣaṣ kapālaḥ mārūtaḥ sapta kapālaḥ bārhaspatyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ

original: maitro navakapālo vārūṇo daśakapāla aindra ekādaśakapālo vaiśvadevo dvādaśakapālaḥ
analyzed: maitraḥ nava kapālaḥ vārūṇaḥ daśa kapālaḥ aindraḥ ekādaśa kapālaḥ vaiśvadevaḥ dvādaśa kapālaḥ

original: (PB 21.11.1) trivṛta prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
analyzed: trivṛta prātassavanam pañcadaśam mādhyandinam savanam saptadaśam tṛtīyasavanam

original: pañcadaśaṃ prātassavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
analyzed: pañcadaśam prātassavanam saptadaśam mādhyandinam savanam ekaviṃśam tṛtīyasavanam

original: sokthaṃ saptadaśaṃ prātassavanam ekaviṃśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ triṇavaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
analyzed: sa uktham saptadaśam prātassavanam ekaviṃśam mādhyandinam savanam triṇavam tṛtīyasavanam

original: soktham ekaviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
analyzed: sa uktham ekaviṃśam prātassavanam triṇavam mādhyandinam savanam trayastriṃśam tṛtīyasavanam

analyzed: pratyavarohīṇi ukthāni triṇavam prathamam dve ekaviṃśe sa ṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhiḥ

original: (PB 21.11.2) vasiṣṭhaḥ putrahato hīna ivāmanyata sa etam apaśyat so 'graṃ paryaid yo hīna iva manyeta sa etena yajeta
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ putra hataḥ hīnaḥ iva amanyata saḥ etam apaśyat saḥ agram paryait yaḥ hīnaḥ iva manyeta saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 21.11.3) yat stomāt stomam abhisaṃkrāmaty agrād evāgraṃ rohati vasiṣṭhasya janitre bhavataḥ prajātyai
analyzed: yat stomāt stomam abhisaṃkrāmati agrāt eva agram rohati vasiṣṭhasya janitre bhavataḥ prajātyai

original: (PB 21.11.4) pratyavarohīṇy uttamasyāhna ukthāni bhavanti pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: pratyavarohīṇi uttamasya ahnaḥ ukthāni bhavanti pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 21.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa uktha ekaviṃśo 'tirātro viśvāmitrasya sañjayaḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthaḥ saptadaśaḥ ukthaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ atirātraḥ viśvāmitrasya sañjayaḥ

original: (PB 21.12.2) jahnuvṛcīvanto rāṣṭra āhiṃsanta sa viśvāmitro jāhnavo rājaitam apaśyat sa rāṣṭram abhavad arāṣṭram itare
analyzed: jahnu vṛcīvantaḥ rāṣṭre āhiṃsanta sa viśvāmitraḥ jāhnavaḥ rājā etam apaśyat sa rāṣṭram abhavat a rāṣṭram itare

original: (PB 21.12.3) bhrātṛvyavān yajeta
analyzed: bhrātṛvyavān yajeta

analyzed: bhavati ātmanā parā asya bhrātṛvyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: jyotiḥ prajānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ vai eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 21.13.1) dve trivṛtī savane pañcadaśam ekaṃ dve pañcadaśe savane saptadaśam ekaṃ
analyzed: dve trivṛtī savane pañcadaśam ekam dve pañcadaśe savane saptadaśam ekam

original: dve saptadaśe savane ekaviṃśam ekaṃ dve ekaviṃśe savane triṇavam ekaṃ dve triṇave

original: savane trayastriṃśam ekaṃ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe

original: saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
analyzed: sa ṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhiḥ

original: (PB 21.13.2) devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta te na vyajayanta te 'bruvan vāco mithunena
analyzed: devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca aspardhanta te na vyajayanta te abruvan vācaḥ mithunena

original: vijayāmahai yatare no vāco mithunaṃ na prativindāṃs te parā bhavān iti te devā eka
analyzed: vijayāmahai yatare naḥ vācaḥ mithunam na prativindān te parāḥ bhavān iti te devāḥ eka

analyzed: iti abruvan ekā iti asurāḥ vācaḥ mithunam pratyavindan dvau iti devāḥ abruvan dve iti

analyzed: asurāḥ vācaḥ mithunam pratyavindanan trayaḥ iti devāḥ abruvan tisraḥ iti asurāḥ vācaḥ

original: mithunaṃ pratyavindaṃś catvāra iti devā abruvaṃś catastra ity asurā vāco mithunaṃ
analyzed: mithunam pratyavindan catvāraḥ iti devāḥ abruvan catastraḥ iti asurāḥ vācaḥ mithunam

original: pratyavindan pañceti devā abruvan nāsurā avindaṃs tato devā abhavan parāsurāḥ
analyzed: pratyavindan pañca iti devāḥ abruvan na asurāḥ avindan tatas devāḥ abhavan para asurāḥ

original: (PB 21.13.3) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: bhavati ātmanā parā asya bhrātṛvyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.13.4) saṃvatsaraṃ vā eṣāṃ tad vīryam annādyam avṛñjata

original: (PB 21.13.5) saṃvatsaraṃ vīryam annādyaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda

analyzed: pañca rātraḥ vai eṣa pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ tena purūṣam ca paśūn ca āpnoti

analyzed: yatra yatra hi asthūriṇā kāmayate tat tat abhyaśnute

original: (PB 21.13.9) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho bhavati santatyai
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ bhavati santatyai

original: (PB 21.13.10) pratyavarohīṇy uttamasyāhna ukthāni bhavanti pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: pratyavarohīṇi uttamasya ahnaḥ ukthāni bhavanti pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 21.14.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa ukthaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśo 'tirātraḥ pañcaśāradīyo marutāṃ stomaḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthaḥ saptadaśaḥ ukthaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthaḥ saptadaśaḥ atirātraḥ pañcaśāradīyaḥ marutām stomaḥ

original: (PB 21.14.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta
analyzed: yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti saḥ etena yajeta

analyzed: saptadaśa pṛśnīn ukṣṇaḥ pañca varṣān saptadaśa pṛśnīḥ trivatsāḥ a pravītāḥ tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitān etarāḥ labhante pra itarān sṛjanti

analyzed: tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitān etarāḥ labhante pra itarān sṛjanti tatas saṃvatsare piśaṅgīḥ

analyzed: ānayanti tān ca eva ukṣṇaḥ tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitān etarāḥ labhante pra itarān sṛjanti

analyzed: labhante pretarān sṛjanti

analyzed: tatas saṃvatsare somāḥ bhavanti

analyzed: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ

analyzed: yadi avasīdeḥ nairṛtam carum nirūpya atha anyam ālabheta yadi apsu mriyeta āponaptrīyam carum nirūpya atha anyam ālabheta yadi andhasyāt

analyzed: sauryam carum nirūpya atha anyam ālabheta

analyzed: etena vai eka yāvā gāndamaḥ vetasvatī yaj sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot

original: (PB 21.14.21) sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 21.15.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaur ukthyo mahāvrataṃ gaur ukthya āyur atirātraḥ
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ mahāvratam gauḥ ukthyaḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 21.15.2) saṃvatsaro vai vrataṃ tasya vasanta ṛtur mukhaṃ grīṣmaś ca varṣāś ca pakṣau śaran madhyaṃ hemantaḥ puccham
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ vai vratam tasya vasantaḥ ṛtuḥ mukham grīṣmaḥ ca varṣāḥ ca pakṣau śarad madhyam hemantaḥ puccham

analyzed: tasmāt śaradam oṣadhayaḥ abhisampacyante śarad hi madhyam saṃvatsarasya

original: (PB 21.15.5) etad vai vratam āptaṃ yat pañcarātre pañca hy ṛtavaḥ

original: (PB 21.15.6) āptena vratena stute sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: āptena vratena stute sarvam āyuḥ eti yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.1.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ

original: (PB 22.1.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta praty eva tiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.1.3) ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitena pratitiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛdhyai
analyzed: ṣaṭ vai ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva etena pratitiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ bhavati pratyakṣam ṛdhyai

original: (PB 22.1.4) pratyakṣaṃ hy etenartava ārdhnuvann ṛdhyā eva
analyzed: pratyakṣam hi etena ṛtavaḥ ārdhnuvan ṛdhyai eva

original: (PB 22.2.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyaḥ saptadaśa ukthyo jyotir gaur āyur atirātraḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthyaḥ saptadaśaḥ ukthyaḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.2.2) yaḥ kāmayeta sarvam āyur iyām iti sa etena yajeta
analyzed: yaḥ kāmayeta sarvam āyuḥ iyām iti saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 22.2.3) yat tryahaḥ purastād bhavati trayaḥ prāṇāpānavyānās ta eva tat saṃdhīyante
analyzed: yat tri ahaḥ purastāt bhavati trayaḥ prāṇa apāna vyānāḥ te eva tat saṃdhīyante

original: (PB 22.2.4) atha yat jyotir gaur āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: atha yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 22.3.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho viśvajid atirātraḥ
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.3.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tatsatreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattram
analyzed: anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajñaḥ na tat satreṇa āpnoti yasmai ekam yajñaḥ na tat yajñena āpnoti yasmai ekam sattram

original: (PB 22.3.3) sattram iva vā etad yad anulomaṃ pṛṣṭhāni yad ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavanty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tad ojo vīryaṃ dadhāti
analyzed: sattram iva vai etat yat anulomam pṛṣṭhāni yat ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavanti ekadhā eva asmin tat ojaḥ vīryam dadhāti

original: (PB 22.3.4) annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: annam pṛṣṭhāni annādyam eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 22.3.5) paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.3.6) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho bhavati santatyai
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ bhavati santatyai

original: (PB 22.3.7) viśvajid atirātro bhavati viśvasyābhijityai
analyzed: viśvajit atirātraḥ bhavati viśvasya abhijityai

original: (PB 22.4.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho mahāvratam atirātraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ mahāvratam atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.4.2) sapta ṛṣaya etenārdhnuvaṃs tenarddhis tasmād etena yajanta ṛddhyā eva
analyzed: sapta ṛṣayaḥ etena ārdhnuvan tena ṛddhiḥ tasmāt etena yajante ṛddhyai eva

original: (PB 22.4.3) sapta śirasi prāṇāḥ prāṇā indriyāṇīndriyāṇy evaitenāpnoti
analyzed: sapta śirasi prāṇāḥ prāṇāḥ indriyāṇi indriyāṇi eva etena āpnoti

original: (PB 22.4.4) sapta grāmyāḥ paśavas tān etenāpnoti
analyzed: sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ tān etena āpnoti

original: (PB 22.4.5) vrataṃ saptamasyāhnaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati tad dhy anāptam annaṃ vai vratam annādyam evaitenāpnoti
analyzed: vratam saptamasya ahnaḥ pṛṣṭham bhavati tat hi an āptam annam vai vratam annādyam eva etena āpnoti

original: (PB 22.4.6) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛdhyai
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ bhavati pratyakṣam ṛdhyai

original: (PB 22.4.7) pratyakṣaṃ hy etena sapta ṛṣaya ārdhnuvann ṛdhyā eva
analyzed: pratyakṣam hi etena sapta ṛṣayaḥ ārdhnuvan ṛdhyai eva

original: (PB 22.5.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ saptadaśaṃ mahāvratam atirātraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ saptadaśam mahāvratam atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.5.2) tasya trivṛc chiraḥ pañcadaśau pakṣau saptadaśa ātmaikaviṃśaṃ puccham
analyzed: tasya trivṛt śiraḥ pañcadaśau pakṣau saptadaśaḥ ātmā ekaviṃśam puccham

original: (PB 22.5.3) etena vai prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata
analyzed: etena vai prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata

original: (PB 22.5.4) pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: pra prajayā pra paśubhiḥ jāyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.5.5) saptadaśo vai prajāpatir yat saptadaśaṃ vrataṃ bhavati prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ yat saptadaśam vratam bhavati prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 22.5.6) yat trivṛc chiro bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva prati tiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat trivṛt śiraḥ bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣu eva prati tiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.5.7) yat pañcadaśau pakṣau savīvadhatvāya
analyzed: yat pañcadaśau pakṣau sa vīvadha tvāya

original: (PB 22.5.8) saptadaśa ātmā bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajā patim evāpnoti
analyzed: saptadaśaḥ ātmā bhavati prajāpatiḥ vai saptadaśaḥ prajā patim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 22.5.9) ekaviṃśaṃ puccha bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: ekaviṃśam puccha bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 22.6.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaś chandomapavamānaṃ mahāvratam atirātraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ chandomapavamānam mahāvratam atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.6.2) paśukāmo yajeta
analyzed: paśu kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 22.6.3) paśavo vai chandāmāḥ
analyzed: paśavaḥ vai chandāmāḥ

original: (PB 22.6.4) yac chadomāḥ pavamānā mahāvratasya bhavanti paśūnevāvarūndhe
analyzed: yat chadomāḥ pavamānāḥ mahāvratasya bhavanti paśūn eva avarūndhe

original: (PB 22.6.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
analyzed: ubhaye stomāḥ yugmantaḥ ca ayujaḥ ca tat mithunam tasmāt mithunāt prajāyate

original: (PB 22.7.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho 'tha trayastriṃśām ahas tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ atha trayastriṃśām ahar tasya catustriṃśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ

original: saptadaśaṃ mahāvratam atirātras tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛc chiraḥ pañcadaśau
analyzed: saptadaśam mahāvratam atirātraḥ tasya caturviṃśam bahiṣpavamānam trivṛt śiraḥ pañcadaśau

original: pakṣau saptadaśa ātmaikaviṃśaṃ puccham
analyzed: pakṣau saptadaśaḥ ātmā ekaviṃśam puccham

original: (PB 22.7.2) etena vai jamadagniḥ sarvān poṣān apuṣyat sarvān evaitena poṣān puṣyati
analyzed: etena vai jamadagniḥ sarvān poṣān apuṣyat sarvān eva etena poṣān puṣyati

original: (PB 22.7.3) yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati santatyā eva
analyzed: yat abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastāt bhavati santatyai eva

original: (PB 22.7.4) athaitat trayastriṃśam ahas trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoti
analyzed: atha etat trayastriṃśam ahar trayastriṃśat devatāḥ devatāḥ eva āpnoti

original: (PB 22.7.5) tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
analyzed: tasya catustriṃśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ prajāpatiḥ catustriṃśaḥ devatānām prajāpatim eva āpnoti

original: (PB 22.7.6) caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati mahāvratasya caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
analyzed: caturviṃśam bahiṣpavamānam bhavati mahāvratasya caturviṃśati akṣarā gāyatrī prajananam gāyatrī prajātyai

original: (PB 22.7.7) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
analyzed: ubhaye stomāḥ yugmantaḥ ca ayujaḥ ca tat mithunam tasmāt mithunāt prajāyate

original: (PB 22.7.8) yat trivṛc chiro bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati yat pañcadaśau
analyzed: yat trivṛt śiraḥ bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati yat pañcadaśau

original: pakṣau savīvadhatvāya saptadaśa ātmā bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim
analyzed: pakṣau sa vīvadha tvāya saptadaśaḥ ātmā bhavati prajāpatiḥ vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim

original: evāpnoty ekaviṃśaṃ pucchaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: eva āpnoti ekaviṃśam puccham bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 22.8.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo viśvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ āyuḥ ukthyaḥ abhijit agniṣṭomaḥ viśvajit agniṣṭomaḥ sarvajit agniṣṭomaḥ sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.8.2) etena vā indro 'ty ānyā devatā abhavad aty anyā prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: etena vai indraḥ ati ā anyāḥ devatāḥ abhavat ati anyā prajā bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.8.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ purastāt bhavati prajñātān stomān upaiti imān eva lokān eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.8.4) athābhijid abhijitā vai devā imān lokān abhyajayan viśvajitā viśvam ajayan sarvajitā sarvam ajayan
analyzed: atha abhijit abhijitā vai devāḥ imān lokān abhyajayan viśvajitā viśvam ajayan sarvajitā sarvam ajayan

original: (PB 22.8.5) sarvastomātirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
analyzed: sarva stoma atirātraḥ bhavati sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena āpnoti sarvam jayati

original: (PB 22.9.1) catvāri trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhāni viśvajin mahāvrataṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: catvāri trivṛnti ahāni agniṣṭoma mukhāni viśvajit mahāvratam jyotiṣṭomaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.9.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata sa sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyam agacchat
analyzed: etena vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata sa sarvasya annādyasya ādhipatyam agacchat

original: (PB 22.9.3) sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: sarvasya annādyasya ādhipatyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.9.4) śiro vā agre sambhavataḥ sambhavati caturdhā vihitaṃ vai śiraḥ prāṇaś cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgātmā vai pṛṣṭhāni yat pṛṣṭhāny upaiti śira  #
analyzed: śiraḥ vai agre sambhavataḥ sambhavati caturdhā vihitam vai śiraḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram vāc ātmā vai pṛṣṭhāni yat pṛṣṭhāni upaiti

original: evātmānam anusandadhāti
analyzed: eva ātmānam anusandadhāti

original: (PB 22.9.5) etad vai purūṣam akas tasmā annam eva vratam apidadhāti
analyzed: etat vai purūṣam akaḥ tasmai annam eva vratam apidadhāti

original: (PB 22.9.6) atha yat jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
analyzed: atha yat jyotiṣṭomaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati a kḷptasya kḷptyai

original: (PB 22.10.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ stomaḥ ṣaḍaho viśvajid atirātraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ stomaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.10.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ
analyzed: anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajñaḥ na tat sattreṇa āpnoti yasmai ekam

original: yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattraṃ sattram iva vā etad yad anulomaṃ pṛṣṭhāni
analyzed: yajñaḥ na tat yajñena āpnoti yasmaikam sattram sattram iva vai etat yat anulomam pṛṣṭhāni

original: yadaikadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavaty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tejo vīryaṃ dadhāty annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny annādyam
analyzed: yadā ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavati ekadhā eva asmin tejaḥ vīryam dadhāti annam pṛṣṭhāni annādyam

original: evāsmin dadhāti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: eva asmin dadhāti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.10.3) yad vai manuṣyāṇāṃ pratyakṣaṃ taddevānāṃ parokṣamatha yanma manuṣyāṇāṃ parokṣaṃ taddevānāṃ pratyakṣam
analyzed: yat vai manuṣyāṇām pratyakṣam tat devānām parokṣam atha yat ma manuṣyāṇām parokṣam tat devānām pratyakṣam

original: (PB 22.10.4) etad vai parokṣaṃ vrataṃ yad viśvajit pratyakṣam evaitenānnādyam avarundhe
analyzed: etat vai parokṣam vratam yat viśvajit pratyakṣam eva etena annādyam avarundhe

original: (PB 22.11.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho mahāvrataṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ mahāvratam jyotiṣṭomaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.11.2) etena vai devā devatvam agacchan
analyzed: etena vai devāḥ deva tvam agacchan

original: (PB 22.11.3) devatvaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: deva tvam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.11.4) etad vai vratam āptaṃ yad aṣṭarātre 'gniṣṭomo hi vrataṃ sampadyate
analyzed: etat vai vratam āptam yat aṣṭa rātre agniṣṭomaḥ hi vratam sampadyate

original: (PB 22.11.5) atha yat jyotiṣṭhomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
analyzed: atha yat jyotiṣṭhomaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati a kḷptasya kḷptyai

original: (PB 22.11.6) aṣṭarātreṇa vai devāḥ sarvam āśnuvata
analyzed: aṣṭa rātreṇa vai devāḥ sarvam āśnuvata

original: (PB 22.11.7) sarvam aśnute ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: sarvam aśnute yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.12.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho jyotir gaur āyur atirātro devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etena navarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ devāḥ vai mṛtyoḥ abibhayuḥ te prajāpatim upādhāvan tebhyaḥ etena navarātreṇa amṛta tvam

original: (PB 22.12.2) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
analyzed: etat vāva manuṣyasya amṛta tvam yat sarvam āyuḥ eti vasīyān bhavati

original: (PB 22.12.3) sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: sarvam āyuḥ eti vasīyān bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.12.4) navarātro vā eṣa nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: nava rātraḥ vai eṣa nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.12.5) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛddhayā atha yat jyotir gaur āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ bhavati pratyakṣam ṛddhayā atha yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 22.13.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭhomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭhomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ āyuḥ ukthyaḥ abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ paśu kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 22.13.2) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ purastāt bhavati prajñātān stomān upaiti imān eva lokān eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.13.3) atha yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho madhyato bhavati pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
analyzed: atha yat abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ madhyataḥ bhavati pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ tena purūṣam ca paśūn ca āpnoti

original: (PB 22.13.4) viśvajid atirātro bhavati viśvasyābhijityai
analyzed: viśvajit atirātraḥ bhavati viśvasya abhijityai

original: (PB 22.14.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyas trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭoma
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthyaḥ trivṛt agniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśaḥ agniṣṭoma

original: ekaviṃśa ukthyaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomas triṇavo 'gniṣṭomas trayastriṃśa ukthyas triṇavo
analyzed: ekaviṃśaḥ ukthyaḥ saptadaśaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ triṇavaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ trayastriṃśaḥ ukthyaḥ triṇavaḥ

original: 'gniṣṭomo viśvajid atirātraḥ
analyzed: agniṣṭomaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.14.2) indro 'surān hatvākāryaṃ cakṛvāṃ amanyata taṃ devā etena stomenāyājayan sa pāpmano nairdaśyam agacchat
analyzed: indraḥ asurān hatvā akāryam cakṛvān amanyata tam devāḥ etena stomena ayājayan sa pāpmanaḥ nairdaśyam agacchat

original: (PB 22.14.3) tasmād iṣuhato vā daṇḍahato vā daśamīṃ nairdaśyaṃ gacchati
analyzed: tasmāt iṣu hataḥ vā daṇḍa hataḥ vā daśamīm nairdaśyam gacchati

original: (PB 22.14.4) daśa daśinī vā eṣā virāḍ annaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
analyzed: daśa daśinī vai eṣā virāj annam virāj annādyam eva asmin dadhāti

original: (PB 22.14.5) agniṣṭomena vai devā asurān nigṛhya madhyata ukthaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyantāgniṣṭomenaiva bhrātṛvyaṃ nigṛhya madhyata ukthyaiḥ  #
analyzed: agniṣṭomena vai devāḥ asurān nigṛhya madhyatas ukthaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyanta agniṣṭomena eva bhrātṛvyam nigṛhya madhyatas ukthyaiḥ  /

original: prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate
analyzed: prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate

original: (PB 22.14.6) trikakub vā eṣa yajñaḥ
analyzed: tri kakubh vai eṣa yajñaḥ

original: (PB 22.14.7) trikakup samānānāṃ ca prajānāṃ ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: tri kakubh samānānām ca prajānām ca bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.15.1) trayastrivṛto 'gniṣṭomās trayaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyās trayaḥ saptadaśa ukthyā ekaviṃśo 'tirātraḥ kusuruvindadaśarātraḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ trivṛtaḥ agniṣṭomāḥ trayaḥ pañcadaśaḥ ukthyāḥ trayaḥ saptadaśaḥ ukthyāḥ ekaviṃśaḥ atirātraḥ kusuruvinda daśarātraḥ

original: (PB 22.15.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta
analyzed: yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti saḥ etena yajeta

original: (PB 22.15.3) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomo bahur eva bhavati
analyzed: yat gaṇaśas stomaḥ bahuḥ eva bhavati

original: (PB 22.15.4) saha trivṛta saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ
analyzed: saha trivṛta saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ

original: (PB 22.15.5) ekaviṃśo 'tirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: ekaviṃśaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 22.15.6) jyotir vā eṣa vihṛtaḥ
analyzed: jyotiḥ vai eṣa vihṛtaḥ

original: (PB 22.15.7) jyotiṣ prajānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: jyotiḥ prajānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.15.8) catuṣṭomo vā eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: catuṣṭomaḥ vai eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.15.9) ekaviṃśaṃ stomā nātiyanti pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśaḥ praty eva tiṣṭhati
analyzed: ekaviṃśam stomāḥ na atiyanti pratiṣṭhā vai ekaviṃśaḥ prati eva tiṣṭhati

original: (PB 22.15.10) etena vai kusurūvinda auddālakir iṣṭvā bhūmānam āśnuta
analyzed: etena vai kusurūvindaḥ auddālakiḥ iṣṭvā bhūmānam āśnuta

original: (PB 22.15.11) bhūmānam aśnute ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: bhūmānam aśnute yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.16.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaś catvāraś chandomaḥ viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ catvāraḥ chandomaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ paśu kāmaḥ yajeta

original: (PB 22.16.2) yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
analyzed: yat abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastāt bhavati pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ tena purūṣam ca paśūn ca āpnoti

original: (PB 22.16.3) chandomā madhyato bhavanti paśavo vai chandomāḥ paśūnām avarudhyai
analyzed: chandomāḥ madhyatas bhavanti paśavaḥ vai chandomāḥ paśūnām avarudhyai

original: (PB 22.16.4) viśvajid atirātro bhavati viśvasyābhijityai
analyzed: viśvajit atirātraḥ bhavati viśvasya abhijityai

original: (PB 22.17.1) triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo jyotir ukthyas triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaurukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo gaur ukthyo viśvajid agniṣṭoma āyur ukthyo viśvajid  #
analyzed: triṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ jyotiḥ ukthyaḥ triṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ abhijit agniṣṭomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ viśvajit agniṣṭomaḥ āyuḥ ukthyaḥ viśvajit

original: agniṣṭomasya sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: agniṣṭomasya sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.17.2) devā vā asurair hanyamānās te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etāṃ devapuraṃ prāyacchat tāṃ prāviśan
analyzed: devāḥ vai asuraiḥ hanyamānāḥ te prajāpatim upādhāvan tebhyaḥ etām deva puram prāyacchat tām prāviśan

original: (PB 22.17.3) abhicāryamāṇaṃ yājayed etām eva devapuraṃ praviśaty asṛtyai
analyzed: abhicāryamāṇam yājayet etām eva deva puram praviśati asṛtyai

original: (PB 22.18.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayaś chandomāś catuṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo viśvajid atirātraḥ
analyzed: abhyāsaṅgyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trayaḥ chandomāḥ catuṣṭomaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ

original: (PB 22.18.2) svārājyo vā eṣa yajñaḥ
analyzed: svārājyaḥ vai eṣa yajñaḥ

original: (PB 22.18.3) svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: svārājyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.18.4) prajāpatir hi svārājyaṃ parameṣṭhī svārājyam
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ hi svārājyam parameṣṭhī svārājyam

original: (PB 22.18.5) parameṣṭhitāṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: parameṣṭhi tām gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.18.6) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavatas tad dhi svārājyam ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad
analyzed: ubhe bṛhat rathantare bhavataḥ tat hi svārājyam ayutam dakṣiṇāḥ tat

original: dhi svārājyaṃ ṣaḍviṃśastomo bhavati sa hi svārājyaṃ catuṣṭomastomaḥ sa hy anto 'nte
analyzed: dhi svārājyam ṣaḍviṃśa stomaḥ bhavati sa hi svārājyam catuṣṭoma stomaḥ sa hi antaḥ ante

original: śriyā gacchati ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: śriyā gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 22.18.7) etena vai kṣema dhṛtvā pauṇḍarīkaṃ iṣṭvā sudāmnas tīra uttare
analyzed: etena vai kṣema dhṛtvā pauṇḍarīkam iṣṭvā sudāmnaḥ tīre uttare

original: (PB 22.18.8) sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvāmṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti yaḥ evam veda

original: (PB 23.1.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraś catvāraś chandomā atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarva stomaḥ atirātraḥ catvāraḥ chandomāḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.1.2) eṣa vā āpto dvādaśāho yat trayodaśarātraḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai āptaḥ dvādaśa ahaḥ yat trayodaśa rātraḥ

original: (PB 23.1.3) samāno hy eṣa yat prayaṇīyaś codayanīyaś cātirātrau kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etābhir abhyaśnuvate
analyzed: samānaḥ hi eṣa yat prayaṇīyaḥ ca udayanīyaḥ ca atirātrau kāmam kāmayante tam etābhiḥ abhyaśnuvate

original: (PB 23.1.4) gṛhapates tu vāg upadāsukā bhavati tad yan madhye sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati tena gṛhapater vāg anupadāsukā bhavati
analyzed: gṛhapateḥ tu vāc upadāsukā bhavati tat yat madhye sarvastomaḥ atirātraḥ bhavati tena gṛhapateḥ vāc an upadāsukā bhavati

original: (PB 23.1.5) etā vā aryalagṛhapataya ārūṇihotāraḥ subhagāsūpayanti te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etāḥ vai aryala gṛhapatayaḥ ārūṇi hotāraḥ subhagāsu upayanti te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.2.1) atirātro dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: atirātraḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 23.2.2) vāg vā eṣā pratāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tāṃ vicchindyur yan madhye 'tirātraṃ kuryuḥ
analyzed: vāc vai eṣā pratāyate yat eṣa dvādaśa ahaḥ tām vicchindyuḥ yat madhye atirātram kuryuḥ

original: (PB 23.2.3) yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti na vācaṃ vicchindanty āpnuvanti trayodaśaṃ māsam
analyzed: yat upariṣṭāt vratam upayanti na vācam vicchindanti āpnuvanti trayodaśam māsam

original: (PB 23.2.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitās trayodaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etāḥ vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ trayodaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.3.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.3.2) kāmasanayo vā etā rātrayaḥ
analyzed: kāma sanayaḥ vai etāḥ rātrayaḥ

original: (PB 23.3.3) virāḍh ḍhi daśātmaikādaśī prajā dvādaśī paśavas trayodaśī kāmāya caturdaśī
analyzed: virāj ḍhi daśa ātmā ekādaśī prajāḥ dvādaśī paśavaḥ trayodaśī kāmāya caturdaśī

original: (PB 23.3.4) sarvān evaitābhiḥ kāmān avarūndhate
analyzed: sarvān eva etābhiḥ kāmān avarūndhate

original: (PB 23.3.5) etā vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad etau trayastriṃśau madhyataḥ saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ rohanti
analyzed: etāḥ vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapaḥ yat etau trayastriṃśau madhyatas saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapam rohanti

original: (PB 23.3.6) dviḥ pṛṣṭhāny upayanty abhipūrvam evaitābhir annādyaṃ dadhate
analyzed: dvis pṛṣṭhāni upe abhipūrvam eva etad annādyam dadhate

original: (PB 23.4.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhya ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaṣ ahaḥ āyuḥ gauḥ jyotiḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.4.2) yāṃs talpe vodake vā vivāhe vā mīmāṃseraṃs ta etā upeyuḥ
analyzed: yān talpe vā udake vā vivāhe vā mīmāṃseran te etāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 23.4.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātāṃ stomān upayanti
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ prajñātām stomān upayanti

original: (PB 23.4.4) imān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhānti
analyzed: imān eva lokān eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhānti

original: (PB 23.4.5) atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty eṣu vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti
analyzed: atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ madhyataḥ bhavati eṣu vāva deva talpaḥ deva talpam eva tat ārohanti talpyāḥ bhavanti

original: (PB 23.4.6) pravasīyasas talpam āpnuvanti
analyzed: pravasīyasaḥ talpam āpnuvanti

original: (PB 23.4.7) atha yad āyur gaur jyotir atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
analyzed: atha yat āyuḥ gauḥ jyotiḥ atirātraḥ yena itas yanti tena punar āyanti

original: (PB 23.5.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ gauḥ ca āyuḥ ca dve ahanī dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.5.2) yad gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī bhavato mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
analyzed: yat gauḥ ca āyuḥ ca dve ahanī bhavataḥ mithunau stomau upayanti prajātyai

original: (PB 23.5.3) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
analyzed: atha yāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya

original: (PB 23.5.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāś caturdaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etāḥ vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ caturdaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.6.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho mahāvrataṃ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ mahāvratam pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.6.2) etābhir vai devā devatvam agacchan devatvaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai devāḥ deva tvam agacchan deva tvam gacchanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.6.3) etad vai devānāṃ sattraṃ tad adyāpi devāḥ sattram āsate
analyzed: etat vai devānām sattram tat adya api devāḥ sattram āsate

original: (PB 23.6.4) paurṇamāsy atirātro 'tha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha ekāṣṭakā mahāvratam atha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho 'māvāsyātirātraḥ
analyzed: paurṇamāsī atirātraḥ atha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ ekāṣṭakā mahāvratam atha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ amāvāsyā atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.6.5) tasmāt tarhi manuṣyāṇāṃ na suto devānāṃ hi tarhi sutaḥ pratyakṣam evaitābhir devatā abhyārohanti
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi manuṣyāṇām na sutaḥ devānām hi tarhi sutaḥ pratyakṣam eva etābhiḥ devatāḥ abhyārohanti

original: (PB 23.6.6) pratinodāt tu bhayyam itaram anupakṣo dīkṣerann apratinodāya
analyzed: pratinodāt tu bhayyam itaram anupakṣaḥ dīkṣeran a pratinodāya

original: (PB 23.7.1) atirātras trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaṣ ahaḥ āyuḥ gauḥ jyotiḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.7.2) kṣatraṃ vā etā rātrayo 'bhinirvadanti
analyzed: kṣatram vai etāḥ rātrayaḥ abhinirvadanti

original: (PB 23.7.3) brahmavarcasakāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: brahmavarcasa kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 23.7.4) yat trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo bhavati brahma tad yaśasārdhayati
analyzed: yat trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ bhavati brahma tat yaśasā ardhayati

original: (PB 23.7.5) brahma vai trivṛt
analyzed: brahma vai trivṛt

original: (PB 23.7.6) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ prajñātān stomān upayanti imān eva lokān eṣu

original: eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanty atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty annaṃ vai pṛṣṭāny
analyzed: eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ madhyataḥ bhavati annam vai pṛṣṭāni

original: annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoty atha yad āyur gaur
analyzed: annam eva tat madhyatas dhīyate tasmāt madhye sat annam dhinoti atha yat āyuḥ gauḥ

original: jyotir atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
analyzed: jyotiḥ atirātraḥ yena itas yanti tena punar āyanti

original: (PB 23.8.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.8.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattram
analyzed: anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajñaḥ na tat sattreṇa āpnoti yasmai ekam yajñaḥ na tat yajñena āpnoti yasmai ekam sattram

original: (PB 23.8.3) yad anyato 'tirātrās tena yajño 'tha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni tena sattram
analyzed: yat anyatas atirātrāḥ tena yajñaḥ atha yāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni tena sattram

original: (PB 23.8.4) ubhāv evaitābhiḥ kāmāv avarūndhate
analyzed: ubhau eva etābhiḥ kāmau avarūndhate

original: (PB 23.9.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ prajākāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ prajā kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 23.9.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyante ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata pra prajayā pra paśubhiḥ jāyante ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.9.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ prajātān stomān upayanti imān eva lokān eṣu eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 23.9.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
analyzed: atha yāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya

original: (PB 23.9.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ pañcadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etāḥ vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ pañcadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.10.1) etā eva samahāvratāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ eva sa mahāvratāḥ

original: (PB 23.10.2) etābhir vā indraḥ paramāṃ vijitiṃ vyajayata paramām evaitābhir vijitiṃ vijayante
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai indraḥ paramām vijitim vyajayata paramām eva etābhiḥ vijitim vijayante

original: (PB 23.10.3) pañcadaśo vai vajro na vā agṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti yā ṣoḍaśy ārambhaṇam eva tad gṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti
analyzed: pañcadaśaḥ vai vajraḥ na vai a gṛhītena vajreṇa vīryam karoti yā ṣoḍaśī ārambhaṇam eva tat gṛhītena vajreṇa vīryam karoti

original: (PB 23.11.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyur gaur āyuḥ pañcāho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ gauḥ āyuḥ pañcāhaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.11.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantāṃ śriyam ajayad anantā vā etā yat pañcāhavidhāḥ
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai prajāpatiḥ anantām śriyam ajayat anantāḥ vai etāḥ yat pañca aha vidhāḥ

original: (PB 23.11.3) yat pañcāho 'nantād eva prajāyante
analyzed: yat pañcāhaḥ anantāt eva prajāyante

original: (PB 23.11.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
analyzed: atha yāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya

original: (PB 23.11.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ saptadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etāḥ vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ saptadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.12.1) atirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 23.12.2) devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etenāṣṭādaśarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ prāyacchat
analyzed: devāḥ vai mṛtyoḥ abibhayuḥ te prajāpatim upādhāvan tebhyaḥ etena aṣṭādaśa rātreṇa amṛta tvam prāyacchat

original: (PB 23.12.3) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
analyzed: etat vāva manuṣyasya amṛta tvam yat sarvam āyuḥ eti vasīyān bhavati

original: (PB 23.12.4) sarvam āyur yanti vasīyāṃso bhavanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: sarvam āyuḥ yanti vasīyāṃsaḥ bhavanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.12.5) dvir vā etā nava nava prāṇā abhipūrvam evaitābhir āyur dadhate
analyzed: dvis vai etāḥ nava nava prāṇāḥ abhipūrvam eva etābhiḥ āyuḥ dadhate

original: (PB 23.13.1) etā eva samahāvratāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ eva sa mahāvratāḥ

original: (PB 23.13.2) etābhir vai vāyur āraṇyānāṃ paśunām ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai vāyuḥ āraṇyānām paśunām ādhipatyam gacchanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 23.13.3) mṛgasatraṃ vā etat
analyzed: mṛga satram vai etat

analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ gauḥ āyuḥ pañcāhaḥ dvau abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

analyzed: dvātriṃśat akṣarā anuṣṭubh

analyzed: catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ
