original: (PB 23.28.7) etābhī rātrībhiḥ
analyzed: etābhiḥ rātrībhiḥ

original: (PB 23.28.8) tasmāt te vācā siddhā vācāhūtā ā yanti
analyzed: tasmāt te vācā siddhāḥ vācā āhūtāḥ ā inti

original: (PB 24.1.1) atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā viśvajid atirātra ekaḥ pañcāho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ trayaḥ pañcāhāḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ ekaḥ pañcāhaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.1.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs tā etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhann
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ na pratyatiṣṭhan tāḥ etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan

original: ime lokā na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti
analyzed: ime lokāḥ na pratyatiṣṭhan te etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ upeyuḥ prati eva tiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 24.1.3) arūpeṇa vā etāḥ sarūpā arūpeṇa prajāḥ sarūpā arūpeṇeme lokāḥ sarūpā yad rathantarasya lokaṃ bṛhad āpadyate bṛhato rathantaram arūpeṇaivaibhyas  #
analyzed: arūpeṇa vai etāḥ sarūpāḥ arūpeṇa prajāḥ sarūpāḥ arūpeṇa ime lokāḥ sarūpāḥ yat rathantarasya lokam bṛhat āpadyate bṛhantaḥ rathantaram arūpeṇa eva ebhyaḥ

original: tat sarūpaṃ prajanayanti
analyzed: tat sarūpam prajanayanti

original: (PB 24.1.4) lupyate vā etat ṣaṣṭham ahar yat pañcāhān upayanti nartavaḥ kalpanteḥ yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas tena ṣaṣṭham ahar na lupyate tenartavaḥ
analyzed: lupyate vai etat ṣaṣṭham ahar yat pañca ahān upayanti na ṛtavaḥ kalpanteḥ yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ tena ṣaṣṭham ahar na lupyate tena ṛtavaḥ

original: (PB 24.1.5) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni tena pañcāhebhyo na yanti
analyzed: atha yāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni tena pañca ahebhyaḥ na yanti

original: (PB 24.1.6) ūdhar vā antarikṣaṃ stanāv abhito 'nena vā eṣa devebhyo dugdhe 'munā prajābhyaḥ
analyzed: ūdhar vai antarikṣam stanau abhitas anena vai eṣa devebhyaḥ dugdhe amunā prajābhyaḥ

original: (PB 24.1.7) idaṃ vā antarikṣaṃ viyad imau stanāv abhitaḥ
analyzed: idam vai antarikṣam viyant imau stanau abhitas

original: (PB 24.1.8) tad abhyanūktā
analyzed: tat abhyanūktā

original: (PB 24.1.9) triṃśati trayaḥ paro ye devā barhir āsata vyann aha dvitā taneti
analyzed: triṃśati trayaḥ paras ye devāḥ barhiḥ āsata vyan aha dvitā tanā iti

original: (PB 24.1.10) ūdhar vai madhyamo 'tirātraḥ stanāv abhitaḥ
analyzed: ūdhar vai madhyamaḥ atirātraḥ stanau abhitas

original: (PB 24.1.11) yad eṣo 'natirātraḥ syād ūdhaḥ pratiharet
analyzed: yat eṣaḥ an atirātraḥ syāt ūdhaḥ pratiharet

original: (PB 24.1.12) tasmād atirātraḥ kārya ūdhaso 'pratihārāya
analyzed: tasmāt atirātraḥ kāryaḥ ūdhasaḥ a pratihārāya

original: (PB 24.1.13) trayastriṃśad devatā etābhir ārdhnuvaṃs tenardhis tasmād etābhir yajanta ṛdhyā eva
analyzed: trayastriṃśat devatāḥ etābhiḥ ārdhnuvan tena ṛdhiḥ tasmāt etābhiḥ yajante ṛdhyai eva

original: (PB 24.1.14) nānā brahmasāmāny upayanty ahnā nānā vīryatāyai nānaiva vīryāṇy avarūndhate
analyzed: nānā brahmasāmāni upayanti ahnā nānā vīrya tāyai nānā eva vīryāṇi avarūndhate

original: (PB 24.2.1) atirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirāś ca
analyzed: atirātraḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ atirātraḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ atirātraḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirāḥ ca

original: (PB 24.2.2) ādityāś cāṅgirasaś caitat sattraṃ samadadhatādityānām ekaviṃśatir aṅgirasāṃ
analyzed: ādityāḥ ca aṅgirasaḥ ca etat sattram samadadhata ādityānām ekaviṃśatiḥ aṅgirasām

original: dvādaśāha ādityā asmiṃl loka ṛddhā ādityā amuṣminn aṅgiraso 'sminn aṅgiraso 'muṣmin
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe ādityāḥ asmin loke ṛddhāḥ ādityāḥ amuṣmin aṅgirasaḥ asmin aṅgirasaḥ amuṣmin

original: dvayaṃ sattraṃ yāvad dvayena sattreṇardhnuvanti tāvaty etāsām ṛddhiḥ
analyzed: dvayam sattram yāvat dvayena sattreṇa ṛdhnuvanti tāvatī etāsām ṛddhiḥ

original: (PB 24.3.1) atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā viśvajid atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ trayaḥ pañcāhāḥ viśvajit atirātraḥ trayaḥ pañcāhāḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.3.2) apaśavyaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad acchandomaṃ yadviśvajiti chandomān upayanti tena chandomavatyas tena paśavyāḥ
analyzed: a paśavyam vai etat sattram yat a chandomam yat viśvajiti chandomān upayanti tena chandomavatyaḥ tena paśavyāḥ

original: (PB 24.3.3) pakṣiṇyo vā etā rātrayo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etābhir abhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
analyzed: pakṣiṇyaḥ vai etāḥ rātrayaḥ yam kāmam kāmayante tam etābhiḥ abhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tat abhyaśnute

original: (PB 24.3.4) trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtodyanti prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ prāṇair eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtā udyanti prāṇāḥ vai trivṛt stomānām prāṇaiḥ eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 24.4.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cardhikāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca ṛdhi kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 24.4.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.4.3) yad etāś catustriṃśad rātrayo bhavanti trayastriṃśad devatāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpater evardhim ṛdhnuvanti
analyzed: yat etāḥ catustriṃśat rātrayaḥ bhavanti trayastriṃśat devatāḥ prajāpatiḥ catustriṃśaḥ devatānām prajāpateḥ eva ṛdhim ṛdhnuvanti

original: (PB 24.5.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyuḥ pañcāhas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ pañcāhaḥ trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ paśu kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 24.5.2) yad etāḥ pañcātriṃśad rātrayo bhavanti pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evaitābhir avarundhate
analyzed: yat etāḥ pañcātriṃśat rātrayaḥ bhavanti pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn eva etābhiḥ avarundhate

original: (PB 24.6.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ paśu kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 24.6.2) etābhir vai devā ādityam astabhnuvann ādityalokaṃ jayanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai devāḥ ādityam astabhnuvan āditya lokam jayanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.6.3) bṛhatī vā etā rātrayaḥ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī yo vai paśūnāṃ bhūmānaṃ gacchati sa svārājyaṃ gacchati pra svārājyam āpnuvanti  #
analyzed: bṛhatī vai etāḥ rātrayaḥ svārājyam chandasām bṛhatī yaḥ vai paśūnām bhūmānam gacchati sa svārājyam gacchati pra svārājyam āpnuvanti  /

original: ya etā upayanti
analyzed: ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.7.1) etā eva samahāvratāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ eva sa mahāvratāḥ

original: (PB 24.7.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir ubhau kāmāv avārūndhānnaṃ vrataṃ paśavo bṛhaty ubhāv evaitābhiḥ kāmāv avarūndhate
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai prajāpatiḥ ubhau kāmau avārūndha annam vratam paśavaḥ bṛhatī ubhau eva etābhiḥ kāmau avarūndhate

original: (PB 24.8.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ spaṣṭo 'rthaḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ gauḥ ca āyuḥ ca dve ahanī catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ paśu kāmāḥ upeyuḥ spaṣṭaḥ arthaḥ

original: (PB 24.8.2) yad etā aṣṭātriṃśad rātrayo bhavanty aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśa evaitābhiḥ paśun avarūndhate
analyzed: yat etāḥ aṣṭātriṃśat rātrayaḥ bhavanti aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśas eva etābhiḥ paśun avarūndhate

original: (PB 24.9.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.9.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantā śriyam ajayad anantā vā etā yā ekayānacatvāriṃśan neti vai vāco 'nantam
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai prajāpatiḥ anantā śriyam ajayat anantāḥ vai etāḥ yāḥ eka yāna catvāriṃśat na iti vai vācaḥ anantam

original: (PB 24.9.3) yad etā ekayānacatvāriṃśad rātrayo bhavanty anantām evaitābhiḥ śriyaṃ jayanti
analyzed: yat etāḥ eka yāna catvāriṃśat rātrayaḥ bhavanti anantām eva etābhiḥ śriyam jayanti

original: (PB 24.10.1) etā eva samahāvratāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ eva sa mahāvratāḥ

original: (PB 24.10.2) sarvā vā etā virājo daśinī prathamā viṃśinī dvitīyā triṃśinī tṛtīyaiṣā vai paramā virāṭ yac catvāriṃśad rātrayaḥ paṅktir vai paramā
analyzed: sarvāḥ vai etāḥ virājaḥ daśinī prathamā viṃśinī dvitīyā triṃśinī tṛtīyā eṣā vai paramā virāj yat catvāriṃśat rātrayaḥ paṅktiḥ vai paramā

original: (PB 24.10.3) paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 24.11.1) atirātras trīṇi trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhāny atirātro daśa pañcadaśā
analyzed: atirātraḥ trīṇi trivṛnti ahāni agniṣṭoma mukhāni atirātraḥ daśa pañcadaśā

original: ukthyāḥ ṣoḍaśimad daśamam ahar atirātro dvādaśa saptadaśā ukthyā atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ
analyzed: ukthyāḥ ṣoḍaśimat daśamam ahar atirātraḥ dvādaśa saptadaśāḥ ukthyāḥ atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ

original: ṣaḍaho 'tirātro dvādaśaikaviṃśā ukthyā atirātraḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍahaḥ atirātraḥ dvādaśa ekaviṃśāḥ ukthyāḥ atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.11.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā avidhṛtā asañjānānā anyonyām ādaṃs tena
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata tāḥ a vidhṛtāḥ a sañjānānāḥ anyonyām ādan tena

original: prajāpatir aśocat sa etā apaśyat tato vā idaṃ vyāvartata gāvo 'bhavann aśvā aśvāḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ aśocat saḥ etāḥ apaśyat tatas vai idam vyāvartata gāvaḥ abhavan aśvāḥ aśvāḥ

original: purūṣāḥ purūṣā mṛgā mṛgāḥ
analyzed: purūṣāḥ purūṣāḥ mṛgāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: (PB 24.11.3) vi pāpmanā vartante ya etā upayanti
analyzed: vi pāpmanā vartante ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.11.4) yad atirātrā antarā vidhṛtyai tasmān netara itarasmin reto dadhāti
analyzed: yat atirātrau antarā vidhṛtyai tasmāt na itaraḥ itarasmin retaḥ dadhāti

original: (PB 24.11.5) yat pṛṣṭhyāḥ stomāḥ sa sṛṣṭās tasmād ajāvayaḥ paśūnāṃ saha caranti tasmād u gardabho vaḍavāyā reto dadhāti
analyzed: yat pṛṣṭhyāḥ stomāḥ sa sṛṣṭāḥ tasmāt aja avayaḥ paśūnām saha caranti tasmāt u gardabhaḥ vaḍavāyāḥ retaḥ dadhāti

original: (PB 24.11.6) apaśavyaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad acchandomaṃ yat sandhiṣāmasu chandāṃsy upayanti tena chandomavatyas tena paśavyāḥ
analyzed: a paśavyam vai etat sattram yat a chandomam yat sandhiṣāmasu chandāṃsi upayanti tena chandomavatyaḥ tena paśavyāḥ

original: (PB 24.11.7) gāyatrīṣu jarābodhīyam uṣṇikṣu śrudhyam anuṣṭupsu nānadaṃ bṛhatīṣu rathantaraṃ paṅktiṣu rāyovājīyaṃ triṣṭupsv auśanaṃ jagatīṣu
analyzed: gāyatrīṣu jarābodhīyam uṣṇikṣu śrudhyam anuṣṭupsu nānadam bṛhatīṣu rathantaram paṅktiṣu rāyovājīyam triṣṭupsu auśanam jagatīṣu

original: (PB 24.11.8) ūrdhvāni chandāṃsy upayanty anapabhraṃśāya
analyzed: ūrdhvāni chandāṃsi upayanti an apabhraṃśāya

original: (PB 24.11.9) prāṇo vai svaro yat svarāv antato bhavatas tasmāt dvāv antataḥ prāṇau
analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai svaraḥ yat svarau antatas bhavataḥ tasmāt dvau antatas prāṇau

original: (PB 24.12.1) atirātrau dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau gauś cāyuś cātirātrau dvāv abhiplavau
analyzed: atirātrau dvau abhiplavau ṣaḍahau gauḥ ca āyuḥ ca atirātrau dvau abhiplavau

original: ṣaḍahāv abhijic ca viśvajic catirātrāv eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomaś ca nava
analyzed: ṣaḍahau abhijit ca viśvajit ca tirātrau ekaḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomaḥ ca nava

original: saptadaśaś cātirātro dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: saptadaśaḥ ca atirātraḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 24.12.2) ādityānāṃ yamātirātrāḥ
analyzed: ādityānām yama atirātrāḥ

original: (PB 24.12.3) yamevaiṣā śrīr bhavati ya etā upayanti
analyzed: yam eva eṣā śrīḥ bhavati ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.12.4) etābhir vā ādityā dvandvam ārdhnuvan mitraś ca varūṇaś ca dhātā cāryamā cāṃśaś ca bhagaś cendraś ca vivasvāś caitāsām eva devatānām  #
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai ādityāḥ dvandvam ārdhnuvan mitraḥ ca varūṇaḥ ca dhātā ca aryamā ca aṃśaḥ ca bhagaḥ ca indraḥ ca vivasvān ca etāsām eva devatānām  /

original: ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.12.5) tad abhyanūktā
analyzed: tat abhyanūktā

original: (PB 24.12.6) aṣṭau putrāso aditer ye jātās tanvaṃ pari devā upaprait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyad iti
analyzed: aṣṭau putrāsaḥ aditeḥ ye jātāḥ tanvam pari devāḥ upaprait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat iti

original: (PB 24.12.7) ādityā asmiṃl loka ṛddhā ādityā amuṣminn ubhayor anayor lokayor ṛdhnuvanti devaloke ca manuṣyaloke ca ya etā upayanti
analyzed: ādityāḥ asmin loke ṛddhāḥ ādityāḥ amuṣmin ubhayoḥ anayoḥ lokayoḥ ṛdhnuvanti deva loke ca manuṣya loke ca ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.13.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sarvastomo 'tirātro dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sarvastomaḥ atirātraḥ dvau abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.13.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa rūkṣo 'bhavat taṃ rūkṣaṃ nājanan sa ā cāṅktābhi cāṅkta
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ asṛjata sa rūkṣaḥ abhavat tam rūkṣam na ajanan saḥ ā cāṅkta abhi cāṅkta

original: (PB 24.13.3) ya ātmānaṃ neva jānīraṃs ta etā upeyur yadā cāñjate 'bhi cāñjate śubham evātman dadhate jānanty enān
analyzed: ye ātmānam na iva jānīran te etāḥ upeyuḥ yadā ca añjate abhi ca añjate śubham eva ātman dadhate jānanti enān

original: (PB 24.13.4) gauggulavena prātassavane saugandhikena mādhyandine savane paitudāraveṇa tṛtīyasavane
analyzed: gauggulavena prātassavane saugandhikena mādhyandine savane paitudāraveṇa tṛtīyasavane

original: (PB 24.13.5) agnir vai devānāṃ hautram upaiṣyañ charīram adhūnuta tasya yanmāṃ samāsīt
analyzed: agniḥ vai devānām hautram upaiṣyam śarīram adhūnuta tasya yat mām samāsīt

original: tad guggulv abhavadyat snāva tat sugandhitejanaṃ yad asthi tat potudārv etāni vai
analyzed: tat guggulu abhavat yat snāva tat sugandhi tejanam yat asthi tat potudāru etāni vai

original: devasurabhīṇi devasurabhibhir eva tad abhyañjate
analyzed: deva surabhīṇi deva surabhibhiḥ eva tat abhyañjate

original: (PB 24.14.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā abhijit
analyzed: atirātraḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam ahar trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ abhijit

original: trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno viśvajid eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaha
analyzed: trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ viśvajit ekaḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaha

original: āyuś ca gauś ca dve āhanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca saṃvatsarasam
analyzed: āyuḥ ca gauḥ ca dve āhanī dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca saṃvatsarasam

original: mitā yāvatī saṃvatsarasyarddhis tāvaty etāsām ṛddhiḥ
analyzed: mitā yāvatī saṃvatsarasya ṛddhiḥ tāvatī etāsām ṛddhiḥ

original: (PB 24.14.2) tad āhur yac caturviṃśam ahaḥ prayaṇīyaṃ kuryuḥ saṃvatsaram ārabhya na samāpayeyur iti trivṛd eva kāryaṃ prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat caturviṃśam ahar prayaṇīyam kuryuḥ saṃvatsaram ārabhya na samāpayeyuḥ iti trivṛt eva kāryam prāṇāḥ vai trivṛt prāṇān

original: (PB 24.14.3) atho khalv āhuś caturviṃśam eva kāryaṃ samṛdhyai
analyzed: atha u khalu āhuḥ caturviṃśam eva kāryam samṛdhyai

original: (PB 24.14.4) athaite svarasāmānaḥ śiro vai divākīrtyaṃ prāṇāḥ svarasāmāno yad divākīrtyam abhitaḥ svarasāmāno bhavanti śirasyeva tat prāṇā
analyzed: atha ete svarasāmānaḥ śiraḥ vai divākīrtyam prāṇāḥ svarasāmānaḥ yat divākīrtyam abhitas svarasāmānaḥ bhavanti śirasi eva tat prāṇā

original: (PB 24.14.5) atha yāvantyau prāṇau tau viśvajid abhijitāv athaite goāyuṣī mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
analyzed: atha yāvantyau prāṇau tau viśvajit abhijitau atha ete go āyuṣī mithunau stomau upayanti prajātyai

original: (PB 24.14.6) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
analyzed: atha etāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya

original: (PB 24.14.7) athaitad vratam annaṃ vai vrata na vā anyatra mukhād annaṃ dhinoti yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti mukhata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate  #
analyzed: atha etat vratam annam vai vrata na vai anyatra mukhāt annam dhinoti yat upariṣṭāt vratam upayanti mukhataḥ eva tat annādyam dhīyate  /

original: tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti
analyzed: tasmāt mukhe sat annam dhinoti

original: (PB 24.14.8) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti
analyzed: atha etau prāyaṇīya udayanīyau atirātrau yena eva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti

original: (PB 24.15.1) atirātro nava trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaṣ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy
analyzed: atirātraḥ nava trivṛnti ahāni agniṣṭoma mukhaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ atha yāni trīṇi

original: ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato nava pañcadaśāny ahāny agniṣṭomam ukhaḥ
analyzed: ahāni agniṣṭomau abhitas ukthyam madhyatas nava pañcadaśāni ahāni agniṣṭomam ukhaḥ

original: ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato nava saptadaśāny
analyzed: ṣaḍahaḥ atha yāni trīṇi ahāni agniṣṭomau abhitas ukthyam madhyatas nava saptadaśāni

original: ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato
analyzed: ahāni agniṣṭoma mukhaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ atha yāni trīṇi ahāni agniṣṭomau abhitas ukthyam madhyatas

original: navaikaviṃśāny ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita
analyzed: nava ekaviṃśāni ahāni agniṣṭoma mukhaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ atha yāni trīṇi ahāni agniṣṭomau abhitas

original: ukthyaṃ madhyato dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: ukthyam madhyataḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 24.15.2) etābhir vai savitā sarvasya prasavam agacchat
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai savitā sarvasya prasavam agacchat

original: (PB 24.15.3) sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: sarvasya prasavam gacchanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.15.4) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomā bahava eva bhavanti saha trivṛtaḥ saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ sahaikaviṃśāḥ savitur vā etāḥ kakubhaḥ
analyzed: yat gaṇaśas stomāḥ bahavaḥ eva bhavanti saha trivṛtaḥ saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ saha ekaviṃśāḥ savituḥ vai etāḥ kakubhaḥ

original: (PB 24.15.5) kakubhaḥ samānānāṃ ca prajānāṃ ca bhavanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: kakubhaḥ samānānām ca prajānām ca bhavanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.16.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā mahāvrataṃ dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ mahāvratam dvau abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni atirātraḥ

original: (PB 24.16.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ na pratyatiṣṭhan te etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ upeyuḥ

original: (PB 24.16.3) praty eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitābhiḥ pratitiṣṭhanti yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyā eva
analyzed: prati eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaṭ vai ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva etābhiḥ pratitiṣṭhanti yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyai eva

original: (PB 24.16.4) athaitad vratam annaṃ vai vrataṃ na vā anyatra madhyād annaṃ dhinoti yad vrataṃ madhyata upayanti madhyata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate  #
analyzed: atha etat vratam annam vai vratam na vai anyatra madhyāt annam dhinoti yat vratam madhyataḥ upayanti madhyataḥ eva tat annādyam dhīyate  /

original: tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoti
analyzed: tasmāt madhye sat annam dhinoti

original: (PB 24.16.5) yat kḷptau ṣaḍahāv upayanti kḷptyā eva
analyzed: yat kḷptau ṣaḍahau upayanti kḷptyai eva

original: (PB 24.16.6) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāyāthaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti  #
analyzed: atha etāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya atha etau prāyaṇīya udayanīyau atirātrau yena eva prāṇena prayanti  /

original: tam abhyudyanti
analyzed: tam abhyudyanti

original: (PB 24.17.1) atirātraḥ ṣaḍabhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: atirātraḥ ṣaṭ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 24.17.2) etābhir vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: etābhiḥ vai indra agnī atyanyāḥ devatāḥ abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajāḥ bhavanti ye etāḥ upe

original: (PB 24.17.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etā upayanti
analyzed: indra agnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhāḥ ojiṣṭhāḥ bhavanti ye etāḥ upayanti

original: (PB 24.17.4) yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyā evāthaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni
analyzed: yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyai eva atha etāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni

original: vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāyāthaitad vratam athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv
analyzed: vācam a vicchinnām upayanti prajananāya atha etat vratam atha etau prāyaṇīya udayanīyau

original: atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti
analyzed: atirātrau yena eva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti

original: (PB 24.18.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam ahar trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ

original: ṣaḍaho 'bhijit trayassvarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍahaḥ abhijit trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ

original: ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇa eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaha āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya
analyzed: ṣaṣ ahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ ekaḥ abhiplavaḥ ṣaṣ ahaḥ āyuḥ ca gauḥ ca dve ahanī dvādaśa ahasya

original: daśāhāni mahāvrataś cātirātraś ca tad etad ekaṣaṣṭirātraṃ daivānāṃ vrātyānām
analyzed: daśa ahāni mahāvrataḥ ca atirātraḥ ca tat etat ekaṣaṣṭi rātram daivānām vrātyānām

original: (PB 24.18.2) daivā vai vrātyāḥ sattram āsata budhena sthapatinā te ha vā aniryācya
analyzed: daivāḥ vai vrātyāḥ sattram āsata budhena sthapatinā te ha vai a niryācya

original: varuṇaṃ rājānaṃ devayajanaṃ didīkṣus tān ha vā varūṇo rājānu vyājahārāntar emi vo
analyzed: varuṇam rājānam devayajanam didīkṣuḥ tān ha vā varūṇaḥ rājā anu vyājahāra antar emi vaḥ

original: yajñiyād bhāgadheyān na devayānaṃ panthānaṃ prajñāsyatheti tasmāt tebhyo na havir gṛhṇanti na graham
analyzed: yajñiyāt bhāgadheyāt na deva yānam panthānam prajñāsyatha iti tasmāt tebhyaḥ na haviḥ gṛhṇanti na graham

original: (PB 24.18.3) atha ha vai tarhi nauṣadhīṣu paya āsīn na kṣīre sarpir na māṃse medo
analyzed: atha ha vai tarhi na oṣadhīṣu payaḥ āsīt na kṣīre sarpiḥ na māṃse medaḥ

original: na tvaci lomāni na vanaspatiṣu palāśāni tad yata etad ekaṣaṣṭirātraṃ daivā vrātyā
analyzed: na tvaci lomāni na vanaspatiṣu palāśāni tat yatas etat ekaṣaṣṭi rātram daivā vrātyā

original: upāyaṃs tato vai tāni bhutāny etair vīryaiḥ samasṛjyanta tejasvanty evāsan payasvanti
analyzed: upāyan tatas vai tāni bhutāni etaiḥ vīryaiḥ samasṛjyanta tejasvanti eva āsan payasvanti

original: (PB 24.18.4) tad eṣa śloko 'bhyanūcyate
analyzed: tat eṣa ślokaḥ abhyanūcyate

original: (PB 24.18.5) kim akarteti yat putrān muhur daivāṃ apṛcchata mahī budhasyāsīd dīkṣā sa kṣīre sarpir āharat
analyzed: kim akarta iti yat putrān muhur daivām apṛcchata mahī budhasya āsīt dīkṣā sa kṣīre sarpiḥ āharat

original: (PB 24.18.6) mahīṃ dīkṣāṃ saumāyano budho yad udayacchadanandat sarvam āpnon manmāṃse medo 'dhā iti
analyzed: mahīm dīkṣām saumāyanaḥ budhaḥ yat udayacchat anandat sarvam āpnot mad māṃse medaḥ adhāḥ iti

original: (PB 24.18.7) daridrā āsan paśavaḥ kṛśāḥ santo vyasthakāḥ saumāyanasya dīkṣāyāṃ samasṛjyanta medaseti
analyzed: daridrāḥ āsan paśavaḥ kṛśāḥ santaḥ vyasthakāḥ saumāyanasya dīkṣāyām samasṛjyanta medasā iti

original: (PB 24.18.8) tad ya etad ekaṣaṣṭirātram upeyus te devayajanam adhyavasāya gārhapatya āhutiṃ juhayur deva varuṇa devayajanaṃ no dehi svāheti  #
analyzed: tat ye etat ekaṣaṣṭi rātram upeyuḥ te devayajanam adhyavasāya gārhapatye āhutim juhayuḥ deva varuṇa devayajanam naḥ dehi svāhā iti

original: te datte devajane yajante
analyzed: te datte devajane yajante

original: (PB 24.18.9) te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 24.19.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaś caturdaśābhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ caturdaśa abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 24.19.2) devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etena śatarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ
analyzed: devāḥ vai mṛtyoḥ abibhayuḥ te prajāpatim upādhāvan tebhyaḥ etena śata rātreṇa amṛta tvam

original: prāyacchad etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati sarvam
analyzed: prāyacchat etat vāva manuṣyasya amṛta tvam yat sarvam āyuḥ eti vasīyān bhavati sarvam

original: āyur yanti vasīyāṃso bhavanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: āyuḥ yanti vasīyāṃsaḥ bhavanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 24.19.3) abhiprayāyam abhiṣuṇvanty abhikrāntyai samānatrābhiṣuṇvanti pratiṣṭhityai
analyzed: abhiprayāyam abhiṣuṇvanti abhikrāntyai samānatra abhiṣuṇvanti pratiṣṭhityai

original: (PB 24.20.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam ahar catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ

original: ṣaḍahaḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣ ahaḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamaḥ trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ

original: ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho 'bhijit trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno
analyzed: ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ abhijit trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ

original: viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
analyzed: viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ

original: ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa
analyzed: ṣaṣ ahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ catvāraḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa

original: tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ trayaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaṣ ahāḥ āyuḥ ca gauḥ ca dve ahanī dvādaśa ahasya

original: daśāhāni mahāvrañcātirātraś ca
analyzed: daśa ahāni mahāvrañca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 24.20.2) saṃvatsarabrāhmaṇaṃ brāhmaṇam
analyzed: saṃvatsara brāhmaṇam brāhmaṇam

original: (PB 25.1.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahar dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau
analyzed: atirātraḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam ahar dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau

original: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa
analyzed: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa

original: caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayas trivṛt pañcadaśāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trivṛd bṛhaspatistomas
analyzed: caturthaḥ sa pañcamaḥ trayaḥ trivṛt pañcadaśāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trivṛt bṛhaspati stomaḥ

original: trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthyaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśaḥ indrastomaḥ ukthyaḥ

original: pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇa ekaḥ pañcadaśas trivṛt ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni
analyzed: pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ ekaḥ pañcadaśaḥ trivṛt ṣaḍahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni

original: vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛta udbhic ca balabhic ca dve ahanī dvau pañcadaśatrivṛtau
analyzed: vyūḍhāḥ agniṣṭomāḥ trivṛtaḥ udbhid ca balabhid ca dve ahanī dvau pañcadaśa trivṛtau

original: ṣaḍahau pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau pañcadaśatribṛtau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍahau pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ dvau pañcadaśa tribṛtau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ

original: sa caturthaḥ pañcadaśatrivṛt ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pañcadaśatrivṛt ṣaḍaho gauś
analyzed: sa caturthaḥ pañcadaśa trivṛt ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pañcadaśa trivṛt ṣaḍahaḥ gauḥ

original: cāyuś ca dve ahanī chandomadaśāho 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ prathamam ahar atha catuścatvāriṃśaṃ
analyzed: ca āyuḥ ca dve ahanī chandoma daśa ahaḥ aṣṭācatvāriṃśam prathamam ahar atha catuścatvāriṃśam

original: catvāriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ triṃśaṃ dve aṣṭāviṃśe pañcaviṃśaṃ caturviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: catvāriṃśam ṣaṭtriṃśam dvātriṃśam triṃśam dve aṣṭāviṃśe pañcaviṃśam caturviṃśam mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 25.1.2) ādityānām madhye pṛṣṭhyam
analyzed: ādityānām madhye pṛṣṭhyam

original: (PB 25.1.3) madhye pṛṣṭhyena vā ādityāḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramanta yan madhye pṛṣṭhāny upayanti svargasya lokasyākrāntyai
analyzed: madhye pṛṣṭhyena vai ādityāḥ svargam lokam ākramanta yat madhye pṛṣṭhāni upayanti svargasya lokasya ākrāntyai

original: (PB 25.1.4) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoti
analyzed: annam vai pṛṣṭhāni annam eva tat madhyatas dhīyate tasmāt madhye sat annam dhinoti

original: (PB 25.1.5) paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.1.6) cakre vā ete sākaṃvṛtīyat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tat  #
analyzed: cakre vai ete sākaṃvṛtīyat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yam kāmam kāmayante tam etena abhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tat

original: tad abhyaśnute
analyzed: tat abhyaśnute

original: (PB 25.1.7) athaiṣa trivṛd bṛhaspatistoma etena vai bṛhaspatir devānāṃ purodhām agacchat purodhakāmā upeyur gacchanti purodhāṃ pura enān dadhate
analyzed: atha eṣa trivṛt bṛhaspati stomaḥ etena vai bṛhaspatiḥ devānām purodhām agacchat purodha kāmāḥ upeyuḥ gacchanti purodhām puras enān dadhate

original: (PB 25.1.8) athaite svarasāmānaḥ śiro vai divākīrtyaṃ prāṇāḥ svarasāmāno yad divākīrtyam abhitaḥ svarasāmāno bhavanti śivasyeva tat prāṇā dhīyante
analyzed: atha ete svarasāmānaḥ śiraḥ vai divākīrtyam prāṇāḥ svarasāmānaḥ yat divākīrtyam abhitas svarasāmānaḥ bhavanti śivasya iva tat prāṇāḥ dhīyante

original: (PB 25.1.9) athaiṣa pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthya etena vā indro 'tyanyā devatā abhavad atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: atha eṣa pañcadaśaḥ indrastomaḥ ukthyaḥ etena vai indraḥ atyanyāḥ devatāḥ abhavat atyanyāḥ prajāḥ bhavanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.1.10) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛto madhyataḥ
analyzed: atha etāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vyūḍhāḥ agniṣṭomāḥ trivṛtaḥ madhyatas

original: pāpmano mucyanta eṣa vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti pravasīyasas talpam āpnuvanti
analyzed: pāpmanaḥ mucyante eṣa vāva deva talpaḥ deva talpam eva tat ārohanti talpyāḥ bhavanti pravasīyasaḥ talpam āpnuvanti

original: (PB 25.1.11) athaitāv udbhidbalabhidāv etābhyāṃ vai bṛhaspatir devebhyaḥ paśūn udasṛjat paśūn evaitābhyām utsṛjante
analyzed: atha etau udbhid balabhidau etābhyām vai bṛhaspatiḥ devebhyaḥ paśūn udasṛjat paśūn eva etābhyām utsṛjante

original: (PB 25.1.12) athaite go āyuṣī mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
analyzed: atha ete go āyuṣī mithunau stomau upayanti prajātyai

original: (PB 25.1.13) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doho 'rvāñci chandāṃsy upayanti tasmād arvāñco bhuñjantaḥ paśava upatiṣṭhante
analyzed: atha eṣa chandoma daśa ahaḥ chandasām dohaḥ arvāñci chandāṃsi upayanti tasmāt arvāñcaḥ bhuñjantaḥ paśavaḥ upatiṣṭhante

original: (PB 25.1.14) athaid vratam annaṃ vai vrataṃ na vā anyatra mukhād annaṃ dhinoti yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti mukhata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate  #
analyzed: atha ait vratam annam vai vratam na vai anyatra mukhāt annam dhinoti yat upariṣṭāt vratam upayanti mukhataḥ eva tat annādyam dhīyate  /

original: tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti
analyzed: tasmāt mukhe sat annam dhinoti

original: (PB 25.1.15) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
analyzed: atha etau prāyaṇīya udayanīyau atirātrau yena eva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti

original: (PB 25.2.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaś catvāras trivṛto
analyzed: atirātraḥ caturviṃśam prāyaṇīyam ahar pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ catvāraḥ trivṛtaḥ

original: 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayas
analyzed: abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamaḥ trayaḥ

original: trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trivṛd bṛhaspatistomas trayaḥ svarasāmāno
analyzed: trivṛtaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ trivṛt bṛhaspatistomaḥ trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ

original: divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthyaḥ pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahas
analyzed: divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśaḥ indrastomaḥ ukthyaḥ pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ

original: trayastriṃśārambhaṇa ekas trivṛd abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās
analyzed: trayastriṃśa ārambhaṇaḥ ekaḥ trivṛt abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni vyūḍhāḥ agniṣṭomāḥ

original: trivṛta udbhic ca balabhic ca dve ahanī catvāras trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
analyzed: trivṛtaḥ udbhid ca balabhid ca dve ahanī catvāraḥ trivṛtaḥ abhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ

original: ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturtho dvau trivṛtāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau
analyzed: ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ dvau trivṛtau abhiplavau ṣaḍahau

original: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaha āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī chandomadaśāhaś caturviṃśaṃ prathamam ahar
analyzed: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ āyuḥ ca gauḥ ca dve ahanī chandoma daśa ahaḥ caturviṃśam prathamam ahar

original: dve aṣṭāviṃśe triṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ catvāriṃśaṃ catuścatvāriṃśam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ
analyzed: dve aṣṭāviṃśe triṃśam dvātriṃśam ṣaṭtriṃśam catvāriṃśam catuścatvāriṃśam aṣṭācatvāriṃśam

original: caturviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cāṅgirasāṃ purastāt pṛṣṭhyam
analyzed: caturviṃśam mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca aṅgirasām purastāt pṛṣṭhyam

original: (PB 25.2.2) purastāt pṛṣṭhyena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramanta yat purastāt pṛṣṭhāny upayanti svargasya lokasyākrāntyai
analyzed: purastāt pṛṣṭhyena vai aṅgirasaḥ svargam lokam ākramanta yat purastāt pṛṣṭhāni upayanti svargasya lokasya ākrāntyai

original: (PB 25.2.3) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan mukhato dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: annam vai pṛṣṭhāni annam eva tat mukhataḥ dhīyate tasmāt mukhe sat annam dhinoti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣu eva pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.2.4) yad anyac cakrābhyāṃ sākavṛdbhyāṃ tatsamānam ā chandomadaśāhāt
analyzed: yat anyat cakrābhyām sākavṛdbhyām tat samānam ā chandoma daśa ahāt

original: (PB 25.2.5) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doha ūrdhvāni chandāṃsy upayanty anapabhraṃśāyaiṣa
analyzed: atha eṣa chandoma daśa ahaḥ chandasām dohaḥ ūrdhvāni chandāṃsi upayanti an apabhraṃśāya eṣa

original: vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanty athaitad vratam
analyzed: vāva deva yānaḥ panthāḥ pra deva yānam panthānam āpnuvanti ye etat upayanti atha etat vratam

original: (PB 25.2.6) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiṣa prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
analyzed: atha etau prāyaṇīya udayanīyau atirātrau yena eṣa prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti

original: (PB 25.3.1) atirātras trivṛtā māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena
analyzed: atirātraḥ trivṛtā māsam pañcadaśena māsam saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena

original: māsaṃ triṇavena māsaṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ mahāvrataṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena
analyzed: māsam triṇavena māsam trayastriṃśena māsam mahāvratam trayastriṃśena māsam triṇavena

original: māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ trivṛtā māsam atirātraḥ
analyzed: māsam ekaviṃśena māsam saptadaśena māsam pañcadaśena māsam trivṛtā māsam atirātraḥ

original: (PB 25.3.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitena pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ na pratyatiṣṭhan te etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ upeyuḥ prati eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaṭ vai ṛtavaḥ ṛtuṣu eva etena pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.3.3) yad gataṃ madhyata upayanti madhyata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān madhye dhinoti
analyzed: yat gatam madhyatas upayanti madhyatas eva tat annādyam dhīyate tasmāt madhye dhinoti

original: (PB 25.3.4) pakṣi vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
analyzed: pakṣi vai etat sattrāyaṇam yam kāmam kāmayante tam etena abhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tat abhyaśnute

original: (PB 25.3.5) trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtodyanti prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ prāṇair eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtā udyanti prāṇāḥ vai trivṛt stomānām prāṇaiḥ eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.3.6) etad vai dṛtivātavantau khāṇdava upeto viṣuvati vātavān uttiṣṭhati samāpayati dṛtis tasmāt tanīyāṃso vātavatā bhūyāṃso dārteyāḥ
analyzed: etat vai dṛti vātavantau khāṇdavaḥ upetaḥ viṣuvati vātavān uttiṣṭhati samāpayati dṛtiḥ tasmāt tanīyāṃsaḥ vātavatā bhūyāṃsaḥ dārteyāḥ

original: (PB 25.4.1) māsaṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti te māsi somaṃ krīṇanti teṣāṃ dvādaśopasada upasadbhiś
analyzed: māsam dīkṣitāḥ bhavanti te māsi somam krīṇanti teṣām dvādaśa upasadaḥ upasadbhiḥ

original: caritvā somam upanahya māsam agnihotraṃ juhvati māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajante
analyzed: caritvā somam upanahya māsam agnihotram juhvati māsam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajante

original: māsaṃ vaiśvadevena māsaṃ varuṇapraghāsair māsaṃ sākamedhair māsaṃ śunāsīryeṇa trivṛtā
analyzed: māsam vaiśvadevena māsam varuṇapraghāsaiḥ māsam sākamedhaiḥ māsam śunāsīryeṇa trivṛtā

original: māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena māsam aṣṭādaśa
analyzed: māsam pañcadaśena māsam saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena māsam triṇavena māsam aṣṭādaśa

original: trayastriṃśāny ahāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
analyzed: trayastriṃśāni ahāni dvādaśa ahasya daśa ahāni mahāvratam ca atirātraḥ ca

original: (PB 25.4.2) agnihotraṃ daśahotā darśapūrṇamāsau caturhotā cāturmāsyāni pañcahotā saumyo 'dhvaraḥ saptahotā
analyzed: agnihotram daśahotā darśa pūrṇamāsau caturhotā cāturmāsyāni pañcahotā saumyaḥ adhvaraḥ saptahotā

original: (PB 25.4.3) ete vāva sarveṇa yajñena yajante ya etad upayanti sarva eva bhavanti
analyzed: ete vāva sarveṇa yajñena yajante ye etat upayanti sarve eva bhavanti

original: (PB 25.4.4) te sarve kuṇḍapāyino 'tsarukaiś camasair bhakṣayanti
analyzed: te sarve kuṇḍapāyinaḥ atsarukaiḥ camasaiḥ bhakṣayanti

original: (PB 25.4.5) yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ sa potā ya udgātā sa neṣṭā so 'cchāvāko yo maitrāvaruṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hotā saḥ adhvaryuḥ sa potā yaḥ udgātā sa neṣṭā saḥ acchāvākaḥ yaḥ maitrāvaruṇaḥ

original: sa brahmā sa pratihartāyaḥ prastotā sa brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sa grāvastut yaḥ pratiprasthātā
analyzed: sa brahmā sa pratihartā ayaḥ prastotā sa brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sa grāvastut yaḥ pratiprasthātā

original: so 'gnīt sa unnetā gṛhapatir gṛhapatiḥ subrahmaṇyassubrahmaṇyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ agnīdh saḥ unnetā gṛhapatiḥ gṛhapatiḥ subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyaḥ

original: (PB 25.5.1) saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto bhavati
analyzed: saṃvatsaram dīkṣitāḥ bhavanti saṃvatsaram upasadbhiḥ caranti saṃvatsaram prasutaḥ bhavati

original: (PB 25.5.2) tat saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti tapa eva tena tapyante yat saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti punata eva tena yat saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto  #
analyzed: tat saṃvatsaram dīkṣitāḥ bhavanti tapaḥ eva tena tapyante yat saṃvatsaram upasadbhiḥ caranti punate eva tena yat saṃvatsaram

original: bhavati devalokam eva tenāpi yanti
analyzed: bhavati deva lokam eva tena api yanti

original: (PB 25.5.3) etena vai tapaścito devāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai tapaḥ citaḥ devāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.6.1) trayastrivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarās trayaḥ pañcadaśās trayaḥ saptadaśās traya ekaviṃśāḥ prajāpater dvādaśasaṃvatsaram
analyzed: trayaḥ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ trayaḥ pañcadaśāḥ trayaḥ saptadaśāḥ trayaḥ ekaviṃśāḥ prajāpateḥ dvādaśa saṃvatsaram

original: (PB 25.6.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavam gacchanti ye etad upayanti

original: (PB 25.6.3) yat trayas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā bhavanti tejo brāhmavarcasaṃ trivṛt teja
analyzed: yat trayaḥ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ bhavanti tejaḥ brāhmavarcasam trivṛt tejaḥ

original: eva brahmavarcasam avarundhate yat trayaḥ pañca daśā ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa oja eva
analyzed: eva brahmavarcasam avarundhate yat trayaḥ pañca daśāḥ ojaḥ vīryam pañcadaśaḥ ojaḥ eva

original: vīryam avarundhate yat trayaḥ saptadaśā annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam evāvarundhate
analyzed: vīryam avarundhate yat trayaḥ saptadaśāḥ annam vai saptadaśaḥ annādyam eva avarundhate

original: yat traya ekaviṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: yat trayaḥ ekaviṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhā vai ekaviṃśaḥ antatas eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.6.4) etena vai naimiśīyāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai naimiśīyāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.6.5) te ha saptadaśebhya evādhyuttasthus ta u hocur yo naḥ prajāyām ṛdhyātai sa etat sattraṃ samāpayād iti tad etat samīpsanto brāhmaṇās  #
analyzed: te ha saptadaśebhyaḥ eva adhyuttasthuḥ te u ha ūcuḥ yaḥ naḥ prajāyām ṛdh saḥ etat sattram samāpayāt iti tat etat samīpsantaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ

original: sattram āsate
analyzed: sattram āsate

original: (PB 25.7.1) nava trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā nava pañcadaśā nava saptadaśā navaikaviṃśāḥ śāktyānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram
analyzed: nava trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ nava pañcadaśāḥ nava saptadaśāḥ nava ekaviṃśāḥ śāktyānām ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram

original: (PB 25.7.2) etena vai gaurīvitiḥ śāktas tarasapuroḍāśo yavyāvatyāṃ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai gaurīvitiḥ śāktaḥ tarasa puroḍāśaḥ yavyāvatyām sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.7.3) bṛhatī vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: bṛhatī vai etat sattrāyaṇam svārājyam chandasām bṛhatī pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.7.4) tad etac chāktyānāṃ daśavīram eṣāṃ daśa vīrā jāyante ya etad upayanti
analyzed: tat etat śāktyānām daśa vīram eṣām daśa vīrāḥ jāyante ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.8.1) pañcaviṃśatis trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatir ekaviṃśāḥ sādhyānāṃ śatasaṃvatsaram
analyzed: pañcaviṃśatiḥ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśāḥ sādhyānām śata saṃvatsaram

original: (PB 25.8.2) sādhyā vai nāma devebhyo devāḥ pūrva āsaṃs ta etat sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs
analyzed: sādhyāḥ vai nāma devebhyaḥ devāḥ pūrve āsan te etat sattrāyaṇam upāyan

original: tenārdhnuvaṃs te sagavaḥ sapuruṣāḥ sarva eva saha svargaṃ lokam āyann evaṃ vāva te
analyzed: tena ārdhnuvan te sagavaḥ sa puruṣāḥ sarve eva saha svargam lokam āyan evam vāva te

original: saha svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: saha svargam lokam yanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.8.3) āyur vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ śatāyuḥ puruṣo yāvad evāyus tad avarundhate na hy atyāyuṣaṃ sattram asti
analyzed: āyuḥ vai etat sattrāyaṇam śata āyuḥ puruṣaḥ yāvat eva āyuḥ tat avarundhate na hi atyāyuṣam sattram asti

original: (PB 25.8.4) tad abhyanūktā tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty ūṣā (?)
analyzed: tat abhyanūktā tāni id ahāni bahulāni āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya yatas pari jāre iva ācarantī ūṣā

original: dādṛśe na punar yatīveti
analyzed: dādṛśe na punar yatī iva iti

original: (PB 25.8.5) jyotiṣṭomasyāyanena yanti jyotir eva bhavanti
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomasya ayanena yanti jyotiḥ eva bhavanti

original: (PB 25.8.6) ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: ekaviṃśaḥ antatas stomānām bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai ekaviṃśaḥ antatas stomānām bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai ekaviṃśaḥ antatas eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.9.1) atirātraḥ sahasram ahāny atirātro 'gneḥ sahasrasāvyam
analyzed: atirātraḥ sahasram ahāni atirātraḥ agneḥ sahasrasāvyam

original: (PB 25.9.2) etena vā agniḥ savasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai agniḥ savasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavam gacchanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.9.3) agner vai sarvam ādyaṃ sarvam eṣām ādyaṃ bhavati ya etad upayanti
analyzed: agneḥ vai sarvam ādyam sarvam eṣām ādyam bhavati ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.9.4) atha yat sahasrasāvyaṃ bhavati sahasrākṣarā vai paramā virāṭ paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti
analyzed: atha yat sahasrasāvyam bhavati sahasra akṣarā vai paramā virāj paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti

original: (PB 25.10.1) sarasvatyā vinaśane dīkṣante
analyzed: sarasvatyāḥ vinaśane dīkṣante

original: (PB 25.10.2) teṣāṃ dvādaśa dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ
analyzed: teṣām dvādaśa dīkṣāḥ dvādaśa upasadaḥ

original: (PB 25.10.3) yad ahar atirātro bhavati tad ahar vatsān apākurvanti saṃsthite 'tirātre sānnāyyena yajante
analyzed: yat ahar atirātraḥ bhavati tat ahar vatsān apākurvanti saṃsthite atirātre sānnāyyena yajante

original: (PB 25.10.4) sānnāyyeneṣṭvādhvaryuḥ śamyāṃ parāsyati sā yatra nipatati tad gārhapatyas tataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ prakramān prakramati tad āhavanīyaḥ
analyzed: sānnāyyena iṣ adhvaryuḥ śamyām parāsyati sā yatra nipatati tat gārhapatyaḥ tatas ṣaṭtriṃśatam prakramān prakramati tat āhavanīyaḥ

original: (PB 25.10.5) cakrīvat sadaś cakrīvad dhavirdhānaṃ cakrīvad āgnīdhram ulūkhalabudhno yūpaḥ prakṛṣya upopta eva noparavān khananti
analyzed: cakrīvat sadaḥ cakrīvat dhavirdhānam cakrīvat āgnīdhram ulūkhala budhnaḥ yūpaḥ prakṛṣyaḥ upoptaḥ eva na uparavān khananti

original: (PB 25.10.6) te tam āpūryamāṇam āvāsyena yanti
analyzed: te tam āpūryamāṇam āvāsyena yanti

original: (PB 25.10.7) teṣāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ goṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo bṛhatsāmā
analyzed: teṣām paurṇamāsyām goṣṭoma stomaḥ bhavati ukthyaḥ bṛhat sāmā

original: (PB 25.10.8) saṃsthite goṣṭome paurṇamāsaṃ nirvapante te tam apakṣīyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsena yanti teṣām amāvāsyāyām āyuṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo
analyzed: saṃsthite goṣṭome paurṇamāsam nirvapante te tam apakṣīyamāṇam paurṇamāsena yanti teṣām amāvāsyāyām āyuṣṭoma stomaḥ bhavati ukthyaḥ

original: (PB 25.10.9) mitrāvaruṇayor ayanam
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ ayanam

original: (PB 25.10.10) etena vai mitrāvaruṇāv imān lokān ājayatām ahorātrau vai mitrāvaruṇāv
analyzed: etena vai mitrāvaruṇau imān lokān ājayatām ahar rātrau vai mitrāvaruṇau

original: ahar mitro rātrir varuṇo 'rdhamāsau vai mitrāvaruṇau ya āpūryate sa mitro yo 'pakṣīyate
analyzed: ahar mitraḥ rātriḥ varuṇaḥ ardha māsau vai mitrāvaruṇau yaḥ āpūryate sa mitraḥ yaḥ apakṣīyate

original: sa varuṇaḥ sa eṣa mitro varuṇe retaḥ siñcati
analyzed: sa varuṇaḥ saḥ eṣa mitraḥ varuṇe retaḥ siñcati

original: (PB 25.10.11) sarasvatyā vai devā ādityam astabhnuvan sā nāyacchat sābhyavlīyata
analyzed: sarasvatyāḥ vai devāḥ ādityam astabhnuvan sā na ayacchat sā abhyavlīyata

original: tasmāt sā kubjimatīva taṃ bṛhatyāstabhnuvan sāyacchat tasmād bṛhatī chandasāṃ vīryavattamādityaṃ hi tayāstabhnuvan
analyzed: tasmāt sā kubjimatī iva tam bṛhatyā astabhnuvan sā ayacchat tasmāt bṛhatī chandasām vīryavattamā ādityam hi tayā astabhnuvan

original: (PB 25.10.12) pratīpaṃ yanti na hy anvīpam aṣṭa vai pūrveṇa pakṣasā yanti
analyzed: pratīpam yanti na hi anvīpam aṣṭa vai pūrveṇa pakṣasā yanti

original: (PB 25.10.13) tad dhi praty ekāpyeti
analyzed: tat hi prati ekā apyeti

original: (PB 25.10.14) dṛṣadvaty eva
analyzed: dṛṣadvatī eva

original: (PB 25.10.15) dṛṣadvatyā apyaye 'ponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ nirupyāthātiyanti
analyzed: dṛṣadvatyāḥ apyaye aponaptrīyam carum nirupya atha atiyanti

original: (PB 25.10.16) catuścatvāriṃśad āśvīnāni sarasvatyā vinaśanāt plakṣaḥ prāsravaṇas tāvad itaḥ svargo lokaḥ sarasvatīsammitenādhvanā svargaṃ lokaṃ
analyzed: catuścatvāriṃśat āśvīnāni sarasvatyāḥ vinaśanāt plakṣaḥ prāsravaṇaḥ tāvat itas svargaḥ lokaḥ sarasvatī sammitena adhvanā svargam lokam

original: (PB 25.10.17) etena vai namī sāpyo vaideho rājāñjasā svargaṃ lokam aid añjasāgāmeti tad añjaskīyānām añjaskīyatvam
analyzed: etena vai namī sāpyaḥ vaidehaḥ rājā añjasā svargam lokam ait añjasā āgāma iti tat añjaskīyānām añjaskīya tvam

original: (PB 25.10.18) sa etad avabhṛtham abhyavaid ya eṣa uttareṇa sthūlārmaṃ hradas tad dhāsya śataṃ gāvaḥ sahasraṃ sampeduḥ
analyzed: saḥ etat avabhṛtham abhyavait yaḥ eṣaḥ uttareṇa sthūlārmam hradaḥ tat ha asya śatam gāvaḥ sahasram sampeduḥ

original: (PB 25.10.19) śate goṣv ṛṣabham apy ṛjanti(?)
analyzed: śate goṣu ṛṣabham api ṛjanti

original: tā yadā sahasraṃ sampadyante 'thotthānam
analyzed: tāḥ yadā sahasram sampadyante atha utthānam

original: (PB 25.10.20) yadā sarvajyāniṃ jīyante 'thotthānaṃ yadā gṛhapatir mriyate 'thotthānam
analyzed: yadā sarva jyānim jīyante atha utthānam yadā gṛhapatiḥ mriyate atha utthānam

original: (PB 25.10.21) yadā plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgacchanty athotthānam
analyzed: yadā plakṣam prāsravaṇam āgacchanti atha utthānam

original: (PB 25.10.22) plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgamyāgnaye kāmāyeṣṭiṃ nirvapante tasyām aśvāṃ ca puruṣīṃ ca dhenuke datvā
analyzed: plakṣam prāsravaṇam āgamya agnaye kāmāya iṣṭim nirvapante tasyām aśvām ca puruṣīm ca dhenuke da tvā

original: (PB 25.10.23) kārapacavaṃ prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavayanti
analyzed: kārapacavam prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavayanti

original: (PB 25.11.1) atirātras trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ trivṛt pañcadaśam indra agnyoḥ ayanam go āyuṣī indra kukṣī atirātraḥ

original: (PB 25.11.2) etena vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai indra agnī atyanyāḥ devatāḥ abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajāḥ bhavanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.11.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: indra agnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhāḥ ojiṣṭhāḥ bhavanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.11.4) atha yat trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
analyzed: atha yat trivṛt pañcadaśam indra agnyoḥ ayanam go āyuṣī indra kukṣī bhavataḥ a saṃvyāthāya

original: (PB 25.12.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
analyzed: atirātraḥ jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ viśvajit abhijitau indra kukṣī atirātraḥ

original: (PB 25.12.2) etena vāryamaitaṃ lokam ajayat
analyzed: etena vāryamā etam lokam ajayat

original: (PB 25.12.3) yad āhur aryamṇaḥ panthā ity eṣa vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ
analyzed: yat āhuḥ aryamṇaḥ panthāḥ iti eṣa vāva deva yānaḥ panthāḥ

original: (PB 25.12.4) pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: pra deva yānam panthānam āpnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.12.5) tasmād eṣo 'ruṇatama iva diva upadadṛśe 'ruṇatama iva hi panthāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt eṣaḥ aruṇatamaḥ iva divaḥ upadadṛśe aruṇatamaḥ iva hi panthāḥ

original: (PB 25.12.6) atha yat jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
analyzed: atha yat jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ tri ahaḥ viśvajit abhijitau indra kukṣī bhavataḥ a saṃvyāthāya

original: (PB 25.13.1) saṃvatsaraṃ brāhmaṇasya gā rakṣet saṃvatsaraṃ vyarṇe naitandhave 'gnim indhīta saṃvatsare parīṇahy agnīn ādadhīta
analyzed: saṃvatsaram brāhmaṇasya gāḥ rakṣet saṃvatsaram vyarṇe naitandhave agnim indhīta saṃvatsare parīṇahi agnīn ādadhīta

original: (PB 25.13.2) sa dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena śamyāparāsīyāt
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ āgneyena aṣṭākapālena śamyā aparāsīyāt

original: (PB 25.13.3) indraś ca ruśamā cāṃśaṃ prāsyetāṃ yataro nau pūrvo bhūmiṃ paryeti sa
analyzed: indraḥ ca ruśamā ca aṃśam prāsyetām yataraḥ nau pūrvaḥ bhūmim paryeti sa

original: jayatīti bhūmim indraḥ paryait kurukṣetraṃ ruśamā so 'bravīd ajaiṣaṃ tv ety aham
analyzed: jayati iti bhūmim indraḥ paryait kurukṣetram ruśamā saḥ abravīt ajaiṣam tu ā iti aham

original: eva tvām ajaiṣam itīndro 'bravīt tau deveṣv apṛcchetāṃ te devā abruvann etāvatī vāva
analyzed: eva tvām ajaiṣam iti indraḥ abravīt tau deveṣu apṛcchetām te devāḥ abruvan etāvatī vāva

original: prajāpater vedir yāvat kurukṣetram iti tau na vyajayetām
analyzed: prajāpateḥ vediḥ yāvat kurukṣetram iti tau na vyajayetām

original: (PB 25.13.4) sa ya āgneyenāṣṭākapālena dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ śamyāparāsyeti triplakṣān prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavaiti tad eva manuṣyebhyas  #
analyzed: sa yaḥ āgneyena aṣṭākapālena dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ śamyā aparāsyā iti tri plakṣān prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavaiti tat eva manuṣyebhyaḥ  /

original: tiro bhavati
analyzed: tiras bhavati

original: (PB 25.14.1) āgneyo 'ṣṭākāpāla aindra ekādaśakapālo vaiśvadevaś caruḥ
analyzed: āgneyaḥ aṣṭākāpālaḥ aindraḥ ekādaśa kapālaḥ vaiśvadevaḥ caruḥ

original: (PB 25.14.2) adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yad adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yo mānuṣy ṛddhis tāṃ tenardhnoti
analyzed: a dīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinam pratimuñcate yat a dīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinam pratimuñcate yaḥ mānuṣī ṛddhiḥ tām tena ṛdhnoti

original: (PB 25.14.3) atha yat tapas tapyate yā daivī tāṃ tena
analyzed: atha yat tapaḥ tapyate yā daivī tām tena

original: (PB 25.14.4) yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavaty agnimukhā vai devatā mukhata eva tad devatā
analyzed: yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati agni mukhāḥ vai devatāḥ mukhataḥ eva tat devatā

original: ṛdhnoty atho prātassavanam eva tenāpnoty atha yad aindra ekādaśakapālo bhavaty aindraṃ
analyzed: ṛdhnoti atha u prātassavanam eva tena āpnoti atha yat aindraḥ ekādaśa kapālaḥ bhavati aindram

original: vai mādhyandinaṃ savaṇaṃ mādhyandinam eva savanaṃ tenāpnoty atha yad vaiśvadevaś
analyzed: vai mādhyandinam savaṇam mādhyandinam eva savanam tena āpnoti atha yat vaiśvadevaḥ

original: carur bhavati vaiśvadevaṃ vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanam eva tenāpnoti
analyzed: caruḥ bhavati vaiśvadevam vai tṛtīyasavanam tṛtīyasavanam eva tena āpnoti

original: (PB 25.14.5) etena vai puro devamuniḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya etad upaiti
analyzed: etena vai puras deva muniḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti yaḥ etat upaiti

original: (PB 25.15.1) atirātrāv abhito 'gniṣṭomā madhye sarvo daśadaśī saṃvatsaro dvādaśo viṣuvān sarpasāmāni viṣuvati kriyante
analyzed: atirātrau abhitas agniṣṭomāḥ madhye sarvaḥ daśadaśī saṃvatsaraḥ dvādaśaḥ viṣuvān sarpasāmāni viṣuvati kriyante

original: (PB 25.15.2) etena vai sarpā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhann eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai sarpāḥ eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhan eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.15.3) jarvaro gṛhapatiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato brahmā pṛthuśvarā daureśravasa
analyzed: jarvaraḥ gṛhapatiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvataḥ brahmā pṛthuśvarāḥ daureśravasa

original: udgātā glāvaś cājagāvaś ca prastotṛpratihartārau dattastāpaso hotā śitipṛṣṭho maitrāvaruṇaḥ
analyzed: udgātā glāvaḥ ca ajagāvaḥ ca prastotṛ pratihartārau dattaḥ tāpasaḥ hotā śiti pṛṣṭhaḥ maitrāvaruṇaḥ

original: takṣako vaiśāleyo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śikhānuśikhau neṣṭāpotārau aruṇa āṭocchāvākaḥ timirgho
analyzed: takṣakaḥ vaiśāleyaḥ brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śikha anuśikhau neṣṭāpotārau aruṇaḥ āṭa ucchāvākaḥ timirghaḥ

original: daureśruto 'gnīt kautastāv adhvaryū arimejayaś ca janamejayaś cārbudo grāvas tu dajiraḥ
analyzed: daureśrutaḥ agnīdh kautastau adhvaryū arimejayaḥ ca janamejayaḥ ca arbudaḥ grāvaḥ tu dajiraḥ

original: subrahmaṇyaḥ cakkapiśaṅgāv unnetārau ṣaṇḍakuṣaṇḍāv abhigarāpagarau
analyzed: subrahmaṇyaḥ cakka piśaṅgau unnetārau ṣaṇḍa kuṣaṇḍau abhigara apagarau

original: (PB 25.15.4) etena vai sarpā apamṛtyum ajayann apamṛtyuṃ jayanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai sarpāḥ apamṛtyum ajayan apamṛtyum jayanti ye etat upayanti

original: tasmāt te hitvā jīrṇāṃ tvacam atisarpanty apa hi te mṛtyum ajayan sarpā vā ādityā
analyzed: tasmāt te hitvā jīrṇām tvacam atisarpanti apa hi te mṛtyum ajayan sarpāḥ vai ādityāḥ

original: ādityānām ivaiṣāṃ prakāśo bhavati ya etad upayanti
analyzed: ādityānām iva eṣām prakāśaḥ bhavati ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.16.1) gavām ayanaṃ prathamaḥ saṃvatsaro 'thādityānām athāṅgirasām
analyzed: gavām ayanam prathamaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ atha ādityānām atha aṅgirasām

original: (PB 25.16.2) etena vai gāvaḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchan prajāyante bahavo bhavanti
analyzed: etena vai gāvaḥ prajātim bhūmānam agacchan prajāyante bahavaḥ bhavanti

original: ya etad upayanty etena vā ādityā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad
analyzed: ye etat upayanti etena vai ādityāḥ eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhanti ye etat

original: upayanty etena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: upayanti etena vai aṅgirasaḥ svargam lokam āyan svargam lokam yanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.16.3) para āhṇāras trasadasyuḥ paurukutso vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ kakṣīvān auśijas
analyzed: paras āhṇāraḥ trasadasyuḥ paurukutsaḥ vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ kakṣīvān auśijas

original: ta etat prajātikāmāḥ sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān apuṣyann evaṃ
analyzed: te etat prajāti kāmāḥ sattrāyaṇam upāyan te sahasram sahasram putrān apuṣyan evam

original: vāva te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān puṣyanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: vāva te sahasram sahasram putrān puṣyanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.17.1) atirātraḥ sahasraṃ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā atirātraḥ prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
analyzed: atirātraḥ sahasram trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ atirātraḥ prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram

original: (PB 25.17.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavam gacchanti ye etad upayanti

original: (PB 25.17.3) etad vai prajāpatir jīryā mūra upait tena jarām apāhatāpa jarāṃ ghnate ya etad upayanti
analyzed: etat vai prajāpatiḥ jīryā mūraḥ upait tena jarām apāhata apa jarām ghnate ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.17.4) tad etat prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: tat etat prajāpateḥ sahasra saṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.18.1) pañca pañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ pañcadaśā pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśata ekaviṃśā viśvasṛjāṃ
analyzed: pañca pañcāśataḥ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ pañcadaśā pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ ekaviṃśāḥ viśvasṛjām

original: (PB 25.18.2) etena vai viśvasṛja idaṃ viśvam asṛjanta yad viśvam asṛjanta tasmāt viśvasṛjaḥ
analyzed: etena vai viśvasṛjaḥ idam viśvam asṛjanta yat viśvam asṛjanta tasmāt viśvasṛjaḥ

original: (PB 25.18.3) viśvam enān anu prajāyate ya etad upayanti
analyzed: viśvam enān anu prajāyate ye etat upayanti

original: (PB 25.18.4) tapo gṛhapatir brahma brahmerā patny amṛtam udgātā bhūtaṃ prastotā bhaviṣyat
analyzed: tapaḥ gṛhapatiḥ brahma brahmerā patnī amṛtam udgātā bhūtam prastotā bhaviṣyat

original: pratihartartava upagātāra ārtavāḥ sadasyāḥ satyaṃ hotartaṃ maitrāvaruṇa ojo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī
analyzed: pratihartā ṛtavaḥ upagātāraḥ ārtavāḥ sadasyāḥ satyam hotā ṛtam maitrāvaruṇaḥ ojaḥ brāhmaṇācchaṃsī

original: tviṣiś cāpacitiś ca neṣṭāpotārau yaśo 'cchāvāko 'gnir evāgnīd bhago grāvastud ūrg
analyzed: tviṣiḥ ca apacitiḥ ca neṣṭāpotārau yaśaḥ acchāvākaḥ agniḥ eva agnīdh bhagaḥ grāvastut ūrj

original: unnetā vāk subrahmaṇyaḥ prāṇo 'dhvaryur apānaḥ pratiprasthātā diṣṭir viśāstā balaṃ
analyzed: unnetā vāc subrahmaṇyaḥ prāṇaḥ adhvaryuḥ apānaḥ pratiprasthātā diṣṭiḥ viśāstā balam

original: dhruvagopam āśā haviṣyeṣy ahorātrāv idhmavāhau mṛtyuḥ śamitaite dīkṣante
analyzed: dhruvagopam āśā haviṣyeṣī ahar rātrau idhma vāhau mṛtyuḥ śamitā ete dīkṣante

original: (PB 25.18.5) tad eṣa śloko viśvasṛjaḥ prathame sattram āsata sahasrasamaṃ prasutena yantas te ha yajñe bhuvanasya gopā hiraṇmayaḥ śakuno brahmanām
analyzed: tat eṣa ślokaḥ viśvasṛjaḥ prathame sattram āsata sahasrasamam prasutena yantaḥ te ha yajñe bhuvanasya gopāḥ hiraṇmayaḥ śakunaḥ brahmanām

original: (PB 25.18.6) brahmaṇaḥ salokatāṃ sārṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti tad
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ salokatām sārṣṭi tām sāyujyam gacchanti ye etat upayanti tat

original: etad viśvasṛjāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai viśvasṛjaḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām
analyzed: etat viśvasṛjām sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai viśvasṛjaḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām

original: ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
analyzed: ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ye etat upayanti
